Translated Text: There’s all sorts of junk out there. Most of it is useless. but you’d be surprised what some people consider trash. Spare batteries. for example.

Original Text: This is Waste Site-9B31. a Colonial Union designated waste planet. It wasn’t viable for terraforming. so it has since become one of the few dump sites scattered across the galaxy. This particular planet is open to all active factions and has been in operation for well over twenty Union-standard years. Surprisingly enough. even being out here on the fringes of the known universe. the junk has built up to such a copious extent that mountains of waste have sprung into existence over the years.
Translated Text: This is Waste Site-9B31. a Colonial Union designated waste planet. It wasn’t viable for terraforming. so it has since become one of the few dump sites scattered across the galaxy. This particular planet is open to all active factions and has been in operation for well over twenty Union-standard years. Surprisingly enough. even being out here on the fringes of the known universe. the junk has built up to such a copious extent that mountains of waste have sprung into existence over the years.

Original Text: I oversee the waste collection here in this quadrant of the surface. It’s not a very exciting job. Just the junk and me. alone. With occasional dust storms sweeping in and jamming my movable parts. Do you have any idea how many times I have to re-oil my hinges? I yearn for clear blue skies and vibrant vegetation and green grass as far as the visual sensors can see. Ah. well. Only another three decades before I’m transferred.
Translated Text: I oversee the waste collection here in this quadrant of the surface. It’s not a very exciting job. Just the junk and me. alone. With occasional dust storms sweeping in and jamming my movable parts. Do you have any idea how many times I have to re-oil my hinges? I yearn for clear blue skies and vibrant vegetation and green grass as far as the visual sensors can see. Ah. well. Only another three decades before I’m transferred.

Original Text: Ugh. those nasty brutes. I can’t step one foot out of my bunker without them buzzing in my sound receptors. They weren’t always as active as they are now. There used to be a hive a few kilometers from here. but it was destroyed when a W.D. cargo vessel dumped several sheets of damaged hull plating onto the planet’s surface. Outright crushed the hive. Those things have been increasingly aggressive ever since. Then again. for someone like you. they’re nothing a few phase pistols can’t handle.
Translated Text: Ugh. those nasty brutes. I can’t step one foot out of my bunker without them buzzing in my sound receptors. They weren’t always as active as they are now. There used to be a hive a few kilometers from here. but it was destroyed when a W.D. cargo vessel dumped several sheets of damaged hull plating onto the planet’s surface. Outright crushed the hive. Those things have been increasingly aggressive ever since. Then again. for someone like you. they’re nothing a few phase pistols can’t handle.

Original Text: There must be one out there. I’ve seen plenty of them in the past. You may have to do a little sifting through the junk. but it’s not like all of them are buried beneath twelve meters of scrap metal…most of the time. In any case. if you have a scanner in your possession. it will be quite useful.
Translated Text: There must be one out there. I’ve seen plenty of them in the past. You may have to do a little sifting through the junk. but it’s not like all of them are buried beneath twelve meters of scrap metal…most of the time. In any case. if you have a scanner in your possession. it will be quite useful.

Original Text: I’m not well-informed on the current events of the galaxy. but I know this planet like the back of my hand.
Translated Text: I’m not well-informed on the current events of the galaxy. but I know this planet like the back of my hand.

Original Text: What do you wish to know?
Translated Text: What do you wish to know?

Original Text: I’d be glad to assist you however I can.
Translated Text: I’d be glad to assist you however I can.

Original Text: Allow me to explain: I’m in dire need of a battery. Working here as long as I have. I know there’s bound to be one unused somewhere in those wastes. But I absolutely refuse to leave my bunker. You’ve seen those wretched. buzzing things outside. haven’t you? They're awful creatures. The last time I mustered enough courage to go out there. they damaged my battery cell. I desperately require a replacement. Find one for me. yes? I’d be tremendously in your debt. And if you manage to exterminate a few of those flying vermin along the way. all the better. I sure won’t miss them.
Translated Text: Allow me to explain: I’m in dire need of a battery. Working here as long as I have. I know there’s bound to be one unused somewhere in those wastes. But I absolutely refuse to leave my bunker. You’ve seen those wretched. buzzing things outside. haven’t you? They're awful creatures. The last time I mustered enough courage to go out there. they damaged my battery cell. I desperately require a replacement. Find one for me. yes? I’d be tremendously in your debt. And if you manage to exterminate a few of those flying vermin along the way. all the better. I sure won’t miss them.

Original Text: I should’ve expected as much. There are very few considerate individuals left in this galaxy. Go on then. Fly away on your flashy starship and leave me here to rust with those beasts buzzing right outside.
Translated Text: I should’ve expected as much. There are very few considerate individuals left in this galaxy. Go on then. Fly away on your flashy starship and leave me here to rust with those beasts buzzing right outside.

Original Text: Ah. a visitor! What a surprise to find you here on Waste Site-9B31! It’s not like this planet is popular with tourists. Well. since you’re here. perhaps you can do me a small favor. It’ll only take a moment of your time.
Translated Text: Ah. a visitor! What a surprise to find you here on Waste Site-9B31! It’s not like this planet is popular with tourists. Well. since you’re here. perhaps you can do me a small favor. It’ll only take a moment of your time.

Original Text: There’s all sorts of junk out there. Most of it is useless. but you’d be surprised what some people consider trash. Spare batteries. for example.
Translated Text: There’s all sorts of junk out there. Most of it is useless. but you’d be surprised what some people consider trash. Spare batteries. for example.

Original Text: I oversee the waste collection here in this quadrant of the surface. It’s not a very exciting job. Just the junk and me. alone. With occasional dust storms sweeping in and jamming my movable parts. Do you have any idea how many times I have to re-oil my hinges? I yearn for clear blue skies and vibrant vegetation and green grass as far as the visual sensors can see. Ah. well. Only another three decades before I’m transferred.
Translated Text: I oversee the waste collection here in this quadrant of the surface. It’s not a very exciting job. Just the junk and me. alone. With occasional dust storms sweeping in and jamming my movable parts. Do you have any idea how many times I have to re-oil my hinges? I yearn for clear blue skies and vibrant vegetation and green grass as far as the visual sensors can see. Ah. well. Only another three decades before I’m transferred.

Original Text: There must be one out there. I’ve seen plenty of them in the past. You may have to do a little sifting through the junk. but it’s not like all of them are buried beneath twelve meters of scrap metal…most of the time. In any case. if you have a scanner in your possession. it will be quite useful.
Translated Text: There must be one out there. I’ve seen plenty of them in the past. You may have to do a little sifting through the junk. but it’s not like all of them are buried beneath twelve meters of scrap metal…most of the time. In any case. if you have a scanner in your possession. it will be quite useful.

Original Text: I’d be glad to assist you however I can.
Translated Text: I’d be glad to assist you however I can.

Original Text: I’m not well-informed on the current events of the galaxy. but I know this planet like the back of my hand.
Translated Text: I’m not well-informed on the current events of the galaxy. but I know this planet like the back of my hand.

Original Text: Many thanks! This battery will work. It’s got enough juice in it. so I can manage on my own. Did you get rid of any pests while you were at it?
Translated Text: Many thanks! This battery will work. It’s got enough juice in it. so I can manage on my own. Did you get rid of any pests while you were at it?

Original Text: Make sure you close the door behind you. Don’t let any of those fiends inside! And have you found my battery yet?
Translated Text: Make sure you close the door behind you. Don’t let any of those fiends inside! And have you found my battery yet?

Original Text: If you find anything you like out there. feel free to keep it. No one else wants it anyway.
Translated Text: If you find anything you like out there. feel free to keep it. No one else wants it anyway.

Original Text: Once I get off this job. the first place I’m going is a farming colony. I’ve had enough dry sand for the rest of my lifetime warranty.
Translated Text: Once I get off this job. the first place I’m going is a farming colony. I’ve had enough dry sand for the rest of my lifetime warranty.

Original Text: You have my thanks. A few years ago. a civilian surveillance crew crash-landed their shuttle just a ways from here. Tragically. there were no survivors. However. the crashed ship is bound to have a few supplies that could be helpful to us. Rations. batteries. pieces of old hull. and even scrap metal would be greatly appreciated. The wreck might be half-buried by now. but it's worth a try.
Translated Text: You have my thanks. A few years ago. a civilian surveillance crew crash-landed their shuttle just a ways from here. Tragically. there were no survivors. However. the crashed ship is bound to have a few supplies that could be helpful to us. Rations. batteries. pieces of old hull. and even scrap metal would be greatly appreciated. The wreck might be half-buried by now. but it's worth a try.

Original Text: You'd better get off this planet then. You won't want to be here when the storm hits. Take care of yourself.
Translated Text: You'd better get off this planet then. You won't want to be here when the storm hits. Take care of yourself.

Original Text: Did Outpost 448 send you? No. you say? Regardless. I'm glad to see anyone made it down here. How your teleporter brought you through the atmosphere is beyond me. Now. I hate to impose upon you. but if you'd be so kind as to help us around the base we'd be in your debt. There's a foul storm brewing. and we have to get this base fortified as soon as possible. Care to lend us a hand?
Translated Text: Did Outpost 448 send you? No. you say? Regardless. I'm glad to see anyone made it down here. How your teleporter brought you through the atmosphere is beyond me. Now. I hate to impose upon you. but if you'd be so kind as to help us around the base we'd be in your debt. There's a foul storm brewing. and we have to get this base fortified as soon as possible. Care to lend us a hand?

Original Text: Rations. scrap metal. batteries... This is good. Very good! Thank you. We can finish the rest of the preparations. Please. take these credits for your help. And I wouldn't stay on this planet much longer if I were you.
Translated Text: Rations. scrap metal. batteries... This is good. Very good! Thank you. We can finish the rest of the preparations. Please. take these credits for your help. And I wouldn't stay on this planet much longer if I were you.

Original Text: What are you still doing here? You should get going! I don't want you to be caught in the coming storm. We'll fare just fine now. don't worry about us.
Translated Text: What are you still doing here? You should get going! I don't want you to be caught in the coming storm. We'll fare just fine now. don't worry about us.

Original Text: You should get going. I don't want you to be caught in the coming storm.
Translated Text: You should get going. I don't want you to be caught in the coming storm.

Original Text: I'm not sure that another week of supplies will help us much in the long run. but we're all grateful for your help.
Translated Text: I'm not sure that another week of supplies will help us much in the long run. but we're all grateful for your help.

Original Text: We set up this base eight months ago. For seven of those months. we've been slammed with storm after storm. It's like the planet doesn't want us here. We were assigned to this planet to assess its viability for terraforming in the future. but the weather might make it impossible to continue our research.
Translated Text: We set up this base eight months ago. For seven of those months. we've been slammed with storm after storm. It's like the planet doesn't want us here. We were assigned to this planet to assess its viability for terraforming in the future. but the weather might make it impossible to continue our research.

Original Text: Thank you so much for helping Jarkos with the supplies. It means a lot to our research team.
Translated Text: Thank you so much for helping Jarkos with the supplies. It means a lot to our research team.

Original Text: If we can't finish our analysis of this planet. it won't be considered for terraforming approval. All our work will have been for nothing. Jarkos won't let us go out to the nearby crash site to scavenge for supplies because we don't have a regeneration atrium installed at this base. He doesn't want us to take the risk of getting hurt out there. If you could help him get the supplies to survive the coming storm. I'd be incredibly grateful.
Translated Text: If we can't finish our analysis of this planet. it won't be considered for terraforming approval. All our work will have been for nothing. Jarkos won't let us go out to the nearby crash site to scavenge for supplies because we don't have a regeneration atrium installed at this base. He doesn't want us to take the risk of getting hurt out there. If you could help him get the supplies to survive the coming storm. I'd be incredibly grateful.

Original Text: The storm will be hitting soon. so you should get out of here quickly. Thanks for assisting us. You're a lifesaver.
Translated Text: The storm will be hitting soon. so you should get out of here quickly. Thanks for assisting us. You're a lifesaver.

Original Text: We're in desperate need of supplies. I have very little material left to repair the damage from the last storm. If we're not prepared when this new storm hits. we might not make it off this planet alive.
Translated Text: We're in desperate need of supplies. I have very little material left to repair the damage from the last storm. If we're not prepared when this new storm hits. we might not make it off this planet alive.

Original Text: A friend of mine was a member of the crew that discovered this planet ten Union-standard years ago. She passed away a few years back. but she would've been happy to see this planet given a chance at colonization. Thanks for helping us make that happen.
Translated Text: A friend of mine was a member of the crew that discovered this planet ten Union-standard years ago. She passed away a few years back. but she would've been happy to see this planet given a chance at colonization. Thanks for helping us make that happen.

Original Text: I didn't think we'd see visitors on this planet. Despite the circumstances. it's a pleasure to meet you.
Translated Text: I didn't think we'd see visitors on this planet. Despite the circumstances. it's a pleasure to meet you.

Original Text: The Nelaxus is a Stargazer-class starship. manufactured in 3199 UE. It was registered as a civilian vessel but was seized by an Alliance crew a year after its initial launch. Since then. it has targeted convoys and trade stations. causing over 200.000 credits worth of damages and 24 human casualties.
Translated Text: The Nelaxus is a Stargazer-class starship. manufactured in 3199 UE. It was registered as a civilian vessel but was seized by an Alliance crew a year after its initial launch. Since then. it has targeted convoys and trade stations. causing over 200.000 credits worth of damages and 24 human casualties.

Original Text: Prevent Alliance ship ‘Nelaxus’ from continuing its attacks on trade stations.
Translated Text: Prevent Alliance ship ‘Nelaxus’ from continuing its attacks on trade stations.

Original Text: Colonial Union starship ‘U.S.S. Galicus’ attempted to open a hailing frequency with the cargo vessel ‘Rustbucket’. which then initiated an attack. The U.S.S. Galicus is in need of support.
Translated Text: Colonial Union starship ‘U.S.S. Galicus’ attempted to open a hailing frequency with the cargo vessel ‘Rustbucket’. which then initiated an attack. The U.S.S. Galicus is in need of support.

Original Text: Assist Colonial Union ship in combat with hostile cargo vessel.
Translated Text: Assist Colonial Union ship in combat with hostile cargo vessel.

Original Text: W.D. shipment of particle shields was intercepted by an Alliance of Gentlemen crew. Eliminate Alliance ship and reclaim stolen particle shield.
Translated Text: W.D. shipment of particle shields was intercepted by an Alliance of Gentlemen crew. Eliminate Alliance ship and reclaim stolen particle shield.

Original Text: CU Intrepid entered W.D. space. violating galactic zone laws. Eliminate intruder.
Translated Text: CU Intrepid entered W.D. space. violating galactic zone laws. Eliminate intruder.

Original Text: Deserted civilian Carrier nearby. Ripe for plundering. For 2000 credits. we’ll send the coordinates. Search it fast. We can’t guarantee we won’t make an offer to someone else.
Translated Text: Deserted civilian Carrier nearby. Ripe for plundering. For 2000 credits. we’ll send the coordinates. Search it fast. We can’t guarantee we won’t make an offer to someone else.

Original Text: Colonial Union Roland on route through contested sector. Join Gentlemen ambush and split the profits three ways. Anyone interested. respond immediately.
Translated Text: Colonial Union Roland on route through contested sector. Join Gentlemen ambush and split the profits three ways. Anyone interested. respond immediately.

Original Text: Colonial Union Roland-class starship ‘U.S.S. Gallantry’ was on a return route to Outpost 448 when it was ambushed by two Alliance vessels. The U.S.S. Gallantry is in urgent need of backup.
Translated Text: Colonial Union Roland-class starship ‘U.S.S. Gallantry’ was on a return route to Outpost 448 when it was ambushed by two Alliance vessels. The U.S.S. Gallantry is in urgent need of backup.

Original Text: Assist Colonial Union vessel in combat with Alliance raiders.
Translated Text: Assist Colonial Union vessel in combat with Alliance raiders.

Original Text: Nearby cargo vessel carrying valuable shipment. We’re unable to raid it ourselves—got tied up in another matter. Don’t let this opportunity go to waste. Small fee of 5000 credits for sector information.
Translated Text: Nearby cargo vessel carrying valuable shipment. We’re unable to raid it ourselves—got tied up in another matter. Don’t let this opportunity go to waste. Small fee of 5000 credits for sector information.

Original Text: To any Gentlemen out there. help us intercept a W.D. cargo shipment. The Corporation is disrupting our monopoly of spreadshot turrets in this quadrant. If you agree to get rid of their cargo transport. you’ll be paid generously for your assistance.
Translated Text: To any Gentlemen out there. help us intercept a W.D. cargo shipment. The Corporation is disrupting our monopoly of spreadshot turrets in this quadrant. If you agree to get rid of their cargo transport. you’ll be paid generously for your assistance.

Original Text: Why are you hailing us? Stop the cargo shipment.
Translated Text: Why are you hailing us? Stop the cargo shipment.

Original Text: Old Colonial Union waystation nearby. A passing Alliance crew reported no humanoid life signs on the base. Might be ripe for scrapping. Request coordinates for 1500 credits.
Translated Text: Old Colonial Union waystation nearby. A passing Alliance crew reported no humanoid life signs on the base. Might be ripe for scrapping. Request coordinates for 1500 credits.

Original Text: Alliance of Gentlemen ship ^The Conquest^ and a group of metal bandits have raided a W.D. mining base. Destroy ship and eliminate metal bandits inside the station.
Translated Text: Alliance of Gentlemen ship ^The Conquest^ and a group of metal bandits have raided a W.D. mining base. Destroy ship and eliminate metal bandits inside the station.

Original Text: Three security drones were hacked and are now hostile towards W.D. Corporation units. Disable the drones immediately.
Translated Text: Three security drones were hacked and are now hostile towards W.D. Corporation units. Disable the drones immediately.

Original Text: Remove native lifeforms that are obstructing a W.D. planetary base from continuing operations. Report to Sarkis Goran on the surface for further instruction.
Translated Text: 清除阻碍W.D.行星基地存在的所有生命体.向地面上的萨基斯-戈兰报告,以获得进一步的指示.

Original Text: W.D. Destroyer discovered unmanned in nearby sector. Investigate cause of malfunction.
Translated Text: W.D. Destroyer discovered unmanned in nearby sector. Investigate cause of malfunction.

Original Text: The ‘U.S.S. Centuria’ was an exploratory Colonial Union vessel. Before transmissions ceased. the crew of U.S.S. Centuria had reported they investigated a planet surface and underwent an ExoSuit breach that was promptly contained. Thirty-two Union-standard hours after. all transmission with the U.S.S. Centuria terminated.
Translated Text: The ‘U.S.S. Centuria’ was an exploratory Colonial Union vessel. Before transmissions ceased. the crew of U.S.S. Centuria had reported they investigated a planet surface and underwent an ExoSuit breach that was promptly contained. Thirty-two Union-standard hours after. all transmission with the U.S.S. Centuria terminated.

Original Text: Determine cause of failure in abandoned CU Intrepid-class starship.
Translated Text: Determine cause of failure in abandoned CU Intrepid-class starship.

Original Text: Station R-929 is a Colonial Union waystation that was retired eight Union-standard years ago. During its last scheduled cargo transport. several contained lifeforms escaped from their enclosures. Since the base was in the process of being shut down. nothing was done to remove the lifeforms from the station. Recently the Command Center decided to prepare Station R-929 for operation once more. The removal of the unrestrained lifeforms is a first step to getting the station’s systems back online.
Translated Text: Station R-929 是一个殖民联盟中转站.八年前就已退役.符合联盟标准. 在其最后一次预定的货物运输期间. 几个被收容的生命体从它们的围栏里逃了出来. 由于基地正在关闭. 没有采取任何措施将生命体从空间站中清楚. 最近.指挥中心决定再次让 R-929 站做好重新运营准备. 清除不受约束的生命形式是让空间站系统重新上线的第一步.

Original Text: Clear out an infestation of creatures from an old Colonial Union waystation.
Translated Text: 清除旧殖民联盟驿站的生物侵扰.

Original Text: Thank you for delivering the shipment. You’ve done us a tremendous service.
Translated Text: Thank you for delivering the shipment. You’ve done us a tremendous service.

Original Text: It pains me to hear that you were unable to deliver our warp coils to Outpost 448. Nevertheless. I understand that traveling through the galaxy poses great risks. I hold nothing against you.
Translated Text: It pains me to hear that you were unable to deliver our warp coils to Outpost 448. Nevertheless. I understand that traveling through the galaxy poses great risks. I hold nothing against you.

Original Text: I hear you received the warp coils. Thank you for assisting us. Please deliver the shipment to Outpost 448 safely.
Translated Text: I hear you received the warp coils. Thank you for assisting us. Please deliver the shipment to Outpost 448 safely.

Original Text: We manufacture warp coils. yes. In fact. Barwick was one of only three active warp coil factories in the galaxy. And our partners are facing hard times as it is.
Translated Text: We manufacture warp coils. yes. In fact. Barwick was one of only three active warp coil factories in the galaxy. And our partners are facing hard times as it is.

Original Text: Has the station faced threats in the past? Of course it has. We’re in an asteroid belt. We’ve had our fair share of problems in the past. mostly regarding collision and power failure. But this place wasn’t built to withstand war. officer.
Translated Text: Has the station faced threats in the past? Of course it has. We’re in an asteroid belt. We’ve had our fair share of problems in the past. mostly regarding collision and power failure. But this place wasn’t built to withstand war. officer.

Original Text: This facility was founded in 3179 UE by an engineer and asteroid miner named Henram Barwick. In all the years this facility has been running. it has never been the target of violence. We produce warp coils. nothing more.
Translated Text: This facility was founded in 3179 UE by an engineer and asteroid miner named Henram Barwick. In all the years this facility has been running. it has never been the target of violence. We produce warp coils. nothing more.

Original Text: Two of our workers were killed in the blast. Most of the members of this facility were close to them. If you speak to the others here. please understand they’re mourning the loss of two good friends.
Translated Text: Two of our workers were killed in the blast. Most of the members of this facility were close to them. If you speak to the others here. please understand they’re mourning the loss of two good friends.

Original Text: It happened so fast—at first we didn’t know what hit us. When we saw life support was down in the refinery. we had to override the doors to prevent losing the rest of the facility…although I suppose that doesn’t matter much now. Luckily. the Colonial Union has assigned someone to the investigation. I hope they can find whoever is responsible.
Translated Text: It happened so fast—at first we didn’t know what hit us. When we saw life support was down in the refinery. we had to override the doors to prevent losing the rest of the facility…although I suppose that doesn’t matter much now. Luckily. the Colonial Union has assigned someone to the investigation. I hope they can find whoever is responsible.

Original Text: What is it you would like to know?
Translated Text: What is it you would like to know?

Original Text: It’s good to see Colonial Union officers here. We’re all a bit shaky after the earlier attack. Welcome to the Barwick Warp Coil Company. You must be here for the delivery. correct? Thank you for your help. We need to get the last shipment of warp coils to Outpost 448. Speak with Jana Yors on the upper level of this room. She’s in charge of distribution. and she’ll load the shipment onto your vessel. If there’s anything else you need. I’m here to assist.
Translated Text: It’s good to see Colonial Union officers here. We’re all a bit shaky after the earlier attack. Welcome to the Barwick Warp Coil Company. You must be here for the delivery. correct? Thank you for your help. We need to get the last shipment of warp coils to Outpost 448. Speak with Jana Yors on the upper level of this room. She’s in charge of distribution. and she’ll load the shipment onto your vessel. If there’s anything else you need. I’m here to assist.

Original Text: It happened out of nowhere. Before we knew it. alarms were going off and the systems report showed life support was down in the refinery. I went into the refinery to assess the breach and confirmed two of our coworkers were killed in the initial blast. Otamo has been taking it especially hard. as his sister was one of the casualties. And now. with the refinery destroyed. there’s no hope left for Barwick Warp Coil Co. It’s difficult to see this place shutting down. But I suppose there’s nothing else we can do.
Translated Text: It happened out of nowhere. Before we knew it. alarms were going off and the systems report showed life support was down in the refinery. I went into the refinery to assess the breach and confirmed two of our coworkers were killed in the initial blast. Otamo has been taking it especially hard. as his sister was one of the casualties. And now. with the refinery destroyed. there’s no hope left for Barwick Warp Coil Co. It’s difficult to see this place shutting down. But I suppose there’s nothing else we can do.

Original Text: The refinery is through these doors. Be sure to have your ExoSuit if you enter. Life support is offline.
Translated Text: 炼油厂就在这些门后面.如果你进入.一定要带上你的ExoSuit.生命维持系统正常.

Original Text: I heard you delivered the warp coils already. My coworkers and I are grateful for your assistance.
Translated Text: I heard you delivered the warp coils already. My coworkers and I are grateful for your assistance.

Original Text: It is unfortunate that you failed to deliver the warp coils. May your future assignments be more successful.
Translated Text: It is unfortunate that you failed to deliver the warp coils. May your future assignments be more successful.

Original Text: I was operating sensors during the missile breach. yes. Since then. I’ve been working with Colonial Union investigators to track down the attacker. There are indications that someone within the W.D. Corporation may be responsible for launching the missile. However. relations with the Corporation are so unsteady as it is. I doubt the Command Center will make this information public. No one wants a war between the Colonial Union and the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.
Translated Text: I was operating sensors during the missile breach. yes. Since then. I’ve been working with Colonial Union investigators to track down the attacker. There are indications that someone within the W.D. Corporation may be responsible for launching the missile. However. relations with the Corporation are so unsteady as it is. I doubt the Command Center will make this information public. No one wants a war between the Colonial Union and the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.

Original Text: You must be one of the Colonial Union officers. It’s good to hear that you’ll be taking care of the shipment to Outpost 448.
Translated Text: You must be one of the Colonial Union officers. It’s good to hear that you’ll be taking care of the shipment to Outpost 448.

Original Text: If you're here for the warp coils. make sure you report to Kip Fulgen first. He's waiting for you by the teleporter.
Translated Text: 如果你是来取电磁圈的.一定要先向基普·富尔根报告.他在传送器旁等你.

Original Text: With our refinery destroyed. there’s no way we can continue manufacturing warp coils. This whole place will be shut down in due time. That’s why this shipment means so much to us.
Translated Text: 随着我们的精炼厂被毁.我们无法继续制造电磁圈. 这整个地方将在适当的时候关闭. 这就是为什么这批货物对我们意义重大.

Original Text: Good. I’ll have them sent up to your ship. These warp coils are Barwick’s last shipment. so take care of them. Don’t let them get damaged. and see that they get to Outpost 448 without a hitch. There’s an administrator at the center of the hub named Eldon Gatra. Tell him Barwick sent you. and he’ll handle the cargo from there.
Translated Text: 好的. 我会把它们送到你的船上. 这些电磁圈是 Barwick 的最后一批货.所以要小心. 不要让他们受到损坏.并确保他们顺利抵达 Outpost 448. 在中心有一位名叫 Eldon Gatra 的管理员. 告诉他 Barwick 派你来的.他会从那里处理货物.

Original Text: You’re here for the warp coils. I assume?
Translated Text: You’re here for the warp coils. I assume?

Original Text: Thanks for all your help. And make sure you’re careful with those warp coils. you hear?
Translated Text: Thanks for all your help. And make sure you’re careful with those warp coils. you hear?

Original Text: I’m not sure why you came all the way back here. but thanks for your help. You did a good job.
Translated Text: I’m not sure why you came all the way back here. but thanks for your help. You did a good job.

Original Text: I specifically told you to get those warp coils to Outpost 448 without a hitch. And you screwed up? I don’t know how you have the nerve to show your face around here.
Translated Text: I specifically told you to get those warp coils to Outpost 448 without a hitch. And you screwed up? I don’t know how you have the nerve to show your face around here.

Original Text: Thank you for your help. officer…
Translated Text: Thank you for your help. officer…

Original Text: Please. don’t bother me right now.
Translated Text: Please. don’t bother me right now.

Original Text: I appreciate that you’re taking care of our last shipment. officer. But please. don’t bother me right now.
Translated Text: I appreciate that you’re taking care of our last shipment. officer. But please. don’t bother me right now.

Original Text: Glad to hear it. Let me know when you’ve brought them all in.
Translated Text: Glad to hear it. Let me know when you’ve brought them all in.

Original Text: Bah. fine. I’ll have Gideon do it when he gets a chance.
Translated Text: Bah. fine. I’ll have Gideon do it when he gets a chance.

Original Text: I don’t get much help around the outpost. It can be a difficult place to manage with so few hands. If you’re looking to earn some extra credits. you could retrieve the sensors that are spread out around the perimeter of the outpost. We use the sensors to keep a watchful eye on the native critters. but it’s been a while since we’ve performed maintenance on a good number of those sensors. They’re due for repairs. If you just bring the batteries in for me. it’d be a tremendous help.
Translated Text: I don’t get much help around the outpost. It can be a difficult place to manage with so few hands. If you’re looking to earn some extra credits. you could retrieve the sensors that are spread out around the perimeter of the outpost. We use the sensors to keep a watchful eye on the native critters. but it’s been a while since we’ve performed maintenance on a good number of those sensors. They’re due for repairs. If you just bring the batteries in for me. it’d be a tremendous help.

Original Text: Good to see you made it to the Harbor. Stock up on supplies. Grab some port ale. Take a load off. Ah. and if you have the spare time. I’d be grateful if you or your crewmates could help me with something outside.
Translated Text: Good to see you made it to the Harbor. Stock up on supplies. Grab some port ale. Take a load off. Ah. and if you have the spare time. I’d be grateful if you or your crewmates could help me with something outside.

Original Text: Excellent work. If you weren’t already employed. I’d hire you permanently.
Translated Text: Excellent work. If you weren’t already employed. I’d hire you permanently.

Original Text: Feel free to stock up if you’re running low on supplies. I’m always willing to do a good trade. Ah. and do you have the old sensor batteries?
Translated Text: Feel free to stock up if you’re running low on supplies. I’m always willing to do a good trade. Ah. and do you have the old sensor batteries?

Original Text: Feel free to stock up if you’re running low on supplies. I’m always willing to do a good trade.
Translated Text: Feel free to stock up if you’re running low on supplies. I’m always willing to do a good trade.

Original Text: Thanks for your help with the sensors. If you need to stock up. you’re welcome to take a look at our supplies.
Translated Text: Thanks for your help with the sensors. If you need to stock up. you’re welcome to take a look at our supplies.

Original Text: Feel free to stock up if you’re running low on supplies. I’m always willing to do a good trade.
Translated Text: Feel free to stock up if you’re running low on supplies. I’m always willing to do a good trade.

Original Text: Our unit captain overworks us day in and day out. I’ve applied several times for transfer to another unit. but I keep getting denied. The Corporation doesn’t go easy on you.
Translated Text: Our unit captain overworks us day in and day out. I’ve applied several times for transfer to another unit. but I keep getting denied. The Corporation doesn’t go easy on you.

Original Text: We don’t have much time here at the Harbor. I plan to enjoy my drink while I still can.
Translated Text: We don’t have much time here at the Harbor. I plan to enjoy my drink while I still can.

Original Text: I hear the owner of this place has trouble with the native lifeforms. Guess that’s what happens when you plant your roots on an alien planet.
Translated Text: I hear the owner of this place has trouble with the native lifeforms. Guess that’s what happens when you plant your roots on an alien planet.

Original Text: We’ve been stuck on our ship for far too long. It’s good to see new faces.
Translated Text: We’ve been stuck on our ship for far too long. It’s good to see new faces.

Original Text: I don’t know how they manage it out here. but the Harbor always serves the best port ale in the galaxy.
Translated Text: I don’t know how they manage it out here. but the Harbor always serves the best port ale in the galaxy.

Original Text: We cut through W.D. territory the other day to get to our assignment location. All those damn security drones were on our tails until we reentered CU space. The W.D. Corp is brutal. isn’t it? Not even Colonial Union officers can get a break anywhere the Corporation has staked its claim. Should be illegal. if you ask me.
Translated Text: We cut through W.D. territory the other day to get to our assignment location. All those damn security drones were on our tails until we reentered CU space. The W.D. Corp is brutal. isn’t it? Not even Colonial Union officers can get a break anywhere the Corporation has staked its claim. Should be illegal. if you ask me.

Original Text: I went to the Academy in the Reckalis galaxy several years ago. But nothing they taught prepared me for what life is really like on the fringes. The straightforward policies of Academy curriculum rarely apply out here. Nukali and I have pushed our ship farther than it was ever meant to go. I’ve seen all sorts of dirty tricks in ship-to-ship combat that they never once mentioned in a class. We’ve set foot on planets and seen phenomena that no other human has witnessed before. Living out here puts to shame any simulation I ever took back in my student days.
Translated Text: I went to the Academy in the Reckalis galaxy several years ago. But nothing they taught prepared me for what life is really like on the fringes. The straightforward policies of Academy curriculum rarely apply out here. Nukali and I have pushed our ship farther than it was ever meant to go. I’ve seen all sorts of dirty tricks in ship-to-ship combat that they never once mentioned in a class. We’ve set foot on planets and seen phenomena that no other human has witnessed before. Living out here puts to shame any simulation I ever took back in my student days.

Original Text: I’ve had a tough time navigating through the quadrant these days. I might have to outfit my cargo ship with weapons systems and hire a specialist.
Translated Text: I’ve had a tough time navigating through the quadrant these days. I might have to outfit my cargo ship with weapons systems and hire a specialist.

Original Text: The Harbor is a good station. We always stop here on our supply route.
Translated Text: The Harbor is a good station. We always stop here on our supply route.

Original Text: You look…rough around the edges. Please. don’t take it personally. But if you’re a Gentleman. you’d better get your ass out of here.
Translated Text: You look…rough around the edges. Please. don’t take it personally. But if you’re a Gentleman. you’d better get your ass out of here.

Original Text: We welcome Colonial Union officers and Wolden-Dorf units here at our outpost. Cargo ships and civilian vessels stop by frequently as well. It makes for good business. even all the way out here. However. the Harbor has zero tolerance for Gentlemen. If we find any Alliance members. we’re sure to get rid of them as quickly as possible.
Translated Text: We welcome Colonial Union officers and Wolden-Dorf units here at our outpost. Cargo ships and civilian vessels stop by frequently as well. It makes for good business. even all the way out here. However. the Harbor has zero tolerance for Gentlemen. If we find any Alliance members. we’re sure to get rid of them as quickly as possible.

Original Text: If you want a drink. talk to Arb over at the bar.
Translated Text: If you want a drink. talk to Arb over at the bar.

Original Text: …I don’t like the look of you. Don’t cause any trouble. or you’ll be on the next prison rig out of here.
Translated Text: …I don’t like the look of you. Don’t cause any trouble. or you’ll be on the next prison rig out of here.

Original Text: They’re big and ugly. But with enough blasts from a heavy beam pistol. they won’t be causing problems anymore. That’s all you need to know. So get to work.
Translated Text: They’re big and ugly. But with enough blasts from a heavy beam pistol. they won’t be causing problems anymore. That’s all you need to know. So get to work.

Original Text: You’re the unit they sent? Well. I guess I shouldn’t have been expecting much. It’s not like they’d send a remarkable crew to do the odd jobs. Alright. listen up. Here’s what you’re going to do. The base has been plagued by crawlers as of late. Usually. they’re manageable. But they’ve been getting out of control lately and have been hindering our work. It’s your job to clear them out.
Translated Text: You’re the unit they sent? Well. I guess I shouldn’t have been expecting much. It’s not like they’d send a remarkable crew to do the odd jobs. Alright. listen up. Here’s what you’re going to do. The base has been plagued by crawlers as of late. Usually. they’re manageable. But they’ve been getting out of control lately and have been hindering our work. It’s your job to clear them out.

Original Text: Get back to your ship. Your job may be over. but we still have a lot of work to do.
Translated Text: Get back to your ship. Your job may be over. but we still have a lot of work to do.

Original Text: Work here is hard. but at least I’m not on a starship. I couldn’t imagine warping from place to place. risking life and limb just to run errands for the Wolden-Dorf HQ. Props to you for doing that every day.
Translated Text: Work here is hard. but at least I’m not on a starship. I couldn’t imagine warping from place to place. risking life and limb just to run errands for the Wolden-Dorf HQ. Props to you for doing that every day.

Original Text: Don’t tell Sarkis I’m taking a break.
Translated Text: Don’t tell Sarkis I’m taking a break.

Original Text: Hey. you’re the ones they assigned to clear out the perimeter. right? Thanks. We couldn’t get any work done with those things lingering around.
Translated Text: Hey. you’re the ones they assigned to clear out the perimeter. right? Thanks. We couldn’t get any work done with those things lingering around.

Original Text: What. do you need something? Talk to Sarkis. He’s the supervisor of this base.
Translated Text: What. do you need something? Talk to Sarkis. He’s the supervisor of this base.

Original Text: Three Union-standard weeks ago in its last transmission to the Command Center. the Roland-class starship ^U.S.S. Valiance^ reported problems with its navigation controls. Not long after. contact with the ship was severed and the Command Center was unable to track the whereabouts of the U.S.S. Valiance. Recently. a civilian vessel reported a short-range distress signal coming from the planet ^Elarius 9^. It has been confirmed that the distress signal is being transmitted by the U.S.S. Valiance. but the state of its crew is currently unknown.
Translated Text: Three Union-standard weeks ago in its last transmission to the Command Center. the Roland-class starship ^U.S.S. Valiance^ reported problems with its navigation controls. Not long after. contact with the ship was severed and the Command Center was unable to track the whereabouts of the U.S.S. Valiance. Recently. a civilian vessel reported a short-range distress signal coming from the planet ^Elarius 9^. It has been confirmed that the distress signal is being transmitted by the U.S.S. Valiance. but the state of its crew is currently unknown.

Original Text: Colonial Union Roland-class starship ^U.S.S. Valiance^ crash landed on a planet. Board the crashed ship and look for survivors.
Translated Text: Colonial Union Roland-class starship ^U.S.S. Valiance^ crash landed on a planet. Board the crashed ship and look for survivors.

Original Text: It is unfortunate that assistance came too late. All other officers of the Valiance perished in the initial crash or from severe injuries afterward. XR-38134 is the only survivor of the Valiance’s crew. One XR unit may not be considered a successful rescue mission. For this. XR-38134 apologizes. But XR-38134 is most grateful to you for finding the Valiance. If it will not cause trouble. could you do one favor for XR-38134? Please. do not tell the Command Center that XR-38134 is still functional. XR-38134 will disable the distress signal. and Command will not receive any further reports of Elarius 9. If Command knows XR-38134 is still functional. a transport vessel will come to retrieve XR-38134. And XR-38134 would like to stay with the Valiance.
Translated Text: It is unfortunate that assistance came too late. All other officers of the Valiance perished in the initial crash or from severe injuries afterward. XR-38134 is the only survivor of the Valiance’s crew. One XR unit may not be considered a successful rescue mission. For this. XR-38134 apologizes. But XR-38134 is most grateful to you for finding the Valiance. If it will not cause trouble. could you do one favor for XR-38134? Please. do not tell the Command Center that XR-38134 is still functional. XR-38134 will disable the distress signal. and Command will not receive any further reports of Elarius 9. If Command knows XR-38134 is still functional. a transport vessel will come to retrieve XR-38134. And XR-38134 would like to stay with the Valiance.

Original Text: Hello. XR-38134 had not expected to see another Colonial Union officer again. The Command Center must have learned of XR-38134’s distress signal. Is that why you have come here. officer?
Translated Text: Hello. XR-38134 had not expected to see another Colonial Union officer again. The Command Center must have learned of XR-38134’s distress signal. Is that why you have come here. officer?

Original Text: XR-38134 is most grateful to you. officer. Most grateful.
Translated Text: XR-38134 is most grateful to you. officer. Most grateful.

Original Text: This desk is for Outpost 448’s supply hold and voyaging services. Do you have business here?
Translated Text: This desk is for Outpost 448’s supply hold and voyaging services. Do you have business here?

Original Text: You are now registered for the Explorer’s Appeal. You will no longer receive missions through long range comms. but the Command Center may require you to complete missions you have already been assigned. After your current duties have been completed. you are free to embark on your expedition. Thank you for your service. and may your voyages bring you much discovery. Together. we survive.
Translated Text: You are now registered for the Explorer’s Appeal. You will no longer receive missions through long range comms. but the Command Center may require you to complete missions you have already been assigned. After your current duties have been completed. you are free to embark on your expedition. Thank you for your service. and may your voyages bring you much discovery. Together. we survive.

Original Text: At this time. you do not have an appropriate status with the Colonial Union to be accepted for the Explorer’s Appeal. When you gain more standing with the Command Center. you may attempt to register again.
Translated Text: At this time. you do not have an appropriate status with the Colonial Union to be accepted for the Explorer’s Appeal. When you gain more standing with the Command Center. you may attempt to register again.

Original Text: The Explorer’s Appeal is a Colonial Union approved exemption from missions given through long range comms. Colonial Union crews that specialize in exploration and research can file for this appeal and focus their efforts solely on discovery. Would you like to apply for an appeal?
Translated Text: The Explorer’s Appeal is a Colonial Union approved exemption from missions given through long range comms. Colonial Union crews that specialize in exploration and research can file for this appeal and focus their efforts solely on discovery. Would you like to apply for an appeal?

Original Text: The facility will be shutting down in a few weeks. I assume the workers at Barwick will be reassigned to new positions. It’s a disappointment that Barwick is facing closure—new warp coils are hard to come by out here.
Translated Text: The facility will be shutting down in a few weeks. I assume the workers at Barwick will be reassigned to new positions. It’s a disappointment that Barwick is facing closure—new warp coils are hard to come by out here.

Original Text: You have the shipment from Barwick? We received a transmission that you’d be on your way. Thank you for delivering the warp coils to us. Please. take this payment for your work.
Translated Text: You have the shipment from Barwick? We received a transmission that you’d be on your way. Thank you for delivering the warp coils to us. Please. take this payment for your work.

Original Text: I will report this issue to the Command Center. Please. be on your way.
Translated Text: I will report this issue to the Command Center. Please. be on your way.

Original Text: You were sent with the shipment from Barwick? Do you have the warp coils?
Translated Text: You were sent with the shipment from Barwick? Do you have the warp coils?

Original Text: Hello. officer. This desk is for Outpost 448’s supply hold and voyaging services. Do you have business here? Or are you seeking to request an Explorer’s Appeal?
Translated Text: Hello. officer. This desk is for Outpost 448’s supply hold and voyaging services. Do you have business here? Or are you seeking to request an Explorer’s Appeal?

Original Text: You are no longer registered for the Explorer’s Appeal. The Command Center will reopen long range comms when there is a suitable assignment for your crew.
Translated Text: You are no longer registered for the Explorer’s Appeal. The Command Center will reopen long range comms when there is a suitable assignment for your crew.

Original Text: This desk is for Outpost 448’s supply hold and voyaging services. How may I assist you?
Translated Text: 这里是 Outpost 448 的补给和航行服务. 我可以帮助你什么呢?

Original Text: Hello. officer. This desk is for Outpost 448’s supply hold and voyaging services. Do you have business here?
Translated Text: 你好.警官. 这里是 Outpost 448 的补给和航行服务. 你这里有生意吗?

Original Text: Five Union-standard days ago. a missile from an unidentified craft was launched at the Barwick Warp Coil Co. An investigation into the attack is underway. but further warp coil manufacture has been deemed impossible due to the extensive damages to the facilities. Barwick has no other resources to spare and requested a reliable Colonial Union crew to transport the last shipment of warp coils to Outpost 448.
Translated Text: 五天前.巴威克扭曲线圈公司因不明原因被导弹袭击.对这次袭击的调查正在进行中.但由于对设施的广泛破坏.扭曲线圈制造公司无法再继续制造. 巴威克已没有其他资源可利用.并要求可靠的殖民联盟船员将最后一批电磁圈运送到前哨站 448.

Original Text: Transport final warp coil shipment from Barwick Warp Coil Co. to Outpost 448. Report to Kip Fulgen on the Barwick station for further instruction.
Translated Text: 从巴威克电磁圈公司运送最后一批电磁圈到448前哨站.请到Barwick站的Kip·Fulgen那里接受进一步指示

Original Text: CU Command is looking for a crew on route to Outpost 448 to accept a voluntary delivery assignment. If your crew is willing to volunteer. reply to this transmission.
Translated Text: CU指挥部正在寻找一个船员在前往前哨448的途中接受自愿交付任务.如果您的船员愿意自愿.请回复此传输.

Original Text: Founded in 3179 UE by engineer and asteroid miner Henram Barwick. The station specializes in the production of warp coils and refinement of a raw material found in certain asteroids.
Translated Text: Founded in 3179 UE by engineer and asteroid miner Henram Barwick. The station specializes in the production of warp coils and refinement of a raw material found in certain asteroids.

Original Text: Teleport to the surface of the planet where the Harbor is located. Then sabotage the sensor stations by removing their power cells. I sent you the coordinates. if you didn’t have them already. Good luck. And thank you for your assistance.
Translated Text: Teleport to the surface of the planet where the Harbor is located. Then sabotage the sensor stations by removing their power cells. I sent you the coordinates. if you didn’t have them already. Good luck. And thank you for your assistance.

Original Text: My fellow Gentlemen. there’s a sector within your warp range that contains a planetary supply station called ‘The Harbor’. The station is famous for its anti-Alliance policies and has been behind the incarceration of several Gentlemen crews over the past decade. Unfortunately. there’s little we can do without bringing the full force of the Colonial Union down upon us. However. we can tamper with the Harbor’s perimeter with minimal risk. If you’re interested in the task. reply to this transmission.
Translated Text: My fellow Gentlemen. there’s a sector within your warp range that contains a planetary supply station called ‘The Harbor’. The station is famous for its anti-Alliance policies and has been behind the incarceration of several Gentlemen crews over the past decade. Unfortunately. there’s little we can do without bringing the full force of the Colonial Union down upon us. However. we can tamper with the Harbor’s perimeter with minimal risk. If you’re interested in the task. reply to this transmission.

Original Text: Leave before we change our minds.
Translated Text: Leave before we change our minds.

Original Text: Don’t make us regret our decision.
Translated Text: Don’t make us regret our decision.

Original Text: You’ve made your point. We’ll let you be.
Translated Text: You’ve made your point. We’ll let you be.

Original Text: We’d like to avoid a fight. as well. Just be on your way.
Translated Text: We’d like to avoid a fight. as well. Just be on your way.

Original Text: Just this once. we’ll allow you to go without conflict. Leave before we change our minds.
Translated Text: Just this once. we’ll allow you to go without conflict. Leave before we change our minds.

Original Text: No. you’re not getting out of this situation.
Translated Text: No. you’re not getting out of this situation.

Original Text: We refuse to cooperate with intruders.
Translated Text: We refuse to cooperate with intruders.

Original Text: You have illegally entered W.D. space. State your business quickly. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME].
Translated Text: You have illegally entered W.D. space. State your business quickly. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME].

Original Text: This sector is occupied by the W.D. Corporation. You are infringing upon galactic zone laws. Colonial Union vessel. Warp immediately.
Translated Text: This sector is occupied by the W.D. Corporation. You are infringing upon galactic zone laws. Colonial Union vessel. Warp immediately.

Original Text: This is a representative of the Wolden-Dorf Galactic Fleet. State your purpose for entering this sector.
Translated Text: This is a representative of the Wolden-Dorf Galactic Fleet. State your purpose for entering this sector.

Original Text: You have crossed into W.D. space. Do not sever this comms link. and leave as soon as your warp drive is ready. Otherwise. your vessel will be eliminated.
Translated Text: You have crossed into W.D. space. Do not sever this comms link. and leave as soon as your warp drive is ready. Otherwise. your vessel will be eliminated.

Original Text: Colonial Union vessel. you are violating a zone law by warping into this sector. Keep comms open with our unit and leave this instant. Refusal to follow these directives will be seen as a hostile act.
Translated Text: Colonial Union vessel. you are violating a zone law by warping into this sector. Keep comms open with our unit and leave this instant. Refusal to follow these directives will be seen as a hostile act.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. unless it is prenegotiated between the Colonial Union Command Center and W.D. Headquarters. you are not authorized to enter W.D. Corporation zones. Remove your ship from this sector. or we will ready weapons.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. unless it is prenegotiated between the Colonial Union Command Center and W.D. Headquarters. you are not authorized to enter W.D. Corporation zones. Remove your ship from this sector. or we will ready weapons.

Original Text: There’s been word that the Sylvassi workers at several outposts have been unsettled as of late. Some believe they’re plotting some sort of uprising. That’s probably why Wulfrom Kas was called back to Headquarters. He has a way with those things. Maybe he can calm them down.
Translated Text: There’s been word that the Sylvassi workers at several outposts have been unsettled as of late. Some believe they’re plotting some sort of uprising. That’s probably why Wulfrom Kas was called back to Headquarters. He has a way with those things. Maybe he can calm them down.

Original Text: I hear our Chief Supervisor. Sullivan Vorcolp. was once good friends with Outpost 448’s Commander. Apparently. they even attended the Academy together. It’s strange to think they were once comrades. when the Union and the Corporation are on the verge of so much conflict now.
Translated Text: 我听到了我们的主管. 沙利文·沃尔科尔普. 曾经是448哨站指挥官的好朋友. 显然. 他们甚至一起参加了学院. 认为他们曾经是同志很奇怪. 当工会和公司现在处于如此多冲突的边缘时.

Original Text: We’ve been directed to guard a planetary facility not far from here. It may not be the most eventful of jobs. but at least we aren’t being sent into neutral space.
Translated Text: We’ve been directed to guard a planetary facility not far from here. It may not be the most eventful of jobs. but at least we aren’t being sent into neutral space.

Original Text: You don’t think Headquarters records our hail transmissions. do you? I should really watch what I say from now on…
Translated Text: You don’t think Headquarters records our hail transmissions. do you? I should really watch what I say from now on…

Original Text: There are claims that Chief Supervisor Sullivan Vorcolp is looking for a qualified crew to perform a special classified job for the W.D. Corporation. It might be worthwhile to do extra well on your next assignments. You might get a chance to impress the Chief Supervisor. and only good things can come of it.
Translated Text: There are claims that Chief Supervisor Sullivan Vorcolp is looking for a qualified crew to perform a special classified job for the W.D. Corporation. It might be worthwhile to do extra well on your next assignments. You might get a chance to impress the Chief Supervisor. and only good things can come of it.

Original Text: The Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency is always looking for new recruits. If you haven't worked with them before and you're confident in your ship's combat capabilities. the Grey Huntsmen might be worth joining. Bounty jobs can be profitable. and they help make the galaxy a bit safer.
Translated Text: The Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency is always looking for new recruits. If you haven't worked with them before and you're confident in your ship's combat capabilities. the Grey Huntsmen might be worth joining. Bounty jobs can be profitable. and they help make the galaxy a bit safer.

Original Text: A Sylvassi named Skiah at Cornelia Station is offering a valuable reward for the completion of some sort of mission. Apparently a lot of people were interested but upon hearing what she had to say turned her down. We wonder what the job could be. but we doubt it's anything the W.D. Corporation can't handle.
Translated Text: A Sylvassi named Skiah at Cornelia Station is offering a valuable reward for the completion of some sort of mission. Apparently a lot of people were interested but upon hearing what she had to say turned her down. We wonder what the job could be. but we doubt it's anything the W.D. Corporation can't handle.

Original Text: The Ion Races should be starting soon. It's one of the biggest events in the galaxy. But with the spread of the Infected. this might be the last year the races can be held here. so it's a special time to participate. We'd join ourselves if we weren't so busy.
Translated Text: The Ion Races should be starting soon. It's one of the biggest events in the galaxy. But with the spread of the Infected. this might be the last year the races can be held here. so it's a special time to participate. We'd join ourselves if we weren't so busy.

Original Text: Don't tell our supervisors. but we're hunting for data fragments to find the Lost Colony. Wait. you're not looking for them too. are you?
Translated Text: Don't tell our supervisors. but we're hunting for data fragments to find the Lost Colony. Wait. you're not looking for them too. are you?

Original Text: Chief Supervisor Sullivan Vorcolp has an impressive record. He's the reason our crew requested a transfer to this galaxy. Wherever he goes. progress is bound to follow.
Translated Text: Chief Supervisor Sullivan Vorcolp has an impressive record. He's the reason our crew requested a transfer to this galaxy. Wherever he goes. progress is bound to follow.

Original Text: There have been many attacks from Alliance of Gentlemen lately. even in W.D. sectors. Stay vigilant.
Translated Text: There have been many attacks from Alliance of Gentlemen lately. even in W.D. sectors. Stay vigilant.

Original Text: The Infected are spreading. It's making travel difficult in some parts of the galaxy. and the Colonial Union isn't working fast enough to combat the threat. If the Colonial Union doesn't show some more competence soon. the W.D. Corporation might step in to handle the situation in its own way.
Translated Text: The Infected are spreading. It's making travel difficult in some parts of the galaxy. and the Colonial Union isn't working fast enough to combat the threat. If the Colonial Union doesn't show some more competence soon. the W.D. Corporation might step in to handle the situation in its own way.

Original Text: Crews like ours don't earn a lot of credits working for the W.D. Corporation. Between repairs and fuel costs. many crews have to take finances into their own hands and find work on the side. It suits us well enough. With all the chaos in the galaxy. nearly every station has job opportunities these days.
Translated Text: Crews like ours don't earn a lot of credits working for the W.D. Corporation. Between repairs and fuel costs. many crews have to take finances into their own hands and find work on the side. It suits us well enough. With all the chaos in the galaxy. nearly every station has job opportunities these days.

Original Text: As the galaxy grows more chaotic. fuel costs are also rising. W.D. units like ours spend enough credits as it is on fuel. It's just going to make things harder from here on out.
Translated Text: As the galaxy grows more chaotic. fuel costs are also rising. W.D. units like ours spend enough credits as it is on fuel. It's just going to make things harder from here on out.

Original Text: Beacons have often been used by the W.D. Corporation and occasionally by the Colonial Union to bolster patrols. But now that beacon technology has fallen into hands of bandits and the Alliance of Gentlemen. neutral space has gotten much harder to traverse. We make a point of destroying a bandit beacon any time we come across one.
Translated Text: Beacons have often been used by the W.D. Corporation and occasionally by the Colonial Union to bolster patrols. But now that beacon technology has fallen into hands of bandits and the Alliance of Gentlemen. neutral space has gotten much harder to traverse. We make a point of destroying a bandit beacon any time we come across one.

Original Text: Take what you want. Just let us be and move on.
Translated Text: Take what you want. Just let us be and move on.

Original Text: This is all we’ll spare. Don’t push us any further.
Translated Text: This is all we’ll spare. Don’t push us any further.

Original Text: Just take your credits. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.
Translated Text: Just take your credits. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.

Original Text: How could you threaten another W.D. unit? You will be reported to Headquarters immediately.
Translated Text: How could you threaten another W.D. unit? You will be reported to Headquarters immediately.

Original Text: No. we will not allow you to demean the Corporation with your errant demands.
Translated Text: No. we will not allow you to demean the Corporation with your errant demands.

Original Text: We refuse to submit to such demands.
Translated Text: We refuse to submit to such demands.

Original Text: Just take your fuel. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.
Translated Text: Just take your fuel. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.

Original Text: This is a standard W.D. patrol unit. Is there an issue you need to report?
Translated Text: This is a standard W.D. patrol unit. Is there an issue you need to report?

Original Text: We refuse to cooperate with intruders.
Translated Text: We refuse to cooperate with intruders.

Original Text: This is restricted W.D. space. You have one opportunity to warp out or we will fire upon your ship.
Translated Text: This is restricted W.D. space. You have one opportunity to warp out or we will fire upon your ship.

Original Text: You have entered a Wolden-Dorf designated zone. If you do not depart immediately. we will eliminate your vessel.
Translated Text: You have entered a Wolden-Dorf designated zone. If you do not depart immediately. we will eliminate your vessel.

Original Text: You have violated galactic zone laws. If you do not back down. we will commence an attack.
Translated Text: You have violated galactic zone laws. If you do not back down. we will commence an attack.

Original Text: By warping into this sector. you have illegally entered the W.D. zone. Refusing to warp out or readying your weapons will give us greater cause to attack your ship. Leave while you still can.
Translated Text: By warping into this sector. you have illegally entered the W.D. zone. Refusing to warp out or readying your weapons will give us greater cause to attack your ship. Leave while you still can.

Original Text: Your entry into this sector is seen as a hostile act. Do not persist. or we will fire our weapons.
Translated Text: Your entry into this sector is seen as a hostile act. Do not persist. or we will fire our weapons.

Original Text: Your vessel is not authorized to be in this zone. Return to your previous sector immediately. Failure to comply will result in your termination.
Translated Text: Your vessel is not authorized to be in this zone. Return to your previous sector immediately. Failure to comply will result in your termination.

Original Text: We will oblige just this once.
Translated Text: We will oblige just this once.

Original Text: We’ll purchase one crate of biscuits. No more than that.
Translated Text: We’ll purchase one crate of biscuits. No more than that.

Original Text: No. You had your chance to leave. Now you’re just wasting the Corporation’s time.
Translated Text: No. You had your chance to leave. Now you’re just wasting the Corporation’s time.

Original Text: We aren’t interested in buying biscuits. Your solicitation in restricted W.D. space is repulsive.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in buying biscuits. Your solicitation in restricted W.D. space is repulsive.

Original Text: Yes. fine. We’ll buy a crate.
Translated Text: Yes. fine. We’ll buy a crate.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll purchase a crate. Just don’t bother us again.
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll purchase a crate. Just don’t bother us again.

Original Text: Leave before we change our minds.
Translated Text: Leave before we change our minds.

Original Text: Don’t make us regret our decision.
Translated Text: Don’t make us regret our decision.

Original Text: You’ve made your point. We’ll let you be.
Translated Text: You’ve made your point. We’ll let you be.

Original Text: We’d like to avoid a fight. as well. Just be on your way.
Translated Text: We’d like to avoid a fight. as well. Just be on your way.

Original Text: Just this once. we’ll allow you to go without conflict. Leave before we change our minds.
Translated Text: Just this once. we’ll allow you to go without conflict. Leave before we change our minds.

Original Text: No. you’re not getting out of this situation.
Translated Text: No. you’re not getting out of this situation.

Original Text: If you're offering biscuits. perhaps we can look the other way. Just get out of the W.D. zone before someone else notices you.
Translated Text: If you're offering biscuits. perhaps we can look the other way. Just get out of the W.D. zone before someone else notices you.

Original Text: We will not be bought by biscuits.
Translated Text: We will not be bought by biscuits.

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit vessels are not permitted in this sector. Leave immediately. or we will be forced to fire upon you.
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit vessels are not permitted in this sector. Leave immediately. or we will be forced to fire upon you.

Original Text: This is the W.D. zone. You are not allowed here. Fluffy Biscuit. Warp out this instant. or we will fire.
Translated Text: This is the W.D. zone. You are not allowed here. Fluffy Biscuit. Warp out this instant. or we will fire.

Original Text: You are not authorized to enter the W.D. zone. We will give you ninety seconds to ready your warp drive before we will fire.
Translated Text: You are not authorized to enter the W.D. zone. We will give you ninety seconds to ready your warp drive before we will fire.

Original Text: You won’t be getting anything else from us. Warp out of here quickly.
Translated Text: You won’t be getting anything else from us. Warp out of here quickly.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll let you go. But if you cause any more trouble for us. we will not hesitate to fire at you.
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll let you go. But if you cause any more trouble for us. we will not hesitate to fire at you.

Original Text: Diplomatic today. are we? All right. we’ll play along. But if you cross us again. you won’t receive any further generous treatment.
Translated Text: Diplomatic today. are we? All right. we’ll play along. But if you cross us again. you won’t receive any further generous treatment.

Original Text: I suppose you caught us on a good day. We’ll agree to let you go—just this once.
Translated Text: I suppose you caught us on a good day. We’ll agree to let you go—just this once.

Original Text: We haven’t the time to negotiate with dead men.
Translated Text: We haven’t the time to negotiate with dead men.

Original Text: You’re attempting to negotiate with us? Is this a joke? We will not oblige.
Translated Text: You’re attempting to negotiate with us? Is this a joke? We will not oblige.

Original Text: You are in restricted space. Colonial Union. Warp out. or your ship will be destroyed.
Translated Text: You are in restricted space. Colonial Union. Warp out. or your ship will be destroyed.

Original Text: This sector is under the control of the W.D. Galactic Fleet. You will either warp out or suffer the repercussions.
Translated Text: This sector is under the control of the W.D. Galactic Fleet. You will either warp out or suffer the repercussions.

Original Text: The Corporation does not permit Colonial Union dogs to be sniffing around restricted space. We have the right to destroy your vessel. Leave now. or we will exercise that right and turn your ship to into scrap metal.
Translated Text: The Corporation does not permit Colonial Union dogs to be sniffing around restricted space. We have the right to destroy your vessel. Leave now. or we will exercise that right and turn your ship to into scrap metal.

Original Text: Crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. the Colonial Union Command Center can’t protect you in a W.D. zone. If you refuse to get out of this sector. we will fire at you with everything we have.
Translated Text: Crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. the Colonial Union Command Center can’t protect you in a W.D. zone. If you refuse to get out of this sector. we will fire at you with everything we have.

Original Text: By galactic zone laws. you are presently committing a crime. Colonial Union. We have every right to remove you from this sector by force. Do you plan to warp out yourselves. or shall we ready our weapons?
Translated Text: By galactic zone laws. you are presently committing a crime. Colonial Union. We have every right to remove you from this sector by force. Do you plan to warp out yourselves. or shall we ready our weapons?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. patrol ship for the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. What exactly do you think you’re doing in W.D. space. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]? You’re a bit far from Outpost 448. If you refuse to leave this sector now. we’ll make sure it’s the last system you ever see.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. patrol ship for the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. What exactly do you think you’re doing in W.D. space. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]? You’re a bit far from Outpost 448. If you refuse to leave this sector now. we’ll make sure it’s the last system you ever see.

Original Text: The Wolden-Dorf flagship was apparently in this galaxy before the intergalactic warp was disabled. Few people know where it’s located. but it would be a sight to behold.
Translated Text: The Wolden-Dorf flagship was apparently in this galaxy before the intergalactic warp was disabled. Few people know where it’s located. but it would be a sight to behold.

Original Text: There’ve been a good number of our ships that have been ambushed by the Alliance of Gentlemen as of late. If you’re assigned to a task in the neutral zone. be wary. Too many fiends want to get their hands on our technology.
Translated Text: There’ve been a good number of our ships that have been ambushed by the Alliance of Gentlemen as of late. If you’re assigned to a task in the neutral zone. be wary. Too many fiends want to get their hands on our technology.

Original Text: Many of the crews we've spoken to lately have been mentioning the Lost Colony. They're all fools. being duped and even abandoning their factions for a farce. We fear for what will become of this galaxy if more people buy into this Lost Colony nonsense.
Translated Text: Many of the crews we've spoken to lately have been mentioning the Lost Colony. They're all fools. being duped and even abandoning their factions for a farce. We fear for what will become of this galaxy if more people buy into this Lost Colony nonsense.

Original Text: There's been talk that many W.D. crews are abandoning their jobs with the Corporation to hunt for the Lost Colony. Make sure you're not among the deserters. The Corporation doesn't like it when crews run off with its technology.
Translated Text: There's been talk that many W.D. crews are abandoning their jobs with the Corporation to hunt for the Lost Colony. Make sure you're not among the deserters. The Corporation doesn't like it when crews run off with its technology.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll transfer the credits to you. Leave us be.
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll transfer the credits to you. Leave us be.

Original Text: If you believe you can threaten us for credits. you are severely mistaken.
Translated Text: If you believe you can threaten us for credits. you are severely mistaken.

Original Text: Threats will get you nowhere. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’re not leaving this sector alive.
Translated Text: Threats will get you nowhere. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’re not leaving this sector alive.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll transfer the fuel capsules to you. Leave us be.
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll transfer the fuel capsules to you. Leave us be.

Original Text: If you believe you can threaten us for fuel. you are severely mistaken.
Translated Text: If you believe you can threaten us for fuel. you are severely mistaken.

Original Text: Threats will get you nowhere. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’re not leaving this sector alive.
Translated Text: Threats will get you nowhere. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’re not leaving this sector alive.

Original Text: For what reason did you think it wise to enter W.D. space? If you doubt the power of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. I’d be willing to give you a demonstration.
Translated Text: For what reason did you think it wise to enter W.D. space? If you doubt the power of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. I’d be willing to give you a demonstration.

Original Text: Well. it seems we found ourselves an intruder. The Corporation isn’t overly forgiving of your sort. One wrong move on your part. and we’ll put the full power of our weapons systems towards your destruction.
Translated Text: Well. it seems we found ourselves an intruder. The Corporation isn’t overly forgiving of your sort. One wrong move on your part. and we’ll put the full power of our weapons systems towards your destruction.

Original Text: This is W.D. space. You aren’t permitted here. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Do you want to know how we greet intruders?
Translated Text: This is W.D. space. You aren’t permitted here. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Do you want to know how we greet intruders?

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. you are in danger of being destroyed. Warp out of this sector immediately. Otherwise. we will hunt you down.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. you are in danger of being destroyed. Warp out of this sector immediately. Otherwise. we will hunt you down.

Original Text: This is a restricted zone. Either charge your warp drive or prepare to be destroyed.
Translated Text: This is a restricted zone. Either charge your warp drive or prepare to be destroyed.

Original Text: To the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]: we will not tolerate intruders in W.D. space. You’ve been given one opportunity to leave. Fail to cooperate. and we will destroy your ship. No negotiations.
Translated Text: To the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]: we will not tolerate intruders in W.D. space. You’ve been given one opportunity to leave. Fail to cooperate. and we will destroy your ship. No negotiations.

Original Text: All right. we’ll purchase some biscuits. Just let us be.
Translated Text: All right. we’ll purchase some biscuits. Just let us be.

Original Text: …We’ll purchase one crate. Keep quiet about it though. Our supervisor can’t find out.
Translated Text: …We’ll purchase one crate. Keep quiet about it though. Our supervisor can’t find out.

Original Text: We’ve had enough of you. Prepare your turrets.
Translated Text: We’ve had enough of you. Prepare your turrets.

Original Text: No. we won’t purchase any biscuits. And now you’ve exhausted our patience.
Translated Text: No. we won’t purchase any biscuits. And now you’ve exhausted our patience.

Original Text: All right! We’ll buy a crate of your biscuits.
Translated Text: All right! We’ll buy a crate of your biscuits.

Original Text: We’ll take a crate. Let us be. and we won’t have any trouble.
