Translated Text: We’ll take a crate. Let us be. and we won’t have any trouble.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll let you go. But if you cause any more trouble for us. we will not hesitate to fire at you.
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll let you go. But if you cause any more trouble for us. we will not hesitate to fire at you.

Original Text: Diplomatic today. are we? All right. we’ll play along. But if you cross us again. you won’t receive any further generous treatment.
Translated Text: Diplomatic today. are we? All right. we’ll play along. But if you cross us again. you won’t receive any further generous treatment.

Original Text: I suppose you caught us on a good day. We’ll agree to let you go—just this once.
Translated Text: I suppose you caught us on a good day. We’ll agree to let you go—just this once.

Original Text: We haven’t the time to negotiate with dead men.
Translated Text: We haven’t the time to negotiate with dead men.

Original Text: You’re attempting to negotiate with us? Is this a joke? We will not oblige.
Translated Text: You’re attempting to negotiate with us? Is this a joke? We will not oblige.

Original Text: We will not be bought. especially for such a cheap price.
Translated Text: We will not be bought. especially for such a cheap price.

Original Text: We will not be bought. especially for something as cheap as biscuits.
Translated Text: We will not be bought. especially for something as cheap as biscuits.

Original Text: Look here. we found a Fluffy Biscuit ship in W.D. space. It seems you traveled a little too far from your delivery route. This is a restricted sector. Warp out of here now. or we’ll show you how unfriendly the Corporation can be to intruders.
Translated Text: Look here. we found a Fluffy Biscuit ship in W.D. space. It seems you traveled a little too far from your delivery route. This is a restricted sector. Warp out of here now. or we’ll show you how unfriendly the Corporation can be to intruders.

Original Text: We cannot allow the Fluffy Biscuit Company to wander wherever it pleases. This is Wolden-Dorf space. understand? Warp out immediately. Otherwise. we’ll turn your ship to scrap metal.
Translated Text: We cannot allow the Fluffy Biscuit Company to wander wherever it pleases. This is Wolden-Dorf space. understand? Warp out immediately. Otherwise. we’ll turn your ship to scrap metal.

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit ships are not authorized to pass through here. If you don’t warp out now. this will be the last sector you ever visit.
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit ships are not authorized to pass through here. If you don’t warp out now. this will be the last sector you ever visit.

Original Text: We’re taking a risk for you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Try not to go back on our agreement.
Translated Text: We’re taking a risk for you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Try not to go back on our agreement.

Original Text: It would be ideal if a fight could be avoided. You can go on your way. Just try not to warp into Corporation zones if you can help it.
Translated Text: It would be ideal if a fight could be avoided. You can go on your way. Just try not to warp into Corporation zones if you can help it.

Original Text: We’ll permit you to go about your business. But if we discover that you’ve caused problems for the W.D. Corporation. expect to hear from us again. We won’t be so amicable.
Translated Text: We’ll permit you to go about your business. But if we discover that you’ve caused problems for the W.D. Corporation. expect to hear from us again. We won’t be so amicable.

Original Text: No. I’m afraid we cannot be lenient. Prepare your weapons.
Translated Text: No. I’m afraid we cannot be lenient. Prepare your weapons.

Original Text: We don’t have the authority to make a deal with you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You should’ve warped out while you had the opportunity.
Translated Text: We don’t have the authority to make a deal with you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You should’ve warped out while you had the opportunity.

Original Text: We are unable to cooperate with intruders.
Translated Text: We are unable to cooperate with intruders.

Original Text: You are in a restricted zone owned by the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Charge your warp drive. or we will be forced to fire upon you.
Translated Text: You are in a restricted zone owned by the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Charge your warp drive. or we will be forced to fire upon you.

Original Text: Colonial Union vessel. you are currently in restricted W.D. space. I recommend you ready your warp drive before I have to give the order to fire.
Translated Text: Colonial Union vessel. you are currently in restricted W.D. space. I recommend you ready your warp drive before I have to give the order to fire.

Original Text: Why have you entered W.D. space. officers? I take no pleasure in saying this. but we have the right to destroy your ship if you continue to meddle in Corporation zones. Please warp back to a Colonial Union or neutral sector.
Translated Text: Why have you entered W.D. space. officers? I take no pleasure in saying this. but we have the right to destroy your ship if you continue to meddle in Corporation zones. Please warp back to a Colonial Union or neutral sector.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. please leave the W.D. zone immediately. Our orders are to destroy any ship that does not comply—including those under Colonial Union Command. We do not wish to engage in combat with you. but we will do as we must.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. please leave the W.D. zone immediately. Our orders are to destroy any ship that does not comply—including those under Colonial Union Command. We do not wish to engage in combat with you. but we will do as we must.

Original Text: Officers. you have illegally entered a W.D. sector. Return to Union or neutral space. Our unit is ready for combat should you refuse.
Translated Text: Officers. you have illegally entered a W.D. sector. Return to Union or neutral space. Our unit is ready for combat should you refuse.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the W.D. Corporation patrol. Please leave this sector immediately.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the W.D. Corporation patrol. Please leave this sector immediately.

Original Text: Those large pieces of space debris are interesting. aren’t they? Most of us warp past them without a second thought. They’ve become part of the backdrop of the galaxy. nothing more than chunks of scrapped metal. But they were once parts of warships that crossed this galaxy centuries ago. Those ships must’ve been massive.
Translated Text: Those large pieces of space debris are interesting. aren’t they? Most of us warp past them without a second thought. They’ve become part of the backdrop of the galaxy. nothing more than chunks of scrapped metal. But they were once parts of warships that crossed this galaxy centuries ago. Those ships must’ve been massive.

Original Text: When we first heard the transmission. we thought it was a hoax. But now most of the galaxy is seeking out Lost Colony data fragments. and we're no different. Maybe the galaxy is full of fools. but we're willing to bet that the Lost Colony is truly out there. and it's only a matter of time before one of us finds it.
Translated Text: When we first heard the transmission. we thought it was a hoax. But now most of the galaxy is seeking out Lost Colony data fragments. and we're no different. Maybe the galaxy is full of fools. but we're willing to bet that the Lost Colony is truly out there. and it's only a matter of time before one of us finds it.

Original Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the credits. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.
Translated Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the credits. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.

Original Text: You want credits? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.
Translated Text: You want credits? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.

Original Text: You will not escape punishment if you tarnish the reputation of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.
Translated Text: You will not escape punishment if you tarnish the reputation of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.

Original Text: We don’t have time for this nonsense. Ready your weapons.
Translated Text: We don’t have time for this nonsense. Ready your weapons.

Original Text: You might get away with such behavior in neutral space. but here is different. We will not tolerate crimes against our own units.
Translated Text: You might get away with such behavior in neutral space. but here is different. We will not tolerate crimes against our own units.

Original Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the fuel. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.
Translated Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the fuel. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.

Original Text: You want fuel capsules? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.
Translated Text: You want fuel capsules? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.

Original Text: Greetings from one W.D. unit to another. Is there something you need out here?
Translated Text: Greetings from one W.D. unit to another. Is there something you need out here?

Original Text: Just passing through this sector? Good luck on your assignments.
Translated Text: Just passing through this sector? Good luck on your assignments.

Original Text: Hello. friends. How are you faring? Hopefully Headquarters isn’t overworking your unit.
Translated Text: Hello. friends. How are you faring? Hopefully Headquarters isn’t overworking your unit.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. warp out of this sector immediately. Noncompliance will force us to open fire.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. warp out of this sector immediately. Noncompliance will force us to open fire.

Original Text: This is no longer neutral space. If you remain in this sector or terminate comms with our unit. you will become a target for elimination. Please charge your warp drive.
Translated Text: This is no longer neutral space. If you remain in this sector or terminate comms with our unit. you will become a target for elimination. Please charge your warp drive.

Original Text: Vessel. you are not allowed in W.D. space. According to galactic zone laws. if you remain in communication with our unit and warp back immediately you will not be harmed.
Translated Text: Vessel. you are not allowed in W.D. space. According to galactic zone laws. if you remain in communication with our unit and warp back immediately you will not be harmed.

Original Text: Crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. you are no longer in neutral space. Turn back now.
Translated Text: Crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. you are no longer in neutral space. Turn back now.

Original Text: This sector is in a restricted W.D. Corporation zone. Your vessel is not permitted to remain here. Unless you wish to engage the W.D. fleet in combat. prepare your warp drive.
Translated Text: This sector is in a restricted W.D. Corporation zone. Your vessel is not permitted to remain here. Unless you wish to engage the W.D. fleet in combat. prepare your warp drive.

Original Text: Civilians. we cannot allow you to pass through W.D. space. We request that you pursue another route to your destination. or we will have to fire upon you.
Translated Text: Civilians. we cannot allow you to pass through W.D. space. We request that you pursue another route to your destination. or we will have to fire upon you.

Original Text: Yes. we’d be interested in buying a crate of biscuits. Thank you.
Translated Text: Yes. we’d be interested in buying a crate of biscuits. Thank you.

Original Text: We shouldn’t. but we can’t resist biscuits. We’ll take some.
Translated Text: We shouldn’t. but we can’t resist biscuits. We’ll take some.

Original Text: You’ve pressed us too far. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We can’t let you stay in the W.D. zone if you’re selling biscuits without the Corporation’s consent.
Translated Text: You’ve pressed us too far. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We can’t let you stay in the W.D. zone if you’re selling biscuits without the Corporation’s consent.

Original Text: You should have gone to neutral space to make your sales. Your business is not permitted here.
Translated Text: You should have gone to neutral space to make your sales. Your business is not permitted here.

Original Text: Calm down! We’ll buy a crate of biscuits. There’s no need for us to get into a fight over it.
Translated Text: Calm down! We’ll buy a crate of biscuits. There’s no need for us to get into a fight over it.

Original Text: We aren’t looking for trouble. We can buy a crate of biscuits. if that’s what you want.
Translated Text: We aren’t looking for trouble. We can buy a crate of biscuits. if that’s what you want.

Original Text: Don’t fire on us! We’re willing to make a purchase.
Translated Text: Don’t fire on us! We’re willing to make a purchase.

Original Text: Our supervisors can be strict about how we spend our funds. Sorry. but we can’t purchase biscuits right now.
Translated Text: Our supervisors can be strict about how we spend our funds. Sorry. but we can’t purchase biscuits right now.

Original Text: As much as we’d like to buy biscuits. we can’t afford to take up any more space in our storage.
Translated Text: As much as we’d like to buy biscuits. we can’t afford to take up any more space in our storage.

Original Text: Thank you. but we have to refuse. Perhaps another time.
Translated Text: Thank you. but we have to refuse. Perhaps another time.

Original Text: We’re taking a risk for you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Try not to go back on our agreement.
Translated Text: We’re taking a risk for you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Try not to go back on our agreement.

Original Text: It would be ideal if a fight could be avoided. You can go on your way. Just try not to warp into Corporation zones if you can help it.
Translated Text: It would be ideal if a fight could be avoided. You can go on your way. Just try not to warp into Corporation zones if you can help it.

Original Text: We’ll permit you to go about your business. But if we discover that you’ve caused problems for the W.D. Corporation. expect to hear from us again. We won’t be so amicable.
Translated Text: We’ll permit you to go about your business. But if we discover that you’ve caused problems for the W.D. Corporation. expect to hear from us again. We won’t be so amicable.

Original Text: No. I’m afraid we cannot be lenient. Prepare your weapons.
Translated Text: No. I’m afraid we cannot be lenient. Prepare your weapons.

Original Text: We don’t have the authority to make a deal with you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You should’ve warped out while you had the opportunity.
Translated Text: We don’t have the authority to make a deal with you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You should’ve warped out while you had the opportunity.

Original Text: We are unable to cooperate with intruders.
Translated Text: We are unable to cooperate with intruders.

Original Text: Well. we can’t refuse free biscuits. You can go. but be careful in W.D. space. If anyone thinks you might be a threat. they won’t be so lenient.
Translated Text: Well. we can’t refuse free biscuits. You can go. but be careful in W.D. space. If anyone thinks you might be a threat. they won’t be so lenient.

Original Text: We have no qualms with the Fluffy Biscuit Company. but you are not authorized to be in this sector. Please warp out before we are forced to take actions against you.
Translated Text: We have no qualms with the Fluffy Biscuit Company. but you are not authorized to be in this sector. Please warp out before we are forced to take actions against you.

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit vessels are not permitted in the W.D. zone. We do not wish to fire upon you. but we will if you do not warp out immediately.
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit vessels are not permitted in the W.D. zone. We do not wish to fire upon you. but we will if you do not warp out immediately.

Original Text: This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. Please ready your warp drive and leave Wolden-Dorf space. If you do not comply. it will be considered a breach of zone laws. and we must engage our weapons.
Translated Text: This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. Please ready your warp drive and leave Wolden-Dorf space. If you do not comply. it will be considered a breach of zone laws. and we must engage our weapons.

Original Text: We have nothing to report. officers.
Translated Text: We have nothing to report. officers.

Original Text: Working for the W.D. Corporation comes with its occasional perks. It's not uncommon to be selected to test a weapon or component prototype. Sometimes they're a little flaky. but they're usually quite powerful--especially since the Colonial Union hasn't pinned a hundred regulations on them yet.
Translated Text: Working for the W.D. Corporation comes with its occasional perks. It's not uncommon to be selected to test a weapon or component prototype. Sometimes they're a little flaky. but they're usually quite powerful--especially since the Colonial Union hasn't pinned a hundred regulations on them yet.

Original Text: We don't have anything against the Colonial Union. but the W.D. Corporation prefers that you officers stay out of its business. Tensions between our factions have worsened because Colonial Union officers fail to respect the W.D. Corporation's private practices. Please respect our space. and we'll respect yours.
Translated Text: We don't have anything against the Colonial Union. but the W.D. Corporation prefers that you officers stay out of its business. Tensions between our factions have worsened because Colonial Union officers fail to respect the W.D. Corporation's private practices. Please respect our space. and we'll respect yours.

Original Text: Despite the tension between the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation. we appreciate the service of officers like you in trying to keep the galaxy safe.
Translated Text: Despite the tension between the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation. we appreciate the service of officers like you in trying to keep the galaxy safe.

Original Text: Just take your credits. You’re lucky we won’t report you to the Colonial Union Command Center.
Translated Text: Just take your credits. You’re lucky we won’t report you to the Colonial Union Command Center.

Original Text: We will not tolerate this sort of treatment.
Translated Text: We will not tolerate this sort of treatment.

Original Text: You may be Union officers. but you will not take advantage of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.
Translated Text: You may be Union officers. but you will not take advantage of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.

Original Text: Just take your fuel capsules. You’re lucky we won’t report you to the Colonial Union Command Center.
Translated Text: Just take your fuel capsules. You’re lucky we won’t report you to the Colonial Union Command Center.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We’re on a standard transport assignment. There’s no reason to concern yourself with us.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We’re on a standard transport assignment. There’s no reason to concern yourself with us.

Original Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. We have permission to pass through this section of Colonial Union space. Please do not engage us.
Translated Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. We have permission to pass through this section of Colonial Union space. Please do not engage us.

Original Text: This is the crew of W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. Our job requires us to pass through Colonial Union space. Please let us continue freely. We aren’t looking for a conflict.
Translated Text: This is the crew of W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. Our job requires us to pass through Colonial Union space. Please let us continue freely. We aren’t looking for a conflict.

Original Text: You don’t think Headquarters records our hail transmissions. do you? I should really watch what I say from now on…
Translated Text: You don’t think Headquarters records our hail transmissions. do you? I should really watch what I say from now on…

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. How are your assignments progressing?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. How are your assignments progressing?

Original Text: Greetings to you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We hope you’re exercising caution here in Union space. Be sure to keep in mind that you act as a representative of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.
Translated Text: Greetings to you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We hope you’re exercising caution here in Union space. Be sure to keep in mind that you act as a representative of the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. What brings you to Union space?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. What brings you to Union space?

Original Text: We have nothing to discuss with you.
Translated Text: We have nothing to discuss with you.

Original Text: In the past few years. the W.D. Corporation's weaponry and ship technology have become much more affordable. Even civilians like yourselves can outfit your ship with W.D. tech.
Translated Text: In the past few years. the W.D. Corporation's weaponry and ship technology have become much more affordable. Even civilians like yourselves can outfit your ship with W.D. tech.

Original Text: With the Alliance of Gentlemen running rampant as of late. the W.D. Corporation has become more suspicious of civilian ships. Do your best to keep out of W.D. sectors. or our drones and patrol ships won't show you any mercy.
Translated Text: With the Alliance of Gentlemen running rampant as of late. the W.D. Corporation has become more suspicious of civilian ships. Do your best to keep out of W.D. sectors. or our drones and patrol ships won't show you any mercy.

Original Text: You cannot get away with threatening the W.D. Corporation.
Translated Text: You cannot get away with threatening the W.D. Corporation.

Original Text: You cannot get away with threatening the W.D. Corporation.
Translated Text: You cannot get away with threatening the W.D. Corporation.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Please resume your course. civilians. We will not tolerate interference with our work.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Please resume your course. civilians. We will not tolerate interference with our work.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] speaking to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. What is your business out this way?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] speaking to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. What is your business out this way?

Original Text: Civilian vessel. please continue on your way. We don’t want trouble.
Translated Text: Civilian vessel. please continue on your way. We don’t want trouble.

Original Text: We have nothing to discuss with you.
Translated Text: We have nothing to discuss with you.

Original Text: Don’t you have deliveries to be making? Neither of us has the time for idle chatter.
Translated Text: Don’t you have deliveries to be making? Neither of us has the time for idle chatter.

Original Text: Even though our companies work in two different industries. the Fluffy Biscuit Company's profits are enviable. We don't know how you manage the sales numbers you bring in. but your higher ups must use some novel techniques to increase your productivity.
Translated Text: Even though our companies work in two different industries. the Fluffy Biscuit Company's profits are enviable. We don't know how you manage the sales numbers you bring in. but your higher ups must use some novel techniques to increase your productivity.

Original Text: W.D. units are supposed to refrain from purchasing Fluffy Biscuit products in order to keep credits out of your company's bank accounts. but many crews are likely buy biscuits anyway. Be persistent. and you can even make loyal customers of the W.D. Corporation's most reputable crews.
Translated Text: W.D. units are supposed to refrain from purchasing Fluffy Biscuit products in order to keep credits out of your company's bank accounts. but many crews are likely buy biscuits anyway. Be persistent. and you can even make loyal customers of the W.D. Corporation's most reputable crews.

Original Text: No. we do not want biscuits.
Translated Text: No. we do not want biscuits.

Original Text: We refuse. Please do not bother us again with your advertisements.
Translated Text: We refuse. Please do not bother us again with your advertisements.

Original Text: Yes. fine. We’ll buy a crate. We can’t afford to get into a fight over biscuits.
Translated Text: Yes. fine. We’ll buy a crate. We can’t afford to get into a fight over biscuits.

Original Text: Are you threatening us? The W.D. Corporation is the most powerful organization in the galaxy. We will not be intimidated into buying biscuits. of all things.
Translated Text: Are you threatening us? The W.D. Corporation is the most powerful organization in the galaxy. We will not be intimidated into buying biscuits. of all things.

Original Text: We refuse to buy anything from you. Your threatening tone is insulting to the Corporation.
Translated Text: We refuse to buy anything from you. Your threatening tone is insulting to the Corporation.

Original Text: We will not be threatened by a Fluffy Biscuit ship.
Translated Text: We will not be threatened by a Fluffy Biscuit ship.

Original Text: Take what you want. Just let us be and move on.
Translated Text: Take what you want. Just let us be and move on.

Original Text: This is all we’ll spare. Don’t push us any further.
Translated Text: This is all we’ll spare. Don’t push us any further.

Original Text: We will not tolerate this sort of treatment.
Translated Text: We will not tolerate this sort of treatment.

Original Text: We refuse to submit to such demands.
Translated Text: We refuse to submit to such demands.

Original Text: Move along. Fluffy Biscuit Co. We’re on a tight schedule. and we have no time to waste.
Translated Text: Move along. Fluffy Biscuit Co. We’re on a tight schedule. and we have no time to waste.

Original Text: We have no desire to speak with officers of the Colonial Union. Be on your way. and let us be on ours.
Translated Text: We have no desire to speak with officers of the Colonial Union. Be on your way. and let us be on ours.

Original Text: So many people are concerned about the Infected creeping in and devouring the whole galaxy. They’re overreacting. The Infected is nothing but a bunch of witless creatures. And they can be exterminated. just like any other organism. W.D. technology is far superior to the primitive attacks of some space-born animals. You would do well to remember it.
Translated Text: So many people are concerned about the Infected creeping in and devouring the whole galaxy. They’re overreacting. The Infected is nothing but a bunch of witless creatures. And they can be exterminated. just like any other organism. W.D. technology is far superior to the primitive attacks of some space-born animals. You would do well to remember it.

Original Text: We will not be humiliated by greedy Colonial Union dogs.
Translated Text: We will not be humiliated by greedy Colonial Union dogs.

Original Text: Before you start with your policing. there’s no need to hound us down. Colonials. We’re here on business.
Translated Text: Before you start with your policing. there’s no need to hound us down. Colonials. We’re here on business.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. warship and representative vessel for the W.D. Galactic Fleet. We’re within our rights to traverse this part of the Union zone. Let us pass without a disturbance.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. warship and representative vessel for the W.D. Galactic Fleet. We’re within our rights to traverse this part of the Union zone. Let us pass without a disturbance.

Original Text: Hello. Colonial Union officers. This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. We’re obliged to state that we’ve been authorized to traverse the Union zone on business. If you have an issue with that. make it quick.
Translated Text: Hello. Colonial Union officers. This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. We’re obliged to state that we’ve been authorized to traverse the Union zone on business. If you have an issue with that. make it quick.

Original Text: Well. if it isn’t a fellow W.D. ship out here in the pits of Union space. We hadn’t expected to come across another Corporation unit for some time.
Translated Text: Well. if it isn’t a fellow W.D. ship out here in the pits of Union space. We hadn’t expected to come across another Corporation unit for some time.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. What are you doing out this way?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. What are you doing out this way?

Original Text: We have no desire to speak with civilians. Be on your way. and we will be on ours.
Translated Text: We have no desire to speak with civilians. Be on your way. and we will be on ours.

Original Text: Move along. civilians. We haven’t the time to deal with you.
Translated Text: Move along. civilians. We haven’t the time to deal with you.

Original Text: We do not wish to waste our time chatting with a Fluffy Biscuit delivery crew. Be on your way. and we will be on ours.
Translated Text: We do not wish to waste our time chatting with a Fluffy Biscuit delivery crew. Be on your way. and we will be on ours.

Original Text: Are you on your break. Fluffy Biscuit? Well. we’re not. So don’t pester us.
Translated Text: Are you on your break. Fluffy Biscuit? Well. we’re not. So don’t pester us.

Original Text: Take your biscuits and leave. We aren’t interested.
Translated Text: Take your biscuits and leave. We aren’t interested.

Original Text: We refuse to buy any of your biscuits.
Translated Text: We refuse to buy any of your biscuits.

Original Text: You’re wasting our time. Go bother someone else.
Translated Text: You’re wasting our time. Go bother someone else.

Original Text: You will not threaten us into purchasing biscuits.
Translated Text: You will not threaten us into purchasing biscuits.

Original Text: If you believe you can threaten us into buying biscuits. you are severely mistaken.
Translated Text: If you believe you can threaten us into buying biscuits. you are severely mistaken.

Original Text: Threats will get you nowhere. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We refuse to buy your biscuits.
Translated Text: Threats will get you nowhere. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We refuse to buy your biscuits.

Original Text: A Fluffy Biscuit ship is trying to threaten us? How amusing.
Translated Text: A Fluffy Biscuit ship is trying to threaten us? How amusing.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll transfer the fuel capsules to you. Leave us be.
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll transfer the fuel capsules to you. Leave us be.

Original Text: If you believe you can threaten us for fuel. you are severely mistaken.
Translated Text: If you believe you can threaten us for fuel. you are severely mistaken.

Original Text: Your pathetic attempts at extortion have earned you an enemy.
Translated Text: Your pathetic attempts at extortion have earned you an enemy.

Original Text: We have pressing business in Union space. Continue on your route. Fluffy Biscuit ship. We have no time to waste on biscuits.
Translated Text: We have pressing business in Union space. Continue on your route. Fluffy Biscuit ship. We have no time to waste on biscuits.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the W.D. Corporation. Taking your little deliveries to the Union zone. are you? How has that been going for you?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the W.D. Corporation. Taking your little deliveries to the Union zone. are you? How has that been going for you?

Original Text: We’ll consent. Take the credits and leave us be.
Translated Text: We’ll consent. Take the credits and leave us be.

Original Text: We refuse to give in to your demands. Colonial Union officers should conduct themselves more appropriately.
Translated Text: We refuse to give in to your demands. Colonial Union officers should conduct themselves more appropriately.

Original Text: The Corporation cannot tolerate this sort of insult.
Translated Text: The Corporation cannot tolerate this sort of insult.

Original Text: We’ll consent. Take the fuel capsules and leave us be.
Translated Text: We’ll consent. Take the fuel capsules and leave us be.

Original Text: We want no trouble. officers. We’re just passing through here on a route.
Translated Text: We want no trouble. officers. We’re just passing through here on a route.

Original Text: Well. it was only a matter of time before we’d run into a Colonial Union ship. Do you need to see our authorization. or are we free to continue on our route?
Translated Text: Well. it was only a matter of time before we’d run into a Colonial Union ship. Do you need to see our authorization. or are we free to continue on our route?

Original Text: We refuse to give in to your demands.
Translated Text: We refuse to give in to your demands.

Original Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the fuel. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.
Translated Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the fuel. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.

Original Text: You want fuel capsules? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.
Translated Text: You want fuel capsules? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.

Original Text: Another W.D. unit in Colonial Union space. What a rare occurrence. At least our routes aren’t bringing us through the neutral zones this time around. Assignments in Union space tend to go a little smoother. don’t you agree?
Translated Text: Another W.D. unit in Colonial Union space. What a rare occurrence. At least our routes aren’t bringing us through the neutral zones this time around. Assignments in Union space tend to go a little smoother. don’t you agree?

Original Text: Greetings. fellow unit. Is your passage through the Union zone going smoothly? If you need to resupply. we may be able to assist you.
Translated Text: Greetings. fellow unit. Is your passage through the Union zone going smoothly? If you need to resupply. we may be able to assist you.

Original Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. As a supervisory unit. we are obliged to extend our assistance to other W.D. vessels in Union and neutral space. Is there something you need?
Translated Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. As a supervisory unit. we are obliged to extend our assistance to other W.D. vessels in Union and neutral space. Is there something you need?

Original Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. If you have an issue. please hail a Colonial Union patrol ship. We are not qualified to assist ships within the Union zone.
Translated Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. If you have an issue. please hail a Colonial Union patrol ship. We are not qualified to assist ships within the Union zone.

Original Text: Calm down! We’ll buy a crate of biscuits. There’s no need for us to get into a fight.
Translated Text: Calm down! We’ll buy a crate of biscuits. There’s no need for us to get into a fight.

Original Text: We do not appreciate your harassment.
Translated Text: We do not appreciate your harassment.

Original Text: You will not coerce us into buying biscuits. We have standards to uphold.
Translated Text: You will not coerce us into buying biscuits. We have standards to uphold.

Original Text: We'll consent. Take the fuel and leave us be.
Translated Text: We'll consent. Take the fuel and leave us be.

Original Text: We don’t have time for this nonsense. Ready your weapons.
Translated Text: We don’t have time for this nonsense. Ready your weapons.

Original Text: The Corporation cannot tolerate this sort of insult.
Translated Text: The Corporation cannot tolerate this sort of insult.

Original Text: Hello. this is [SHIP_NAME]. We hope your travels have been going well. Fluffy Biscuit Co. Do you have any new biscuits in stock?
Translated Text: Hello. this is [SHIP_NAME]. We hope your travels have been going well. Fluffy Biscuit Co. Do you have any new biscuits in stock?

Original Text: Our unit is on a fixed schedule. Do not hinder us. Colonial Union.
Translated Text: Our unit is on a fixed schedule. Do not hinder us. Colonial Union.

Original Text: We have no business with the Colonial Union. Be on your way. and we’ll be on ours.
Translated Text: We have no business with the Colonial Union. Be on your way. and we’ll be on ours.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We’re on route to a W.D. Corp supply station. Let us continue on our course. and we won’t cause you any trouble.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We’re on route to a W.D. Corp supply station. Let us continue on our course. and we won’t cause you any trouble.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we have no intention to engage in a conflict with you. Do not interfere with our course.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we have no intention to engage in a conflict with you. Do not interfere with our course.

Original Text: How could you threaten another W.D. unit? You will be reported to Headquarters immediately.
Translated Text: How could you threaten another W.D. unit? You will be reported to Headquarters immediately.

Original Text: Greetings. We hope you’re progressing well in your assignments.
Translated Text: Greetings. We hope you’re progressing well in your assignments.

Original Text: This sector is being surveyed by the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. We will not tolerate interruptions. nor do we have an interest in biscuits. Be on your way.
Translated Text: This sector is being surveyed by the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. We will not tolerate interruptions. nor do we have an interest in biscuits. Be on your way.

Original Text: No one ordered biscuits in this sector. Leave now before we take your presence to be an obstruction of our work.
Translated Text: No one ordered biscuits in this sector. Leave now before we take your presence to be an obstruction of our work.

Original Text: Be on your way. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. Our unit has no interest in whatever you are selling.
Translated Text: Be on your way. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. Our unit has no interest in whatever you are selling.

Original Text: We will not be humiliated by greedy Colonial Union dogs.
Translated Text: We will not be humiliated by greedy Colonial Union dogs.

Original Text: I know you enjoy policing the galaxy. Colonial Union. But you have little jurisdiction in neutral zones. If you obstruct my unit. I will not hesitate to give the order to fire weapons.
Translated Text: I know you enjoy policing the galaxy. Colonial Union. But you have little jurisdiction in neutral zones. If you obstruct my unit. I will not hesitate to give the order to fire weapons.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. you are in our way. If you prevent us from continuing our course. you’ll have a problem on your hands.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. you are in our way. If you prevent us from continuing our course. you’ll have a problem on your hands.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Wolden-Dorf Galactic Fleet. Do not move against us. Union ship. If you hope to keep the peace in this sector. you will stay out of our way.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Wolden-Dorf Galactic Fleet. Do not move against us. Union ship. If you hope to keep the peace in this sector. you will stay out of our way.

Original Text: We didn’t expect to see another W.D. unit out this way. Did Headquarters send you on some pointless errand into Gentlemen territory? Be sure that you don’t get that shiny hull of yours blasted to pieces.
Translated Text: We didn’t expect to see another W.D. unit out this way. Did Headquarters send you on some pointless errand into Gentlemen territory? Be sure that you don’t get that shiny hull of yours blasted to pieces.

Original Text: Do not interfere with our passage through this sector. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Keep to your own business.
Translated Text: Do not interfere with our passage through this sector. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Keep to your own business.

Original Text: Watch yourself. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. One wrong move. and we won’t hesitate to fire.
Translated Text: Watch yourself. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. One wrong move. and we won’t hesitate to fire.

Original Text: No one ordered biscuits here. Get moving.
Translated Text: No one ordered biscuits here. Get moving.

Original Text: Get out of here. Fluffy Biscuit. We haven’t the patience to deal with your advertisements right now.
Translated Text: Get out of here. Fluffy Biscuit. We haven’t the patience to deal with your advertisements right now.

Original Text: We’ll consent. Take the credits and leave us be.
Translated Text: We’ll consent. Take the credits and leave us be.

Original Text: We’ll consent. Take the fuel capsules and leave us be.
Translated Text: We’ll consent. Take the fuel capsules and leave us be.

Original Text: Greetings. Colonial Union officers. Please pay no mind to our unit. We aren’t looking for trouble. just traveling on a job.
Translated Text: Greetings. Colonial Union officers. Please pay no mind to our unit. We aren’t looking for trouble. just traveling on a job.

Original Text: This is a W.D. transport unit. We’re only passing through on a job.
Translated Text: This is a W.D. transport unit. We’re only passing through on a job.

Original Text: What brings you out here. Colonial Union? Be sure to watch yourselves/be careful in these parts of the galaxy. It can be risky to traverse neutral space.
Translated Text: What brings you out here. Colonial Union? Be sure to watch yourselves/be careful in these parts of the galaxy. It can be risky to traverse neutral space.

Original Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the credits. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.
Translated Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the credits. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.

Original Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the fuel. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.
Translated Text: As captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I’m disappointed in your actions. I’ll allow you to make away with the fuel. but I doubt you can continue this misconduct and remain long within the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Consider your position.

Original Text: It’s surprising to find another W.D. Unit out here. We wish you the best on whatever assignment brings you into neutral space.
Translated Text: It’s surprising to find another W.D. Unit out here. We wish you the best on whatever assignment brings you into neutral space.

Original Text: Hello. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. How are you faring?
Translated Text: Hello. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. How are you faring?

Original Text: Please state your business in this sector.
Translated Text: Please state your business in this sector.

Original Text: We’ll consent. Take the fuel and leave us be.
Translated Text: We’ll consent. Take the fuel and leave us be.

Original Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit. How are the deliveries going?
Translated Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit. How are the deliveries going?

Original Text: Ah. a Fluffy Biscuit vessel. It’s been a while since we’ve come across one of your ships. Sales are good. I trust?
Translated Text: Ah. a Fluffy Biscuit vessel. It’s been a while since we’ve come across one of your ships. Sales are good. I trust?

Original Text: This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. What business do you have in this sector?
Translated Text: This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. What business do you have in this sector?

Original Text: Greetings. We were hoping to come by a Fluffy Biscuit vessel. What do you have for sale?
Translated Text: Greetings. We were hoping to come by a Fluffy Biscuit vessel. What do you have for sale?

Original Text: Just take your credits. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.
Translated Text: Just take your credits. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.

Original Text: Just take your fuel. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.
Translated Text: Just take your fuel. You’re lucky we won’t report you to HQ.

Original Text: We have no business with the personnel of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Please return to your assignments.
Translated Text: We have no business with the personnel of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Please return to your assignments.

Original Text: What is it you need? Unless you have business with our unit. we must return to our more pressing work.
Translated Text: What is it you need? Unless you have business with our unit. we must return to our more pressing work.

Original Text: This vessel. [SHIP_NAME]. is not authorized to assist other W.D. units unless explicitly directed by Headquarters. Resume your course.
Translated Text: This vessel. [SHIP_NAME]. is not authorized to assist other W.D. units unless explicitly directed by Headquarters. Resume your course.

Original Text: Why are you hailing us. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]? Get back to work.
Translated Text: Why are you hailing us. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]? Get back to work.

Original Text: Refrain from hailing our unit. We have work to do. If you disrupt us any further. we will report you to HQ.
Translated Text: Refrain from hailing our unit. We have work to do. If you disrupt us any further. we will report you to HQ.

Original Text: What is it you hope to accomplish by hindering our work? Unless you have something urgent to report. we advise you to stop hailing us before we treat you with the same friendliness that we extend to intruders.
Translated Text: What is it you hope to accomplish by hindering our work? Unless you have something urgent to report. we advise you to stop hailing us before we treat you with the same friendliness that we extend to intruders.

Original Text: You want credits? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.
Translated Text: You want credits? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.

Original Text: You want fuel capsules? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.
Translated Text: You want fuel capsules? Have them. But if you keep up these irresponsible actions. word will eventually get back to Headquarters.

Original Text: Do you have a problem to report. Unit?
Translated Text: Do you have a problem to report. Unit?

Original Text: With the intergalactic warp systems down. this galaxy is completely cut off from the main organization of government. Forgive me for having doubts. but I’m concerned that the Outpost 448 Command Center won’t be able to maintain order here for long. We should prepare for the worst.
Translated Text: With the intergalactic warp systems down. this galaxy is completely cut off from the main organization of government. Forgive me for having doubts. but I’m concerned that the Outpost 448 Command Center won’t be able to maintain order here for long. We should prepare for the worst.

Original Text: As Colonial Union officers. we are bound to keeping the peace. But it seems this galaxy is growing farther and farther from a peaceful state. Keep your wits about you.
Translated Text: As Colonial Union officers. we are bound to keeping the peace. But it seems this galaxy is growing farther and farther from a peaceful state. Keep your wits about you.

Original Text: If you happen across a planetary station called The Harbor in your travels. be sure to stop by. It’s a good place to rest and resupply for Union officers. W.D. employees. and civilians alike.
Translated Text: If you happen across a planetary station called The Harbor in your travels. be sure to stop by. It’s a good place to rest and resupply for Union officers. W.D. employees. and civilians alike.

Original Text: We've heard rumors that the Colonial Union Command Center is forming a special task force for the Wasted Wing incident at Outpost 448. We have no idea what it would entail. but hopefully it has good compensation. It seems like a particularly dangerous mission.
Translated Text: 我们听说殖民联盟指挥中心正在组建一个特别工作组来应对前哨 448 的废翼事件.我们不知道它会带来什么. 但希望它有很好的补偿. 这似乎是一项特别危险的任务.

Original Text: The Sylvassi Cypher Lab is looking for assistance. They need a reliable crew to find and solve Sylvassi cyphers on planets across the galaxy. and they're willing to offer a reward to anyone who helps them. If you're interested. you should stop by the lab whenever you get the chance.
Translated Text: The Sylvassi Cypher Lab is looking for assistance. They need a reliable crew to find and solve Sylvassi cyphers on planets across the galaxy. and they're willing to offer a reward to anyone who helps them. If you're interested. you should stop by the lab whenever you get the chance.

Original Text: At Outpost 448 there's a man named Rumibard Warger who procures artifacts from across the galaxy. sometimes through less than legal means. The Colonial Union has had eyes on him for years. but they've never found enough proof to stop his operation. Who knows what sort of priceless relics he's gotten his hands on by now?
Translated Text: At Outpost 448 there's a man named Rumibard Warger who procures artifacts from across the galaxy. sometimes through less than legal means. The Colonial Union has had eyes on him for years. but they've never found enough proof to stop his operation. Who knows what sort of priceless relics he's gotten his hands on by now?

Original Text: We've heard rumors that the supervisors of the W.D. Corporation have taken an interest in the Lost Colony. The W.D. Corporation claims that it denounces anyone searching for the Lost Colony. but we wouldn't be surprised if they had crews looking for it in secret.
Translated Text: 我们听说有传言说 W.D. 公司的主管对失落的殖民地感兴趣. W.D. 公司声称它谴责任何寻找失落殖民地的人. 但如果他们有工作人员秘密寻找它.我们不会感到惊讶.

Original Text: Crews are becoming violent in their search for Lost Colony data fragments. If you're looking for data fragments as well. be on your guard. There's no telling what some of these crews will do for one.
Translated Text: Crews are becoming violent in their search for Lost Colony data fragments. If you're looking for data fragments as well. be on your guard. There's no telling what some of these crews will do for one.

Original Text: It's important that the Colonial Union finds the Lost Colony before anyone else. If the W.D. Corporation or the Alliance of Gentlemen gets there first. it would spell disaster for this galaxy. The Colonial Union needs to put more resources towards finding data fragments. Even if the transmission was a hoax. it's better to be safe than sorry.
Translated Text: It's important that the Colonial Union finds the Lost Colony before anyone else. If the W.D. Corporation or the Alliance of Gentlemen gets there first. it would spell disaster for this galaxy. The Colonial Union needs to put more resources towards finding data fragments. Even if the transmission was a hoax. it's better to be safe than sorry.

Original Text: The Harbor is a good place to resupply. It's safe and affordable. and the bar has good drinks.
Translated Text: The Harbor is a good place to resupply. It's safe and affordable. and the bar has good drinks.

Original Text: Cornelia Station isn't a Colonial Union sanctioned hub. but it offers services that are harder to find in Outpost 448. If you ever end up in a bad situation and need to dump some cargo. Cornelia is the place to go.
Translated Text: Cornelia Station isn't a Colonial Union sanctioned hub. but it offers services that are harder to find in Outpost 448. If you ever end up in a bad situation and need to dump some cargo. Cornelia is the place to go.

Original Text: The Colonial Union Command Center in Outpost 448 has been closed off to most crews. We're not sure what's going on. but it must be something alarming if so few crews are privy to information at this time. Our guess is that it has something to do with the Wasted Wing.
Translated Text: The Colonial Union Command Center in Outpost 448 has been closed off to most crews. We're not sure what's going on. but it must be something alarming if so few crews are privy to information at this time. Our guess is that it has something to do with the Wasted Wing.

Original Text: We just made a stop at a scrapyard since our engineer is looking to make some improvements to our reactor. With the galaxy in so much chaos. it's not a bad idea to upgrade your ship components whenever you're able.
Translated Text: We just made a stop at a scrapyard since our engineer is looking to make some improvements to our reactor. With the galaxy in so much chaos. it's not a bad idea to upgrade your ship components whenever you're able.

Original Text: Take the credits! Just let us be.
Translated Text: Take the credits! Just let us be.

Original Text: We don’t want a confrontation. We’ll give you the credits. all right?
Translated Text: We don’t want a confrontation. We’ll give you the credits. all right?

Original Text: We cannot allow you to threaten any other crews. We’re preparing our weapons.
Translated Text: We cannot allow you to threaten any other crews. We’re preparing our weapons.

Original Text: The Command Center will be hearing of this offence.
Translated Text: The Command Center will be hearing of this offence.

Original Text: Take the fuel capsules! Just let us be.
Translated Text: Take the fuel capsules! Just let us be.

Original Text: We don’t want a confrontation. You can have the fuel. all right?
Translated Text: We don’t want a confrontation. You can have the fuel. all right?

Original Text: Good luck with your missions. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. May you embark on safe journeys.
Translated Text: Good luck with your missions. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. May you embark on safe journeys.

Original Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. Have you anything to report?
Translated Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. Have you anything to report?

Original Text: Even though Outpost 448 suffered a blow with the Wasted Wing. the station is still open to anyone who needs to rest and resupply. All are welcome. Plus. Outpost 448 has its own long range warp station. so it's easily accessible from anywhere in the galaxy.
Translated Text: Even though Outpost 448 suffered a blow with the Wasted Wing. the station is still open to anyone who needs to rest and resupply. All are welcome. Plus. Outpost 448 has its own long range warp station. so it's easily accessible from anywhere in the galaxy.

Original Text: W.D. crews are free to roam through most of Colonial Union space. but be on your best behavior. Just because Colonial Union sectors aren't restricted doesn't mean you can do whatever you want in them. Remember that you're subject to cargo inspections. and if you make a move against our officers. we won't hesitate to retaliate.
Translated Text: W.D. crews are free to roam through most of Colonial Union space. but be on your best behavior. Just because Colonial Union sectors aren't restricted doesn't mean you can do whatever you want in them. Remember that you're subject to cargo inspections. and if you make a move against our officers. we won't hesitate to retaliate.

Original Text: It's a shame that relations between the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation are so poor. We hope tensions between our factions improve in the future.
Translated Text: It's a shame that relations between the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation are so poor. We hope tensions between our factions improve in the future.

Original Text: We refuse to facilitate criminal activity.
Translated Text: We refuse to facilitate criminal activity.

Original Text: Hello. W.D. unit. What business do you have out here?
Translated Text: Hello. W.D. unit. What business do you have out here?

Original Text: Greetings from Colonial Union starship [SHIP_NAME]. Are you on an assignment. W.D. unit?
Translated Text: Greetings from Colonial Union starship [SHIP_NAME]. Are you on an assignment. W.D. unit?

Original Text: Carry on with your route. Corporation vessel.
Translated Text: Carry on with your route. Corporation vessel.

Original Text: Civilians should remember that while in Colonial Union space they may be subject to cargo inspections. If you receive a comms message directing you to an inspection station. please oblige.
Translated Text: Civilians should remember that while in Colonial Union space they may be subject to cargo inspections. If you receive a comms message directing you to an inspection station. please oblige.

Original Text: If you plan to travel through neutral space. be cautious. These days you never know who might be a member of the Alliance of Gentlemen.
Translated Text: If you plan to travel through neutral space. be cautious. These days you never know who might be a member of the Alliance of Gentlemen.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. If you encounter a problem in the Union zone. please hail one of our patrol ships. We will do our best to aid you.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. If you encounter a problem in the Union zone. please hail one of our patrol ships. We will do our best to aid you.

Original Text: If you happen across a planetary station called The Harbor in your travels. be sure to stop by. It’s a good place to rest and resupply for Union officers. W.D. employees. and civilians alike.
Translated Text: If you happen across a planetary station called The Harbor in your travels. be sure to stop by. It’s a good place to rest and resupply for Union officers. W.D. employees. and civilians alike.

Original Text: It's always a pleasure to have Fluffy Biscuit ships in Colonial Union space. If you haven't already stopped by Outpost 448. you should. There are many residents who would be willing to purchase biscuits from you.
Translated Text: It's always a pleasure to have Fluffy Biscuit ships in Colonial Union space. If you haven't already stopped by Outpost 448. you should. There are many residents who would be willing to purchase biscuits from you.

Original Text: It must be difficult for crews like yours to traverse the galaxy for your deliveries. Rest assured. if the residents of Outpost 448 tire of biscuits. just give them some time. Demand will rise again.
Translated Text: It must be difficult for crews like yours to traverse the galaxy for your deliveries. Rest assured. if the residents of Outpost 448 tire of biscuits. just give them some time. Demand will rise again.

Original Text: Sure. we’ll purchase a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: Sure. we’ll purchase a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: We can’t refuse biscuits. We’ll buy a crate.
Translated Text: We can’t refuse biscuits. We’ll buy a crate.

Original Text: Thank you. but we must decline. Please carry on with your business elsewhere.
Translated Text: Thank you. but we must decline. Please carry on with your business elsewhere.

Original Text: We aren’t interested in purchasing biscuits at this time.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in purchasing biscuits at this time.

Original Text: Our crew is not authorized to make unnecessary purchases. We wish you luck in selling to the next ship you come across.
Translated Text: Our crew is not authorized to make unnecessary purchases. We wish you luck in selling to the next ship you come across.

Original Text: There’s no need to be forceful! We’ll purchase a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: There’s no need to be forceful! We’ll purchase a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: We don’t want any conflict with civilians. Yes. we’ll take a biscuit crate if it’ll keep you from firing upon us.
Translated Text: We don’t want any conflict with civilians. Yes. we’ll take a biscuit crate if it’ll keep you from firing upon us.

Original Text: Fine! We’ll buy some biscuits! Let’s just keep things civil.
Translated Text: Fine! We’ll buy some biscuits! Let’s just keep things civil.

Original Text: The Colonial Union will not tolerate these kinds of threatening demands.
Translated Text: The Colonial Union will not tolerate these kinds of threatening demands.

Original Text: Whether you’re from the Alliance of Gentlemen or the Fluffy Biscuit Company. extortion is unacceptable. We will not stand for this.
Translated Text: Whether you’re from the Alliance of Gentlemen or the Fluffy Biscuit Company. extortion is unacceptable. We will not stand for this.

Original Text: Are you threatening us over biscuits? That’s a truly abhorrent business practice! We can’t allow it to continue.
Translated Text: Are you threatening us over biscuits? That’s a truly abhorrent business practice! We can’t allow it to continue.

Original Text: Take the fuel capsules! Just let us be.
Translated Text: Take the fuel capsules! Just let us be.

Original Text: We don’t want a confrontation. You can have the fuel. all right?
Translated Text: We don’t want a confrontation. You can have the fuel. all right?

Original Text: We cannot allow you to threaten any other crews. We’re preparing our weapons.
Translated Text: We cannot allow you to threaten any other crews. We’re preparing our weapons.

Original Text: Welcome to the Union zone. Do you have a lot of deliveries to make?
Translated Text: Welcome to the Union zone. Do you have a lot of deliveries to make?

Original Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. This is [SHIP_NAME]. How have your deliveries been going?
Translated Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. This is [SHIP_NAME]. How have your deliveries been going?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Good luck with your work. Fluffy Biscuit. Let us know if you need assistance in the Union zone.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Good luck with your work. Fluffy Biscuit. Let us know if you need assistance in the Union zone.

Original Text: Stay on task. With all the disorder springing up in the galaxy. the Command Center needs every officer to be as alert and effective as possible.
Translated Text: Stay on task. With all the disorder springing up in the galaxy. the Command Center needs every officer to be as alert and effective as possible.

Original Text: Anyone hunting down the Lost Colony is mad. It doesn't even exist. and yet the galaxy is falling apart because of it. Please. if you're considering hunting for the Lost Colony. rethink your plans. Help us bring back order.
Translated Text: Anyone hunting down the Lost Colony is mad. It doesn't even exist. and yet the galaxy is falling apart because of it. Please. if you're considering hunting for the Lost Colony. rethink your plans. Help us bring back order.

Original Text: We’ll transfer the credits to you. Just take your leave.
Translated Text: We’ll transfer the credits to you. Just take your leave.

Original Text: We will not stand for this.
Translated Text: We will not stand for this.

Original Text: We refuse to give in to your ridiculous demands.
Translated Text: We refuse to give in to your ridiculous demands.

Original Text: Colonial Union officers should never stoop so low. Consider yourself reported to the Command Center.
Translated Text: Colonial Union officers should never stoop so low. Consider yourself reported to the Command Center.

Original Text: We’ll transfer the fuel to you. Just take your leave.
Translated Text: We’ll transfer the fuel to you. Just take your leave.

Original Text: This is the captain of the [SHIP_NAME]. Have you encountered any miscreants as of late? Do your best to keep peace in the Union zone.
Translated Text: This is the captain of the [SHIP_NAME]. Have you encountered any miscreants as of late? Do your best to keep peace in the Union zone.

Original Text: Be on your way. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We have this sector defended.
Translated Text: Be on your way. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We have this sector defended.

Original Text: You wouldn’t be trying to pry secrets out of us. Would you. Wolden-Dorf?
Translated Text: You wouldn’t be trying to pry secrets out of us. Would you. Wolden-Dorf?

Original Text: The CU Command Center expects W.D. units to adhere to Colonial Union zone laws. Do not violate those terms. or you will face the repercussions.
Translated Text: CU指挥中心希望W.D.舰队遵守殖民地联盟法.不要违反这些条款.否则您将面临不可预知的后果.

Original Text: Continue on your way. W.D. unit.
Translated Text: Continue on your way. W.D. unit.

Original Text: We keep a close watch on W.D. Corporation warships. Remember. you are in Colonial Union space. Any acts of hostility will be met with swift punishment.
Translated Text: We keep a close watch on W.D. Corporation warships. Remember. you are in Colonial Union space. Any acts of hostility will be met with swift punishment.

Original Text: We haven’t the time to converse with civilians.
Translated Text: We haven’t the time to converse with civilians.

Original Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. What are you doing in this sector. civilians?
Translated Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. What are you doing in this sector. civilians?

Original Text: We aren’t interested in hearing about biscuits. Move along now.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in hearing about biscuits. Move along now.

Original Text: We would usually be inclined to say no. but on second thought. perhaps we will buy a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: We would usually be inclined to say no. but on second thought. perhaps we will buy a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: We don’t normally purchase biscuits. but today we’ll make an exception.
Translated Text: We don’t normally purchase biscuits. but today we’ll make an exception.

Original Text: Fine. we’ll buy some biscuits. Just let us get back to our work. all right?
Translated Text: Fine. we’ll buy some biscuits. Just let us get back to our work. all right?

Original Text: We are not interested in purchasing biscuits. Continue on your way. and let us get back to work.
Translated Text: We are not interested in purchasing biscuits. Continue on your way. and let us get back to work.

Original Text: We don’t care for biscuits. Pester someone else.
Translated Text: We don’t care for biscuits. Pester someone else.

Original Text: No. we will not buy any biscuits.
Translated Text: No. we will not buy any biscuits.

Original Text: All right. we’ll buy some biscuits! Let’s just leave turrets out of the transaction.
Translated Text: All right. we’ll buy some biscuits! Let’s just leave turrets out of the transaction.

Original Text: We’ll submit to your demands and pay for a crate of biscuits. There’s no need to become hostile.
Translated Text: We’ll submit to your demands and pay for a crate of biscuits. There’s no need to become hostile.

Original Text: We don’t want to buy your wretched biscuits. Have we not made that clear?
Translated Text: We don’t want to buy your wretched biscuits. Have we not made that clear?

Original Text: You’ve crossed the line. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Threatening Colonial Union officers is a criminal offense.
Translated Text: You’ve crossed the line. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Threatening Colonial Union officers is a criminal offense.

Original Text: We’ll transfer the fuel to you. Just take your leave.
Translated Text: We’ll transfer the fuel to you. Just take your leave.

Original Text: We will not stand for this.
Translated Text: We will not stand for this.

Original Text: We refuse to give in to your ridiculous demands.
Translated Text: We refuse to give in to your ridiculous demands.

Original Text: We will not give in to mere threats.
Translated Text: We will not give in to mere threats.

Original Text: You have no business here. Fluffy Biscuit Co. Please move on.
Translated Text: You have no business here. Fluffy Biscuit Co. Please move on.

Original Text: Be on your way. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. You’ll be making no deliveries here.
Translated Text: Be on your way. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. You’ll be making no deliveries here.

Original Text: You are currently in a patrolled sector. If you have deliveries to make. get on with them quickly.
Translated Text: You are currently in a patrolled sector. If you have deliveries to make. get on with them quickly.

Original Text: There’s a man named Gruff who owns a trading station out in the galaxy. He provides quality merchandise and is pleased to assist members of any faction. If you come across his shop. we’d recommend you stop by and take a look.
Translated Text: There’s a man named Gruff who owns a trading station out in the galaxy. He provides quality merchandise and is pleased to assist members of any faction. If you come across his shop. we’d recommend you stop by and take a look.

Original Text: You’ve seen the destruction at Outpost 448. I’m sure. People have been calling it the ‘Wasted Wing’. I haven’t the slightest idea what happened there. but tensions at the station seem to be high. The Command Center’s silence on the matter isn’t helping to calm people’s worries. Hopefully Command can get the situation under control before the civilians become desperate for answers.
Translated Text: You’ve seen the destruction at Outpost 448. I’m sure. People have been calling it the ‘Wasted Wing’. I haven’t the slightest idea what happened there. but tensions at the station seem to be high. The Command Center’s silence on the matter isn’t helping to calm people’s worries. Hopefully Command can get the situation under control before the civilians become desperate for answers.

Original Text: It’s been quite some time since our Academy days. yet it seems we only have more to learn as time progresses. The state of the galaxy is in constant change. Who knows what difficulties we’ll be faced with tomorrow? Be safe out there. friend.
Translated Text: It’s been quite some time since our Academy days. yet it seems we only have more to learn as time progresses. The state of the galaxy is in constant change. Who knows what difficulties we’ll be faced with tomorrow? Be safe out there. friend.

Original Text: There have been quite a few Colonial Union crews who have defected in order to find the Lost Colony. We're as curious as anyone as to what the Lost Colony actually is. but abandoning all of our responsibilities to find it? We can't agree with that.
Translated Text: There have been quite a few Colonial Union crews who have defected in order to find the Lost Colony. We're as curious as anyone as to what the Lost Colony actually is. but abandoning all of our responsibilities to find it? We can't agree with that.

Original Text: If it’s credits you want. take them. But your actions will not go unanswered forever.
Translated Text: If it’s credits you want. take them. But your actions will not go unanswered forever.

Original Text: No. we will not agree to this.
Translated Text: No. we will not agree to this.

Original Text: You have made a mistake. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Turn yourselves over.
Translated Text: You have made a mistake. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Turn yourselves over.

Original Text: We are disappointed to see comrades resort to such dishonorable measures.
Translated Text: We are disappointed to see comrades resort to such dishonorable measures.

Original Text: If you want fuel capsules. take them. But your actions will not go unanswered forever.
Translated Text: If you want fuel capsules. take them. But your actions will not go unanswered forever.

Original Text: Greetings. Have you been assigned a mission in a nearby sector?
Translated Text: Greetings. Have you been assigned a mission in a nearby sector?

Original Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. How are you faring. friends? If you need us to lend our assistance. only say the word.
Translated Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. How are you faring. friends? If you need us to lend our assistance. only say the word.

Original Text: There’s a man named Gruff who owns a trading station out in the galaxy. He provides quality merchandise and is pleased to assist members of any faction. If you come across his shop. we’d recommend you stop by and take a look.
Translated Text: There’s a man named Gruff who owns a trading station out in the galaxy. He provides quality merchandise and is pleased to assist members of any faction. If you come across his shop. we’d recommend you stop by and take a look.

Original Text: Good luck with your assignments. W.D. unit. If you need assistance. call upon us.
Translated Text: Good luck with your assignments. W.D. unit. If you need assistance. call upon us.

Original Text: Greetings. Wolden-Dorf vessel. What brings you to the Colonial Union zone?
Translated Text: Greetings. Wolden-Dorf vessel. What brings you to the Colonial Union zone?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Do you require assistance. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Do you require assistance. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. Where are you headed. civilians?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. Where are you headed. civilians?

Original Text: Yes. we’ll buy a crate of biscuits. Thank you for your exceptional service. and we wish you safe travels.
Translated Text: Yes. we’ll buy a crate of biscuits. Thank you for your exceptional service. and we wish you safe travels.

Original Text: Biscuits sound delightful. Of course we’ll take a crate.
Translated Text: Biscuits sound delightful. Of course we’ll take a crate.

Original Text: We would be happy to purchase some biscuits.
Translated Text: We would be happy to purchase some biscuits.

Original Text: At this time. our crew is running a bit low on credits. Apologies. but we can’t afford to purchase biscuits right now.
Translated Text: At this time. our crew is running a bit low on credits. Apologies. but we can’t afford to purchase biscuits right now.

Original Text: Unfortunately. we just purchased biscuits not all that long ago. If we buy any more. our superior officers will question our financial habits.
Translated Text: Unfortunately. we just purchased biscuits not all that long ago. If we buy any more. our superior officers will question our financial habits.

Original Text: Biscuits are wonderful. but we have to pass on your offer.
Translated Text: Biscuits are wonderful. but we have to pass on your offer.

Original Text: We’ll agree to buy some biscuits! There’s no need for the situation to escalate.
Translated Text: We’ll agree to buy some biscuits! There’s no need for the situation to escalate.

Original Text: Please don’t initiate a fight! We’d be happy to buy a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: Please don’t initiate a fight! We’d be happy to buy a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: No. We won’t buy your biscuits. As Colonial Union officers. we cannot allow such blatant extortion to persist.
Translated Text: No. We won’t buy your biscuits. As Colonial Union officers. we cannot allow such blatant extortion to persist.

Original Text: Your business tactics are reprehensible. You will not threaten us into purchasing biscuits. nor can we let you threaten anyone else.
Translated Text: Your business tactics are reprehensible. You will not threaten us into purchasing biscuits. nor can we let you threaten anyone else.

Original Text: If you want fuel capsules. take them. But your actions will not go unanswered forever.
Translated Text: If you want fuel capsules. take them. But your actions will not go unanswered forever.

Original Text: You have made a mistake. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Turn yourselves over.
Translated Text: You have made a mistake. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Turn yourselves over.

Original Text: We will not be the victims of your extortion.
Translated Text: We will not be the victims of your extortion.

Original Text: Welcome to Union space. Fluffy Biscuit Co. Good luck with your deliveries.
Translated Text: Welcome to Union space. Fluffy Biscuit Co. Good luck with your deliveries.

Original Text: It’s always nice to see a Fluffy Biscuit ship out here. Thank you for your deliveries.
Translated Text: It’s always nice to see a Fluffy Biscuit ship out here. Thank you for your deliveries.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We hope your journeys have been safe and profitable. Fluffy Biscuit. Is there anything with which we may assist you?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We hope your journeys have been safe and profitable. Fluffy Biscuit. Is there anything with which we may assist you?

Original Text: What. are you worried we’ll change our minds? Stop hailing us and leave our sector.
Translated Text: What. are you worried we’ll change our minds? Stop hailing us and leave our sector.

Original Text: You’ve made a very foolish decision.
Translated Text: You’ve made a very foolish decision.

Original Text: Just remember. you could’ve gotten out of here in one piece.
Translated Text: Just remember. you could’ve gotten out of here in one piece.

Original Text: Bold move. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’ll come to regret it.
Translated Text: Bold move. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’ll come to regret it.

Original Text: We gave you one chance to get out of this. We won’t be generous again.
Translated Text: We gave you one chance to get out of this. We won’t be generous again.

Original Text: I was hoping you’d refuse. It gives us a chance to try out our new turrets.
Translated Text: I was hoping you’d refuse. It gives us a chance to try out our new turrets.

Original Text: Yeah. yeah. Just stop talking. We’ll let you go.
Translated Text: Yeah. yeah. Just stop talking. We’ll let you go.

Original Text: Fine. Warp out of here before we come to our senses.
Translated Text: Fine. Warp out of here before we come to our senses.

Original Text: You bore us. Ready your weapons.
Translated Text: You bore us. Ready your weapons.

Original Text: Keep talking while we heat up the turrets.
Translated Text: Keep talking while we heat up the turrets.

Original Text: We get it. you come in peace. Just recharge your shields and get out of here already.
Translated Text: We get it. you come in peace. Just recharge your shields and get out of here already.

Original Text: You believe you are at peace with us? How amusing.
Translated Text: You believe you are at peace with us? How amusing.

Original Text: It’s not as much as we were looking for. but it’ll do.
Translated Text: It’s not as much as we were looking for. but it’ll do.

Original Text: You’re too cheap. That’ll cost you.
Translated Text: You’re too cheap. That’ll cost you.

Original Text: Well. look at this. A Colonial Union vessel strayed from its post. You could’ve run into some real trouble out here in the neutral zone. Lucky for you. we’re kind enough to let you pass unharmed—for 2000 credits.
