Translated Text: Well. look at this. A Colonial Union vessel strayed from its post. You could’ve run into some real trouble out here in the neutral zone. Lucky for you. we’re kind enough to let you pass unharmed—for 2000 credits.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. If you want to make it out of this sector alive. you will consent to our demands. Give us 2000 credits and warp out. Otherwise. our weapons are ready to fire.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. If you want to make it out of this sector alive. you will consent to our demands. Give us 2000 credits and warp out. Otherwise. our weapons are ready to fire.

Original Text: Colonial Union ship. let us get to the point. Transfer 2000 credits to us. or we will empty our missile silos into your hull.
Translated Text: Colonial Union ship. let us get to the point. Transfer 2000 credits to us. or we will empty our missile silos into your hull.

Original Text: W.D. vessel--cooperate with our demands. or we’ll be selling pieces of your ship to the next automated trading station. We want 2000 credits transferred to us now. No tabs. no IOUs. And no compromises.
Translated Text: W.D. vessel--cooperate with our demands. or we’ll be selling pieces of your ship to the next automated trading station. We want 2000 credits transferred to us now. No tabs. no IOUs. And no compromises.

Original Text: Now. we’ll only say this once. Wolden-Dorf. You’re going to transfer 2000 credits to us. or we’re going to scatter fragments of your hull across the next five sectors. What’ll it be?
Translated Text: Now. we’ll only say this once. Wolden-Dorf. You’re going to transfer 2000 credits to us. or we’re going to scatter fragments of your hull across the next five sectors. What’ll it be?

Original Text: You’re feeling chatty? Well. I’m not. Get moving.
Translated Text: You’re feeling chatty? Well. I’m not. Get moving.

Original Text: Well. if you’re prying an opinion out of me… Those Infected creatures are going to destroy us all. It’s only a matter of time before they eat up the Corporation. and then the Colonial Union. and then us. Best we enjoy our last days.
Translated Text: Well. if you’re prying an opinion out of me… Those Infected creatures are going to destroy us all. It’s only a matter of time before they eat up the Corporation. and then the Colonial Union. and then us. Best we enjoy our last days.

Original Text: We've heard rumors that the Caretaker is looking for a crew to help in a private mission of his own devising. It's rare that the Caretaker gets involved in jobs anymore. It must be something big.
Translated Text: 我们听到有传言说看守者正在寻找一个船员来帮助他制作一个秘密计划. 看守者很少再参与工作了. 一定是大事.

Original Text: Have you ever heard of the High Rollers Casino? It's a station where avid Liar's Dice players compete for prizes. We've heard that High Rollers is rewarding a Lost Colony data fragment to whoever wins the seven seat table. It's probably just a rumor. but it'll likely bring a rush of players to the casino.
Translated Text: Have you ever heard of the High Rollers Casino? It's a station where avid Liar's Dice players compete for prizes. We've heard that High Rollers is rewarding a Lost Colony data fragment to whoever wins the seven seat table. It's probably just a rumor. but it'll likely bring a rush of players to the casino.

Original Text: The Spiderbarge Auction is going on at the Burrow. Supposedly one of the items up for auction this year is particularly rare. Some speculate it might even be a Lost Colony data fragment. Too bad most crews out here couldn't afford it.
Translated Text: The Spiderbarge Auction is going on at the Burrow. Supposedly one of the items up for auction this year is particularly rare. Some speculate it might even be a Lost Colony data fragment. Too bad most crews out here couldn't afford it.

Original Text: Somebody could sell one of those Lost Colony data fragments for a fortune. In fact. we've even heard about an auction planning to sell one to the highest bidder.
Translated Text: Somebody could sell one of those Lost Colony data fragments for a fortune. In fact. we've even heard about an auction planning to sell one to the highest bidder.

Original Text: Many crews out here are looking for Lost Colony data fragments. If you have one. keep it to yourself. or else you might become a target.
Translated Text: Many crews out here are looking for Lost Colony data fragments. If you have one. keep it to yourself. or else you might become a target.

Original Text: We've been trying to track down the source of the transmission. We haven't had much luck. but we feel that we're on the verge of a breakthrough. Having Lost Colony data fragments would make this process much easier.
Translated Text: We've been trying to track down the source of the transmission. We haven't had much luck. but we feel that we're on the verge of a breakthrough. Having Lost Colony data fragments would make this process much easier.

Original Text: We occasionally stop by the Burrow to resupply. The combat arena there. Sandscar. has a sizable credit prize. but we haven't been able to beat it as of yet.
Translated Text: We occasionally stop by the Burrow to resupply. The combat arena there. Sandscar. has a sizable credit prize. but we haven't been able to beat it as of yet.

Original Text: We've seen strange ruins on some planets. They have puzzles in them with rotating circular designs. but we've never figured out how to solve them. It's a shame. Someone out there would probably pay for whatever we got from them.
Translated Text: We've seen strange ruins on some planets. They have puzzles in them with rotating circular designs. but we've never figured out how to solve them. It's a shame. Someone out there would probably pay for whatever we got from them.

Original Text: Be careful traveling through Colonial Union sectors. You might get an order to stop at an inspection station. and any illicit goods you're carrying could be discovered. We had to dump nearly our whole cargo bay to avoid getting caught.
Translated Text: Be careful traveling through Colonial Union sectors. You might get an order to stop at an inspection station. and any illicit goods you're carrying could be discovered. We had to dump nearly our whole cargo bay to avoid getting caught.

Original Text: Have you ever heard of Torsten Rowe? He's a wealthy artifact collector who has a lot of influence in this galaxy. There are rumors that he has a longstanding feud with the Caretaker of the Estate. and one of these days he might make a move.
Translated Text: Have you ever heard of Torsten Rowe? He's a wealthy artifact collector who has a lot of influence in this galaxy. There are rumors that he has a longstanding feud with the Caretaker of the Estate. and one of these days he might make a move.

Original Text: The legendary tech specialist Conrad was arrested not too long ago. Supposedly he's being sent to Hollow Rock. Bad luck that is. No one has ever broken out of that prison.
Translated Text: The legendary tech specialist Conrad was arrested not too long ago. Supposedly he's being sent to Hollow Rock. Bad luck that is. No one has ever broken out of that prison.

Original Text: We admit. we’ve been bested. Take the credits and go already.
Translated Text: We admit. we’ve been bested. Take the credits and go already.

Original Text: Just take the credits and stop talking. Our comms system is going to break if you keep it up.
Translated Text: Just take the credits and stop talking. Our comms system is going to break if you keep it up.

Original Text: Are you attempting to intimidate us? Pathetic.
Translated Text: Are you attempting to intimidate us? Pathetic.

Original Text: No. you won’t get away with our credits.
Translated Text: No. you won’t get away with our credits.

Original Text: We admit. we’ve been bested. Take the fuel and go already.
Translated Text: We admit. we’ve been bested. Take the fuel and go already.

Original Text: Just take the fuel capsules and stop talking. Our comms system is going to break if you keep it up.
Translated Text: Just take the fuel capsules and stop talking. Our comms system is going to break if you keep it up.

Original Text: No. you won’t get away with our fuel capsules.
Translated Text: No. you won’t get away with our fuel capsules.

Original Text: Get out of here. This is our sector. understand?
Translated Text: Get out of here. This is our sector. understand?

Original Text: You think I don’t recognize a Gentlemen ship when I see one? Scram. kids. We’ve got work to do in this sector.
Translated Text: You think I don’t recognize a Gentlemen ship when I see one? Scram. kids. We’ve got work to do in this sector.

Original Text: Gents. whatever you came to this sector for—consider it done. Leave before we find a reason to repurpose your hull as scrap metal.
Translated Text: Gents. whatever you came to this sector for—consider it done. Leave before we find a reason to repurpose your hull as scrap metal.

Original Text: Yes. we’ll buy some biscuits. But don’t mention this to anyone. [SHIP_NAME] has a reputation. and we can’t let word get out that we’re buying biscuits from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. No one will take us seriously anymore.
Translated Text: Yes. we’ll buy some biscuits. But don’t mention this to anyone. [SHIP_NAME] has a reputation. and we can’t let word get out that we’re buying biscuits from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. No one will take us seriously anymore.

Original Text: Okay. we’ll take a crate of biscuits. You don’t have to give us your sales pitch anymore. We’ve been convinced.
Translated Text: Okay. we’ll take a crate of biscuits. You don’t have to give us your sales pitch anymore. We’ve been convinced.

Original Text: Biscuits sound good right about now. Send a crate to us.
Translated Text: Biscuits sound good right about now. Send a crate to us.

Original Text: Don’t even think about squeezing credits out of us.
Translated Text: Don’t even think about squeezing credits out of us.

Original Text: Biscuits? You’re trying to sell us biscuits? Who do you think we are?
Translated Text: Biscuits? You’re trying to sell us biscuits? Who do you think we are?

Original Text: Okay. we’ll buy some biscuits! Just don’t mention it to anyone. We’re trying to build a reputation around these sectors.
Translated Text: Okay. we’ll buy some biscuits! Just don’t mention it to anyone. We’re trying to build a reputation around these sectors.

Original Text: One crate of biscuits! Fine! We’ll pay for it. I’m starting to think we should have gone into your line of work.
Translated Text: One crate of biscuits! Fine! We’ll pay for it. I’m starting to think we should have gone into your line of work.

Original Text: What. are you worried we’ll change our minds? Stop hailing us and leave our sector.
Translated Text: What. are you worried we’ll change our minds? Stop hailing us and leave our sector.

Original Text: Warp out of here before we come to our senses.
Translated Text: Warp out of here before we come to our senses.

Original Text: You’ve made a very foolish decision.
Translated Text: You’ve made a very foolish decision.

Original Text: Just remember. you could’ve gotten out of here in one piece.
Translated Text: Just remember. you could’ve gotten out of here in one piece.

Original Text: Bold move. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’ll come to regret it.
Translated Text: Bold move. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You’ll come to regret it.

Original Text: We gave you one chance to get out of this. We won’t be generous again.
Translated Text: We gave you one chance to get out of this. We won’t be generous again.

Original Text: I was hoping you’d refuse. It gives us a chance to try out our new turrets.
Translated Text: I was hoping you’d refuse. It gives us a chance to try out our new turrets.

Original Text: Yeah. yeah. Just stop talking. We’ll let you go.
Translated Text: Yeah. yeah. Just stop talking. We’ll let you go.

Original Text: Fine. Warp out of here before we come to our senses.
Translated Text: Fine. Warp out of here before we come to our senses.

Original Text: You bore us. Ready your weapons.
Translated Text: You bore us. Ready your weapons.

Original Text: Keep talking while we heat up the turrets.
Translated Text: Keep talking while we heat up the turrets.

Original Text: We get it. you come in peace. Just recharge your shields and get out of here already.
Translated Text: We get it. you come in peace. Just recharge your shields and get out of here already.

Original Text: It’s not as much as we were looking for. but it’ll do.
Translated Text: It’s not as much as we were looking for. but it’ll do.

Original Text: You’re too cheap. That’ll cost you.
Translated Text: You’re too cheap. That’ll cost you.

Original Text: We’ll let you go. but only because you were so generous with the biscuits.
Translated Text: We’ll let you go. but only because you were so generous with the biscuits.

Original Text: What do you expect us to do with these?
Translated Text: What do you expect us to do with these?

Original Text: How have your profits been. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]? The way I understand it. biscuits are quite the money-maker these days. You must have some credits to spare. For 2000 credits. we’ll let your biscuits be. not a single turret fired. What do you say?
Translated Text: How have your profits been. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]? The way I understand it. biscuits are quite the money-maker these days. You must have some credits to spare. For 2000 credits. we’ll let your biscuits be. not a single turret fired. What do you say?

Original Text: Well if it isn’t a Fluffy Biscuit Company ship. delivering biscuits to the farthest reaches of the galaxy. You’ve wandered a bit off course. haven’t you? We can help you get on the right track for 2000 credits. Consider it. If you don’t accept our help. you might find yourself in a troublesome situation.
Translated Text: Well if it isn’t a Fluffy Biscuit Company ship. delivering biscuits to the farthest reaches of the galaxy. You’ve wandered a bit off course. haven’t you? We can help you get on the right track for 2000 credits. Consider it. If you don’t accept our help. you might find yourself in a troublesome situation.

Original Text: 2000 credits. Fluffy Biscuit. That’s what you owe us for sparing your lives. Refuse. and you’ll regret disrespecting our generosity.
Translated Text: 2000 credits. Fluffy Biscuit. That’s what you owe us for sparing your lives. Refuse. and you’ll regret disrespecting our generosity.

Original Text: Leave here. We’ll hold our fire.
Translated Text: Leave here. We’ll hold our fire.

Original Text: We said we’d let you pass. We intend to keep our word.
Translated Text: We said we’d let you pass. We intend to keep our word.

Original Text: You were never here. Leave now.
Translated Text: 你此时不应该在哪里.请马上离开.

Original Text: We’ll let you go. But if we ever cross paths again. we will not be so merciful.
Translated Text: We’ll let you go. But if we ever cross paths again. we will not be so merciful.

Original Text: We have no interest in reaching an agreement.
Translated Text: We have no interest in reaching an agreement.

Original Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I intend to engage your vessel. Have you any last words?
Translated Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I intend to engage your vessel. Have you any last words?

Original Text: I apologize. Colonial Union officers. But you have wandered into a very dangerous territory. As per our contract. we’re obliged to take down any ship that enters this sector—even Union vessels. Please. don’t hold it against us.
Translated Text: I apologize. Colonial Union officers. But you have wandered into a very dangerous territory. As per our contract. we’re obliged to take down any ship that enters this sector—even Union vessels. Please. don’t hold it against us.

Original Text: You have entered a protected Alliance sector. W.D. vessel. We have no choice but to engage you. Ready your weapons. We look forward to testing their power.
Translated Text: You have entered a protected Alliance sector. W.D. vessel. We have no choice but to engage you. Ready your weapons. We look forward to testing their power.

Original Text: Wolden-Dorf ship. you are not welcome in this sector. If you wish to make it out alive. warp now. Otherwise. we will meet you in battle.
Translated Text: Wolden-Dorf ship. you are not welcome in this sector. If you wish to make it out alive. warp now. Otherwise. we will meet you in battle.

Original Text: There is nothing we have to discuss with you. It would be better if you left this sector.
Translated Text: There is nothing we have to discuss with you. It would be better if you left this sector.

Original Text: We are not going to oblige you in idle chatter.
Translated Text: We are not going to oblige you in idle chatter.

Original Text: We’re not looking to strike up conversation. Kindly remove yourselves from our sector or we’ll do it for you.
Translated Text: We’re not looking to strike up conversation. Kindly remove yourselves from our sector or we’ll do it for you.

Original Text: We haven't gotten any data fragments. but we've been searching for the Lost Colony nonetheless. We rerouted all of our courses to stop at every planet along the way. but we haven't found the Lost Colony anywhere. We're starting to think it might not be on a planet...or maybe even in this galaxy.
Translated Text: We haven't gotten any data fragments. but we've been searching for the Lost Colony nonetheless. We rerouted all of our courses to stop at every planet along the way. but we haven't found the Lost Colony anywhere. We're starting to think it might not be on a planet...or maybe even in this galaxy.

Original Text: Warping into a sector with a sector commander is usually a death sentence. We avoid them as much as possible. and if we do have to warp into a commander's sector. we have an instant warp charge program ready to go.
Translated Text: Warping into a sector with a sector commander is usually a death sentence. We avoid them as much as possible. and if we do have to warp into a commander's sector. we have an instant warp charge program ready to go.

Original Text: These days many factions have been hiring bounty hunters to track down crews that have been causing trouble. You may not appreciate our advice. but try not to get a faction so upset with you that they want you dead. You might regret it.
Translated Text: These days many factions have been hiring bounty hunters to track down crews that have been causing trouble. You may not appreciate our advice. but try not to get a faction so upset with you that they want you dead. You might regret it.

Original Text: If you ever have to cut through W.D. space. be careful. The W.D. Corporation is not as forgiving of intruders as the Colonial Union.
Translated Text: If you ever have to cut through W.D. space. be careful. The W.D. Corporation is not as forgiving of intruders as the Colonial Union.

Original Text: We’ll let you have the credits. Don’t push us any further.
Translated Text: We’ll let you have the credits. Don’t push us any further.

Original Text: We’ll let you have the fuel capsules. Don’t push us any further.
Translated Text: We’ll let you have the fuel capsules. Don’t push us any further.

Original Text: We don’t have any business with the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. It would be best if you journeyed elsewhere.
Translated Text: We don’t have any business with the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. It would be best if you journeyed elsewhere.

Original Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. What business do you have in this sector?
Translated Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. What business do you have in this sector?

Original Text: Yes. we would be interested in purchasing some biscuits. Thank you for initiating the exchange.
Translated Text: Yes. we would be interested in purchasing some biscuits. Thank you for initiating the exchange.

Original Text: We’ll purchase a single crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: We’ll purchase a single crate of biscuits.

Original Text: No. we are not interested. Your persistence is irritating.
Translated Text: No. we are not interested. Your persistence is irritating.

Original Text: Biscuits do not appeal to us. It would’ve been best if you had left this sector.
Translated Text: Biscuits do not appeal to us. It would’ve been best if you had left this sector.

Original Text: You’ve made your point! We’ll purchase a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: You’ve made your point! We’ll purchase a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: We already came to an agreement to cease hostilities. In order to keep that agreement. yes. we will buy some biscuits.
Translated Text: We already came to an agreement to cease hostilities. In order to keep that agreement. yes. we will buy some biscuits.

Original Text: Biscuits do not appeal to us. It would be best if you leave this sector.
Translated Text: Biscuits do not appeal to us. It would be best if you leave this sector.

Original Text: Leave here. We’ll hold our fire.
Translated Text: Leave here. We’ll hold our fire.

Original Text: We said we’d let you pass. We intend to keep our word.
Translated Text: We said we’d let you pass. We intend to keep our word.

Original Text: You were never here. Leave now.
Translated Text: You were never here. Leave now.

Original Text: We’ll let you go. But if we ever cross paths again. we will not be so merciful.
Translated Text: We’ll let you go. But if we ever cross paths again. we will not be so merciful.

Original Text: All right. go on then. Peddle your biscuits elsewhere.
Translated Text: All right. go on then. Peddle your biscuits elsewhere.

Original Text: We have no interest in reaching an agreement.
Translated Text: We have no interest in reaching an agreement.

Original Text: We aren’t interested in whatever you have to sell. Get out of here before we blast you to pieces.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in whatever you have to sell. Get out of here before we blast you to pieces.

Original Text: If you’ve come to sell us biscuits. we’re not buying. We suggest you warp out of here.
Translated Text: If you’ve come to sell us biscuits. we’re not buying. We suggest you warp out of here.

Original Text: This is [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We demand you leave this sector immediately. This is no place for the likes of you.
Translated Text: This is [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We demand you leave this sector immediately. This is no place for the likes of you.

Original Text: No one ordered biscuits. Leave now. or we’ll scatter pieces of your ship across the galaxy.
Translated Text: No one ordered biscuits. Leave now. or we’ll scatter pieces of your ship across the galaxy.

Original Text: We don’t have anything to report. officers. Apologies.
Translated Text: We don’t have anything to report. officers. Apologies.

Original Text: A while ago our crew managed to find a Lost Colony data fragment. Then our scientist turned on us. stole the data fragment. and sold it to someone else. Whatever you do. make sure that you can trust your crewmembers. Any search for the Lost Colony is bound to require cooperation.
Translated Text: A while ago our crew managed to find a Lost Colony data fragment. Then our scientist turned on us. stole the data fragment. and sold it to someone else. Whatever you do. make sure that you can trust your crewmembers. Any search for the Lost Colony is bound to require cooperation.

Original Text: Sectors are dangerous these days with all the hostile ships and drones. When plotting a course. we try to stick to nebulas wherever we can. That way our ship is much harder to detect.
Translated Text: Sectors are dangerous these days with all the hostile ships and drones. When plotting a course. we try to stick to nebulas wherever we can. That way our ship is much harder to detect.

Original Text: All right. you can have the credits. Just let us be!
Translated Text: All right. you can have the credits. Just let us be!

Original Text: We don’t have the credits to spare.
Translated Text: We don’t have the credits to spare.

Original Text: You call yourselves Colonial Union officers?
Translated Text: You call yourselves Colonial Union officers?

Original Text: All right. you can have the fuel. Just let us be!
Translated Text: All right. you can have the fuel. Just let us be!

Original Text: We don’t have the fuel to spare.
Translated Text: We don’t have the fuel to spare.

Original Text: Officers of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. hello. Performing many cargo inspections these days?
Translated Text: Officers of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. hello. Performing many cargo inspections these days?

Original Text: We don’t have much to say to you officers. We’d appreciate it if you left us to our course.
Translated Text: We don’t have much to say to you officers. We’d appreciate it if you left us to our course.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. What is it you want from us?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. What is it you want from us?

Original Text: We don’t know anything that would be of use to a W.D. crew. If you need information about this part of the galaxy. you’d best ask someone else.
Translated Text: We don’t know anything that would be of use to a W.D. crew. If you need information about this part of the galaxy. you’d best ask someone else.

Original Text: W.D. Corporation ships are at risk in neutral sectors. There are many Gentlemen who track W.D. convoys for an opportunity to steal their technology. Who knows? You might already be someone's target.
Translated Text: W.D. Corporation ships are at risk in neutral sectors. There are many Gentlemen who track W.D. convoys for an opportunity to steal their technology. Who knows? You might already be someone's target.

Original Text: It's not too often that we come across W.D. Corporation ships. In fact. we make a point to stay away from them. Let's just go about our business and keep out of each other's way.
Translated Text: It's not too often that we come across W.D. Corporation ships. In fact. we make a point to stay away from them. Let's just go about our business and keep out of each other's way.

Original Text: Not even the W.D. Corporation can scare us out of our credits.
Translated Text: Not even the W.D. Corporation can scare us out of our credits.

Original Text: We don’t have the fuel to spare.
Translated Text: We don’t have the fuel to spare.

Original Text: Threaten us all you please. We’ll be getting our turrets ready.
Translated Text: Threaten us all you please. We’ll be getting our turrets ready.

Original Text: Why are you hailing us. W.D. ship? We won’t hinder your work. Just forget we’re even here.
Translated Text: Why are you hailing us. W.D. ship? We won’t hinder your work. Just forget we’re even here.

Original Text: What do you want from us. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?
Translated Text: What do you want from us. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?

Original Text: If you happen across a Colonial Union ship. be careful not to let it slip that you belong to the Alliance. They won’t show any mercy towards you. Best to play along with the civilian charade until you can get out of their sights.
Translated Text: If you happen across a Colonial Union ship. be careful not to let it slip that you belong to the Alliance. They won’t show any mercy towards you. Best to play along with the civilian charade until you can get out of their sights.

Original Text: The Infected just keep spreading. We’re done for. If even the best Colonial Union and Wolden-Dorf scientists put together can’t find a way to stop those creatures. you know there’s nothing we can do except await the end. That’s probably the reason the intergalactic warp was severed. They didn’t want any Infected ships spreading to the main galaxies. They’ve quarantined us.
Translated Text: The Infected just keep spreading. We’re done for. If even the best Colonial Union and Wolden-Dorf scientists put together can’t find a way to stop those creatures. you know there’s nothing we can do except await the end. That’s probably the reason the intergalactic warp was severed. They didn’t want any Infected ships spreading to the main galaxies. They’ve quarantined us.

Original Text: We have a pressing deadline to deliver this cargo. We really cannot spend any more time talking with you.
Translated Text: We have a pressing deadline to deliver this cargo. We really cannot spend any more time talking with you.

Original Text: Threaten us all you please. We’ll be getting our turrets ready.
Translated Text: Threaten us all you please. We’ll be getting our turrets ready.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We don’t have much time to complete our shipment. If you need something from us. make it quick.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We don’t have much time to complete our shipment. If you need something from us. make it quick.

Original Text: You Fluffy Biscuit crews seem very thorough with your deliveries. Even neural space isn't safe from your sales pitches.
Translated Text: You Fluffy Biscuit crews seem very thorough with your deliveries. Even neural space isn't safe from your sales pitches.

Original Text: How many biscuits on average do you delivery crews sell in a day? Your products are everywhere lately. You must be making a fortune. Perhaps we should give up on our line of work and start peddling biscuits.
Translated Text: How many biscuits on average do you delivery crews sell in a day? Your products are everywhere lately. You must be making a fortune. Perhaps we should give up on our line of work and start peddling biscuits.

Original Text: All right. we’ll take a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: All right. we’ll take a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: You know what? Sure. We’ll buy a crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: You know what? Sure. We’ll buy a crate of biscuits.

Original Text: We haven’t had biscuits in a long time. I suppose we can treat ourselves to a crate.
Translated Text: We haven’t had biscuits in a long time. I suppose we can treat ourselves to a crate.

Original Text: No thanks. We’re in a hurry.
Translated Text: No thanks. We’re in a hurry.

Original Text: Nobody in our crew has a taste for biscuits. Apologies.
Translated Text: Nobody in our crew has a taste for biscuits. Apologies.

Original Text: Okay. okay! We’ll take a crate! You can stop threatening us now.
Translated Text: Okay. okay! We’ll take a crate! You can stop threatening us now.

Original Text: Look. we don’t want any trouble. We’ll buy a crate of biscuits. Just don’t fire at us. all right?
Translated Text: Look. we don’t want any trouble. We’ll buy a crate of biscuits. Just don’t fire at us. all right?

Original Text: We don’t have any credits to spare. no matter how much you harass us.
Translated Text: We don’t have any credits to spare. no matter how much you harass us.

Original Text: If you want a fight. you’ve got one.
Translated Text: If you want a fight. you’ve got one.

Original Text: All right. you can have the fuel. Just let us be!
Translated Text: All right. you can have the fuel. Just let us be!

Original Text: Fine. fine! Take whatever you want! Turn it to biscuits or whatever you all do.
Translated Text: Fine. fine! Take whatever you want! Turn it to biscuits or whatever you all do.

Original Text: What’s a Fluffy Biscuit ship doing out this way? Did you wander off your delivery route? Watch yourselves. now.
Translated Text: What’s a Fluffy Biscuit ship doing out this way? Did you wander off your delivery route? Watch yourselves. now.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Why did you hail us? Are you trying to sell us biscuits?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Why did you hail us? Are you trying to sell us biscuits?

Original Text: Is there something you want. Fluffy Biscuit? If not. we should get back to our route. We’re behind schedule on our shipment.
Translated Text: Is there something you want. Fluffy Biscuit? If not. we should get back to our route. We’re behind schedule on our shipment.

Original Text: You should’ve gone through Union space. Wolden-Dorf.
Translated Text: You should’ve gone through Union space. Wolden-Dorf.

Original Text: My. what a lovely ship you have! Mind if we take a look inside?
Translated Text: My. what a lovely ship you have! Mind if we take a look inside?

Original Text: We’ve been on the hunt for borthix these past few months. That damnable stuff is hard to find. But when you do manage to get your hands on some. it always pays off. Ah. but don’t be getting any ideas. We aren’t fond of competition.
Translated Text: We’ve been on the hunt for borthix these past few months. That damnable stuff is hard to find. But when you do manage to get your hands on some. it always pays off. Ah. but don’t be getting any ideas. We aren’t fond of competition.

Original Text: If you’re looking for conversation. find an automated trading robot. You’ll get more out of one of them than you will from us.
Translated Text: If you’re looking for conversation. find an automated trading robot. You’ll get more out of one of them than you will from us.

Original Text: You have some gall. Lucky for you. we can appreciate that. You can have the credits.
Translated Text: You have some gall. Lucky for you. we can appreciate that. You can have the credits.

Original Text: Did you think you could get away with threatening [SHIP_NAME]? How foolish.
Translated Text: Did you think you could get away with threatening [SHIP_NAME]? How foolish.

Original Text: You have some gall. Lucky for you. we can appreciate that. You can have the fuel.
Translated Text: You have some gall. Lucky for you. we can appreciate that. You can have the fuel.

Original Text: Did you think you could get away with threatening [SHIP_NAME]? How foolish.
Translated Text: Did you think you could get away with threatening [SHIP_NAME]? How foolish.

Original Text: We’re not looking for partners. Go lose yourselves in a nebula or something.
Translated Text: We’re not looking for partners. Go lose yourselves in a nebula or something.

Original Text: Yes. this is [SHIP_NAME]. What do you want?
Translated Text: Yes. this is [SHIP_NAME]. What do you want?

Original Text: Well. hello. We didn’t expect to find a Fluffy Biscuit ship out here. Ripe for pillaging. aren’t you?
Translated Text: Well. hello. We didn’t expect to find a Fluffy Biscuit ship out here. Ripe for pillaging. aren’t you?

Original Text: What are you selling today? Ah. let me guess. Biscuits. Doesn’t it ever get old? How about we relieve some of the monotony for you?
Translated Text: What are you selling today? Ah. let me guess. Biscuits. Doesn’t it ever get old? How about we relieve some of the monotony for you?

Original Text: Oh. not another Fluffy Biscuit ship. No. we are not interested in buying your damn biscuits.
Translated Text: Oh. not another Fluffy Biscuit ship. No. we are not interested in buying your damn biscuits.

Original Text: Stay on task. With all the disorder springing up in the galaxy. the Command Center needs every officer to be as alert and effective as possible.
Translated Text: Stay on task. With all the disorder springing up in the galaxy. the Command Center needs every officer to be as alert and effective as possible.

Original Text: Colonial Union officers should never stoop so low. Consider yourself reported to the Command Center.
Translated Text: Colonial Union officers should never stoop so low. Consider yourself reported to the Command Center.

Original Text: Greetings to you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Be sure to exercise caution in neutral space. We’d rather not have to track down another Colonial Union distress signal.
Translated Text: Greetings to you. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Be sure to exercise caution in neutral space. We’d rather not have to track down another Colonial Union distress signal.

Original Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I trust you are all staying on task. Order and balance in this galaxy are kept solely by dependable officers. Do not become careless.
Translated Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. I trust you are all staying on task. Order and balance in this galaxy are kept solely by dependable officers. Do not become careless.

Original Text: This is the Colonial Union starship [SHIP_NAME]. We have no desire to start a conflict with a W.D. unit. Be on your way quickly.
Translated Text: This is the Colonial Union starship [SHIP_NAME]. We have no desire to start a conflict with a W.D. unit. Be on your way quickly.

Original Text: Be careful. Wolden-Dorf unit. We’re watching you.
Translated Text: Be careful. Wolden-Dorf unit. We’re watching you.

Original Text: Be on your way. civilians. We have no business with you.
Translated Text: Be on your way. civilians. We have no business with you.

Original Text: Greetings. civilian vessel. This is the [SHIP_NAME]. We ask that you report any criminal activity that you may come across in neutral space. The Colonial Union cannot allow the neutral sectors to fall into greater chaos. Do your part in keeping the peace.
Translated Text: Greetings. civilian vessel. This is the [SHIP_NAME]. We ask that you report any criminal activity that you may come across in neutral space. The Colonial Union cannot allow the neutral sectors to fall into greater chaos. Do your part in keeping the peace.

Original Text: Captain of the Colonial Union starship [SHIP_NAME] speaking. What is your destination. civilians?
Translated Text: Captain of the Colonial Union starship [SHIP_NAME] speaking. What is your destination. civilians?

Original Text: You won’t be making any sales here. Fluffy Biscuit. Carry on your way quickly.
Translated Text: You won’t be making any sales here. Fluffy Biscuit. Carry on your way quickly.

Original Text: Continue on your course. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You should do your best not to linger in neutral space.
Translated Text: Continue on your course. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You should do your best not to linger in neutral space.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union. If you have deliveries in the neutral zone. complete them with haste. We don’t want to fish you out of trouble.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union. If you have deliveries in the neutral zone. complete them with haste. We don’t want to fish you out of trouble.

Original Text: It’s good to see a friendly ship out here. How is the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME] faring?
Translated Text: It’s good to see a friendly ship out here. How is the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME] faring?

Original Text: Good to see you. fellow officers. May your travels be safe and successful.
Translated Text: Good to see you. fellow officers. May your travels be safe and successful.

Original Text: We haven’t come across another Colonial Union vessel in quite some time. Have you brought any news with you?
Translated Text: We haven’t come across another Colonial Union vessel in quite some time. Have you brought any news with you?

Original Text: Greetings. friends. This is the crew of [SHIP_NAME]. Are you headed back to Outpost 448 soon? We hope you make it there safely. whenever you are on route to return.
Translated Text: Greetings. friends. This is the crew of [SHIP_NAME]. Are you headed back to Outpost 448 soon? We hope you make it there safely. whenever you are on route to return.

Original Text: Be careful out here. Neutral zones can bring on unexpected challenges. If you are in need of aid. do not hesitate to approach us. Together. we survive.
Translated Text: Be careful out here. Neutral zones can bring on unexpected challenges. If you are in need of aid. do not hesitate to approach us. Together. we survive.

Original Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. It’s been a long time since we’ve come across another Colonial Union ship. Are you managing well in the neutral zone?
Translated Text: This is the [SHIP_NAME]. It’s been a long time since we’ve come across another Colonial Union ship. Are you managing well in the neutral zone?

Original Text: Greetings. W.D. unit. Is your work going well? If you have further business in the neutral zone. be on your guard. Alliance of Gentlemen raiders and renegade ships are on the rise as of late.
Translated Text: Greetings. W.D. unit. Is your work going well? If you have further business in the neutral zone. be on your guard. Alliance of Gentlemen raiders and renegade ships are on the rise as of late.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union. Your assignments must be taking you into neutral space. Keep a watchful eye. It is becoming more difficult to traverse the galaxy with the recent unrest.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union. Your assignments must be taking you into neutral space. Keep a watchful eye. It is becoming more difficult to traverse the galaxy with the recent unrest.

Original Text: Captain of [SHIP_NAME]. speaking. What brings you out this way. Wolden-Dorf?
Translated Text: Captain of [SHIP_NAME]. speaking. What brings you out this way. Wolden-Dorf?

Original Text: Civilian vessel. we hope you’re faring well out here. Please contact us if you have anything to report.
Translated Text: Civilian vessel. we hope you’re faring well out here. Please contact us if you have anything to report.

Original Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are you faring well?
Translated Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are you faring well?

Original Text: No. we will not agree to this.
Translated Text: No. we will not agree to this.

Original Text: How are you faring. Fluffy Biscuit? Please be cautious in the neutral zone. These sectors tend to be even more lawless than the rest of the galaxy.
Translated Text: How are you faring. Fluffy Biscuit? Please be cautious in the neutral zone. These sectors tend to be even more lawless than the rest of the galaxy.

Original Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. This is [SHIP_NAME]. Out on a delivery. are you? Stay safe out here.
Translated Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. This is [SHIP_NAME]. Out on a delivery. are you? Stay safe out here.

Original Text: Ah. a Fluffy Biscuit Company ship! We’re quite lucky to have run into you. Do you have any new specials going on?
Translated Text: Ah. a Fluffy Biscuit Company ship! We’re quite lucky to have run into you. Do you have any new specials going on?

Original Text: Please. we don’t want trouble. We’ll hand over the credits!
Translated Text: Please. we don’t want trouble. We’ll hand over the credits!

Original Text: Such actions are considered reprehensible to the Colonial Union. You won’t get away with this.
Translated Text: Such actions are considered reprehensible to the Colonial Union. You won’t get away with this.

Original Text: Please. we don’t want trouble. We’ll hand over the fuel!
Translated Text: Please. we don’t want trouble. We’ll hand over the fuel!

Original Text: Another Colonial Union vessel in W.D. space? That is indeed unexpected. Are you authorized to be here. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?
Translated Text: Another Colonial Union vessel in W.D. space? That is indeed unexpected. Are you authorized to be here. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We’ve been given explicit permission from the Command Center to enter the W.D. zone. Have you received similar orders? If not. I advise you to leave here as soon as possible.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. We’ve been given explicit permission from the Command Center to enter the W.D. zone. Have you received similar orders? If not. I advise you to leave here as soon as possible.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we have been given orders to inspect a group of W.D. sectors near here. We request that you do not interfere with this investigation.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we have been given orders to inspect a group of W.D. sectors near here. We request that you do not interfere with this investigation.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. Please do not attack us. We have business in the Wolden-Dorf zone.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. Please do not attack us. We have business in the Wolden-Dorf zone.

Original Text: Leave W.D. space. civilians. You’ve crossed a very dangerous line.
Translated Text: Leave W.D. space. civilians. You’ve crossed a very dangerous line.

Original Text: What are civilians doing in the Corporation zone? You shouldn’t be here. Leave as soon as possible.
Translated Text: What are civilians doing in the Corporation zone? You shouldn’t be here. Leave as soon as possible.

Original Text: You should not be here. Fluffy Biscuit ship. The W.D. zone is restricted. It would not be wise to traverse through it unless you’ve been given clearance by the Corporation.
Translated Text: You should not be here. Fluffy Biscuit ship. The W.D. zone is restricted. It would not be wise to traverse through it unless you’ve been given clearance by the Corporation.

Original Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are you making deliveries in the W.D. zone? If so. you should be careful not to wander too far off course. The Wolden-Dorf Corporation is very strict about intruders.
Translated Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are you making deliveries in the W.D. zone? If so. you should be careful not to wander too far off course. The Wolden-Dorf Corporation is very strict about intruders.

Original Text: You call yourselves Colonial Union officers?
Translated Text: You call yourselves Colonial Union officers?

Original Text: All right. you can have the fuel capsules. Just let us be!
Translated Text: All right. you can have the fuel capsules. Just let us be!

Original Text: Colonial Union officers. greetings. What brings you out this way?
Translated Text: Colonial Union officers. greetings. What brings you out this way?

Original Text: We don’t know anything that would be of use to a W.D. crew. Apologies.
Translated Text: We don’t know anything that would be of use to a W.D. crew. Apologies.

Original Text: Hello. W.D. ship. It seems our navigator is busted. Took us right into Corporation space. We didn’t realize the blunder until we were already in warp. We’ll just be on our way. No need to heat up your turrets.
Translated Text: Hello. W.D. ship. It seems our navigator is busted. Took us right into Corporation space. We didn’t realize the blunder until we were already in warp. We’ll just be on our way. No need to heat up your turrets.

Original Text: There are rumors that the Estate is somewhere in this galaxy. We’re not privileged enough to know the current coordinates. but we intend to see it someday.
Translated Text: There are rumors that the Estate is somewhere in this galaxy. We’re not privileged enough to know the current coordinates. but we intend to see it someday.

Original Text: The Infected just keep spreading. We’re done for. If even the best Colonial Union and Wolden-Dorf scientists put together can’t find a way to stop those creatures. you know there’s nothing we can do except await the end. That’s probably the reason the intergalactic warp was severed. They didn’t want any Infected ships spreading to the main galaxies. They’ve quarantined us.
Translated Text: The Infected just keep spreading. We’re done for. If even the best Colonial Union and Wolden-Dorf scientists put together can’t find a way to stop those creatures. you know there’s nothing we can do except await the end. That’s probably the reason the intergalactic warp was severed. They didn’t want any Infected ships spreading to the main galaxies. They’ve quarantined us.

Original Text: Stay out of our way. We have work to do.
Translated Text: Stay out of our way. We have work to do.

Original Text: We have a pressing deadline to deliver this cargo. We really cannot spend any more time talking with you.
Translated Text: We have a pressing deadline to deliver this cargo. We really cannot spend any more time talking with you.

Original Text: You Fluffy Biscuit crews seem very thorough with your deliveries. Even W.D. space isn't safe from your sales pitches.
Translated Text: You Fluffy Biscuit crews seem very thorough with your deliveries. Even W.D. space isn't safe from your sales pitches.

Original Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit ship. Do you have a delivery in the W.D. zone? We have a delivery ourselves. Now if you’ll excuse us. we should get back to our course.
Translated Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit ship. Do you have a delivery in the W.D. zone? We have a delivery ourselves. Now if you’ll excuse us. we should get back to our course.

Original Text: The Command Center will be hearing of this offence.
Translated Text: The Command Center will be hearing of this offence.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. move along and resume your work. The Command Center does not tolerate negligent officers. Neither will we.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. move along and resume your work. The Command Center does not tolerate negligent officers. Neither will we.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. How can we help you?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. How can we help you?

Original Text: Do you have something to report to us. W.D. unit?
Translated Text: Do you have something to report to us. W.D. unit?

Original Text: Carry on your way. W.D. unit.
Translated Text: Carry on your way. W.D. unit.

Original Text: Greetings. Have you anything to report?
Translated Text: Greetings. Have you anything to report?

Original Text: This is a Colonial Union patrol ship. What is it you need?
Translated Text: This is a Colonial Union patrol ship. What is it you need?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] answering your hail request. What seems to be the problem?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] answering your hail request. What seems to be the problem?

Original Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. Do you have deliveries in the Union zone? If so. good luck with your work.
Translated Text: Greetings. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. Do you have deliveries in the Union zone? If so. good luck with your work.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet. Welcome to Union space. Let us know if you need assistance.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet. Welcome to Union space. Let us know if you need assistance.

Original Text: As members of the crew of [SHIP_NAME]. we welcome the Fluffy Biscuit Company to Union space. We wish you safe passage.
Translated Text: As members of the crew of [SHIP_NAME]. we welcome the Fluffy Biscuit Company to Union space. We wish you safe passage.

Original Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. Are you facing some issue. W.D. unit?
Translated Text: This is the captain of [SHIP_NAME]. Are you facing some issue. W.D. unit?

Original Text: Greetings. W.D. vessel. It seems your current task is taking you through the Union zone. Make sure you are following Colonial regulations.
Translated Text: Greetings. W.D. vessel. It seems your current task is taking you through the Union zone. Make sure you are following Colonial regulations.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. If you need assistance. do not refrain from contacting us.
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] of the Colonial Union fleet. If you need assistance. do not refrain from contacting us.

Original Text: Welcome to Colonial Union space. Please contact one of our ships if you have a report or are in need of assistance. Is there are problem. civilian vessel? How may we assist you?
Translated Text: Welcome to Colonial Union space. Please contact one of our ships if you have a report or are in need of assistance. Is there are problem. civilian vessel? How may we assist you?

Original Text: Welcome to Colonial Union space. Best of luck on your deliveries.
Translated Text: Welcome to Colonial Union space. Best of luck on your deliveries.

Original Text: Greetings from [SHIP_NAME]. You have our thanks for bringing more biscuits to the Union zone. Do you need any assistance?
Translated Text: Greetings from [SHIP_NAME]. You have our thanks for bringing more biscuits to the Union zone. Do you need any assistance?

Original Text: Hello. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. How are you faring?
Translated Text: Hello. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. How are you faring?

Original Text: You’ve convinced us. We’ll let you go.
Translated Text: You’ve convinced us. We’ll let you go.

Original Text: You’ve convinced us. We’ll let you go.
Translated Text: You’ve convinced us. We’ll let you go.

Original Text: This may be Union territory. but it won’t stop us from raiding your ship. You won’t be leaving this sector alive. Colonials.
Translated Text: This may be Union territory. but it won’t stop us from raiding your ship. You won’t be leaving this sector alive. Colonials.

Original Text: Greetings. officers. I’ll be honest—our hauls have been a little fruitless as of late. But your ship looks quite promising. It’s bound to hold something of value. I’m afraid we have no choice but to blast open your hull and take a look ourselves.
Translated Text: Greetings. officers. I’ll be honest—our hauls have been a little fruitless as of late. But your ship looks quite promising. It’s bound to hold something of value. I’m afraid we have no choice but to blast open your hull and take a look ourselves.

Original Text: Listen. officers. We’re not the crafty sort of Gentlemen. So let’s be upfront. shall we? We plan to take your ship and sell the parts for credits. Please. don’t waste our time with negotiations. You have no say in the matter. Your only choice is to put up a good fight.
Translated Text: Listen. officers. We’re not the crafty sort of Gentlemen. So let’s be upfront. shall we? We plan to take your ship and sell the parts for credits. Please. don’t waste our time with negotiations. You have no say in the matter. Your only choice is to put up a good fight.

Original Text: Captain of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we harbor no resentment towards you or your crew. Our decision to attack your ship is based purely on monetary reasons.
Translated Text: Captain of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we harbor no resentment towards you or your crew. Our decision to attack your ship is based purely on monetary reasons.

Original Text: Ah. a W.D. vessel on its own in Union space. Have you any idea how much stolen Wolden-Dorf technology sells for these days? It’s lucky for us that we found you straying away from the pack. We’re in for a big pay day.
Translated Text: Ah. a W.D. vessel on its own in Union space. Have you any idea how much stolen Wolden-Dorf technology sells for these days? It’s lucky for us that we found you straying away from the pack. We’re in for a big pay day.

Original Text: That’s a nice ship you have there. Its parts will sell for a hefty price.
Translated Text: That’s a nice ship you have there. Its parts will sell for a hefty price.

Original Text: Do you think your precious W.D. Corporation will notice if you don’t report back to its headquarters? I say we test that theory.
Translated Text: Do you think your precious W.D. Corporation will notice if you don’t report back to its headquarters? I say we test that theory.

Original Text: Get out of here. We’re busy.
Translated Text: Get out of here. We’re busy.

Original Text: Hello. Fluffy Biscuits. Have you restocked your supply recently? We’d like to have a look around your ship.
Translated Text: Hello. Fluffy Biscuits. Have you restocked your supply recently? We’d like to have a look around your ship.

Original Text: All right. you can have the fuel capsules. Just let us be!
Translated Text: All right. you can have the fuel capsules. Just let us be!

Original Text: Hello. officers. Is there something you need of us?
Translated Text: Hello. officers. Is there something you need of us?

Original Text: Greetings. The Colonial Union has our full cooperation. we assure you.
Translated Text: Greetings. The Colonial Union has our full cooperation. we assure you.

Original Text: We don’t want any trouble. W.D. unit. Just let us go.
Translated Text: We don’t want any trouble. W.D. unit. Just let us go.

Original Text: We can’t offer anything to the Corporation. If you are in need of something. a Colonial Union vessel will be more equipped to aid you.
Translated Text: We can’t offer anything to the Corporation. If you are in need of something. a Colonial Union vessel will be more equipped to aid you.

Original Text: Pay us no heed. We have no intention to disrupt a W.D. ship.
Translated Text: Pay us no heed. We have no intention to disrupt a W.D. ship.

Original Text: May the stars favor your voyages. friend.
Translated Text: May the stars favor your voyages. friend.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] answering your hail request. Is there something you want from us?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME] answering your hail request. Is there something you want from us?

Original Text: We aren’t interested in purchasing biscuits. sorry. If you have no other business with us. we’d appreciate it if you’d let us be on our way. We’re in a hurry.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in purchasing biscuits. sorry. If you have no other business with us. we’d appreciate it if you’d let us be on our way. We’re in a hurry.

Original Text: We aren’t interested in negotiations of any sort.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in negotiations of any sort.

Original Text: We have actual work to do. Union scum. If you get in our way one more time. we will make sure you regret it.
Translated Text: We have actual work to do. Union scum. If you get in our way one more time. we will make sure you regret it.

Original Text: The W.D. Corporation will do away with the Union in time. Your authority in this galaxy is beginning to falter. It’s time you started obeying our orders. officers. Warp out of here or face the power of W.D. weaponry.
Translated Text: The W.D. Corporation will do away with the Union in time. Your authority in this galaxy is beginning to falter. It’s time you started obeying our orders. officers. Warp out of here or face the power of W.D. weaponry.

Original Text: Our patience is growing limited for you pesky Union officers. Leave this sector now. or we will do away with you.
Translated Text: Our patience is growing limited for you pesky Union officers. Leave this sector now. or we will do away with you.

Original Text: The Infected are taking over the galaxy. Anyone who tells you otherwise is a liar or a fool. I fear there will come a point when even the Corporation is overwhelmed by them.
Translated Text: The Infected are taking over the galaxy. Anyone who tells you otherwise is a liar or a fool. I fear there will come a point when even the Corporation is overwhelmed by them.

Original Text: Have you heard the rumors about Roalwin Mocath? He used to be one of the head supervisors of our branch in the W.D. Corporation. Supposedly. he went missing several months ago. His ship just vanished. and Headquarters hasn’t been able to contact him since. They tried tracking him. but all searches proved futile. If you ask me. he probably got ambushed by Alliance raiders. That ship is nothing but scrap by now. They’ll never find it.
Translated Text: Have you heard the rumors about Roalwin Mocath? He used to be one of the head supervisors of our branch in the W.D. Corporation. Supposedly. he went missing several months ago. His ship just vanished. and Headquarters hasn’t been able to contact him since. They tried tracking him. but all searches proved futile. If you ask me. he probably got ambushed by Alliance raiders. That ship is nothing but scrap by now. They’ll never find it.

Original Text: You want credits? Take them! Just stay away from us.
Translated Text: You want credits? Take them! Just stay away from us.

Original Text: You want fuel? Take it! Just stay away from us.
Translated Text: You want fuel? Take it! Just stay away from us.

Original Text: I trust you are tending to your assignments diligently. Progress above all.
Translated Text: I trust you are tending to your assignments diligently. Progress above all.

Original Text: Be vigilant. There have been several reports about raiders in these sectors. Do not allow your ship to be infiltrated.
Translated Text: Be vigilant. There have been several reports about raiders in these sectors. Do not allow your ship to be infiltrated.

Original Text: I suspect you are not who you appear to be. Leave now. or there will be trouble.
Translated Text: I suspect you are not who you appear to be. Leave now. or there will be trouble.

Original Text: We trust no one in the neutral zone. Unless you can prove you bear the Corporation no malicious intent. we will be readying our weapons.
Translated Text: We trust no one in the neutral zone. Unless you can prove you bear the Corporation no malicious intent. we will be readying our weapons.

Original Text: Warp out of this sector now. We will not tolerate disruptions. If you hinder our work in any way. you’ll join the rest of the space debris floating around this galaxy.
Translated Text: Warp out of this sector now. We will not tolerate disruptions. If you hinder our work in any way. you’ll join the rest of the space debris floating around this galaxy.

Original Text: Just this once. we’ll purchase a crate of biscuits. Then we expect you to take your business elsewhere.
Translated Text: Just this once. we’ll purchase a crate of biscuits. Then we expect you to take your business elsewhere.

Original Text: We made it clear that we’re not interested in purchasing biscuits. Your persistence is infuriating.
Translated Text: We made it clear that we’re not interested in purchasing biscuits. Your persistence is infuriating.

Original Text: Very well. Transfer over one crate of biscuits.
Translated Text: Very well. Transfer over one crate of biscuits.

Original Text: We aren’t interested in negotiations of any sort.
Translated Text: We aren’t interested in negotiations of any sort.

Original Text: We’ve had enough of your company’s irritating sales pitches. Get out of this sector. or we will fire upon you.
Translated Text: We’ve had enough of your company’s irritating sales pitches. Get out of this sector. or we will fire upon you.

Original Text: Leave now. Fluffy Biscuit. We have no intention of purchasing your terrible product. and we will not tolerate your presence here. Charge your warp drive and get out of our way.
Translated Text: Leave now. Fluffy Biscuit. We have no intention of purchasing your terrible product. and we will not tolerate your presence here. Charge your warp drive and get out of our way.

Original Text: It seems that many ships are abandoning their stations in pursuit of this Lost Colony. I’d be wary if I were you. You never know who might be a friend or a foe these days.
Translated Text: It seems that many ships are abandoning their stations in pursuit of this Lost Colony. I’d be wary if I were you. You never know who might be a friend or a foe these days.

Original Text: We’ve answered some false distress signals in the past. Pirates. feigning ship malfunctions and luring unsuspecting passersby into traps. Since then. we’ve grown more skeptical of the ships we meet out here in neutral space. We advise you to exercise caution. as well.
Translated Text: We’ve answered some false distress signals in the past. Pirates. feigning ship malfunctions and luring unsuspecting passersby into traps. Since then. we’ve grown more skeptical of the ships we meet out here in neutral space. We advise you to exercise caution. as well.

Original Text: The Wolden-Dorf Corporation is a scourge in our galaxy. It is corrupt beyond question. and yet the Colonial Union takes little action against it. The Union thinks it’s preventing a war by maintaining a balance of power between the Corporation and itself. But by failing to enforce stricter laws against W.D.. the Union is losing its power. And soon it will be too late.
Translated Text: The Wolden-Dorf Corporation is a scourge in our galaxy. It is corrupt beyond question. and yet the Colonial Union takes little action against it. The Union thinks it’s preventing a war by maintaining a balance of power between the Corporation and itself. But by failing to enforce stricter laws against W.D.. the Union is losing its power. And soon it will be too late.

Original Text: Let us be! We’ll give you the credits.
Translated Text: Let us be! We’ll give you the credits.

Original Text: We won’t let you get away with this.
Translated Text: We won’t let you get away with this.

Original Text: Let us be! We’ll give you the fuel.
Translated Text: Let us be! We’ll give you the fuel.

Original Text: We have no business with you. Move along.
Translated Text: We have no business with you. Move along.

Original Text: Be on your course. There is no work here for you.
Translated Text: Be on your course. There is no work here for you.

Original Text: We will grant you passage just this once. Don’t cross paths with us again.
Translated Text: We will grant you passage just this once. Don’t cross paths with us again.

Original Text: You’ve convinced us. We won’t fire upon you.
Translated Text: You’ve convinced us. We won’t fire upon you.

Original Text: We are unwavering on this matter.
Translated Text: We are unwavering on this matter.

Original Text: What exactly are you doing out here. Wolden-Dorf? Conducting unethical experiments just out of the Colonial Union’s sight? Hunting down civilian research stations to steal technology? No matter. My crew will stop you before you can commit any further crimes.
Translated Text: What exactly are you doing out here. Wolden-Dorf? Conducting unethical experiments just out of the Colonial Union’s sight? Hunting down civilian research stations to steal technology? No matter. My crew will stop you before you can commit any further crimes.

Original Text: A W.D. ship is the last thing I wanted to find out here. But there’s an advantage to being the neutral zone. Anything is probable. I’ll say we were attacked by a W.D. vessel and defended ourselves. We had no choice but to destroy it. How does that sound?
Translated Text: A W.D. ship is the last thing I wanted to find out here. But there’s an advantage to being the neutral zone. Anything is probable. I’ll say we were attacked by a W.D. vessel and defended ourselves. We had no choice but to destroy it. How does that sound?

Original Text: The Command Center is too tolerant of you Corporation drones. They should be pursuing you with the same ferocity as they pursue the Alliance of Gentlemen. Your crimes are just as heinous.
Translated Text: The Command Center is too tolerant of you Corporation drones. They should be pursuing you with the same ferocity as they pursue the Alliance of Gentlemen. Your crimes are just as heinous.

Original Text: Ah. yes… Another W.D. ship pretending to be in cooperation with Colonial Union. I can see right through your Corporation’s ruse. And I cannot in good conscience let you leave this sector.
Translated Text: Ah. yes… Another W.D. ship pretending to be in cooperation with Colonial Union. I can see right through your Corporation’s ruse. And I cannot in good conscience let you leave this sector.

Original Text: I’ve grown inexpressibly weary of the W.D. Corporation doing whatever it wants. This ends now. Prepare to fight.
Translated Text: I’ve grown inexpressibly weary of the W.D. Corporation doing whatever it wants. This ends now. Prepare to fight.

Original Text: The W.D. Corporation is a stain on our society. Today. I am taking a stand against it. I will not let you leave this sector.
Translated Text: The W.D. Corporation is a stain on our society. Today. I am taking a stand against it. I will not let you leave this sector.

Original Text: You belong to the Alliance of Gentlemen. We can’t be fooled. Prepare to meet justice.
Translated Text: You belong to the Alliance of Gentlemen. We can’t be fooled. Prepare to meet justice.

Original Text: Every civilian ship we’ve come across thus far has been overrun by Alliance members. We’ll take our chances with you.
Translated Text: Every civilian ship we’ve come across thus far has been overrun by Alliance members. We’ll take our chances with you.

Original Text: Do you truly expect us to believe you are civilians? You may be operating a civilian starship. but our better judgement tells us it’s a clever front.
Translated Text: Do you truly expect us to believe you are civilians? You may be operating a civilian starship. but our better judgement tells us it’s a clever front.

Original Text: A fellow captain of mine aided a civilian vessel much like yours. At their plea. he offered fuel and rations. Lowered his shields for them. Then his ship was utterly destroyed. I am not as trusting as my comrade. and I’m not inclined to give you the advantage on us.
Translated Text: A fellow captain of mine aided a civilian vessel much like yours. At their plea. he offered fuel and rations. Lowered his shields for them. Then his ship was utterly destroyed. I am not as trusting as my comrade. and I’m not inclined to give you the advantage on us.

Original Text: We’ve answered some false distress signals in the past. Pirates. feigning ship malfunctions and luring unsuspecting passersby into traps. Since then. we’ve grown more skeptical of the ships we meet out here in neutral space. We advise you to exercise caution. as well.
Translated Text: We’ve answered some false distress signals in the past. Pirates. feigning ship malfunctions and luring unsuspecting passersby into traps. Since then. we’ve grown more skeptical of the ships we meet out here in neutral space. We advise you to exercise caution. as well.

Original Text: …Fine. we’ll take one crate of biscuits. Just one. understand?
Translated Text: …Fine. we’ll take one crate of biscuits. Just one. understand?

Original Text: If we purchase biscuits. will you leave us be? We’ll take one crate. Then you need to get out of here.
Translated Text: If we purchase biscuits. will you leave us be? We’ll take one crate. Then you need to get out of here.

Original Text: All right. you’ve convinced us. We’ll buy some biscuits.
Translated Text: All right. you’ve convinced us. We’ll buy some biscuits.

Original Text: Do not harass us with your sales pitches. Find someone else who has an appetite for your mass produced garbage.
Translated Text: Do not harass us with your sales pitches. Find someone else who has an appetite for your mass produced garbage.

Original Text: No. We already made it clear that we aren’t interested in buying biscuits. Take your business elsewhere.
Translated Text: No. We already made it clear that we aren’t interested in buying biscuits. Take your business elsewhere.

Original Text: We don’t care for biscuits. Now get out of our way.
Translated Text: We don’t care for biscuits. Now get out of our way.

Original Text: Biscuits. yes. we’ll take them. There’s no need to start a fight.
Translated Text: Biscuits. yes. we’ll take them. There’s no need to start a fight.

Original Text: We don’t have time to get into a fight with you. We’ll buy one crate of biscuits. Are you satisfied?
Translated Text: We don’t have time to get into a fight with you. We’ll buy one crate of biscuits. Are you satisfied?

Original Text: You’re bluffing. A Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel can’t overpower a Colonial Union ship. Nor can a Fluffy Biscuit employee get away with threatening a Colonial Union officer.
Translated Text: You’re bluffing. A Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel can’t overpower a Colonial Union ship. Nor can a Fluffy Biscuit employee get away with threatening a Colonial Union officer.

Original Text: Let us be! We’ll give you the fuel.
Translated Text: Let us be! We’ll give you the fuel.

Original Text: We won’t let you get away with this.
Translated Text: We won’t let you get away with this.

Original Text: We aren’t ones for biscuits. Move along.
Translated Text: We aren’t ones for biscuits. Move along.

Original Text: Leave. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. Contrary to what your entrepreneurial spirit might believe. there is no business for you here.
Translated Text: Leave. Fluffy Biscuit vessel. Contrary to what your entrepreneurial spirit might believe. there is no business for you here.

Original Text: Keep moving. Fluffy Biscuit. There’s nothing for you to see here.
Translated Text: Keep moving. Fluffy Biscuit. There’s nothing for you to see here.

Original Text: Storms on this planet carry in extreme radiation. It can be difficult for biologicals to survive. If you are seeking to traverse the path. stay near to the lights. They are radiation scrubbers. Do not stray from them.
Translated Text: Storms on this planet carry in extreme radiation. It can be difficult for biologicals to survive. If you are seeking to traverse the path. stay near to the lights. They are radiation scrubbers. Do not stray from them.

Original Text: Creatures live in these wastes. Be vigilant.
Translated Text: Creatures live in these wastes. Be vigilant.

Original Text: Hello. is there something you need? Perhaps one of my wares may help you on your travels.
Translated Text: Hello. is there something you need? Perhaps one of my wares may help you on your travels.

Original Text: Is there some way I can help you?
Translated Text: Is there some way I can help you?

Original Text: You must’ve come a long way to get here. This planet is not easy for biologicals to traverse. Now that you’re here. is one of my fine weapons catching your eye?
Translated Text: You must’ve come a long way to get here. This planet is not easy for biologicals to traverse. Now that you’re here. is one of my fine weapons catching your eye?

Original Text: I have many fine weapons for sale. if you’d like to take a look.
Translated Text: I have many fine weapons for sale. if you’d like to take a look.

Original Text: The fruits on this tree are strange indeed.
Translated Text: The fruits on this tree are strange indeed.

Original Text: Thank you! The generator room is in the tall spherical building outside. My sensors indicate there are six large spots of greywrack. Just pick them up. bring them back here. and I’ll dispose of them.
Translated Text: Thank you! The generator room is in the tall spherical building outside. My sensors indicate there are six large spots of greywrack. Just pick them up. bring them back here. and I’ll dispose of them.

Original Text: That’s all right. I know it’s not exciting work. I’ll just have to do it after my shift. Thanks anyway for offering to help.
Translated Text: That’s all right. I know it’s not exciting work. I’ll just have to do it after my shift. Thanks anyway for offering to help.

Original Text: You’re interested in helping out? Well. if you want work. you could assist us with our generators. The generator room was contaminated with greywrack a few weeks back. That stuff spreads fast and is almost impossible to get rid of. so we have to keep cleaning it out every couple days. If you could clean it for me. I’d be very appreciative.
Translated Text: You’re interested in helping out? Well. if you want work. you could assist us with our generators. The generator room was contaminated with greywrack a few weeks back. That stuff spreads fast and is almost impossible to get rid of. so we have to keep cleaning it out every couple days. If you could clean it for me. I’d be very appreciative.

Original Text: We have a mix of factions working closely together to bring this place up from the ground. It’s been difficult for some of them to cooperate. but they’re slowly learning how to work as a team. And they all get along fine when discussing their shared dislike of the weather. Although this is a terribly inhospitable planet for humans to live on. there’s a lot of hope that the colony will be successful. It’s my job to make sure everyone does their part in making that happen. I believe all the workers here—Colonial Union. Wolden-Dorf and civilian factions alike—want to see this place flourish.
Translated Text: We have a mix of factions working closely together to bring this place up from the ground. It’s been difficult for some of them to cooperate. but they’re slowly learning how to work as a team. And they all get along fine when discussing their shared dislike of the weather. Although this is a terribly inhospitable planet for humans to live on. there’s a lot of hope that the colony will be successful. It’s my job to make sure everyone does their part in making that happen. I believe all the workers here—Colonial Union. Wolden-Dorf and civilian factions alike—want to see this place flourish.

Original Text: Greetings. I’m surprised this planet is receiving visitors so soon. There isn’t much here as of yet. but that will change in due time. Do you have any concerns you need to bring to my attention?
Translated Text: Greetings. I’m surprised this planet is receiving visitors so soon. There isn’t much here as of yet. but that will change in due time. Do you have any concerns you need to bring to my attention?

Original Text: Thanks for your help. You’ve saved me some time. Please. take these credits. I’m sure it’s not as much money as you’re used to. but your help means a lot. We all have our hands full here. and I’m sure we’d be worse off without people like you who are willing to assist at a moment’s notice. Best of luck to you. and stay safe out in the galaxy.
Translated Text: Thanks for your help. You’ve saved me some time. Please. take these credits. I’m sure it’s not as much money as you’re used to. but your help means a lot. We all have our hands full here. and I’m sure we’d be worse off without people like you who are willing to assist at a moment’s notice. Best of luck to you. and stay safe out in the galaxy.

Original Text: Have you cleaned out the generator room?
Translated Text: Have you cleaned out the generator room?

Original Text: Our settlement owes a great debt to kind people like yourself. Thanks again for your help. Best of luck to you. and stay safe out in the galaxy.
Translated Text: Our settlement owes a great debt to kind people like yourself. Thanks again for your help. Best of luck to you. and stay safe out in the galaxy.

Original Text: Sorry. can’t talk right now. We’re on a tight schedule.
Translated Text: Sorry. can’t talk right now. We’re on a tight schedule.

Original Text: This planet was finally approved by the Command Center for colonization. It was a process that spanned many years. Decades. in fact. Now this planet is being prepared to accept its first true colonists. Our job is to make sure the initial structures are stable and safe for the civilians who were selected to live here.
Translated Text: This planet was finally approved by the Command Center for colonization. It was a process that spanned many years. Decades. in fact. Now this planet is being prepared to accept its first true colonists. Our job is to make sure the initial structures are stable and safe for the civilians who were selected to live here.

Original Text: This is a ghastly planet for anyone to settle down on. It’s a glacial nightmare. Nothing can survive on the surface. The sun rarely shows itself. Blizzards frequently rip through the area and bury everything in more snow. I can’t wait to get off this planet. I haven’t any idea how the colonists are going to fare here. but I wish them luck. Brave. foolish souls.
Translated Text: This is a ghastly planet for anyone to settle down on. It’s a glacial nightmare. Nothing can survive on the surface. The sun rarely shows itself. Blizzards frequently rip through the area and bury everything in more snow. I can’t wait to get off this planet. I haven’t any idea how the colonists are going to fare here. but I wish them luck. Brave. foolish souls.

Original Text: Preparing this planet for colonization has been a tremendous ordeal.
