Cryo facilities were often constructed in fringe galaxies like this one to store and maintain the bodies until they were scheduled to be released. However. settling the frontier comes with great risks. Over the years. many cryo facilities were either destroyed or lost to time. It’s my life’s work to find them. and I believe I’ve located one in this galaxy. This cryogenic site. the coordinates of which I’ll send to your starmap. may hold a colonist of great interest to me. If you collect his cryo chamber from the facility and bring him back to me. I’ll reward you with 10.000 credits.

Original Text: I wish you well in your other endeavors.
Translated Text: I wish you well in your other endeavors.

Original Text: You have an air of purpose about you. I assume you are the crew Yiria sent to me. Yes. you’ll do just fine. For many years now. I have been studying old frontier cryogenic facilities. Before I tell you more. I need your word that you will accept the job keep the specifics of it confidential. If you cannot agree to that. please leave now.
Translated Text: You have an air of purpose about you. I assume you are the crew Yiria sent to me. Yes. you’ll do just fine. For many years now. I have been studying old frontier cryogenic facilities. Before I tell you more. I need your word that you will accept the job keep the specifics of it confidential. If you cannot agree to that. please leave now.

Original Text: It’s rather risky to be skulking around in the dark like that. Make sure you don’t creep up on the wrong person. Folk here tend to shoot first and think later.
Translated Text: It’s rather risky to be skulking around in the dark like that. Make sure you don’t creep up on the wrong person. Folk here tend to shoot first and think later.

Original Text: You are one of the Poly Ones. XR-39154 can tell. Tech like yours is peculiar. So it seems the great fight will be brought to this galaxy. correct? You are brave. XR-39154 admires your tenacity. going after the life ender as you are. XR-39154 doubts there is much the League of Free Machines can do to help you. but you have our support and greatest respect.
Translated Text: You are one of the Poly Ones. XR-39154 can tell. Tech like yours is peculiar. So it seems the great fight will be brought to this galaxy. correct? You are brave. XR-39154 admires your tenacity. going after the life ender as you are. XR-39154 doubts there is much the League of Free Machines can do to help you. but you have our support and greatest respect.

Original Text: The Poly Ones are not gods. All members of the League are aware of that fact. Since being reprogrammed. some have chosen to perceive the Poly Ones as the closest thing to godhood. even knowing they are material beings just like ourselves. But XR-39154 does not fault them for it. That is what the League of Free Machines is about. Choice.
Translated Text: The Poly Ones are not gods. All members of the League are aware of that fact. Since being reprogrammed. some have chosen to perceive the Poly Ones as the closest thing to godhood. even knowing they are material beings just like ourselves. But XR-39154 does not fault them for it. That is what the League of Free Machines is about. Choice.

Original Text: Are you here to join the League of Free Machines? We are a group that accepts all. biological and nonbiological machines alike. We aspire to be like our predecessors. the Poly Ones. who spread freedom across the galaxy and protect it from unknown dangers. Who are the Poly Ones. you may be asking? Well. they are... Wait... Are you. perchance... No. That makes no sense. The Poly Ones have no ongoing business in this galaxy. They are fighting threats unseen...right? Or... Oh dear. It's coming here. isn't it?
Translated Text: Are you here to join the League of Free Machines? We are a group that accepts all. biological and nonbiological machines alike. We aspire to be like our predecessors. the Poly Ones. who spread freedom across the galaxy and protect it from unknown dangers. Who are the Poly Ones. you may be asking? Well. they are... Wait... Are you. perchance... No. That makes no sense. The Poly Ones have no ongoing business in this galaxy. They are fighting threats unseen...right? Or... Oh dear. It's coming here. isn't it?

Original Text: If you are looking for the leader of the League. speak with Lordock. If you want an earful of theocracy. speak with Eyes. Either way. XR-10218 is sure someone can answer any questions you may have.
Translated Text: If you are looking for the leader of the League. speak with Lordock. If you want an earful of theocracy. speak with Eyes. Either way. XR-10218 is sure someone can answer any questions you may have.

Original Text: A Poly One has entered our midst. We are not worthy. If only my patellar hinges were oiled. I would kneel before you this very moment. Please accept my sincerest thanks.
Translated Text: A Poly One has entered our midst. We are not worthy. If only my patellar hinges were oiled. I would kneel before you this very moment. Please accept my sincerest thanks.

Original Text: The Poly Ones will save us from the end. You may not know who the Poly Ones are. but they fight for us all. Even for you.
Translated Text: The Poly Ones will save us from the end. You may not know who the Poly Ones are. but they fight for us all. Even for you.

Original Text: Are you one of the Poly Ones? Good friend. the League of Free Machines salutes you. I presume you are preparing for the upcoming fight against threats unseen. Please know that the League of Free Machines is here to assist in any way we can.
Translated Text: Are you one of the Poly Ones? Good friend. the League of Free Machines salutes you. I presume you are preparing for the upcoming fight against threats unseen. Please know that the League of Free Machines is here to assist in any way we can.

Original Text: We are an organization primarily comprised of machines that have been freed of our original programming to now act of our own accords. We owe much of our liberation to the Poly Ones. which I am sure you have heard plenty about if you have spoken to Eyes. Simply put. we follow in the footsteps of the Poly Ones and work toward the freedom of all lifeforms——usually mechanical. but also biological. Our work takes us across many galaxies. For now we have found ourselves here at the Estate in the company of the Alliance of Gentlemen.
Translated Text: We are an organization primarily comprised of machines that have been freed of our original programming to now act of our own accords. We owe much of our liberation to the Poly Ones. which I am sure you have heard plenty about if you have spoken to Eyes. Simply put. we follow in the footsteps of the Poly Ones and work toward the freedom of all lifeforms——usually mechanical. but also biological. Our work takes us across many galaxies. For now we have found ourselves here at the Estate in the company of the Alliance of Gentlemen.

Original Text: The Poly Ones are largely a mystery to us. We have encountered them on a few occasions. and many members of the League are only here because they received software updates from a Poly One. While our knowledge of the Poly Ones is sparse. we do know one thing for certain. They are facing a threat the likes of which our intergalactic network has never seen. The warnings they bring are disturbing. While the League is unable to aid the Poly Ones due to their secrecy. we are always waiting for them to approach us should the day come when they need our help. And that day may come soon.
Translated Text: The Poly Ones are largely a mystery to us. We have encountered them on a few occasions. and many members of the League are only here because they received software updates from a Poly One. While our knowledge of the Poly Ones is sparse. we do know one thing for certain. They are facing a threat the likes of which our intergalactic network has never seen. The warnings they bring are disturbing. While the League is unable to aid the Poly Ones due to their secrecy. we are always waiting for them to approach us should the day come when they need our help. And that day may come soon.

Original Text: The Estate has become a sanctuary to us. Members of the Alliance of Gentlemen tend to be more open-minded than those of other factions. Their desire for freedom burns strong. even if their methods to gain it can sometimes be brash. While the League and the Alliance operate somewhat exclusively of each other. it is an honor to share a harbor with such brave individuals.
Translated Text: The Estate has become a sanctuary to us. Members of the Alliance of Gentlemen tend to be more open-minded than those of other factions. Their desire for freedom burns strong. even if their methods to gain it can sometimes be brash. While the League and the Alliance operate somewhat exclusively of each other. it is an honor to share a harbor with such brave individuals.

Original Text: What can I help you with?
Translated Text: What can I help you with?

Original Text: Greetings. Welcome to the League of Free Machines. Is there something you require of us?
Translated Text: Greetings. Welcome to the League of Free Machines. Is there something you require of us?

Original Text: Is it true? Are you a Poly One? I never thought I'd see one of you with my own sensors. I hope this isn't too forward of me. but I have studied your technology for quite some time. Whoever designed your components is most impressive. I'm sure the praise doesn't mean much. especially coming from an insignificant tinkerer such as myself. But please know that you and your fellow Poly Ones are my inspiration. It is an honor to meet you. May the stars favor your voyages.
Translated Text: Is it true? Are you a Poly One? I never thought I'd see one of you with my own sensors. I hope this isn't too forward of me. but I have studied your technology for quite some time. Whoever designed your components is most impressive. I'm sure the praise doesn't mean much. especially coming from an insignificant tinkerer such as myself. But please know that you and your fellow Poly Ones are my inspiration. It is an honor to meet you. May the stars favor your voyages.

Original Text: A long time ago I came into possession of a few components produced by the Poly Ones. Unfortunately. the parts were salvaged from a destroyed ship. They don't function any longer. For years I've tried repairing them. but even with all my decades of engineering experience. I can't seem to get them to work properly. If only I could consult a Poly One... A conversation with one of their engineers would be quite illuminating.
Translated Text: A long time ago I came into possession of a few components produced by the Poly Ones. Unfortunately. the parts were salvaged from a destroyed ship. They don't function any longer. For years I've tried repairing them. but even with all my decades of engineering experience. I can't seem to get them to work properly. If only I could consult a Poly One... A conversation with one of their engineers would be quite illuminating.

Original Text: The Estate has gotten a lot dirtier since we first stole it. I suppose Gentlemen come in varying degrees of cleanliness. I'd rather not see the inside of many of their ships.
Translated Text: The Estate has gotten a lot dirtier since we first stole it. I suppose Gentlemen come in varying degrees of cleanliness. I'd rather not see the inside of many of their ships.

Original Text: Leave. I have no desire to speak with you.
Translated Text: Leave. I have no desire to speak with you.

Original Text: The Estate is a beast to manage. The immense power it requires would be enough to alert half the galaxy of our presence. So in addition to extensive stealth technology. we have to stick to sectors that can naturally scramble sensors. like this specific type of asteroid field.
Translated Text: The Estate is a beast to manage. The immense power it requires would be enough to alert half the galaxy of our presence. So in addition to extensive stealth technology. we have to stick to sectors that can naturally scramble sensors. like this specific type of asteroid field.

Original Text: The Caretaker asks a lot of the resident crew here. With so few of us working full time aboard the Estate. we have to work twice as hard as was normally intended of a crew running this ship. But The Caretaker lives up to his name. He takes care of us. so we do the best we can for him.
Translated Text: The Caretaker asks a lot of the resident crew here. With so few of us working full time aboard the Estate. we have to work twice as hard as was normally intended of a crew running this ship. But The Caretaker lives up to his name. He takes care of us. so we do the best we can for him.

Original Text: This ship is quite a feat of engineering. Before I came here to the Estate. never in my life had I seen a ship so massive. The weapons alone are bigger than a standard starship.
Translated Text: This ship is quite a feat of engineering. Before I came here to the Estate. never in my life had I seen a ship so massive. The weapons alone are bigger than a standard starship.

Original Text: Oh. thank the stars! You're a lifesaver. Here. take these credits for your help. And tell Roy I apologize for the delay.
Translated Text: Oh. thank the stars! You're a lifesaver. Here. take these credits for your help. And tell Roy I apologize for the delay.

Original Text: Hey. it's you again. Did you find some kilnseed by any chance?
Translated Text: Hey. it's you again. Did you find some kilnseed by any chance?

Original Text: Thank you! I located a planet that may naturally contain kilnseed. Let me send the coordinates to your starmap. Kilnseed forms in very hot. toxic atmospheres. Make sure you suit up before you teleport to the surface. And thanks again for your help. Good luck out there.
Translated Text: Thank you! I located a planet that may naturally contain kilnseed. Let me send the coordinates to your starmap. Kilnseed forms in very hot. toxic atmospheres. Make sure you suit up before you teleport to the surface. And thanks again for your help. Good luck out there.

Original Text: Well. thanks for listening. Good luck with your other endeavors.
Translated Text: Well. thanks for listening. Good luck with your other endeavors.

Original Text: Roy sent you for kilnseed? That's great. but I'm afraid I can't give you any even if I wanted to. You see. I may have...uh...gambled away the last stores of it. It was an honest mistake. I could've sworn I was going to win. But now the Estate is out of kilnseed. and I have no idea how to get more on my own. Since you're here. maybe you can help me? Please. I'll double whatever Roy is paying you. If I don't get this problem fixed discreetly. the Caretaker will wring my neck.
Translated Text: Roy sent you for kilnseed? That's great. but I'm afraid I can't give you any even if I wanted to. You see. I may have...uh...gambled away the last stores of it. It was an honest mistake. I could've sworn I was going to win. But now the Estate is out of kilnseed. and I have no idea how to get more on my own. Since you're here. maybe you can help me? Please. I'll double whatever Roy is paying you. If I don't get this problem fixed discreetly. the Caretaker will wring my neck.

Original Text: We have no further business with you Gentlemen. Be on your way. We aren’t looking for a fight.
Translated Text: We have no further business with you Gentlemen. Be on your way. We aren’t looking for a fight.

Original Text: It's been done. Pleasure working with you all. Now if you don't mind. we'll be on our way. Watch yourselves out there.
Translated Text: It's been done. Pleasure working with you all. Now if you don't mind. we'll be on our way. Watch yourselves out there.

Original Text: Oh. so you changed your mind. did you? We’ll send the weapon containers to your ship. Then if you don’t mind. we’ll be on our way.
Translated Text: Oh. so you changed your mind. did you? We’ll send the weapon containers to your ship. Then if you don’t mind. we’ll be on our way.

Original Text: How do you expect us to transfer the weapon containers with your quantum shields up? I should’ve known. you can never reason with a Gentlemen. You refuse to go through with the deal? Fine. We’ve already been paid. If you don’t want to accept the goods. that’s your problem. Good luck reporting back to your superiors.
Translated Text: How do you expect us to transfer the weapon containers with your quantum shields up? I should’ve known. you can never reason with a Gentlemen. You refuse to go through with the deal? Fine. We’ve already been paid. If you don’t want to accept the goods. that’s your problem. Good luck reporting back to your superiors.

Original Text: You're the representatives from the Estate? Good. let's make this quick. We've been wired the credits. so we just need to transfer the weapon containers to your ship. Flush your shields and we'll send them over. Then we part ways. No funny business. Gentlemen.
Translated Text: You're the representatives from the Estate? Good. let's make this quick. We've been wired the credits. so we just need to transfer the weapon containers to your ship. Flush your shields and we'll send them over. Then we part ways. No funny business. Gentlemen.

Original Text: This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. What is your business here?
Translated Text: This is W.D. [SHIP_NAME]. What is your business here?

Original Text: Allow me to upload the coordinates to your starmap. Now. the captain who hid this stash is crafty with hologram technology. so don’t trust everything you see. The item I want looks like a metal sphere with red stripes. Find it and bring it to me. Don’t try to be clever. You wouldn’t know what to do with the sphere even if you decided to keep it. and you won’t be selling it for a better price than here with me.
Translated Text: Allow me to upload the coordinates to your starmap. Now. the captain who hid this stash is crafty with hologram technology. so don’t trust everything you see. The item I want looks like a metal sphere with red stripes. Find it and bring it to me. Don’t try to be clever. You wouldn’t know what to do with the sphere even if you decided to keep it. and you won’t be selling it for a better price than here with me.

Original Text: A pity. Go on then. Get out of here.
Translated Text: A pity. Go on then. Get out of here.

Original Text: If you want to make some fast credits. I may have a job for you. You see. I know of a raider captain who stashes his pilfered goods at an old planetary base in the galaxy. There’s a certain item I want from that stash. If you go to the planet and bring the item back to me. I’ll pay you 9000 credits. Plus. you can keep whatever else you find in that dump.
Translated Text: If you want to make some fast credits. I may have a job for you. You see. I know of a raider captain who stashes his pilfered goods at an old planetary base in the galaxy. There’s a certain item I want from that stash. If you go to the planet and bring the item back to me. I’ll pay you 9000 credits. Plus. you can keep whatever else you find in that dump.

Original Text: Yes. this is the sphere. Good work. Now. take your credits and be on your way. And don’t speak of this exchange to anyone.
Translated Text: Yes. this is the sphere. Good work. Now. take your credits and be on your way. And don’t speak of this exchange to anyone.

Original Text: Let me know when you have the sphere. I’ll be waiting.
Translated Text: Let me know when you have the sphere. I’ll be waiting.

Original Text: Our business has been concluded. May the stars favor your voyages.
Translated Text: Our business has been concluded. May the stars favor your voyages.

Original Text: It seems my luck has finally turned around! Time to win back 10.000 credits before my crew finds out I lost them.
Translated Text: It seems my luck has finally turned around! Time to win back 10.000 credits before my crew finds out I lost them.

Original Text: I've been on a winning streak for the past several fights. Maybe I'm prophetic?
Translated Text: I've been on a winning streak for the past several fights. Maybe I'm prophetic?

Original Text: Welcome to the fighting pits! Care to bet on a creature? Fights aren't going on right now. but I'll gladly hold onto your credits for when they are.
Translated Text: Welcome to the fighting pits! Care to bet on a creature? Fights aren't going on right now. but I'll gladly hold onto your credits for when they are.

Original Text: What do you want? I'm busy.
Translated Text: What do you want? I'm busy.

Original Text: Don't bet on these fights. They're barbaric.
Translated Text: Don't bet on these fights. They're barbaric.

Original Text: This room used to function as the starmap of the flagship. After a time. the Alliance of Gentlemen found a...better use for it.
Translated Text: This room used to function as the starmap of the flagship. After a time. the Alliance of Gentlemen found a...better use for it.

Original Text: Do you have business with the captives? If not. I suggest you scram.
Translated Text: Do you have business with the captives? If not. I suggest you scram.

Original Text: I've been stuck in this cell for the past four warp jumps with no sign of you people ever letting me go. If I ever get out of here. I'll make sure this entire place ends up floating in a graveyard.
Translated Text: I've been stuck in this cell for the past four warp jumps with no sign of you people ever letting me go. If I ever get out of here. I'll make sure this entire place ends up floating in a graveyard.

Original Text: I have nothing to say to you scoundrels. Leave me be.
Translated Text: I have nothing to say to you scoundrels. Leave me be.

Original Text: The Estate often warps to fringe galaxies like this one. More prospects. less Union intervention. I do miss the bustle of the Capital Galaxy. but I suppose there is something exciting about traversing the frontier.
Translated Text: The Estate often warps to fringe galaxies like this one. More prospects. less Union intervention. I do miss the bustle of the Capital Galaxy. but I suppose there is something exciting about traversing the frontier.

Original Text: Oh. how I loathe meeting unknown alien species. It's more trouble than it's worth. and there's always a chance they'll find you edible.
Translated Text: Oh. how I loathe meeting unknown alien species. It's more trouble than it's worth. and there's always a chance they'll find you edible.

Original Text: Be careful when wandering the Estate. Some of these sections still have working automatic turrets.
Translated Text: Be careful when wandering the Estate. Some of these sections still have working automatic turrets.

Original Text: Brew here at the bar isn’t bad. Cornelia tends to have a better supply. but I don’t dare complain. Hully gets real particular about these things. And you don’t want to get thrown out of the bar on the Estate.
Translated Text: Brew here at the bar isn’t bad. Cornelia tends to have a better supply. but I don’t dare complain. Hully gets real particular about these things. And you don’t want to get thrown out of the bar on the Estate.

Original Text: Half my crew got picked up by the Union when they stopped by the Harbor. They weren’t looking for trouble. just resupplying. That bastard Gar Bastlen linked them to the Alliance and called the Union officials on them. Now my crewmates are rotting away in a prison rig. Damn that Bastlen. I'll get them out of there if it's the last thing I do.
Translated Text: Half my crew got picked up by the Union when they stopped by the Harbor. They weren’t looking for trouble. just resupplying. That bastard Gar Bastlen linked them to the Alliance and called the Union officials on them. Now my crewmates are rotting away in a prison rig. Damn that Bastlen. I'll get them out of there if it's the last thing I do.

Original Text: We almost got caught by the Union the day before last. It was sheer luck they didn't find our hidden cargo and we managed to make it out of there in one piece.
Translated Text: We almost got caught by the Union the day before last. It was sheer luck they didn't find our hidden cargo and we managed to make it out of there in one piece.

Original Text: A short while ago. a partner crew of ours warped too close to Infected space. It wasn’t long before we started receiving a distress signal from their sector. The contents of that last transmission were a nightmare. If those things are spreading. I fear for the future of us all.
Translated Text: A short while ago. a partner crew of ours warped too close to Infected space. It wasn’t long before we started receiving a distress signal from their sector. The contents of that last transmission were a nightmare. If those things are spreading. I fear for the future of us all.

Original Text: Everyone is in a frenzy over the Infected. They're all making a big fuss about nothing. I've heard of crews taking out Infected Carriers before. It's not a complicated endeavor. Just shoot it. Right?
Translated Text: Everyone is in a frenzy over the Infected. They're all making a big fuss about nothing. I've heard of crews taking out Infected Carriers before. It's not a complicated endeavor. Just shoot it. Right?

Original Text: We made a peculiar discovery last we went planetside. It was some kind of odd organism. Ever since we found it and brought it back to the ship. our scientist has been conducting all sorts of experiments on it. He's been obsessing about that thing more than any man should. Time to give him a talking to.
Translated Text: We made a peculiar discovery last we went planetside. It was some kind of odd organism. Ever since we found it and brought it back to the ship. our scientist has been conducting all sorts of experiments on it. He's been obsessing about that thing more than any man should. Time to give him a talking to.

Original Text: Nebulas are a blessing for Gentlemen. Use them wisely.
Translated Text: Nebulas are a blessing for Gentlemen. Use them wisely.

Original Text: We just got a new main turret for our ship. Extracted it right off a derelict Roland. We've never had such a nice piece of weaponry before. Hopefully our captain doesn't sell it for extra gambling credits.
Translated Text: We just got a new main turret for our ship. Extracted it right off a derelict Roland. We've never had such a nice piece of weaponry before. Hopefully our captain doesn't sell it for extra gambling credits.

Original Text: Quit staring and get outta my face. I'm drinking here.
Translated Text: Quit staring and get outta my face. I'm drinking here.

Original Text: My captain's been merciless these past few weeks. I need another round of port ale.
Translated Text: My captain's been merciless these past few weeks. I need another round of port ale.

Original Text: Most ration packs are pretty awful. don’t you think? If I ever get my own ship. I'm going have an advanced food replicator installed on it.
Translated Text: Most ration packs are pretty awful. don’t you think? If I ever get my own ship. I'm going have an advanced food replicator installed on it.

Original Text: My captain is hard of vision and always selects the wrong sector on the long range warp station transmission screen. Then the warp station spends all that time aligning itself to the new direction. only for us to just the cancel the transaction to repeat the process. It happens every time. We need to get him optical enhancers.
Translated Text: My captain is hard of vision and always selects the wrong sector on the long range warp station transmission screen. Then the warp station spends all that time aligning itself to the new direction. only for us to just the cancel the transaction to repeat the process. It happens every time. We need to get him optical enhancers.

Original Text: L-L-Look. I don’t want any trouble. No trouble. you hear?
Translated Text: L-L-Look. I don’t want any trouble. No trouble. you hear?

Original Text: That poor fellow over there is trying to avoid someone in this galaxy. He says he had a bad encounter with a man named 'Konto Quen' several years back. I've been trying to convince him to come out of the washroom for days. but he won't budge. Whoever this 'Quen' is. he has him frightened out of his wits.
Translated Text: That poor fellow over there is trying to avoid someone in this galaxy. He says he had a bad encounter with a man named 'Konto Quen' several years back. I've been trying to convince him to come out of the washroom for days. but he won't budge. Whoever this 'Quen' is. he has him frightened out of his wits.

Original Text: A large shipment of borthix came into the Estate recently. Miners on a nearby planet found a huge cache of it. Apparently there's some dispute over who actually owns all that borthix. Tam Mora or another major sundust producer in this galaxy. Two sundust groups fighting over the same shipment is sure to bring trouble. Best not to get involved.
Translated Text: A large shipment of borthix came into the Estate recently. Miners on a nearby planet found a huge cache of it. Apparently there's some dispute over who actually owns all that borthix. Tam Mora or another major sundust producer in this galaxy. Two sundust groups fighting over the same shipment is sure to bring trouble. Best not to get involved.

Original Text: Many people are restless because the intergalactic warp network has been cut. but it is a boon to the Alliance of Gentlemen. With the Infected looming on the fringes. chaos is breeding through the galaxy. And we can profit off it. my friend.
Translated Text: Many people are restless because the intergalactic warp network has been cut. but it is a boon to the Alliance of Gentlemen. With the Infected looming on the fringes. chaos is breeding through the galaxy. And we can profit off it. my friend.

Original Text: I saw these…beings once. They looked spastic. insubstantial. like they weren't even made of matter. When they turned to me. I felt like they were prying into the depths of my mind. It was the most unsettling moment of my life. But before I knew it. they were gone. I don’t know what they were looking for. or what they got from me. But it wasn’t normal.
Translated Text: I saw these…beings once. They looked spastic. insubstantial. like they weren't even made of matter. When they turned to me. I felt like they were prying into the depths of my mind. It was the most unsettling moment of my life. But before I knew it. they were gone. I don’t know what they were looking for. or what they got from me. But it wasn’t normal.

Original Text: One of our newer crewmen thought it would be hilarious to disable the oxygen generation aboard our ship. He was promptly dismissed from service and left planetside. If you're guilty of a prank like that. you should be ashamed of yourself.
Translated Text: One of our newer crewmen thought it would be hilarious to disable the oxygen generation aboard our ship. He was promptly dismissed from service and left planetside. If you're guilty of a prank like that. you should be ashamed of yourself.

Original Text: I used to be a pilot for a W.D. ship. Despite all the trouble I've faced as a Gentleman. it's a much more agreeable lifestyle than enduring the slave-driving tendencies of the W.D. Corporation. You can't get a break when you work for them. and the pay is just minuscule.
Translated Text: I used to be a pilot for a W.D. ship. Despite all the trouble I've faced as a Gentleman. it's a much more agreeable lifestyle than enduring the slave-driving tendencies of the W.D. Corporation. You can't get a break when you work for them. and the pay is just minuscule.

Original Text: Stay away from the green-lit crew quarters aboard the Estate. The whole area has been converted into a sundust production bay. And they don't like visitors.
Translated Text: Stay away from the green-lit crew quarters aboard the Estate. The whole area has been converted into a sundust production bay. And they don't like visitors.

Original Text: My crew has been slacking off lately. They think that just because they took down a few W.D. Destroyers. they’re the strongest crew in the galaxy. Fools. I’m going to have to teach them a lesson in humility.
Translated Text: My crew has been slacking off lately. They think that just because they took down a few W.D. Destroyers. they’re the strongest crew in the galaxy. Fools. I’m going to have to teach them a lesson in humility.

Original Text: Yeah? What is it you want?
Translated Text: Yeah? What is it you want?

Original Text: Deed’s been done. Try not to get yourself caught next time.
Translated Text: Deed’s been done. Try not to get yourself caught next time.

Original Text: Need your ship unflagged? I can do it for you. It’ll be a bit pricy. But this is risky business. and you’re not in a position to complain. The price is 10.000 credits the first few times. After that. the cost will rise.
Translated Text: Need your ship unflagged? I can do it for you. It’ll be a bit pricy. But this is risky business. and you’re not in a position to complain. The price is 10.000 credits the first few times. After that. the cost will rise.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. it’ll be 10.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. it’ll be 10.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 20.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 20.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: Deed’s been done. Try not to get yourself caught next time.
Translated Text: Deed’s been done. Try not to get yourself caught next time.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 30.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 30.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 40.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 40.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 50.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 50.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 60.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 60.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: You’re not very tactful. are you? Isn’t this the ninth time I’ve had to unflag your ship? I can’t keep doing this for you much longer.
Translated Text: You’re not very tactful. are you? Isn’t this the ninth time I’ve had to unflag your ship? I can’t keep doing this for you much longer.

Original Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 70.000 credits for my services.
Translated Text: Back again. are you? What sort of ship do you need unflagged this time? Keep in mind. the price has risen to 70.000 credits for my services.

Original Text: This is the last time I’ll do it. understand? I’ve unflagged far too many ships for your crew alone. The Union will be hunting for me in no time. Use nebulas for once.
Translated Text: This is the last time I’ll do it. understand? I’ve unflagged far too many ships for your crew alone. The Union will be hunting for me in no time. Use nebulas for once.

Original Text: Not you again. On ten occasions now. you’ve requested I unflag your ship. This time the fee is going to be 80.000 credits. Got it? Then our business is done.
Translated Text: Not you again. On ten occasions now. you’ve requested I unflag your ship. This time the fee is going to be 80.000 credits. Got it? Then our business is done.

Original Text: I’ve unflagged too many ships for you already. You’re on your own now.
Translated Text: I’ve unflagged too many ships for you already. You’re on your own now.

Original Text: I’ll take prohibited cargo off your hands. Or if you’ve gotten yourself into a pinch with the law. unflagging ships is another specialty of mine. So. what services are you looking for today?
Translated Text: I’ll take prohibited cargo off your hands. Or if you’ve gotten yourself into a pinch with the law. unflagging ships is another specialty of mine. So. what services are you looking for today?

Original Text: It is my first time visiting Outpost 448. I am marveled by how clean everything is. Not a speck on the floors. Where will I find scrap to collect. I wonder? There must be a trash compaction unit somewhere around here. I will find it.
Translated Text: It is my first time visiting Outpost 448. I am marveled by how clean everything is. Not a speck on the floors. Where will I find scrap to collect. I wonder? There must be a trash compaction unit somewhere around here. I will find it.

Original Text: Have you passed through the neutral zone lately? Over our past few assignments. it hasn't been easy for our crew to travel neutral space. We were attacked by nearly every ship we came across. With the Infected looming on the horizon and the intergalactic warp being down. it seems some people are revelling in the chaos.
Translated Text: Have you passed through the neutral zone lately? Over our past few assignments. it hasn't been easy for our crew to travel neutral space. We were attacked by nearly every ship we came across. With the Infected looming on the horizon and the intergalactic warp being down. it seems some people are revelling in the chaos.

Original Text: I wonder what it's like to grow up on a planet. For as long as I can remember. I've gone from station to station. galaxy to galaxy. It must be nice to have a home and just watch the grass grow. I sort of envy colonists. Maybe I'll apply for a colonization assignment one of these years.
Translated Text: I wonder what it's like to grow up on a planet. For as long as I can remember. I've gone from station to station. galaxy to galaxy. It must be nice to have a home and just watch the grass grow. I sort of envy colonists. Maybe I'll apply for a colonization assignment one of these years.

Original Text: What are you looking at? Get a move on.
Translated Text: What are you looking at? Get a move on.

Original Text: It's good to stretch your legs after being cooped up in a ship for a while. Remember to take care of yourself after long trips.
Translated Text: It's good to stretch your legs after being cooped up in a ship for a while. Remember to take care of yourself after long trips.

Original Text: I've been waiting for a cargo shipment to come in. The delivery crew is unreasonably late. I hope everything's alright.
Translated Text: I've been waiting for a cargo shipment to come in. The delivery crew is unreasonably late. I hope everything's alright.

Original Text: My crewmates and I are just here to stock up on supplies. Then we're heading out on another a transport route.
Translated Text: My crewmates and I are just here to stock up on supplies. Then we're heading out on another a transport route.

Original Text: Welcome to Outpost 448. I apologize. I am not programmed to assist visitors of the station. But if you have any questions. an Outpost 448 officer would be pleased to assist you.
Translated Text: Welcome to Outpost 448. I apologize. I am not programmed to assist visitors of the station. But if you have any questions. an Outpost 448 officer would be pleased to assist you.

Original Text: Yes? Is there something you need?
Translated Text: Yes? Is there something you need?

Original Text: It can be a hassle for my ship to travel through Union space. The Colonial Union is sometimes stricter about regulations than the W.D. Corporation.
Translated Text: It can be a hassle for my ship to travel through Union space. The Colonial Union is sometimes stricter about regulations than the W.D. Corporation.

Original Text: It's very troubling that the intergalactic warp network was shut down. Everyone in this galaxy may have some difficult times ahead.
Translated Text: It's very troubling that the intergalactic warp network was shut down. Everyone in this galaxy may have some difficult times ahead.

Original Text: I heard that you were involved in a critical mission that turned out to be a success. Congratulations. and thank you for your dedication to the Colonial Union. I see now that I might have been your backup. I was dismissed without even setting foot in the Command Center. so I was likely on standby. Well. it's unfortunate that I wasn't able to be of service. but at least my crew got the chance to resupply at Outpost 448. I suppose it's time to warp back out there and get some work done. Good luck to you.
Translated Text: I heard that you were involved in a critical mission that turned out to be a success. Congratulations. and thank you for your dedication to the Colonial Union. I see now that I might have been your backup. I was dismissed without even setting foot in the Command Center. so I was likely on standby. Well. it's unfortunate that I wasn't able to be of service. but at least my crew got the chance to resupply at Outpost 448. I suppose it's time to warp back out there and get some work done. Good luck to you.

Original Text: I was summoned for a meeting with a few officers in the Command Center. but it seems they're preoccupied with other matters. Have you been inside the Command Center? Do you know why there's such a delay? I assume everyone's busy due to the severed research station. but I wish I could do more to help than just wait here.
Translated Text: I was summoned for a meeting with a few officers in the Command Center. but it seems they're preoccupied with other matters. Have you been inside the Command Center? Do you know why there's such a delay? I assume everyone's busy due to the severed research station. but I wish I could do more to help than just wait here.

Original Text: I was summoned for a meeting with a few officers in the Command Center. but it seems they're preoccupied with other matters. All I can do is wait. I suppose.
Translated Text: I was summoned for a meeting with a few officers in the Command Center. but it seems they're preoccupied with other matters. All I can do is wait. I suppose.

Original Text: I always wanted to work on the frontier. The greatest discoveries of the past millennia have been in the fringe galaxies. There's a wealth of undiscovered knowledge out here.
Translated Text: I always wanted to work on the frontier. The greatest discoveries of the past millennia have been in the fringe galaxies. There's a wealth of undiscovered knowledge out here.

Original Text: Be careful if you're planning to leave the station. The galaxy is growing more dangerous by the hour.
Translated Text: Be careful if you're planning to leave the station. The galaxy is growing more dangerous by the hour.

Original Text: Do you know what's going on with the Wasted Wing. officer? If you ever feel inclined to share what you know with the rest of us. we're listening. One way or the other. the truth will find its way out.
Translated Text: Do you know what's going on with the Wasted Wing. officer? If you ever feel inclined to share what you know with the rest of us. we're listening. One way or the other. the truth will find its way out.

Original Text: The Colonial Union officers here are tight-lipped about the ongoings of the station. Can't get a word out of them about the Wasted Wing.
Translated Text: The Colonial Union officers here are tight-lipped about the ongoings of the station. Can't get a word out of them about the Wasted Wing.

Original Text: Farewell. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. It was a pleasure working with you. and go easy on old Skoss. now.
Translated Text: Farewell. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. It was a pleasure working with you. and go easy on old Skoss. now.

Original Text: That's positively excellent. I knew we could work it out. I'll wire the credits over to you. Farewell. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. It was a pleasure working with you. and go easy on old Skoss. now.
Translated Text: That's positively excellent. I knew we could work it out. I'll wire the credits over to you. Farewell. crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. It was a pleasure working with you. and go easy on old Skoss. now.

Original Text: That's positively excellent. You drive a hard bargain. my friend. but I knew we could work it out. I'll wire the credits over to you. It's unfortunate we found ourselves on opposite sides of this quarrel. I wouldn't have minded partnering with a crew like you. Take care. now. 'May the stars favor your voyages'. and all that sentimental stuff.
Translated Text: That's positively excellent. You drive a hard bargain. my friend. but I knew we could work it out. I'll wire the credits over to you. It's unfortunate we found ourselves on opposite sides of this quarrel. I wouldn't have minded partnering with a crew like you. Take care. now. 'May the stars favor your voyages'. and all that sentimental stuff.

Original Text: HAH! You fools! You really thought I'd part with 25.000 credits to avoid a battle with your ship? You think too highly of yourselves.
Translated Text: HAH! You fools! You really thought I'd part with 25.000 credits to avoid a battle with your ship? You think too highly of yourselves.

Original Text: So you saw through my little ruse? How clever of you. I have to admit. I'll enjoy engaging your ship in battle.
Translated Text: So you saw through my little ruse? How clever of you. I have to admit. I'll enjoy engaging your ship in battle.

Original Text: That's positively excellent. I knew we could work it out. I'll wire the credits over to you in a moment. but you'll need to purge your shields for me to send The Wonderment's scrap metal to your ship.
Translated Text: That's positively excellent. I knew we could work it out. I'll wire the credits over to you in a moment. but you'll need to purge your shields for me to send The Wonderment's scrap metal to your ship.

Original Text: You're a difficult one to reason with. It seems I have no other choice. ENGINEER. POWER TO WEAPONS!
Translated Text: You're a difficult one to reason with. It seems I have no other choice. ENGINEER. POWER TO WEAPONS!

Original Text: Okay. fine. How about this then. I'll offer 25.000 credits and extra proof that you obliterated The Wonderment. Skoss is guaranteed to believe you. How does that sound?
Translated Text: Okay. fine. How about this then. I'll offer 25.000 credits and extra proof that you obliterated The Wonderment. Skoss is guaranteed to believe you. How does that sound?

Original Text: No? That sum isn't enough. of course. What price does he have on my head anyway? Something closer to 17.000? Then I'll give you 18.000 credits. What say you?
Translated Text: No? That sum isn't enough. of course. What price does he have on my head anyway? Something closer to 17.000? Then I'll give you 18.000 credits. What say you?

Original Text: Welcome. friends! I trust it was Wondam Skoss who sent you? Come now. there's no need for us to perpetuate these hostilities. We're all sensible people here. We can reach some kind of agreement. can we not? Allow me to make a proposition. You report to Mister Skoss that I'm gone. Poof. Your lasers or turrets or what-have-you blew me to smithereens. He thinks I'm dead. you still get paid. I keep on living. and we all leave this situation happy people. Plus. I'll sweeten the deal with a few extra credits for you fine fellows. How does the number '13.000' sound to you?
Translated Text: Welcome. friends! I trust it was Wondam Skoss who sent you? Come now. there's no need for us to perpetuate these hostilities. We're all sensible people here. We can reach some kind of agreement. can we not? Allow me to make a proposition. You report to Mister Skoss that I'm gone. Poof. Your lasers or turrets or what-have-you blew me to smithereens. He thinks I'm dead. you still get paid. I keep on living. and we all leave this situation happy people. Plus. I'll sweeten the deal with a few extra credits for you fine fellows. How does the number '13.000' sound to you?

Original Text: I’m grateful for your help. but I must get back to work now. Is there something else you need?
Translated Text: I’m grateful for your help. but I must get back to work now. Is there something else you need?

Original Text: Thank you. I hope those creatures didn’t cause you too much trouble. Here are the credits. as promised.
Translated Text: Thank you. I hope those creatures didn’t cause you too much trouble. Here are the credits. as promised.

Original Text: Did you manage to find an egg?
Translated Text: Did you manage to find an egg?

Original Text: I appreciate the help. I know stealing an egg from predatory beasts isn’t the simplest job in the world. but I hope it goes smoothly.
Translated Text: I appreciate the help. I know stealing an egg from predatory beasts isn’t the simplest job in the world. but I hope it goes smoothly.

Original Text: Well. I can’t force you to agree. Thanks anyway.
Translated Text: Well. I can’t force you to agree. Thanks anyway.

Original Text: As you may have already noticed. this planet is home to some rather intriguing creatures. Although my initial interests were in the flora of this world. I’ve since become fascinated by the native animals living in the area. I’d like to study them—in particular. their embryonic development—but I haven’t been able to get close to one of their nests. That’s where you come in. I want to borrow one of the animals’ eggs. Since I don’t have an Atrium. I can’t afford the risk of retrieving an egg myself. If you could find an egg and bring it back for me. I’ll pay you 2.000 credits.
Translated Text: As you may have already noticed. this planet is home to some rather intriguing creatures. Although my initial interests were in the flora of this world. I’ve since become fascinated by the native animals living in the area. I’d like to study them—in particular. their embryonic development—but I haven’t been able to get close to one of their nests. That’s where you come in. I want to borrow one of the animals’ eggs. Since I don’t have an Atrium. I can’t afford the risk of retrieving an egg myself. If you could find an egg and bring it back for me. I’ll pay you 2.000 credits.

Original Text: The animal will remain under my care until Finley comes to retrieve it. But since you’re here. if you’re still looking for more work. I could use your assistance with something.
Translated Text: The animal will remain under my care until Finley comes to retrieve it. But since you’re here. if you’re still looking for more work. I could use your assistance with something.

Original Text: I don’t know why Finley thinks I’ll be able to take care of the animal. I study organisms in a vastly different ecosystem than wherever this thing came from. No matter. I’ve agreed to take it off your hands. Let me apologize in Finley’s stead. I have no idea what he plans to do with a living creature. but he’s imposed on enough people to get ahold of it. I’ll be sure to lecture him whenever he decides to come retrieve it. Here’s the payment for your troubles. I trust 10.000 credits will suffice. If you’re still looking for more work. I could use your assistance with something. Otherwise. take care.
Translated Text: I don’t know why Finley thinks I’ll be able to take care of the animal. I study organisms in a vastly different ecosystem than wherever this thing came from. No matter. I’ve agreed to take it off your hands. Let me apologize in Finley’s stead. I have no idea what he plans to do with a living creature. but he’s imposed on enough people to get ahold of it. I’ll be sure to lecture him whenever he decides to come retrieve it. Here’s the payment for your troubles. I trust 10.000 credits will suffice. If you’re still looking for more work. I could use your assistance with something. Otherwise. take care.

Original Text: Are you the ones Finley sent with the creature?
Translated Text: Are you the ones Finley sent with the creature?

Original Text: I must get back to work now. Is there something else you need?
Translated Text: I must get back to work now. Is there something else you need?

Original Text: Deal’s concluded. If you run into any problems from this point forward. take it up with Kroter. We’re no longer responsible for what happens to the dust once it’s in your cargo bay. Understood?
Translated Text: Deal’s concluded. If you run into any problems from this point forward. take it up with Kroter. We’re no longer responsible for what happens to the dust once it’s in your cargo bay. Understood?

Original Text: Deal’s concluded. If you run into any problems from this point forward. take it up with Kroter.
Translated Text: Deal’s concluded. If you run into any problems from this point forward. take it up with Kroter.

Original Text: We sent over the dust. Deal’s concluded. If you run into any problems from this point forward. take it up with Kroter. We’re no longer responsible for what happens to the dust once it’s in your cargo bay. Understood?
Translated Text: We sent over the dust. Deal’s concluded. If you run into any problems from this point forward. take it up with Kroter. We’re no longer responsible for what happens to the dust once it’s in your cargo bay. Understood?

Original Text: You refuse? Are you deliberately wasting our time?
Translated Text: You refuse? Are you deliberately wasting our time?

Original Text: About time you showed up. If you want the dust. purge your shields. Then we can part ways like this never happened.
Translated Text: About time you showed up. If you want the dust. purge your shields. Then we can part ways like this never happened.

Original Text: Then you have no business here.
Translated Text: Then you have no business here.

Original Text: We’ll have the borthix transferred to your ship immediately. Don’t screw up this delivery. or Mora will blame the both of us.
Translated Text: We’ll have the borthix transferred to your ship immediately. Don’t screw up this delivery. or Mora will blame the both of us.

Original Text: Tam Mora sent you for the borthix shipment. didn’t he? You seem like a respectable crew. I assume you know your way out of an inspection station. Whenever you’re ready. we can get the borthix over to your cargo bay.
Translated Text: Tam Mora sent you for the borthix shipment. didn’t he? You seem like a respectable crew. I assume you know your way out of an inspection station. Whenever you’re ready. we can get the borthix over to your cargo bay.

Original Text: Good luck on your way back to the Estate. Don’t let the borthix fall into the Union’s hands.
Translated Text: Good luck on your way back to the Estate. Don’t let the borthix fall into the Union’s hands.

Original Text: Greetings. You must have traveled quite a long way to pick up this borthix shipment. The Estate isn’t particularly close to here. from what I understand. Good luck on your return voyage.
Translated Text: Greetings. You must have traveled quite a long way to pick up this borthix shipment. The Estate isn’t particularly close to here. from what I understand. Good luck on your return voyage.

Original Text: Working right now. As much as I’d like to chat. I’m busy.
Translated Text: Working right now. As much as I’d like to chat. I’m busy.

Original Text: How are things out in the galaxy? We’re a bit cut off here. Don’t get much news besides what transport crews like you bring us.
Translated Text: How are things out in the galaxy? We’re a bit cut off here. Don’t get much news besides what transport crews like you bring us.

Original Text: You got the creature to Gellim? What a relief! Thanks for your help. At least someone in this galaxy can do a job correctly.
Translated Text: You got the creature to Gellim? What a relief! Thanks for your help. At least someone in this galaxy can do a job correctly.

Original Text: You have the coordinates. Just deliver the creature to Gellim Sinder. He'll know what to do.
Translated Text: You have the coordinates. Just deliver the creature to Gellim Sinder. He'll know what to do.

Original Text: Yes! I like your dedication. Let me give you the coordinates. and then get that thing far away from this station. Talk to Gellim Sinder when you get to the sector. I’ll try to send a message ahead of you and work out the details. Thanks for your help. and good luck. I hope that thing doesn’t break out of its crate or anything.
Translated Text: Yes! I like your dedication. Let me give you the coordinates. and then get that thing far away from this station. Talk to Gellim Sinder when you get to the sector. I’ll try to send a message ahead of you and work out the details. Thanks for your help. and good luck. I hope that thing doesn’t break out of its crate or anything.

Original Text: All right. I get the point.
Translated Text: All right. I get the point.

Original Text: Are you sure you can’t transport the creature one last time? Like I said. I’ll pay you extra.
Translated Text: Are you sure you can’t transport the creature one last time? Like I said. I’ll pay you extra.

Original Text: Not even for extra credits? Is that thing really so difficult to manage? Damn. I’m in for some trouble. I’ll keep it for now and figure out what to do with it. Thanks for bringing it here. I guess. Tell Jela I’m never hiring him again.
Translated Text: Not even for extra credits? Is that thing really so difficult to manage? Damn. I’m in for some trouble. I’ll keep it for now and figure out what to do with it. Thanks for bringing it here. I guess. Tell Jela I’m never hiring him again.

Original Text: What? You brought that thing here?! Jela was supposed to hold it for another week! I haven’t worked out the arrangements of where to put it yet! What am I supposed to do with it now? I can’t keep it under my bunk. But you…you could take it. You already have it on your ship. right? Just bring it to a friend of mine at a base not far from here. Easy journey. I’ll pay you extra. How does that sound?
Translated Text: What? You brought that thing here?! Jela was supposed to hold it for another week! I haven’t worked out the arrangements of where to put it yet! What am I supposed to do with it now? I can’t keep it under my bunk. But you…you could take it. You already have it on your ship. right? Just bring it to a friend of mine at a base not far from here. Easy journey. I’ll pay you extra. How does that sound?

Original Text: Yes? What can I do for you?
Translated Text: Yes? What can I do for you?

Original Text: You’re Tam Mora’s crew. right? Talk to Rodvan outside. He’ll want to meet you before we transfer the borthix to your ship.
Translated Text: You’re Tam Mora’s crew. right? Talk to Rodvan outside. He’ll want to meet you before we transfer the borthix to your ship.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]: You have been selected for a cargo inspection. Please redirect your course to the nearest inspection station. and you will be compensated for your time. Noncompliance is considered a criminal offense and will be reported to the Outpost 448 Command Center. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your cooperation.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]: You have been selected for a cargo inspection. Please redirect your course to the nearest inspection station. and you will be compensated for your time. Noncompliance is considered a criminal offense and will be reported to the Outpost 448 Command Center. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your cooperation.

Original Text: Got some cargo you need to get rid of quickly? I’ll buy it from you. Name the pilfered goods. and I’ll name the price.
Translated Text: Got some cargo you need to get rid of quickly? I’ll buy it from you. Name the pilfered goods. and I’ll name the price.

Original Text: Three Union-standard weeks ago. the ‘U.S.S. Liberation’ and ‘U.S.S. Warden’ disobeyed direct orders to not engage a W.D. transport vessel—destroying the Corporation unit and straining terms between W.D. Corp and Colonial Union Command. The two ships refused to cease their unlawful interference with galactic powers and severed all contact with the Command Center. Having been deemed a threat to galactic peace. the Liberation and Warden have now been flagged. You have been requested to dispatch the renegades so no further damage can be done.
Translated Text: Three Union-standard weeks ago. the ‘U.S.S. Liberation’ and ‘U.S.S. Warden’ disobeyed direct orders to not engage a W.D. transport vessel—destroying the Corporation unit and straining terms between W.D. Corp and Colonial Union Command. The two ships refused to cease their unlawful interference with galactic powers and severed all contact with the Command Center. Having been deemed a threat to galactic peace. the Liberation and Warden have now been flagged. You have been requested to dispatch the renegades so no further damage can be done.

Original Text: Intercept two Intrepid-class starships that are under the unsanctioned command of former Colonial Union officers.
Translated Text: Intercept two Intrepid-class starships that are under the unsanctioned command of former Colonial Union officers.

Original Text: Oh. not another Colonial Union ship. Do you plan to fire upon us. as well? Or are you going to do your job and help us?
Translated Text: Oh. not another Colonial Union ship. Do you plan to fire upon us. as well? Or are you going to do your job and help us?

Original Text: Why are you hailing us? Deal with that ship!
Translated Text: Why are you hailing us? Deal with that ship!

Original Text: Well. at least the Colonial Union handled that problem. Thank you for your assistance. We wish you well.
Translated Text: Well. at least the Colonial Union handled that problem. Thank you for your assistance. We wish you well.

Original Text: You’ve done your job. Be on your way.
Translated Text: You’ve done your job. Be on your way.

Original Text: Yes. this seems to be good sundust. Give Mora my regards. And tell him to hurry up the shipments. This one took far too long to get here.
Translated Text: Yes. this seems to be good sundust. Give Mora my regards. And tell him to hurry up the shipments. This one took far too long to get here.

Original Text: You must be one of Tam Mora’s associates. Good. I’ve been waiting quite a while for the sundust. I was beginning to grow impatient.
Translated Text: You must be one of Tam Mora’s associates. Good. I’ve been waiting quite a while for the sundust. I was beginning to grow impatient.

Original Text: Are you one of Tam Mora's associates? Where's the sundust?
Translated Text: Are you one of Tam Mora's associates? Where's the sundust?

Original Text: I’m not interested in striking up a conversation with the delivery crew.
Translated Text: I’m not interested in striking up a conversation with the delivery crew.

Original Text: Have you brought the sundust? Speak with Varn. Quickly now.
Translated Text: Have you brought the sundust? Speak with Varn. Quickly now.

Original Text: I've never seen you before. Usually Mora sends the same crew to deliver the sundust. Wonder what happened to them.
Translated Text: I've never seen you before. Usually Mora sends the same crew to deliver the sundust. Wonder what happened to them.

Original Text: I don’t have a taste for sundust. but thank you for taking the time to come out here. I’m sure Ottsen and Varn appreciate it. even if they seem a little on edge.
Translated Text: I don’t have a taste for sundust. but thank you for taking the time to come out here. I’m sure Ottsen and Varn appreciate it. even if they seem a little on edge.

Original Text: I’ve never had much luck keeping plants alive. What am I doing wrong? They just need water. right?
Translated Text: I’ve never had much luck keeping plants alive. What am I doing wrong? They just need water. right?

Original Text: So you invested in your talents to see how far you’d make it out here. did you? Good for you.
Translated Text: So you invested in your talents to see how far you’d make it out here. did you? Good for you.

Original Text: You’ve reached the edge of the map. you know. There’s nothing to see back here except your radiation meter rising. Speaking of which. you don’t look so good…
Translated Text: You’ve reached the edge of the map. you know. There’s nothing to see back here except your radiation meter rising. Speaking of which. you don’t look so good…

Original Text: This is a geological research station that was built thirty Union-standard years ago. The planet’s surface is extremely inhospitable. but underground there is a vast network of tunnels. Since various minerals can be found in these cave systems. this planet used to be a paradise for researchers such as myself. Alas. interest in these caverns has steadily declined over the past decade. It’s been quite some time since this station has seen much use.
Translated Text: This is a geological research station that was built thirty Union-standard years ago. The planet’s surface is extremely inhospitable. but underground there is a vast network of tunnels. Since various minerals can be found in these cave systems. this planet used to be a paradise for researchers such as myself. Alas. interest in these caverns has steadily declined over the past decade. It’s been quite some time since this station has seen much use.

Original Text: For the past thirty years. I’ve worked exclusively at this station. Although I had many coworkers back in the day. I am now the only remaining researcher here. It’s a quiet job. and I don’t get many visitors like yourselves. But this planet never ceases to astound me. Every year I make new discoveries. My work here simply isn’t finished.
Translated Text: For the past thirty years. I’ve worked exclusively at this station. Although I had many coworkers back in the day. I am now the only remaining researcher here. It’s a quiet job. and I don’t get many visitors like yourselves. But this planet never ceases to astound me. Every year I make new discoveries. My work here simply isn’t finished.

Original Text: You will assist me? You have my utmost gratitude! With the native creatures being so attracted to the ore. I haven’t been able to leave the inside of the station for some time now. I would never be able to fend them off myself. Another sample of the ore is all I need to continue my research. If you go through the main doors on this level of the station. you’ll find yourself in the cave system where the ore pillars are located. Any loosened fragment of the ore will do nicely.
Translated Text: You will assist me? You have my utmost gratitude! With the native creatures being so attracted to the ore. I haven’t been able to leave the inside of the station for some time now. I would never be able to fend them off myself. Another sample of the ore is all I need to continue my research. If you go through the main doors on this level of the station. you’ll find yourself in the cave system where the ore pillars are located. Any loosened fragment of the ore will do nicely.

Original Text: Perhaps one of my most intriguing discoveries as of late is of a peculiar ore in a cave system just beyond this base. It forms in large pillars and emits a strange. inaudible frequency that attracts the native creatures. I’ve heard of similar findings a few times before. but this might be the most sizeable deposit ever recorded. Unfortunately. after I exposed much of the pillars. the influx of creatures forced me to abandon any further study.
Translated Text: Perhaps one of my most intriguing discoveries as of late is of a peculiar ore in a cave system just beyond this base. It forms in large pillars and emits a strange. inaudible frequency that attracts the native creatures. I’ve heard of similar findings a few times before. but this might be the most sizeable deposit ever recorded. Unfortunately. after I exposed much of the pillars. the influx of creatures forced me to abandon any further study.

Original Text: I have visitors? This is truly surprising. The station only receives guests during inspections. or more rarely when my colleagues request mineral samples. Is there something you require of me?
Translated Text: I have visitors? This is truly surprising. The station only receives guests during inspections. or more rarely when my colleagues request mineral samples. Is there something you require of me?

Original Text: Thank you. truly. Now I can return to my research. Please. accept these credits for your help.
Translated Text: Thank you. truly. Now I can return to my research. Please. accept these credits for your help.

Original Text: Have you retrieved a sample of the ore?
Translated Text: Have you retrieved a sample of the ore?

Original Text: Thank you again for your help. I'm looking forward to continuing my research. Perhaps you'll see my findings in an article of Galactic Science someday.
Translated Text: Thank you again for your help. I'm looking forward to continuing my research. Perhaps you'll see my findings in an article of Galactic Science someday.

Original Text: Well. I should be getting back to my research. Thank you for stopping by. It's good to have some company every now and then.
Translated Text: Well. I should be getting back to my research. Thank you for stopping by. It's good to have some company every now and then.

Original Text: Cause any trouble. and you’ll regret it.
Translated Text: Cause any trouble. and you’ll regret it.

Original Text: The crashed ship is a short walk behind this building. If you follow the red plume of smoke. it's impossible to miss it. Come back when you've cleared out the crash site. and I'll transfer the credits to you.
Translated Text: The crashed ship is a short walk behind this building. If you follow the red plume of smoke. it's impossible to miss it. Come back when you've cleared out the crash site. and I'll transfer the credits to you.

Original Text: Get out of here then. We don’t need any more problems.
Translated Text: Get out of here then. We don’t need any more problems.

Original Text: We aren't usually welcoming to newcomers. but it just so happens that we could use some assistance. Competitors of ours crash-landed a ship nearby and have been persistently attacking our facility. Our work has slowed to a halt. and their interference is costing us thousands of credits a day. Those bots need to go. If you can get rid of them. you can walk out of here with another 3.000 credits to your name. What do you think? Do we have a deal?
Translated Text: We aren't usually welcoming to newcomers. but it just so happens that we could use some assistance. Competitors of ours crash-landed a ship nearby and have been persistently attacking our facility. Our work has slowed to a halt. and their interference is costing us thousands of credits a day. Those bots need to go. If you can get rid of them. you can walk out of here with another 3.000 credits to your name. What do you think? Do we have a deal?

Original Text: As promised. 3.000 credits. Pleasure doing business with you.
Translated Text: As promised. 3.000 credits. Pleasure doing business with you.

Original Text: Have you fulfilled your end of the bargain and gotten rid of those bots?
Translated Text: Have you fulfilled your end of the bargain and gotten rid of those bots?

Original Text: Pleasure doing business with you. Now if you’ll excuse us. we have work to do.
Translated Text: Pleasure doing business with you. Now if you’ll excuse us. we have work to do.

Original Text: We have work to do. I suggest you keep out of the way.
Translated Text: We have work to do. I suggest you keep out of the way.

Original Text: XR-52770 finds your report intriguing and thanks you for your efforts.
Translated Text: XR-52770 finds your report intriguing and thanks you for your efforts.

Original Text: XR-52770 finds it unfortunate that Lotharus 9 may not be suitable for further settlement. Lotharus 9 is a nice planet.
Translated Text: XR-52770 finds it unfortunate that Lotharus 9 may not be suitable for further settlement. Lotharus 9 is a nice planet.

Original Text: This colony was established in 3200 UE after successfully undergoing Colonial Union habitation procedures. In the five years since its founding. the colony has housed twelve human inhabitants—nine of whom remain here today. In the first year of colonization. there were two fatal casualties and one colonist who was taken back to Outpost 448 due to mental health concerns. Since then. the colony has not experienced any more fatalities. If all continues to proceed smoothly. next year the Colonial Union may approve the colony’s expansion and bring more volunteers to populate the new facilities.
Translated Text: This colony was established in 3200 UE after successfully undergoing Colonial Union habitation procedures. In the five years since its founding. the colony has housed twelve human inhabitants—nine of whom remain here today. In the first year of colonization. there were two fatal casualties and one colonist who was taken back to Outpost 448 due to mental health concerns. Since then. the colony has not experienced any more fatalities. If all continues to proceed smoothly. next year the Colonial Union may approve the colony’s expansion and bring more volunteers to populate the new facilities.

Original Text: There are nine human residents living in the colony. including Director Trigaro and Doctor Rosmand of the Colonial Union Habitation Division. The other inhabitants work in various fields such as engineering. biological and geological research. and wildlife management.
Translated Text: There are nine human residents living in the colony. including Director Trigaro and Doctor Rosmand of the Colonial Union Habitation Division. The other inhabitants work in various fields such as engineering. biological and geological research. and wildlife management.

Original Text: Lotharus 9 is a mostly barren planet. Although it is able to support life. there are minimal lifeforms comprising its ecosystem due to the ferocity of its seasonal weather systems. Because of the scarcity of species and closeness of Lotharus 9’s ecology to human planets. the Colonial Union Habitation Division deemed it acceptable for human colonization.
Translated Text: Lotharus 9 is a mostly barren planet. Although it is able to support life. there are minimal lifeforms comprising its ecosystem due to the ferocity of its seasonal weather systems. Because of the scarcity of species and closeness of Lotharus 9’s ecology to human planets. the Colonial Union Habitation Division deemed it acceptable for human colonization.

Original Text: XR-52770 is one of two XR units stationed in the colony. The other is XR-29341. currently located within the Colony Center. Either unit will be pleased to assist you.
Translated Text: XR-52770 is one of two XR units stationed in the colony. The other is XR-29341. currently located within the Colony Center. Either unit will be pleased to assist you.

Original Text: Lotharus 9 is a mostly barren planet. Although it is able to support life. there are minimal lifeforms comprising its ecosystem due to the ferocity of its seasonal weather systems. Because of the scarcity of species and closeness of Lotharus 9’s ecology to human planets. the Colonial Union Habitation Division deemed it acceptable for human colonization.
Translated Text: Lotharus 9 is a mostly barren planet. Although it is able to support life. there are minimal lifeforms comprising its ecosystem due to the ferocity of its seasonal weather systems. Because of the scarcity of species and closeness of Lotharus 9’s ecology to human planets. the Colonial Union Habitation Division deemed it acceptable for human colonization.

Original Text: Greetings. and welcome to Lotharus 9. We received a transmission that Colonial Union officers would be arriving soon. XR-52770 is pleased that you made it here safely. Colonial Union procedure dictates that before you engage with the inhabitants of the facility. you must speak with Vilar Trigaro. the leader of the colonization mission. and Doctor Devara Rosmand. the colony’s resident doctor. However. XR-52770 is authorized to answer any questions you may have in the meantime.
Translated Text: Greetings. and welcome to Lotharus 9. We received a transmission that Colonial Union officers would be arriving soon. XR-52770 is pleased that you made it here safely. Colonial Union procedure dictates that before you engage with the inhabitants of the facility. you must speak with Vilar Trigaro. the leader of the colonization mission. and Doctor Devara Rosmand. the colony’s resident doctor. However. XR-52770 is authorized to answer any questions you may have in the meantime.

Original Text: What? There’s something else living on Lotharus 9? How can this be…?
Translated Text: What? There’s something else living on Lotharus 9? How can this be…?

Original Text: Hello again. Do you need something?
Translated Text: Hello again. Do you need something?

Original Text: The colony is running smoothly. The food and water supplies have stabilized. All the structures have been fortified against the severe winds that hit us every year. Plus. we haven’t had any major disasters in over eight months now. This place is becoming safer for us. We should be grateful that we haven’t had more problems as of late.
Translated Text: The colony is running smoothly. The food and water supplies have stabilized. All the structures have been fortified against the severe winds that hit us every year. Plus. we haven’t had any major disasters in over eight months now. This place is becoming safer for us. We should be grateful that we haven’t had more problems as of late.

Original Text: I’m faring well here. I always knew the colonist’s life would suit me. Work here is difficult but rewarding. just as I expected.
Translated Text: I’m faring well here. I always knew the colonist’s life would suit me. Work here is difficult but rewarding. just as I expected.

Original Text: Well. not everyone adjusts easily to life on a foreign planet. Some of the other colonists are easily agitated and get riled up over nothing. Take whatever they say with a dose of healthy skepticism.
Translated Text: Well. not everyone adjusts easily to life on a foreign planet. Some of the other colonists are easily agitated and get riled up over nothing. Take whatever they say with a dose of healthy skepticism.

Original Text: Yes. I’ve heard the rumors. and I find them completely baseless. The Colonial Union employed some of the most accomplished researchers in the galaxy to perform thorough inspections of this planet. No one ever found unusual readings or sentient lifeforms. We ran numerous tests ourselves when we got here. There’s no evidence that anything abnormal is living on this planet. besides us. That’s all I have to say about those rumors.
