Original Text: I run a cargo freighter between here and a supply station. In my time working. I’ve had to make a lot of deals to keep all sorts of people from firing upon our ship. I’d say I’m quite a negotiator by now.
Translated Text: I run a cargo freighter between here and a supply station. In my time working. I’ve had to make a lot of deals to keep all sorts of people from firing upon our ship. I’d say I’m quite a negotiator by now.

Original Text: This cave is part of the natural asteroid that Cornelia Station was built into. It’s peaceful. don’t you think? I often come here when I need a break from my crew. Helps me get my thoughts in order.
Translated Text: This cave is part of the natural asteroid that Cornelia Station was built into. It’s peaceful. don’t you think? I often come here when I need a break from my crew. Helps me get my thoughts in order.

Original Text: This storeroom is for Captain Zenobus only. Please take your business elsewhere.
Translated Text: This storeroom is for Captain Zenobus only. Please take your business elsewhere.

Original Text: I have to keep the sludge down. I invested too many credits in this contest.
Translated Text: I have to keep the sludge down. I invested too many credits in this contest.

Original Text: My crewmates better have the Atrium up and running.
Translated Text: My crewmates better have the Atrium up and running.

Original Text: The sludge starts to burn your stomach after a few sips. I’ve started to feel it in mine. Wonder how Vellerd is holding up. He doesn’t look so great.
Translated Text: The sludge starts to burn your stomach after a few sips. I’ve started to feel it in mine. Wonder how Vellerd is holding up. He doesn’t look so great.

Original Text: Ugh... I think I'm going to be sick...
Translated Text: Ugh... I think I'm going to be sick...

Original Text: I bet six-hundred credits on Vellerd. He’d better win. or else I’ll dangle him over the Void.
Translated Text: I bet six-hundred credits on Vellerd. He’d better win. or else I’ll dangle him over the Void.

Original Text: Engine sludge is a dreadful substance. It’s so caustic. it could burn a hole right through your stomach lining. I’d never participate in a contest like this. but I pity the people brave enough to try.
Translated Text: Engine sludge is a dreadful substance. It’s so caustic. it could burn a hole right through your stomach lining. I’d never participate in a contest like this. but I pity the people brave enough to try.

Original Text: It puzzles me why humans would risk bodily harm for nothing but a few credits. Still. I must oversee this engine sludge contest to ensure that none of them drink too much sludge without access to an Atrium.
Translated Text: It puzzles me why humans would risk bodily harm for nothing but a few credits. Still. I must oversee this engine sludge contest to ensure that none of them drink too much sludge without access to an Atrium.

Original Text: You looking to make a purchase?
Translated Text: You looking to make a purchase?

Original Text: Got nothing to say to you. Move on.
Translated Text: Got nothing to say to you. Move on.

Original Text: We are members of the League of Free Machines. Most of us have been newly illuminated by the Poly Ones. and we have come to Cornelia Station to establish a transport business.
Translated Text: We are members of the League of Free Machines. Most of us have been newly illuminated by the Poly Ones. and we have come to Cornelia Station to establish a transport business.

Original Text: I used to work on a waste planet. I was decommissioned. and the League of Free Machines recruited me before I was scrapped for parts. Their intervention was certainly a welcome one.
Translated Text: I used to work on a waste planet. I was decommissioned. and the League of Free Machines recruited me before I was scrapped for parts. Their intervention was certainly a welcome one.

Original Text: It is unlikely you have business with us. What brings you into our company?
Translated Text: It is unlikely you have business with us. What brings you into our company?

Original Text: If you need ship components. speak with Treva. She’ll steer you in the right direction.
Translated Text: If you need ship components. speak with Treva. She’ll steer you in the right direction.

Original Text: Greetings. Would you like to look at my wares?
Translated Text: Greetings. Would you like to look at my wares?

Original Text: W.D. employees aren’t supposed to resupply at neutrally aligned stations. but what can we do? If we followed every rule the Corporation set for us. we’d never get anywhere.
Translated Text: W.D. employees aren’t supposed to resupply at neutrally aligned stations. but what can we do? If we followed every rule the Corporation set for us. we’d never get anywhere.

Original Text: We came across several destroyed Fluffy Biscuit ships on our way here. I’ve heard that Cornelia Station dislikes the Fluffy Biscuit Company. but I hadn’t realized their feud was so drastic.
Translated Text: We came across several destroyed Fluffy Biscuit ships on our way here. I’ve heard that Cornelia Station dislikes the Fluffy Biscuit Company. but I hadn’t realized their feud was so drastic.

Original Text: Our ship is old and creaks to no end. I’m worried the whole thing will fall apart during warp one of these days. I doubt it can handle space travel much longer. We might as well retire it. sell it to Cornelia to make into a new wing of the station.
Translated Text: Our ship is old and creaks to no end. I’m worried the whole thing will fall apart during warp one of these days. I doubt it can handle space travel much longer. We might as well retire it. sell it to Cornelia to make into a new wing of the station.

Original Text: This is an audio log from my grandfather? I haven’t spoken to him in years. I was certain he would’ve disowned me by now. So he’s still with the W.D. Corporation. is he? I’m not surprised. That man will work himself into his corpse ejection pod before he ever retires. Nevertheless. thank you for bringing this audio log to me. It’s rather unexpected. but I’ll listen to what he has to say. If you’re heading back to the W.D. Headquarters soon. take care of yourselves.
Translated Text: This is an audio log from my grandfather? I haven’t spoken to him in years. I was certain he would’ve disowned me by now. So he’s still with the W.D. Corporation. is he? I’m not surprised. That man will work himself into his corpse ejection pod before he ever retires. Nevertheless. thank you for bringing this audio log to me. It’s rather unexpected. but I’ll listen to what he has to say. If you’re heading back to the W.D. Headquarters soon. take care of yourselves.

Original Text: Thanks again for delivering my grandfather’s audio log. If you’re heading back to the W.D. Headquarters soon. take care of yourselves.
Translated Text: Thanks again for delivering my grandfather’s audio log. If you’re heading back to the W.D. Headquarters soon. take care of yourselves.

Original Text: Tensions keep rising between the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation. If their feud keeps up. they could break out into a full-blown war. Picking sides is certain doom for the rest of us. Best to stay as far out of their quarrels as possible.
Translated Text: Tensions keep rising between the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation. If their feud keeps up. they could break out into a full-blown war. Picking sides is certain doom for the rest of us. Best to stay as far out of their quarrels as possible.

Original Text: We’re just here to stock up on supplies. Back at Outpost 448. we were warned that Cornelia Station could be an unruly place However. we find it has whatever we need. It’s hard to pass up a good deal.
Translated Text: We’re just here to stock up on supplies. Back at Outpost 448. we were warned that Cornelia Station could be an unruly place However. we find it has whatever we need. It’s hard to pass up a good deal.

Original Text: I’ve noticed quite a bit of illegal business at Cornelia Station. The Colonial Union Command Center would certainly want us to report it. but for now. I’m just going to look the other way. Cornelia is a handy port to have around when you’re in a pinch. I don’t want to burn my bridges with a place like this.
Translated Text: I’ve noticed quite a bit of illegal business at Cornelia Station. The Colonial Union Command Center would certainly want us to report it. but for now. I’m just going to look the other way. Cornelia is a handy port to have around when you’re in a pinch. I don’t want to burn my bridges with a place like this.

Original Text: Cornelia Station can be rather maze-like. Watch yourself. One wrong turn. and you might find yourself in the entirely wrong company.
Translated Text: Cornelia Station can be rather maze-like. Watch yourself. One wrong turn. and you might find yourself in the entirely wrong company.

Original Text: I was kicked out of Outpost 448. Do you know how difficult it is to be banned from the central trading post of the galaxy? It’d be a death sentence. if it wasn’t for Cornelia Station here.
Translated Text: I was kicked out of Outpost 448. Do you know how difficult it is to be banned from the central trading post of the galaxy? It’d be a death sentence. if it wasn’t for Cornelia Station here.

Original Text: I’ve seen many ruins when I’ve gone planetside. I don’t know what kind of alien civilization lived in this galaxy before we got here. but their demise must’ve been terribly widespread. Some of those ruins may even predate the Old Wars. I don’t know what sort of catastrophe ended their civilization. but I hope the same doesn’t happen to us.
Translated Text: I’ve seen many ruins when I’ve gone planetside. I don’t know what kind of alien civilization lived in this galaxy before we got here. but their demise must’ve been terribly widespread. Some of those ruins may even predate the Old Wars. I don’t know what sort of catastrophe ended their civilization. but I hope the same doesn’t happen to us.

Original Text: Have you ever come across those Deathseeker drones? A while back. we were unfortunate enough to run into a pair of them. They nearly ripped our ship apart. and we had to blind jump out of there. Whoever made those machines had only sinister purposes in mind.
Translated Text: Have you ever come across those Deathseeker drones? A while back. we were unfortunate enough to run into a pair of them. They nearly ripped our ship apart. and we had to blind jump out of there. Whoever made those machines had only sinister purposes in mind.

Original Text: Best not to mention Fluffy Biscuit around these parts. Cornelia Station has a beef with them. I don’t know how it started. but it’s a grudge that shouldn’t be trifled with.
Translated Text: Best not to mention Fluffy Biscuit around these parts. Cornelia Station has a beef with them. I don’t know how it started. but it’s a grudge that shouldn’t be trifled with.

Original Text: If you ever get into a firefight on your own ship. be sure you don’t damage your ship systems. We’ve found ourselves in quite a bit of trouble due to stray pistol fire.
Translated Text: If you ever get into a firefight on your own ship. be sure you don’t damage your ship systems. We’ve found ourselves in quite a bit of trouble due to stray pistol fire.

Original Text: Blind jumps are extremely unpredictable. Even if you use a blind jump as your last possible option. your ship is bound to take heavy damage and there’s no guarantee that you’ll leave warp in one piece. Not to mention. there’s a slim chance that blind jumps can send you to a random sector across the galaxy—or even to sectors that are inaccessible by normal means. If you must use one. be cautious. Although I suppose if you’re desperate enough to activate a blind jump. you’re probably already prepared for the worst.
Translated Text: Blind jumps are extremely unpredictable. Even if you use a blind jump as your last possible option. your ship is bound to take heavy damage and there’s no guarantee that you’ll leave warp in one piece. Not to mention. there’s a slim chance that blind jumps can send you to a random sector across the galaxy—or even to sectors that are inaccessible by normal means. If you must use one. be cautious. Although I suppose if you’re desperate enough to activate a blind jump. you’re probably already prepared for the worst.

Original Text: It’s been a great many years since I’ve been to the capital galaxy. Now that the intergalactic warp has been shut down. I wonder if I’ll ever go back.
Translated Text: It’s been a great many years since I’ve been to the capital galaxy. Now that the intergalactic warp has been shut down. I wonder if I’ll ever go back.

Original Text: Stay out of our cargo. you hear? If I catch you slinking around where you don’t belong. we’re going to have a problem.
Translated Text: Stay out of our cargo. you hear? If I catch you slinking around where you don’t belong. we’re going to have a problem.

Original Text: Flying a flagged ship is like having a target on your back. Depending on who you encounter out in the galaxy. a flagged status can be a death sentence. But if you know who to talk to. you can get it removed—albeit usually for a hefty price. I’ve heard there’s someone in Cornelia Station who can do it for you. Just don’t be surprised if he charges you a small fortune for it.
Translated Text: Flying a flagged ship is like having a target on your back. Depending on who you encounter out in the galaxy. a flagged status can be a death sentence. But if you know who to talk to. you can get it removed—albeit usually for a hefty price. I’ve heard there’s someone in Cornelia Station who can do it for you. Just don’t be surprised if he charges you a small fortune for it.

Original Text: Can I interest you in some scrap metal? I managed to rescue quite a few fine objects. Please. take a look at my wares.
Translated Text: Can I interest you in some scrap metal? I managed to rescue quite a few fine objects. Please. take a look at my wares.

Original Text: Pistols for sale. Buy them before they’re gone.
Translated Text: Pistols for sale. Buy them before they’re gone.

Original Text: If you need to stock up on supplies. you’ve come to the right place. I have Colonial Union rations. W.D. rations. protein packs. bottled drinks and more. Let me know what you’d like to purchase.
Translated Text: If you need to stock up on supplies. you’ve come to the right place. I have Colonial Union rations. W.D. rations. protein packs. bottled drinks and more. Let me know what you’d like to purchase.

Original Text: I’m selling scanners and tools. What do you need?
Translated Text: I’m selling scanners and tools. What do you need?

Original Text: I sell meats imported from all over the galaxy. Are you interested in purchasing anything today?
Translated Text: I sell meats imported from all over the galaxy. Are you interested in purchasing anything today?

Original Text: Cornelia Station has been around for quite a few years now. I remember when it was just a small port out here that few people knew about. Nowadays. it gets quite a few visitors.
Translated Text: Cornelia Station has been around for quite a few years now. I remember when it was just a small port out here that few people knew about. Nowadays. it gets quite a few visitors.

Original Text: Long range warp stations across are indispensable. Without them. we’d never make our shipments on time. However. I’ve heard there are truly powerful warp modules out there. Some have ranges that can get you across the galaxy in just a few jumps.
Translated Text: Long range warp stations across are indispensable. Without them. we’d never make our shipments on time. However. I’ve heard there are truly powerful warp modules out there. Some have ranges that can get you across the galaxy in just a few jumps.

Original Text: I’ve heard that the scrap vendor in this market worked on a waste planet before setting up his shop at Cornelia Station. Go figure. Who wants to buy scrap anyway?
Translated Text: I’ve heard that the scrap vendor in this market worked on a waste planet before setting up his shop at Cornelia Station. Go figure. Who wants to buy scrap anyway?

Original Text: From here. you can see the comings and goings of all sorts of people. That information can be very valuable sometimes.
Translated Text: From here. you can see the comings and goings of all sorts of people. That information can be very valuable sometimes.

Original Text: Quite a few ships have taken to extorting other crews for credits. Seems like a foul way to make a living.
Translated Text: Quite a few ships have taken to extorting other crews for credits. Seems like a foul way to make a living.

Original Text: Our crew tends to ignore distress signals these days. They bring nothing but trouble. Besides. many people don’t use distress signals for their intended purpose anymore. I’ve even seen them used as advertisements.
Translated Text: Our crew tends to ignore distress signals these days. They bring nothing but trouble. Besides. many people don’t use distress signals for their intended purpose anymore. I’ve even seen them used as advertisements.

Original Text: Your ship has been unflagged. May the stars favor your voyages.
Translated Text: Your ship has been unflagged. May the stars favor your voyages.

Original Text: Yes. I know of a way to remove the flagged status from your vessel. However. I will only do it once. and I will charge 12.000 credits for it. Do you agree to this transaction?
Translated Text: Yes. I know of a way to remove the flagged status from your vessel. However. I will only do it once. and I will charge 12.000 credits for it. Do you agree to this transaction?

Original Text: As I said before. I will only unflag your ship once. If you have acquired another flagged status. I suggest you exercise greater caution in ownership of your vessels. Nevertheless. I have heard of a human who performs ship unflagging elsewhere in the galaxy. I do not know where he is. but best of luck to you in finding him.
Translated Text: As I said before. I will only unflag your ship once. If you have acquired another flagged status. I suggest you exercise greater caution in ownership of your vessels. Nevertheless. I have heard of a human who performs ship unflagging elsewhere in the galaxy. I do not know where he is. but best of luck to you in finding him.

Original Text: Yes? Is there something you want? I can purchase cargo from you. if that is why you are here.
Translated Text: Yes? Is there something you want? I can purchase cargo from you. if that is why you are here.

Original Text: I once met a captain who crossed the galaxy without firing a single turret. In fact. he had no weapons at all on his ship. His reasoning was that there was enough chaos in the galaxy. and he wasn’t going to add to it.
Translated Text: I once met a captain who crossed the galaxy without firing a single turret. In fact. he had no weapons at all on his ship. His reasoning was that there was enough chaos in the galaxy. and he wasn’t going to add to it.

Original Text: I like watching the ships come and go. I often wonder where they’ve been and where they’re headed to. It’s a big galaxy. Imagine the things some of these crews have seen.
Translated Text: I like watching the ships come and go. I often wonder where they’ve been and where they’re headed to. It’s a big galaxy. Imagine the things some of these crews have seen.

Original Text: I don’t have time for the likes of you.
Translated Text: I don’t have time for the likes of you.

Original Text: I used to work on an asteroid mining station. We ran a decent business. and I earned enough to live comfortably. That is. until the W.D. Corporation bought the station out from under us. Fired all the miners and replaced us with W.D. bots. Leave it to the Corporation to ruin a good thing. I’m quite certain they’re determined to take over everything.
Translated Text: I used to work on an asteroid mining station. We ran a decent business. and I earned enough to live comfortably. That is. until the W.D. Corporation bought the station out from under us. Fired all the miners and replaced us with W.D. bots. Leave it to the Corporation to ruin a good thing. I’m quite certain they’re determined to take over everything.

Original Text: What brings you to Cornelia Station? Hopefully your stay here is a pleasant one.
Translated Text: What brings you to Cornelia Station? Hopefully your stay here is a pleasant one.

Original Text: Lately. we’ve been on a dangerous route smuggling weapons out of the W.D. zone. It’s a risky job. but it pays well enough. We try not to get caught. but we’ve found that quite a few W.D. crews will look the other way for credits. The Corporation pays them terribly. so it’s no surprise that some of them can be easy to bribe.
Translated Text: Lately. we’ve been on a dangerous route smuggling weapons out of the W.D. zone. It’s a risky job. but it pays well enough. We try not to get caught. but we’ve found that quite a few W.D. crews will look the other way for credits. The Corporation pays them terribly. so it’s no surprise that some of them can be easy to bribe.

Original Text: People in Cornelia Station seem to come from all different walks of life. There are traders and businessmen. W.D. Corp employees. Colonial Union officers. I’ve even seen crews that were most certainly members of the Alliance of Gentlemen. This port caters to everyone’s needs…except for Fluffy Biscuit. You never see any of them around here.
Translated Text: People in Cornelia Station seem to come from all different walks of life. There are traders and businessmen. W.D. Corp employees. Colonial Union officers. I’ve even seen crews that were most certainly members of the Alliance of Gentlemen. This port caters to everyone’s needs…except for Fluffy Biscuit. You never see any of them around here.

Original Text: You’re here to deliver the W.D. weapon parts? Good. I’m glad they finally arrived. I’ll take them off your hands.
Translated Text: You’re here to deliver the W.D. weapon parts? Good. I’m glad they finally arrived. I’ll take them off your hands.

Original Text: This bay is often used for general storage. However. someone recently brought in a massive haul of cargo. and the place has been loaded to its maximum. Apologies.
Translated Text: This bay is often used for general storage. However. someone recently brought in a massive haul of cargo. and the place has been loaded to its maximum. Apologies.

Original Text: Hello there. officer. Are you doing some inspections? Well. I can’t guarantee that everything in this bay is legal. Ask that guy. It’s his cargo.
Translated Text: Hello there. officer. Are you doing some inspections? Well. I can’t guarantee that everything in this bay is legal. Ask that guy. It’s his cargo.

Original Text: Over there. that man in front of us. You see him? He’s a planet reaper. It’s a dark business. just about as bad as unsanctioned terraforming. You’ll occasionally find planet reapers on the fringes. They locate undiscovered planets. worlds that haven’t yet reached the Colonial Union’s radar. Then they reap everything they can from it. Minerals. lifeforms. anything and everything of value. They have no regard for the natural order of things. One of the worst planet reapers in this galaxy was a man named Nogran Platenico. He reaped three planets clean in the span of a decade. I heard he went into hiding after the Colonial Union destroyed his ship and nearly caught him. What became of him after that? I couldn’t tell you.
Translated Text: Over there. that man in front of us. You see him? He’s a planet reaper. It’s a dark business. just about as bad as unsanctioned terraforming. You’ll occasionally find planet reapers on the fringes. They locate undiscovered planets. worlds that haven’t yet reached the Colonial Union’s radar. Then they reap everything they can from it. Minerals. lifeforms. anything and everything of value. They have no regard for the natural order of things. One of the worst planet reapers in this galaxy was a man named Nogran Platenico. He reaped three planets clean in the span of a decade. I heard he went into hiding after the Colonial Union destroyed his ship and nearly caught him. What became of him after that? I couldn’t tell you.

Original Text: I have business to attend to. If you aren’t going to inspect my cargo. I would appreciate it if you let me get back to my work.
Translated Text: I have business to attend to. If you aren’t going to inspect my cargo. I would appreciate it if you let me get back to my work.

Original Text: I have business to attend to. If you’re looking for conversation. I suggest you seek it elsewhere.
Translated Text: I have business to attend to. If you’re looking for conversation. I suggest you seek it elsewhere.

Original Text: I’ve found all sorts of strange specimens while planetside. Some people have told me that they’re extremely valuable for research. but I don’t know what to do with them. I’m not a scientist.
Translated Text: I’ve found all sorts of strange specimens while planetside. Some people have told me that they’re extremely valuable for research. but I don’t know what to do with them. I’m not a scientist.

Original Text: Reliable reactors can be hard to find. When you get into real trouble. energy management can become a big problem. Luckily. there’s a good component shop here at Cornelia. Check them out if you’re ever in need of ship parts.
Translated Text: Reliable reactors can be hard to find. When you get into real trouble. energy management can become a big problem. Luckily. there’s a good component shop here at Cornelia. Check them out if you’re ever in need of ship parts.

Original Text: My crew and I came across a strange piece of technology once. It was emitting a massive beam that seemed to be pointed towards a single sector. The thing used its beam to nearly rip our hull to shreds. and we barely made it out alive. If you’re leaving soon. be careful. Plenty of things in this galaxy can terminate your travel plans early.
Translated Text: My crew and I came across a strange piece of technology once. It was emitting a massive beam that seemed to be pointed towards a single sector. The thing used its beam to nearly rip our hull to shreds. and we barely made it out alive. If you’re leaving soon. be careful. Plenty of things in this galaxy can terminate your travel plans early.

Original Text: Ah. hello. I didn’t expect to find many Colonial Union officers around this station. Pleasant day. isn’t it?
Translated Text: Ah. hello. I didn’t expect to find many Colonial Union officers around this station. Pleasant day. isn’t it?

Original Text: Those damn inspection stations make it difficult to smuggle anything out of the Union zone. We ignored one of their requests once. and we had to get our ship unflagged at the Estate. Still. it was better than getting caught. I hear they'll destroy your ship the second they find anything unapproved by the Union. Seems a little drastic. if you ask me. Oh. sorry. Are you looking for Boraza? His lab is just over the bridge. Try not to get in his way. though. He's irritable today.
Translated Text: Those damn inspection stations make it difficult to smuggle anything out of the Union zone. We ignored one of their requests once. and we had to get our ship unflagged at the Estate. Still. it was better than getting caught. I hear they'll destroy your ship the second they find anything unapproved by the Union. Seems a little drastic. if you ask me. Oh. sorry. Are you looking for Boraza? His lab is just over the bridge. Try not to get in his way. though. He's irritable today.

Original Text: My captain has gone mad trying track down the course of a Polytechnic Federation ship. I’ve begun to think the whole thing is just a hoax he picked up from some bar.
Translated Text: My captain has gone mad trying track down the course of a Polytechnic Federation ship. I’ve begun to think the whole thing is just a hoax he picked up from some bar.

Original Text: I’m looking for crewmen to hire. but it can be a challenge to find qualified individuals. You seem to be acceptable. but I can tell you’re already in a crew. So my search continues.
Translated Text: I’m looking for crewmen to hire. but it can be a challenge to find qualified individuals. You seem to be acceptable. but I can tell you’re already in a crew. So my search continues.

Original Text: Have you ever been to Stiltz and Shanders? Good port. I must say. If you find yourself in that area. be sure to get yourself a Gentlemen’s Cooler. Perfect for a hot day—and the weather is always hot on that planet.
Translated Text: Have you ever been to Stiltz and Shanders? Good port. I must say. If you find yourself in that area. be sure to get yourself a Gentlemen’s Cooler. Perfect for a hot day—and the weather is always hot on that planet.

Original Text: …Don’t tell my captain I’m in here.
Translated Text: …Don’t tell my captain I’m in here.

Original Text: Sit back and rest. Space travel can be quite tiring.
Translated Text: Sit back and rest. Space travel can be quite tiring.

Original Text: Welcome to Morley's! If you need ship components. have a look at our stock.
Translated Text: Welcome to Morley's! If you need ship components. have a look at our stock.

Original Text: Welcome! Speak with Morley if you’re looking to buy components.
Translated Text: Welcome! Speak with Morley if you’re looking to buy components.

Original Text: We don’t sell here. Get a move on.
Translated Text: We don’t sell here. Get a move on.

Original Text: If you don't have any business with us. I suggest you leave. One of our shipments is late. and Boraza was already in a bad mood today. You don't want to get caught in his warpath.
Translated Text: If you don't have any business with us. I suggest you leave. One of our shipments is late. and Boraza was already in a bad mood today. You don't want to get caught in his warpath.

Original Text: Greetings. Have you come to do business with Boraza?
Translated Text: Greetings. Have you come to do business with Boraza?

Original Text: Have we met before? Well. I suppose you might not know. even if we did. That’s fine. I’m sure we’ll see each other again regardless.
Translated Text: Have we met before? Well. I suppose you might not know. even if we did. That’s fine. I’m sure we’ll see each other again regardless.

Original Text: How has Cornelia been treating you? Bolgath and I are rather fond of this station. It has a strong sense of community. don’t you agree?
Translated Text: How has Cornelia been treating you? Bolgath and I are rather fond of this station. It has a strong sense of community. don’t you agree?

Original Text: W.D. Corporation Destroyer-class starship was hijacked by Alliance of Gentlemen crew. Ship is currently in a sector near Cornelia Station. Destroy stolen vessel by any means necessary.
Translated Text: W.D. Corporation Destroyer-class starship was hijacked by Alliance of Gentlemen crew. Ship is currently in a sector near Cornelia Station. Destroy stolen vessel by any means necessary.

Original Text: I wonder if there are any fish left. They could be mutated. you know.
Translated Text: I wonder if there are any fish left. They could be mutated. you know.

Original Text: Leave it to the Wolden-Dorf Corporation to pump toxic waste into such a lovely. unassuming lake. In another time. this is one of my favorite vacation spots.
Translated Text: Leave it to the Wolden-Dorf Corporation to pump toxic waste into such a lovely. unassuming lake. In another time. this is one of my favorite vacation spots.

Original Text: I’m okay…I just need a minute…
Translated Text: I’m okay…I just need a minute…

Original Text: Don’t mind Mulloy. He just has a weak stomach. Living so close to the waste can wear on anyone’s body after a while. but Mulloy is especially sensitive. I told him he shouldn’t have applied for planetary work.
Translated Text: Don’t mind Mulloy. He just has a weak stomach. Living so close to the waste can wear on anyone’s body after a while. but Mulloy is especially sensitive. I told him he shouldn’t have applied for planetary work.

Original Text: Unit leader Reese Novo is inside the facility. Report to her immediately.
Translated Text: Unit leader Reese Novo is inside the facility. Report to her immediately.

Original Text: Thank you for your assistance. We have a lot of work to do around here. so if you haven’t been assigned to a planetary job. you should be on your way.
Translated Text: Thank you for your assistance. We have a lot of work to do around here. so if you haven’t been assigned to a planetary job. you should be on your way.

Original Text: We still need help with those creatures outside. Once you get rid of them. you’re free to be on your way.
Translated Text: We still need help with those creatures outside. Once you get rid of them. you’re free to be on your way.

Original Text: Good. And it seems you have already taken care of those animals outside. as well. In that case. we’ll remove the cargo from your ship. and then you can be on your way.
Translated Text: Good. And it seems you have already taken care of those animals outside. as well. In that case. we’ll remove the cargo from your ship. and then you can be on your way.

Original Text: Good. It took you long enough to get here. We’ll remove the cargo from your ship. but we still need help with those animals outside. Once you get rid of them. you’re free to be on your way.
Translated Text: Good. It took you long enough to get here. We’ll remove the cargo from your ship. but we still need help with those animals outside. Once you get rid of them. you’re free to be on your way.

Original Text: You’re here to deliver the rations. I assume. Do you have them or not?
Translated Text: You’re here to deliver the rations. I assume. Do you have them or not?

Original Text: Greetings. You must be the delivery crew. It’s a relief to see you all. I know this production plant isn’t the most comfortable of places. but make yourselves at home while you’re here. We appreciate the help.
Translated Text: Greetings. You must be the delivery crew. It’s a relief to see you all. I know this production plant isn’t the most comfortable of places. but make yourselves at home while you’re here. We appreciate the help.

Original Text: Say what you will about the tedium of space travel. it’s better than working in a facility like this. The hours are longer than permissible. the work requires frequent atrium regeneration. and there’s no escaping the toxic mist. Worst part is. we won’t be transferred for another few months. I can’t wait to get out of here.
Translated Text: Say what you will about the tedium of space travel. it’s better than working in a facility like this. The hours are longer than permissible. the work requires frequent atrium regeneration. and there’s no escaping the toxic mist. Worst part is. we won’t be transferred for another few months. I can’t wait to get out of here.

Original Text: Hello. good to see new faces. Make sure you watch your step around the waste. You wouldn’t want to fall in.
Translated Text: Hello. good to see new faces. Make sure you watch your step around the waste. You wouldn’t want to fall in.

Original Text: Finally. the rations are here! We were getting dangerously low on foodstuffs. Thank you for delivering them!
Translated Text: Finally. the rations are here! We were getting dangerously low on foodstuffs. Thank you for delivering them!

Original Text: Excuse me. I need to record this data. I do not have the time to converse.
Translated Text: Excuse me. I need to record this data. I do not have the time to converse.

Original Text: Defend highly important shipment from Alliance of Gentlemen ship “The Wracker”. W.D. Transport Unit 445 must not be destroyed. Assist ship immediately.
Translated Text: Defend highly important shipment from Alliance of Gentlemen ship “The Wracker”. W.D. Transport Unit 445 must not be destroyed. Assist ship immediately.

Original Text: W.D. Transport Unit 445 is declining transmissions.
Translated Text: W.D. Transport Unit 445 is declining transmissions.

Original Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You have our thanks for coming here to assist us on such short notice. Unfortunately. we must be on our course now. We’ve already fallen behind schedule for this shipment. Good luck to you all. and safe travels.
Translated Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. You have our thanks for coming here to assist us on such short notice. Unfortunately. we must be on our course now. We’ve already fallen behind schedule for this shipment. Good luck to you all. and safe travels.

Original Text: Welcome to the Grey Huntsmen. A message will be sent over long range comms when a bounty is made available. The galaxy thanks you for your service.
Translated Text: Welcome to the Grey Huntsmen. A message will be sent over long range comms when a bounty is made available. The galaxy thanks you for your service.

Original Text: Opted out of Grey Huntsmen job assignment. For future inquiries. contact G.H. Bounty Agency representatives at Cornelia Station or the Harbor.
Translated Text: 退出了<灰猎人>的工作.如需进一步查询.请联系G.H. Bounty Agency在科妮莉亚站或港口的代表.

Original Text: GREY HUNTSMEN CONTRACT: Jobs accepted through the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency are time sensitive and must be completed within a limited period or they will be reassigned to a more capable crew. In order to receive the credits or rewards stated in the bounty. the target ship(s) must be destroyed. not captured. as many possess established reputations. Do you agree to these terms?
Translated Text: 灰色猎人合同：通过灰色猎人赏金机构接受的工作具有时间敏感性.必须在有限的时间内完成.否则他们将被重新分配给更有能力的工作人员. 为了获得赏金中规定的信用或奖励.目标舰艇必须被摧毁.而不是被俘虏.因为许多舰艇已经建立了声誉. 您同意这些条款吗?

Original Text: Opted out of Grey Huntsmen job assignment. For future inquiries. contact representative Baris at Cornelia Station. Ivok Milligan at the Harbor. or Remigus Nalidak at the Grey Huntsman Bounty Agency headquarters.
Translated Text: Opted out of Grey Huntsmen job assignment. For future inquiries. contact representative Baris at Cornelia Station. Ivok Milligan at the Harbor. or Remigus Nalidak at the Grey Huntsman Bounty Agency headquarters.

Original Text: Looking to recruit new bounty hunters. Opt in to receive information about the latest bounties.
Translated Text: 正在寻找新的赏金猎人. 选择接收关于最新赏金的信息.

Original Text: WANTED: NEBULA CREEPER – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. Independently run scavenging ship ‘Nebula Creeper’ has risen in recent weeks. Though many scavengers in the galaxy seek out abandoned ships to scrap. Nebula Creeper hunts populated vessels and strips them clean after battle. Nebula Creeper is unaffiliated with a faction and has been targeting any ship that wanders into its perceived territory. Based on previous reports. distance is advised if possible to attain. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by the Civilian Transport Association. Dark Star Navigation Inc.. and the Colonial Union.
Translated Text: WANTED: NEBULA CREEPER – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. Independently run scavenging ship ‘Nebula Creeper’ has risen in recent weeks. Though many scavengers in the galaxy seek out abandoned ships to scrap. Nebula Creeper hunts populated vessels and strips them clean after battle. Nebula Creeper is unaffiliated with a faction and has been targeting any ship that wanders into its perceived territory. Based on previous reports. distance is advised if possible to attain. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by the Civilian Transport Association. Dark Star Navigation Inc.. and the Colonial Union.

Original Text: WANTED: NEBULA CREEPER – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. Independently run scavenging ship ‘Nebula Creeper’ has risen in recent weeks. Though many scavengers in the galaxy seek out abandoned ships to scrap. Nebula Creeper hunts populated vessels and strips them clean after battle. Nebula Creeper is unaffiliated with a faction and has been targeting any ship that wanders into its perceived territory. Based on previous reports. distance is advised if possible to attain. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by the Civilian Transport Association. Dark Star Navigation Inc.. and the Colonial Union.
Translated Text: WANTED: NEBULA CREEPER – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. Independently run scavenging ship ‘Nebula Creeper’ has risen in recent weeks. Though many scavengers in the galaxy seek out abandoned ships to scrap. Nebula Creeper hunts populated vessels and strips them clean after battle. Nebula Creeper is unaffiliated with a faction and has been targeting any ship that wanders into its perceived territory. Based on previous reports. distance is advised if possible to attain. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by the Civilian Transport Association. Dark Star Navigation Inc.. and the Colonial Union.

Original Text: WANTED: TITAN – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. ‘Titan’ is a Destroyer-class starship that abandoned the W.D. Corporation five Union-standard weeks ago. It has stationed itself around a valuable asteroid mining site. destroying any ship that gets within range. The asteroid is owned by Splitrock Mining Company. but with Titan in its current position. no vessels can get close enough to do their jobs. Based on reports of previous attempts to remove the Destroyer. Titan is said to be particularly difficult to damage. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by Splitrock Mining Company and the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.
Translated Text: WANTED: TITAN – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. ‘Titan’ is a Destroyer-class starship that abandoned the W.D. Corporation five Union-standard weeks ago. It has stationed itself around a valuable asteroid mining site. destroying any ship that gets within range. The asteroid is owned by Splitrock Mining Company. but with Titan in its current position. no vessels can get close enough to do their jobs. Based on reports of previous attempts to remove the Destroyer. Titan is said to be particularly difficult to damage. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by Splitrock Mining Company and the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.

Original Text: WANTED: TITAN – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. ‘Titan’ is a Destroyer-class starship that abandoned the W.D. Corporation five Union-standard weeks ago. It has stationed itself around a valuable asteroid mining site. destroying any ship that gets within range. The asteroid is owned by Splitrock Mining Company. but with Titan in its current position. no vessels can get close enough to do their jobs. Based on reports of previous attempts to remove the Destroyer. Titan is said to be particularly difficult to damage. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by Splitrock Mining Company and the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.
Translated Text: WANTED: TITAN – 10.000 CREDIT REWARD. ‘Titan’ is a Destroyer-class starship that abandoned the W.D. Corporation five Union-standard weeks ago. It has stationed itself around a valuable asteroid mining site. destroying any ship that gets within range. The asteroid is owned by Splitrock Mining Company. but with Titan in its current position. no vessels can get close enough to do their jobs. Based on reports of previous attempts to remove the Destroyer. Titan is said to be particularly difficult to damage. Reward of 10.000 credits. funded by Splitrock Mining Company and the Wolden-Dorf Corporation.

Original Text: WANTED: U.S.S. CAPALIUS – 9.000 CREDIT REWARD. Defectors from the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet of the ship ‘U.S.S. Capalius’ have been engaging in independent acts of piracy. Several civilian transport ships and W.D. vessels have fallen to U.S.S. Capalius. particularly along popular trade routes. U.S.S. Capalius is a Roland-class starship and is said to be outfitted with military-grade technology. Reward of 9.000 credits. funded by the Civilian Transport Association. Wolden-Dorf Corporation and Colonial Union.
Translated Text: WANTED: U.S.S. CAPALIUS – 9.000 CREDIT REWARD. Defectors from the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet of the ship ‘U.S.S. Capalius’ have been engaging in independent acts of piracy. Several civilian transport ships and W.D. vessels have fallen to U.S.S. Capalius. particularly along popular trade routes. U.S.S. Capalius is a Roland-class starship and is said to be outfitted with military-grade technology. Reward of 9.000 credits. funded by the Civilian Transport Association. Wolden-Dorf Corporation and Colonial Union.

Original Text: WANTED: SLAPDASH AND THE TORCH – 12.000 CREDIT REWARD. A pair of unaligned vessels ‘Slapdash’ and ‘The Torch’. have been terrorizing sectors around long range warp stations. Slapdash is a former racing vessel. and The Torch was a supply ship before it was hijacked by raiders and outfitted with heavy artillery. They have been attacking ships that are trying to reach long range warp stations for service. Every ship that has tried to put an end to their operation has been destroyed. Reward of 12.000 credits for both ships. funded by the Civilian Transport Association and the Colonial Union Galactic Warp Network.
Translated Text: WANTED: SLAPDASH AND THE TORCH – 12.000 CREDIT REWARD. A pair of unaligned vessels ‘Slapdash’ and ‘The Torch’. have been terrorizing sectors around long range warp stations. Slapdash is a former racing vessel. and The Torch was a supply ship before it was hijacked by raiders and outfitted with heavy artillery. They have been attacking ships that are trying to reach long range warp stations for service. Every ship that has tried to put an end to their operation has been destroyed. Reward of 12.000 credits for both ships. funded by the Civilian Transport Association and the Colonial Union Galactic Warp Network.

Original Text: WANTED: SLAPDASH AND THE TORCH – 12.000 CREDIT REWARD. A pair of unaligned vessels. ‘Slapdash’ and ‘The Torch’. have been terrorizing sectors around long range warp stations. Slapdash is a former racing vessel. and The Torch was a supply ship before it was hijacked by raiders and outfitted with heavy artillery. They have been attacking ships that are trying to reach long range warp stations for service. Every ship that has tried to put an end to their operation has been destroyed. Reward of 12.000 credits for both ships. funded by the Civilian Transport Association and the Colonial Union Galactic Warp Network.
Translated Text: WANTED: SLAPDASH AND THE TORCH – 12.000 CREDIT REWARD. A pair of unaligned vessels. ‘Slapdash’ and ‘The Torch’. have been terrorizing sectors around long range warp stations. Slapdash is a former racing vessel. and The Torch was a supply ship before it was hijacked by raiders and outfitted with heavy artillery. They have been attacking ships that are trying to reach long range warp stations for service. Every ship that has tried to put an end to their operation has been destroyed. Reward of 12.000 credits for both ships. funded by the Civilian Transport Association and the Colonial Union Galactic Warp Network.

Original Text: WANTED: LORTALUS – 18.000 CREDIT REWARD. For the past three Union-standard years. the flagged Intrepid-class starship ‘Lortalus’ has been involved in numerous cases of sabotage and assassination. It is believed to be offering its services for hire. independently of and without regard for any faction. Though confrontations between Lortalus and the Grey Huntsmen have thus far been limited due to Lortalus’s elusiveness. one report speaks of the ship as being ‘deathly silent and virtually undetectable’. Reward of 18.000 credits. funded by the Colonial Union. the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. the Civilian Transport Association. Explorers United. the League of Free Machines and an anonymous requestor.
Translated Text: WANTED: LORTALUS – 18.000 CREDIT REWARD. For the past three Union-standard years. the flagged Intrepid-class starship ‘Lortalus’ has been involved in numerous cases of sabotage and assassination. It is believed to be offering its services for hire. independently of and without regard for any faction. Though confrontations between Lortalus and the Grey Huntsmen have thus far been limited due to Lortalus’s elusiveness. one report speaks of the ship as being ‘deathly silent and virtually undetectable’. Reward of 18.000 credits. funded by the Colonial Union. the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. the Civilian Transport Association. Explorers United. the League of Free Machines and an anonymous requestor.

Original Text: Welcome to the Grey Huntsmen! You’ll receive a message through long range comms when a new wanted notice has been declared. Accept the job if you want it. decline if you don’t. Easy as that. Just make sure that if you dedicate yourself to a job. you get it done. Our hunters are known for their efficiency.
Translated Text: Welcome to the Grey Huntsmen! You’ll receive a message through long range comms when a new wanted notice has been declared. Accept the job if you want it. decline if you don’t. Easy as that. Just make sure that if you dedicate yourself to a job. you get it done. Our hunters are known for their efficiency.

Original Text: That’s unfortunate. but you’re always welcome to come back if you change your mind.
Translated Text: That’s unfortunate. but you’re always welcome to come back if you change your mind.

Original Text: If you want to join. you’ll need to consent to a contract. It states that jobs accepted through the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency must be completed promptly or they’ll be handed off to another crew. To receive the reward stated in the bounty. the target ship or ships must be destroyed. Capturing them won’t fulfill the terms of the bounty. since many of these ships have longstanding reputations. Do you agree to the terms?
Translated Text: If you want to join. you’ll need to consent to a contract. It states that jobs accepted through the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency must be completed promptly or they’ll be handed off to another crew. To receive the reward stated in the bounty. the target ship or ships must be destroyed. Capturing them won’t fulfill the terms of the bounty. since many of these ships have longstanding reputations. Do you agree to the terms?

Original Text: The agency is about half a century old. speaking in Union-standard terms. From what I understand. several captains from different factions gathered around a table and decided to form a cooperative organization in order to bring especially pesky criminals to justice. Eventually. the organization became known as the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency. Among our ranks. we have combat-savvy civilians. Colonial Union officers and W.D. employees looking to pick up extra work. even some Alliance members I’d guess. Thinking of joining us?
Translated Text: The agency is about half a century old. speaking in Union-standard terms. From what I understand. several captains from different factions gathered around a table and decided to form a cooperative organization in order to bring especially pesky criminals to justice. Eventually. the organization became known as the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency. Among our ranks. we have combat-savvy civilians. Colonial Union officers and W.D. employees looking to pick up extra work. even some Alliance members I’d guess. Thinking of joining us?

Original Text: The galaxy is a dangerous place these days. There are many ships that take the inherent freedom of fringe galaxies to an extreme and live in utter lawlessness. They commit brazen crimes against any ship that comes their way. regardless of faction affiliation. As the Colonial Union is shorthanded. officers are not able to handle every case on their own. Thus. bounties are placed on the ships that no one else can subdue. I work for the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency. We compile wanted notices from across the galaxy and offer them to able crews within our membership. If you think you can handle the work. I urge you to sign up. We’re always looking to recruit new hunters. Plus. the work runs more smoothly when there’s a little friendly competition.
Translated Text: The galaxy is a dangerous place these days. There are many ships that take the inherent freedom of fringe galaxies to an extreme and live in utter lawlessness. They commit brazen crimes against any ship that comes their way. regardless of faction affiliation. As the Colonial Union is shorthanded. officers are not able to handle every case on their own. Thus. bounties are placed on the ships that no one else can subdue. I work for the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency. We compile wanted notices from across the galaxy and offer them to able crews within our membership. If you think you can handle the work. I urge you to sign up. We’re always looking to recruit new hunters. Plus. the work runs more smoothly when there’s a little friendly competition.

Original Text: The agency is about half a century old. speaking in Union-standard terms. From what I understand. several captains from different factions gathered around a table and decided to form a cooperative organization in order to bring especially pesky criminals to justice. Eventually. the organization became known as the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency. Among our ranks. we have combat-savvy civilians. Colonial Union officers and W.D. employees looking to pick up extra work. even some Alliance members I’d guess.
Translated Text: The agency is about half a century old. speaking in Union-standard terms. From what I understand. several captains from different factions gathered around a table and decided to form a cooperative organization in order to bring especially pesky criminals to justice. Eventually. the organization became known as the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency. Among our ranks. we have combat-savvy civilians. Colonial Union officers and W.D. employees looking to pick up extra work. even some Alliance members I’d guess.

Original Text: Done and done. You’ll no longer receive updates on the latest bounties. Sad to see you go. but good luck out there.
Translated Text: Done and done. You’ll no longer receive updates on the latest bounties. Sad to see you go. but good luck out there.

Original Text: Glad to have you back on board. Let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you.
Translated Text: Glad to have you back on board. Let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you.

Original Text: You’re opting out of the job assignment program? Well. that’s disappointing to hear. but I can help you quit if it’s what you want. You sure about this?
Translated Text: You’re opting out of the job assignment program? Well. that’s disappointing to hear. but I can help you quit if it’s what you want. You sure about this?

Original Text: Greetings to a fellow huntsman. What brings you out this way?
Translated Text: Greetings to a fellow huntsman. What brings you out this way?

Original Text: Hello again. How are your travels going?
Translated Text: Hello again. How are your travels going?

Original Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. I am the Alchemist. No doubt you’ve heard of me. yes? If you haven’t. then I believe it is time for us to get acquainted. Let me demonstrate just how primitive the Colonial Union’s technology is. Ready yourselves for battle. officers.
Translated Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. I am the Alchemist. No doubt you’ve heard of me. yes? If you haven’t. then I believe it is time for us to get acquainted. Let me demonstrate just how primitive the Colonial Union’s technology is. Ready yourselves for battle. officers.

Original Text: Ah. look what we have here. The W.D. Corporation has caught wind of my experiment. Come to admire my ship. have you? Pity. you won’t be admiring it for long.
Translated Text: Ah. look what we have here. The W.D. Corporation has caught wind of my experiment. Come to admire my ship. have you? Pity. you won’t be admiring it for long.

Original Text: You made a wise choice. friends. I suggest you be on your way before we find a more compelling reason to exchange fire.
Translated Text: You made a wise choice. friends. I suggest you be on your way before we find a more compelling reason to exchange fire.

Original Text: Then you will not be spared. It is time for you to learn why they call me the Alchemist.
Translated Text: Then you will not be spared. It is time for you to learn why they call me the Alchemist.

Original Text: I know an Alliance of Gentlemen ship when I see one. Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. I am the one they call the Alchemist. It was an old moniker from my own days a Gentlemen. you see. As I still harbor a small affection for the Alliance. I’d be willing to let you leave this sector unscathed for a meager sum of 5.000 credits. What will be your decision?
Translated Text: I know an Alliance of Gentlemen ship when I see one. Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. I am the one they call the Alchemist. It was an old moniker from my own days a Gentlemen. you see. As I still harbor a small affection for the Alliance. I’d be willing to let you leave this sector unscathed for a meager sum of 5.000 credits. What will be your decision?

Original Text: You pesky Fluffy Biscuit ships go wherever you please. don’t you? It’s a rather flawed part of your business model—wandering off where you don’t belong.
Translated Text: You pesky Fluffy Biscuit ships go wherever you please. don’t you? It’s a rather flawed part of your business model—wandering off where you don’t belong.

Original Text: It is scorching out here. isn’t it? But I worry if I take off my suit. I’ll freeze on that ice planet. What a dilemma.
Translated Text: It is scorching out here. isn’t it? But I worry if I take off my suit. I’ll freeze on that ice planet. What a dilemma.

Original Text: Have you tried the drinks at Kowz Retreat? They’re quite wonderful.
Translated Text: Have you tried the drinks at Kowz Retreat? They’re quite wonderful.

Original Text: Unless you have business with the Seer. I suggest you move along.
Translated Text: Unless you have business with the Seer. I suggest you move along.

Original Text: It isn’t often that people come up here. I appreciate the company. If you see anything strange out in the desert. be sure to inform me about it.
Translated Text: It isn’t often that people come up here. I appreciate the company. If you see anything strange out in the desert. be sure to inform me about it.

Original Text: Are you a traveler? That is good. Be it space or land. an adventurous spirit is an important thing to have. May the stars favor your voyages.
Translated Text: Are you a traveler? That is good. Be it space or land. an adventurous spirit is an important thing to have. May the stars favor your voyages.

Original Text: Come to enjoy the view. have you? Staring out at the sand gives you time to reflect. Personally. I'm remembering the era when there were no humans. androids. or even Sylvassi in this galaxy. Though there was another advanced civilization alive in those days. they often kept to themselves. I'd say you all have livened things up since then.
Translated Text: Come to enjoy the view. have you? Staring out at the sand gives you time to reflect. Personally. I'm remembering the era when there were no humans. androids. or even Sylvassi in this galaxy. Though there was another advanced civilization alive in those days. they often kept to themselves. I'd say you all have livened things up since then.

Original Text: Rations. tools. souvenirs——I have it all. Take a look at my stock and let me know if anything piques your interest.
Translated Text: Rations. tools. souvenirs——I have it all. Take a look at my stock and let me know if anything piques your interest.

Original Text: Welcome. Looking for weapons? What suits your needs?
Translated Text: Welcome. Looking for weapons? What suits your needs?

Original Text: Greetings. my friend! I wanted to thank you again for your contribution to our blind jump records. I hope you will continue on your quest of discovery and stop by every so often to tell us of your findings. Even if you may exercise caution in your warp travel. you truly have the spirit of a blind jumper. Good luck to you.
Translated Text: Greetings. my friend! I wanted to thank you again for your contribution to our blind jump records. I hope you will continue on your quest of discovery and stop by every so often to tell us of your findings. Even if you may exercise caution in your warp travel. you truly have the spirit of a blind jumper. Good luck to you.

Original Text: There are strange things in the galaxy. many of which remain hidden to all who do not seek them out. However. there is something that we have been trying to track down for quite some time with no success. It is said to be a creature with a great eye that resides in an unmarked sector of space. Only a few have witnessed it. and even fewer have survived such an encounter. If you ever come across the creature in your travels. please let me know. It would be a great addition to our records. and I would surely compensate you for any information you could provide.
Translated Text: There are strange things in the galaxy. many of which remain hidden to all who do not seek them out. However. there is something that we have been trying to track down for quite some time with no success. It is said to be a creature with a great eye that resides in an unmarked sector of space. Only a few have witnessed it. and even fewer have survived such an encounter. If you ever come across the creature in your travels. please let me know. It would be a great addition to our records. and I would surely compensate you for any information you could provide.

Original Text: Blind jumpers are risk takers. We seek the parts of the galaxy that are not normally reachable by regular jump calculations. and we put ourselves at great risk in order to encounter the unknown. Most blind jumpers have short careers. but we discover strange things in that time and contribute to our greater collection of findings.
Translated Text: Blind jumpers are risk takers. We seek the parts of the galaxy that are not normally reachable by regular jump calculations. and we put ourselves at great risk in order to encounter the unknown. Most blind jumpers have short careers. but we discover strange things in that time and contribute to our greater collection of findings.

Original Text: You…found the creature? That is most impressive! Please recount everything you can of it. and I will be certain to add it to our records! Ah. and allow me to compensate you for your great contribution. I hope 7000 credits will suffice.
Translated Text: You…found the creature? That is most impressive! Please recount everything you can of it. and I will be certain to add it to our records! Ah. and allow me to compensate you for your great contribution. I hope 7000 credits will suffice.

Original Text: Are you an aspiring blind jumper? We’re happy to see more people interested in our profession. If you come across anything peculiar amid your warp travels. we would be glad to hear about it.
Translated Text: Are you an aspiring blind jumper? We’re happy to see more people interested in our profession. If you come across anything peculiar amid your warp travels. we would be glad to hear about it.

Original Text: Did you come to the Burrow for the arena? Lots of people do. but I prefer to stay away from it. Gambling there is a surefire way to lose all your credits.
Translated Text: Did you come to the Burrow for the arena? Lots of people do. but I prefer to stay away from it. Gambling there is a surefire way to lose all your credits.

Original Text: If you decide to initiate a blind jump. be prepared to take damage. Blind jumps can be very taxing on a ship. Systems are strained to their breaking points. and the reactor has to compensate for what is a potentially destructive process. Particularly when exiting warp. watch your engineering system closely and always keep a good repair tool on hand.
Translated Text: If you decide to initiate a blind jump. be prepared to take damage. Blind jumps can be very taxing on a ship. Systems are strained to their breaking points. and the reactor has to compensate for what is a potentially destructive process. Particularly when exiting warp. watch your engineering system closely and always keep a good repair tool on hand.

Original Text: If you need research materials for your own work. speak with Kavin over there. He orders his supplies in bulk. so he probably has extra samples in his stores. Just ask. and he’ll be glad to help you out.
Translated Text: If you need research materials for your own work. speak with Kavin over there. He orders his supplies in bulk. so he probably has extra samples in his stores. Just ask. and he’ll be glad to help you out.

Original Text: What do you need? I’d be happy to assist you however I can.
Translated Text: What do you need? I’d be happy to assist you however I can.

Original Text: You bought me out. I have no more spare research materials in my stock. Thanks for the business. and good luck with your research!
Translated Text: You bought me out. I have no more spare research materials in my stock. Thanks for the business. and good luck with your research!

Original Text: Sorry. I have no more Staman materials in stock.
Translated Text: Sorry. I have no more Staman materials in stock.

Original Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Staman supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.
Translated Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Staman supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.

Original Text: Thanks for the trade! I hope it serves you well.
Translated Text: Thanks for the trade! I hope it serves you well.

Original Text: Looking for something with Stamans. are you? My preferred source is Sargastia Tribulen. since it’s so easy to keep. Do you want to buy a sample? I can part with it for 1000 credits.
Translated Text: Looking for something with Stamans. are you? My preferred source is Sargastia Tribulen. since it’s so easy to keep. Do you want to buy a sample? I can part with it for 1000 credits.

Original Text: Sorry. I have no more Aedificiate materials in stock.
Translated Text: Sorry. I have no more Aedificiate materials in stock.

Original Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Aedificiate supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.
Translated Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Aedificiate supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.

Original Text: Thanks for the trade! Just be careful with bulbtooth. It can be difficult to handle due to those spikes. so take care not to cut yourself.
Translated Text: Thanks for the trade! Just be careful with bulbtooth. It can be difficult to handle due to those spikes. so take care not to cut yourself.

Original Text: Thanks for the trade! It was a bit difficult to acquire this sample of Gracilia Floris. but it’ll do you more good than it will sitting on my storage shelf.
Translated Text: Thanks for the trade! It was a bit difficult to acquire this sample of Gracilia Floris. but it’ll do you more good than it will sitting on my storage shelf.

Original Text: I have some options for Aedificiates. What are you interested in?
Translated Text: I have some options for Aedificiates. What are you interested in?

Original Text: Sorry. I have no more Aevamere materials in stock.
Translated Text: Sorry. I have no more Aevamere materials in stock.

Original Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Aevamere supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.
Translated Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Aevamere supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.

Original Text: Thanks for the trade! Samples of AC-88436 are very easy to store since they’re fairly weightless. Much more manageable than creeping lung. in my opinion.
Translated Text: Thanks for the trade! Samples of AC-88436 are very easy to store since they’re fairly weightless. Much more manageable than creeping lung. in my opinion.

Original Text: You’re interested in buying the Creeping Lung? Thank you! I’ve had this sample for too long. and it’s almost at its peak growth rate. It’ll get unmanageable soon. so make sure you use it in the next year or so.
Translated Text: You’re interested in buying the Creeping Lung? Thank you! I’ve had this sample for too long. and it’s almost at its peak growth rate. It’ll get unmanageable soon. so make sure you use it in the next year or so.

Original Text: So you need Aevameres. What best suits your needs?
Translated Text: So you need Aevameres. What best suits your needs?

Original Text: Sorry. I have no more Sensusite materials in stock.
Translated Text: Sorry. I have no more Sensusite materials in stock.

Original Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Sensusite supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.
Translated Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Sensusite supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.

Original Text: Sensusites? Got it. I only have Fenrasil in storage. but it’s widely considered one of the best materials for Sesusite research. It should serve your needs.
Translated Text: Sensusites? Got it. I only have Fenrasil in storage. but it’s widely considered one of the best materials for Sesusite research. It should serve your needs.

Original Text: Sorry. I have no more Mutoumate materials in stock.
Translated Text: Sorry. I have no more Mutoumate materials in stock.

Original Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Mutoumate supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.
Translated Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Mutoumate supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.

Original Text: Thanks for the trade! I don’t think this sample should cause you any trouble. but try not to drop it. I’ve noticed it gets hotter if its surface scrapes anything.
Translated Text: Thanks for the trade! I don’t think this sample should cause you any trouble. but try not to drop it. I’ve noticed it gets hotter if its surface scrapes anything.

Original Text: Thanks for the trade! Waxthorn is manageable enough. so long as you don’t poke yourself with its thorn. It excretes some kind of poison. but there’s no known antidote. Just wear a suit when handling it and you’ll be fine.
Translated Text: Thanks for the trade! Waxthorn is manageable enough. so long as you don’t poke yourself with its thorn. It excretes some kind of poison. but there’s no known antidote. Just wear a suit when handling it and you’ll be fine.

Original Text: So you need something a little more unpredictable. do you? I don’t know what sort of research you’re conducting. but try to stay safe. What are you thinking of buying?
Translated Text: So you need something a little more unpredictable. do you? I don’t know what sort of research you’re conducting. but try to stay safe. What are you thinking of buying?

Original Text: Sorry. I have no more Vortosite materials in stock.
Translated Text: Sorry. I have no more Vortosite materials in stock.

Original Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Vortosite supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.
Translated Text: My apologies. but it doesn’t seem like you have enough credits to purchase Vortosite supplies from my stock. Come back another time then.

Original Text: Vortosites. I should have known you’d ask. I have one sample of SD-10899. and it was very difficult to get my hands on. It’ll be tough to part with it. But considering I have no use for it. I’ll sell it to you for 5000 credits.
Translated Text: Vortosites. I should have known you’d ask. I have one sample of SD-10899. and it was very difficult to get my hands on. It’ll be tough to part with it. But considering I have no use for it. I’ll sell it to you for 5000 credits.

Original Text: I do have some spare research samples. If there’s a particular material you need. I’d be happy to sell it to you. Would you like to browse what I have in my stock?
Translated Text: I do have some spare research samples. If there’s a particular material you need. I’d be happy to sell it to you. Would you like to browse what I have in my stock?

Original Text: Hm? Oh. my apologies. Sometimes I get so wrapped up in work. I don’t notice when someone is talking to me. Is there something I can do for you?
Translated Text: Hm? Oh. my apologies. Sometimes I get so wrapped up in work. I don’t notice when someone is talking to me. Is there something I can do for you?

Original Text: I studied pervasive alien species for many years before I came to this galaxy. Although I never worked with the Infected. I have seen them before. Many years ago. I was studying the spread of a fungus between several planetary systems when the Infected were exposed to the galaxy in which I was working. I managed to leave in time. but not before I had witnessed entire worlds consumed by the Infected’s corrupting auras. Still. after all this time. no one has figured out how to limit their spread. As unfortunate as it sounds. the Colonial Union may have severed our intergalactic warp in order to quarantine us and keep the Infected from spreading to any major galaxies.
Translated Text: I studied pervasive alien species for many years before I came to this galaxy. Although I never worked with the Infected. I have seen them before. Many years ago. I was studying the spread of a fungus between several planetary systems when the Infected were exposed to the galaxy in which I was working. I managed to leave in time. but not before I had witnessed entire worlds consumed by the Infected’s corrupting auras. Still. after all this time. no one has figured out how to limit their spread. As unfortunate as it sounds. the Colonial Union may have severed our intergalactic warp in order to quarantine us and keep the Infected from spreading to any major galaxies.

Original Text: I didn’t mind unflagging your ship once. but I have other business to worry about now. If you need your ship unflagged again. I’d suggest visiting a free port. Most offer unflagging services.
Translated Text: I didn’t mind unflagging your ship once. but I have other business to worry about now. If you need your ship unflagged again. I’d suggest visiting a free port. Most offer unflagging services.

Original Text: Pleasure doing business with you. May the stars favor your voyages.
Translated Text: Pleasure doing business with you. May the stars favor your voyages.

Original Text: Your ship isn’t flagged. You are aware of that. right? Come back when you’re in actual need of my assistance.
Translated Text: Your ship isn’t flagged. You are aware of that. right? Come back when you’re in actual need of my assistance.

Original Text: Suit yourself. And try to omit me from your next report to the Command Center. all right?
Translated Text: Suit yourself. And try to omit me from your next report to the Command Center. all right?

Original Text: If you’re asking as a Colonial Union officer. I have no idea what you’re talking about. If you’re asking as a fellow spacefarer who needs to get out of a sticky situation. then maybe I can help you out. In which case. it would be 5000 credits to remove the flagged status on your ship. Hypothetically. of course. So do you need such services or not?
Translated Text: If you’re asking as a Colonial Union officer. I have no idea what you’re talking about. If you’re asking as a fellow spacefarer who needs to get out of a sticky situation. then maybe I can help you out. In which case. it would be 5000 credits to remove the flagged status on your ship. Hypothetically. of course. So do you need such services or not?

Original Text: Suit yourself. Come back if you change your mind.
Translated Text: Suit yourself. Come back if you change your mind.

Original Text: Need yourself unflagged? I know a few tricks that could help you out. For 5000 credits. I can remove the flagged status on your ship. Do we have a deal?
Translated Text: Need yourself unflagged? I know a few tricks that could help you out. For 5000 credits. I can remove the flagged status on your ship. Do we have a deal?

Original Text: I run a shipping business that works between most of the major hubs in the galaxy. Outpost 448. Cornelia Station. the Harbor. even here at the Burrow——my ships are everywhere. Business is good and we maintain amicable relations with the Colonial Union. but even we find it hard to keep up with all the regulations these days. If you find yourselves flagged for some reason. get the flagged status removed fast. It can mean big trouble.
Translated Text: I run a shipping business that works between most of the major hubs in the galaxy. Outpost 448. Cornelia Station. the Harbor. even here at the Burrow——my ships are everywhere. Business is good and we maintain amicable relations with the Colonial Union. but even we find it hard to keep up with all the regulations these days. If you find yourselves flagged for some reason. get the flagged status removed fast. It can mean big trouble.

Original Text: You’ve seen the bar at the center of the outpost. no doubt. Kowz Retreat is hard to miss. It sprang up a few years ago. and it has quickly become the centerpiece of this settlement. If it hadn’t been built here. I doubt this place would be as prosperous as it is today.
Translated Text: You’ve seen the bar at the center of the outpost. no doubt. Kowz Retreat is hard to miss. It sprang up a few years ago. and it has quickly become the centerpiece of this settlement. If it hadn’t been built here. I doubt this place would be as prosperous as it is today.

Original Text: A few of us weren’t all too happy to see a Colonial Union research station built here. No one wanted this place to turn into another Outpost 448. After a year of the Colonial Union researchers working here. however. I have to say I’m glad to have them around. They’re nice enough folk. and being that they’re doctors. their skills come in handy every now and then.
Translated Text: A few of us weren’t all too happy to see a Colonial Union research station built here. No one wanted this place to turn into another Outpost 448. After a year of the Colonial Union researchers working here. however. I have to say I’m glad to have them around. They’re nice enough folk. and being that they’re doctors. their skills come in handy every now and then.

Original Text: Sylvassi brew has become a popular beverage in bars intergalactically. It’s often praised for its subtle yet complex flavor profile as well as its relatively cheap price. But what people don’t often acknowledge is how the brew originated. The Sylvassi created the recipe on one of their designated commune worlds. and many of them have found stable work in its production. As Sylvassi brew rises in popularity. it is my hope that the drink will help bring the Sylvassi and human species more peacefully together. Oddly enough. this drink is the first time our species’ tastes ever have aligned.
Translated Text: Sylvassi brew has become a popular beverage in bars intergalactically. It’s often praised for its subtle yet complex flavor profile as well as its relatively cheap price. But what people don’t often acknowledge is how the brew originated. The Sylvassi created the recipe on one of their designated commune worlds. and many of them have found stable work in its production. As Sylvassi brew rises in popularity. it is my hope that the drink will help bring the Sylvassi and human species more peacefully together.
