Oddly enough. this drink is the first time our species’ tastes ever have aligned.

Original Text: I hope the Burrow has been treating you well. Be sure to come back to the bar when you need a refreshment. It’s the only practical place you can find a drink in this desert. I can assure you of that.
Translated Text: I hope the Burrow has been treating you well. Be sure to come back to the bar when you need a refreshment. It’s the only practical place you can find a drink in this desert. I can assure you of that.

Original Text: Have you met those blind jumpers that camp out in the cave at the top of the Burrow? They’re crazy. if you ask me. Many foolish feats have been done for the sake of discovery. However. activating a blind warp in anything less than a dire situation is high up on that list.
Translated Text: Have you met those blind jumpers that camp out in the cave at the top of the Burrow? They’re crazy. if you ask me. Many foolish feats have been done for the sake of discovery. However. activating a blind warp in anything less than a dire situation is high up on that list.

Original Text: Welcome to Kowz Retreat. What will you be drinking today?
Translated Text: Welcome to Kowz Retreat. What will you be drinking today?

Original Text: Our crew is taking a rest here after several months of space travel. We’ve gone from sector to sector. station to station with hardly a break in between. I’ve been stuck inside metal rooms for so long. I can’t express how glad I am to see a sky again.
Translated Text: Our crew is taking a rest here after several months of space travel. We’ve gone from sector to sector. station to station with hardly a break in between. I’ve been stuck inside metal rooms for so long. I can’t express how glad I am to see a sky again.

Original Text: Have you ever eaten one of those dehydrated sandwiches? They’re chewier than I would’ve expected.
Translated Text: Have you ever eaten one of those dehydrated sandwiches? They’re chewier than I would’ve expected.

Original Text: I tend to keep my ExoSuit on around here. Even though the heat on this planet isn’t lethal. it isn’t particularly tolerable either. I prefer my ExoSuit’s cooling systems to the scorching sun of a desert planet.
Translated Text: I tend to keep my ExoSuit on around here. Even though the heat on this planet isn’t lethal. it isn’t particularly tolerable either. I prefer my ExoSuit’s cooling systems to the scorching sun of a desert planet.

Original Text: My family assembles and upgrades weapons for a living. Since my father passed away a few years ago. my grandfather is teaching me the trade. So far it's been tricky. but I think I'm finally getting the hang of it. Be sure to buy something from my grandfather Wallace before you leave. We have some great weapons for sale.
Translated Text: My family assembles and upgrades weapons for a living. Since my father passed away a few years ago. my grandfather is teaching me the trade. So far it's been tricky. but I think I'm finally getting the hang of it. Be sure to buy something from my grandfather Wallace before you leave. We have some great weapons for sale.

Original Text: I’ve been rematerialized in an atrium forty-nine times due to that arena. Despite all the failures. I’ve still won my fair share of games. If you can front the entrance fee. think about giving it a try. You never know how the game might turn out.
Translated Text: I’ve been rematerialized in an atrium forty-nine times due to that arena. Despite all the failures. I’ve still won my fair share of games. If you can front the entrance fee. think about giving it a try. You never know how the game might turn out.

Original Text: Congratulations on your win in the arena. I’ve never seen anyone shoot like that before. You’re quite capable.
Translated Text: Congratulations on your win in the arena. I’ve never seen anyone shoot like that before. You’re quite capable.

Original Text: The arena’s obstacles often change between rounds. If you decide to enter. be alert of what’s shifting around you. Smart contestants often use the obstacles to their advantage.
Translated Text: The arena’s obstacles often change between rounds. If you decide to enter. be alert of what’s shifting around you. Smart contestants often use the obstacles to their advantage.

Original Text: Not many contestants win the arena pot. You’re one of the few. Good job.
Translated Text: Not many contestants win the arena pot. You’re one of the few. Good job.

Original Text: I’ve considered participating in the arena. but the track record of people who’ve won doesn’t leave me feeling very optimistic. I’d rather see someone win to know it’s possible first. Then I’ll join.
Translated Text: I’ve considered participating in the arena. but the track record of people who’ve won doesn’t leave me feeling very optimistic. I’d rather see someone win to know it’s possible first. Then I’ll join.

Original Text: It’s you! You won the arena. didn’t you? It’s an honor to meet you in person! You made it look easy. I almost considered entering as a contestant myself. but I think I’ll wait to see if another winner pops up. After all. your win could’ve been a fluke. right?
Translated Text: It’s you! You won the arena. didn’t you? It’s an honor to meet you in person! You made it look easy. I almost considered entering as a contestant myself. but I think I’ll wait to see if another winner pops up. After all. your win could’ve been a fluke. right?

Original Text: Supposedly the arena owners have an atrium that’s been tweaked to regenerate any of the creatures that fall during a game. Saves them quite a few credits I’d imagine. but I’m not sure their methods are ethically sound.
Translated Text: Supposedly the arena owners have an atrium that’s been tweaked to regenerate any of the creatures that fall during a game. Saves them quite a few credits I’d imagine. but I’m not sure their methods are ethically sound.

Original Text: Good job in the arena. Do you have a plan for spending those new credits of yours?
Translated Text: Good job in the arena. Do you have a plan for spending those new credits of yours?

Original Text: It always amazes me the lengths biologicals will go in order to get themselves killed.
Translated Text: It always amazes me the lengths biologicals will go in order to get themselves killed.

Original Text: So you won. did you? What a rare occurrence. Consider yourself lucky.
Translated Text: So you won. did you? What a rare occurrence. Consider yourself lucky.

Original Text: Welcome to the grenade shop. my friend! Are you interested in making a purchase?
Translated Text: Welcome to the grenade shop. my friend! Are you interested in making a purchase?

Original Text: I’m not sure why you came to this planet. but I’m grateful for your help. Take care.
Translated Text: I’m not sure why you came to this planet. but I’m grateful for your help. Take care.

Original Text: It’s busted? Well. that’s unfortunate but not wholly unexpected. I’ll send Davorn up there to fix it later. Here’s a couple hundred credits for your trouble. I’m not sure why you came to this planet. but I’m grateful for your help. Take care.
Translated Text: It’s busted? Well. that’s unfortunate but not wholly unexpected. I’ll send Davorn up there to fix it later. Here’s a couple hundred credits for your trouble. I’m not sure why you came to this planet. but I’m grateful for your help. Take care.

Original Text: Have you checked the tower yet?
Translated Text: Have you checked the tower yet?

Original Text: I appreciate the assistance. Let me know what find up there.
Translated Text: I appreciate the assistance. Let me know what find up there.

Original Text: Suit yourself. But if you aren’t here to lend a hand. you should head back to your ship. We don’t need any more trouble than we already have.
Translated Text: Suit yourself. But if you aren’t here to lend a hand. you should head back to your ship. We don’t need any more trouble than we already have.

Original Text: You have a flight pack. correct? If you’re any good with it. could you fly to the top of the station and check the comms tower for me? We’ve been having some problems with our communications array. so we need to climb up there to see what went wrong. The process would go a lot faster with your help. Plus. I’d be willing to part with a few credits in exchange for your help.
Translated Text: You have a flight pack. correct? If you’re any good with it. could you fly to the top of the station and check the comms tower for me? We’ve been having some problems with our communications array. so we need to climb up there to see what went wrong. The process would go a lot faster with your help. Plus. I’d be willing to part with a few credits in exchange for your help.

Original Text: We really should invest in flight packs ourselves. They seem to come in handy.
Translated Text: We really should invest in flight packs ourselves. They seem to come in handy.

Original Text: We aren’t expecting a supply shipment for another Union-standard month. But if you’re not a shipping crew. what are you doing here?
Translated Text: We aren’t expecting a supply shipment for another Union-standard month. But if you’re not a shipping crew. what are you doing here?

Original Text: This entire planet is covered in sand. Looking out at it. I sometimes feel a bit uneasy. After all. who really knows what’s out there?
Translated Text: This entire planet is covered in sand. Looking out at it. I sometimes feel a bit uneasy. After all. who really knows what’s out there?

Original Text: I’ve been living on ration packs for quite a while now. Next time I go to a station. I think I’ll find some food that doesn’t come in a can.
Translated Text: I’ve been living on ration packs for quite a while now. Next time I go to a station. I think I’ll find some food that doesn’t come in a can.

Original Text: Thanks again for your help. I doubt you’ll have a reason to come back to this planet any time soon. but you’re always welcome.
Translated Text: Thanks again for your help. I doubt you’ll have a reason to come back to this planet any time soon. but you’re always welcome.

Original Text: Thank you for your help. I’ve never seen an ore like this before. but I’ll run it through the database and see if we can identify its source. Here are the 2000 credits I promised you.
Translated Text: Thank you for your help. I’ve never seen an ore like this before. but I’ll run it through the database and see if we can identify its source. Here are the 2000 credits I promised you.

Original Text: Did you finish the tasks I requested of you?
Translated Text: Did you finish the tasks I requested of you?

Original Text: Thank you. I appreciate the help. Please be careful out there.
Translated Text: Thank you. I appreciate the help. Please be careful out there.

Original Text: Well. I had to ask. If you aren’t going to help. at least be careful if you decide to go outside the station. Those drones are dangerous.
Translated Text: Well. I had to ask. If you aren’t going to help. at least be careful if you decide to go outside the station. Those drones are dangerous.

Original Text: A storm swept through here not too long ago. and it revealed a rocky hole in the ground near the station. When we lowered a cord down to investigate it. we discovered a small cave and saw something glowing deeper inside. However. we didn’t get a good look at it before the drones swarmed us. Ever since we found that cave. the drones have been circling the station and setting off our sensors. It’s becoming difficult to get work done. and we still don’t know what that glowing object was. If you’re willing to do me a favor. clear out the drones around the station and bring back that glowing object from the cave. I’ll pay you 2000 credits. Do we have a deal?
Translated Text: A storm swept through here not too long ago. and it revealed a rocky hole in the ground near the station. When we lowered a cord down to investigate it. we discovered a small cave and saw something glowing deeper inside. However. we didn’t get a good look at it before the drones swarmed us. Ever since we found that cave. the drones have been circling the station and setting off our sensors. It’s becoming difficult to get work done. and we still don’t know what that glowing object was. If you’re willing to do me a favor. clear out the drones around the station and bring back that glowing object from the cave. I’ll pay you 2000 credits. Do we have a deal?

Original Text: I wonder what that glowing object in the cave was. Perhaps I'll contact some colleagues at Outpost 448 and see if they know anything.
Translated Text: I wonder what that glowing object in the cave was. Perhaps I'll contact some colleagues at Outpost 448 and see if they know anything.

Original Text: XR-12131 is not certain that you are authorized to be inside this terraforming facility. However. Miss Ritrana is in need of some assistance. Please speak with her if you are not currently occupied with another task.
Translated Text: XR-12131 is not certain that you are authorized to be inside this terraforming facility. However. Miss Ritrana is in need of some assistance. Please speak with her if you are not currently occupied with another task.

Original Text: XR-12131 thanks you for heeding Miss Ritrana’s request.
Translated Text: XR-12131 thanks you for heeding Miss Ritrana’s request.

Original Text: These are supposed to be my off hours. but I can arrange a quick exchange if you need fuel capsules or something. How about it?
Translated Text: These are supposed to be my off hours. but I can arrange a quick exchange if you need fuel capsules or something. How about it?

Original Text: In our opinion. the best biscuit is the original. Nothing beats the flavor of a classic biscuit.
Translated Text: In our opinion. the best biscuit is the original. Nothing beats the flavor of a classic biscuit.

Original Text: There are many types of biscuits—spicy. crumbly. frozen. Be sure to try all our flavors!
Translated Text: There are many types of biscuits—spicy. crumbly. frozen. Be sure to try all our flavors!

Original Text: If you’re ever craving a biscuit. a Fluffy Biscuit delivery ship is never too far away. We’re pleased to serve.
Translated Text: If you’re ever craving a biscuit. a Fluffy Biscuit delivery ship is never too far away. We’re pleased to serve.

Original Text: Have a look at our stock!
Translated Text: Have a look at our stock!

Original Text: Great! Let us know if anything piques your interest.
Translated Text: Great! Let us know if anything piques your interest.

Original Text: What sort of biscuit are you looking for?
Translated Text: What sort of biscuit are you looking for?

Original Text: Please don’t hurt us! Just take the credits and leave us alone!
Translated Text: Please don’t hurt us! Just take the credits and leave us alone!

Original Text: If you want the credits so badly. you can have them! We don’t want a fight.
Translated Text: If you want the credits so badly. you can have them! We don’t want a fight.

Original Text: Please. we mean no harm! Don’t fire at us. We’ll give you whatever you want.
Translated Text: Please. we mean no harm! Don’t fire at us. We’ll give you whatever you want.

Original Text: We never meant to get in your way. Please. just let us go!
Translated Text: We never meant to get in your way. Please. just let us go!

Original Text: Aren’t Colonial Union officers supposed to protect the galaxy? Shame on you.
Translated Text: Aren’t Colonial Union officers supposed to protect the galaxy? Shame on you.

Original Text: We’ll never hand over our credits to scoundrels such as yourselves.
Translated Text: We’ll never hand over our credits to scoundrels such as yourselves.

Original Text: We refuse. You can’t intimidate us.
Translated Text: We refuse. You can’t intimidate us.

Original Text: The Fluffy Biscuit Company has strict regulations on the distribution of its supplies and products. As threatening as you might be. we simply cannot break the rules.
Translated Text: The Fluffy Biscuit Company has strict regulations on the distribution of its supplies and products. As threatening as you might be. we simply cannot break the rules.

Original Text: Based on your hostile tone. we’ve come to the conclusion that you do not want to place an order.
Translated Text: Based on your hostile tone. we’ve come to the conclusion that you do not want to place an order.

Original Text: Please don’t hurt us! Just take the fuel and leave us alone!
Translated Text: Please don’t hurt us! Just take the fuel and leave us alone!

Original Text: If you want the fuel so badly. you can have it! We don’t want a fight.
Translated Text: If you want the fuel so badly. you can have it! We don’t want a fight.

Original Text: We’ll never hand over our fuel to scoundrels such as yourselves.
Translated Text: We’ll never hand over our fuel to scoundrels such as yourselves.

Original Text: Hello. brave officers of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! This is the Fluffy Biscuit delivery service! Would you like to place an order?
Translated Text: Hello. brave officers of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! This is the Fluffy Biscuit delivery service! Would you like to place an order?

Original Text: Union officers. it’s a pleasure to meet you out here! Might we interest you in some biscuits for your travels?
Translated Text: Union officers. it’s a pleasure to meet you out here! Might we interest you in some biscuits for your travels?

Original Text: Greetings from Fluffy Biscuit ship [SHIP_NAME]! Can we serve you fine officers some biscuits?
Translated Text: Greetings from Fluffy Biscuit ship [SHIP_NAME]! Can we serve you fine officers some biscuits?

Original Text: Hello. officers! Are you looking to buy some biscuits?
Translated Text: Hello. officers! Are you looking to buy some biscuits?

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit Company at your service! What can we get for you today?
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit Company at your service! What can we get for you today?

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit delivery service here. Care to buy some biscuits?
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit delivery service here. Care to buy some biscuits?

Original Text: This is Fluffy Biscuit. bringing you the best biscuits in the galaxy! Would you like to view our specials?
Translated Text: This is Fluffy Biscuit. bringing you the best biscuits in the galaxy! Would you like to view our specials?

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit Co. Would you like to buy our famous crate o’ biscuits?
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit Co. Would you like to buy our famous crate o’ biscuits?

Original Text: Greetings! This is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. How can we help you?
Translated Text: Greetings! This is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. How can we help you?

Original Text: If you’re looking for biscuits. we’re happy to supply! What piques your cravings today?
Translated Text: If you’re looking for biscuits. we’re happy to supply! What piques your cravings today?

Original Text: Hello. Wolden-Dorf crew! Need some biscuits for your assignments? We’d be glad to supply you! Please. take a look at our specials!
Translated Text: Hello. Wolden-Dorf crew! Need some biscuits for your assignments? We’d be glad to supply you! Please. take a look at our specials!

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. greetings! Would a fine W.D. crew like yourselves have a taste for biscuits today?
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. greetings! Would a fine W.D. crew like yourselves have a taste for biscuits today?

Original Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! We hope the Corporation isn’t working you too hard. Would you like to purchase some biscuits today?
Translated Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! We hope the Corporation isn’t working you too hard. Would you like to purchase some biscuits today?

Original Text: Whether you’re a civilian or a space pirate. you’ll probably like biscuits! Would you like to buy something from the Fluffy Biscuit Company?
Translated Text: Whether you’re a civilian or a space pirate. you’ll probably like biscuits! Would you like to buy something from the Fluffy Biscuit Company?

Original Text: Hello. civilians or Gentlemen or whatever you might be! We have some great biscuits for sale today. Would you like to take a look at our ship’s stock?
Translated Text: Hello. civilians or Gentlemen or whatever you might be! We have some great biscuits for sale today. Would you like to take a look at our ship’s stock?

Original Text: Our manager is working to get us access to the W.D. zone. It’d be nice to expand our scope of business a little farther. I’m sure plenty of Wolden-Dorf crews could go for a good biscuit.
Translated Text: Our manager is working to get us access to the W.D. zone. It’d be nice to expand our scope of business a little farther. I’m sure plenty of Wolden-Dorf crews could go for a good biscuit.

Original Text: We have quite a few deliveries to make. so we should be on our way soon. If you want to avoid plunging to the bottom of the scoreboard. you should get back to work yourselves.
Translated Text: We have quite a few deliveries to make. so we should be on our way soon. If you want to avoid plunging to the bottom of the scoreboard. you should get back to work yourselves.

Original Text: Deliveries have gotten more difficult with all the chaos in the galaxy as of late. Be careful on your travels.
Translated Text: Deliveries have gotten more difficult with all the chaos in the galaxy as of late. Be careful on your travels.

Original Text: You won’t get ahead of us on the scoreboards.
Translated Text: You won’t get ahead of us on the scoreboards.

Original Text: How are your sales? You’re not in the lead. are you?
Translated Text: How are your sales? You’re not in the lead. are you?

Original Text: Greetings. How have your deliveries been going. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?
Translated Text: Greetings. How have your deliveries been going. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]?

Original Text: Hello to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are you headed back to a station to restock?
Translated Text: Hello to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are you headed back to a station to restock?

Original Text: We aren’t permitted to converse about anything other than biscuits while on the job. Apologies. and have a good day!
Translated Text: We aren’t permitted to converse about anything other than biscuits while on the job. Apologies. and have a good day!

Original Text: We’re always happy to make a sale!
Translated Text: We’re always happy to make a sale!

Original Text: What would you like? I’m sure we have what you’re looking for!
Translated Text: What would you like? I’m sure we have what you’re looking for!

Original Text: From the bottoms of our buttery hearts. we thank you for considering the Fluffy Biscuit Company for your nutritional needs.
Translated Text: From the bottoms of our buttery hearts. we thank you for considering the Fluffy Biscuit Company for your nutritional needs.

Original Text: Please take a look at what we have to offer!
Translated Text: Please take a look at what we have to offer!

Original Text: Don’t fire. don’t fire! We’ll give you the credits!
Translated Text: Don’t fire. don’t fire! We’ll give you the credits!

Original Text: Okay. don’t fire! I’m sure we can whip up some special deals for you! You want credits? Take them!
Translated Text: Okay. don’t fire! I’m sure we can whip up some special deals for you! You want credits? Take them!

Original Text: We are employees of the Fluffy Biscuit Company. and we can’t be shaken by threats.
Translated Text: We are employees of the Fluffy Biscuit Company. and we can’t be shaken by threats.

Original Text: Just because we serve biscuits doesn’t mean we can’t fend for ourselves.
Translated Text: Just because we serve biscuits doesn’t mean we can’t fend for ourselves.

Original Text: We have a job to do. If we cowered in fear at every threatening ship that came our way. do you think we’d get any work done?
Translated Text: We have a job to do. If we cowered in fear at every threatening ship that came our way. do you think we’d get any work done?

Original Text: We refuse. The only free goods we offer are samplers.
Translated Text: We refuse. The only free goods we offer are samplers.

Original Text: Don’t fire. don’t fire! We’ll give you the fuel!
Translated Text: Don’t fire. don’t fire! We’ll give you the fuel!

Original Text: Okay. don’t fire! I’m sure we can whip up some special deals for you! You want fuel capsules? Take them!
Translated Text: Okay. don’t fire! I’m sure we can whip up some special deals for you! You want fuel capsules? Take them!

Original Text: Hello. hello. hello! It’s wonderful to come across Colonial Union officers out here! Can we tempt you with some delectable biscuits?
Translated Text: Hello. hello. hello! It’s wonderful to come across Colonial Union officers out here! Can we tempt you with some delectable biscuits?

Original Text: Greetings. space travelers! We have some special deals to butter you up. What can we get for you?
Translated Text: Greetings. space travelers! We have some special deals to butter you up. What can we get for you?

Original Text: Welcome! We are the Fluffy Biscuit Company. dedicated to serving you the highest quality baked goods in the galaxy! How may we help you?
Translated Text: Welcome! We are the Fluffy Biscuit Company. dedicated to serving you the highest quality baked goods in the galaxy! How may we help you?

Original Text: Biscuits for sale! Take look at our stock and see them for yourself!
Translated Text: Biscuits for sale! Take look at our stock and see them for yourself!

Original Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company! How would you like to try some of our delectable biscuits?
Translated Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company! How would you like to try some of our delectable biscuits?

Original Text: You W.D. crews work yourselves too hard! Why don’t you buy yourselves some biscuits and take a well-deserved break?
Translated Text: You W.D. crews work yourselves too hard! Why don’t you buy yourselves some biscuits and take a well-deserved break?

Original Text: It’s always a pleasure to come across W.D. crews! Would you like to try some of our specials?
Translated Text: It’s always a pleasure to come across W.D. crews! Would you like to try some of our specials?

Original Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! You’re lucky—our ship was fully stocked only a few hours ago! Would you be interested in purchasing some fresh biscuits? They might still be warm!
Translated Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! You’re lucky—our ship was fully stocked only a few hours ago! Would you be interested in purchasing some fresh biscuits? They might still be warm!

Original Text: We don’t share our sales secrets with competitors. Get lost.
Translated Text: We don’t share our sales secrets with competitors. Get lost.

Original Text: You want to talk? Find an automated sales unit. You’ll get more out of them than you will from us.
Translated Text: You want to talk? Find an automated sales unit. You’ll get more out of them than you will from us.

Original Text: You’re a fierce competitor. We can admire that.
Translated Text: You’re a fierce competitor. We can admire that.

Original Text: Prepare to be reported to management.
Translated Text: Prepare to be reported to management.

Original Text: You won’t get anywhere near our hard-earned credits.
Translated Text: You won’t get anywhere near our hard-earned credits.

Original Text: How dare you threaten us! We’re supposed to threaten you!
Translated Text: How dare you threaten us! We’re supposed to threaten you!

Original Text: You won’t get anywhere near our precious fuel capsules.
Translated Text: You won’t get anywhere near our precious fuel capsules.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. get out of our delivery zone. We refuse to lose customers to you.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. get out of our delivery zone. We refuse to lose customers to you.

Original Text: We got here first. so this is part our delivery route. Get out of here and find another sector to travel through.
Translated Text: We got here first. so this is part our delivery route. Get out of here and find another sector to travel through.

Original Text: Ah. look who it is. The competition. You’d better find another sector to do business in. or we’ll find a reason to deploy our biscuit bomb.
Translated Text: Ah. look who it is. The competition. You’d better find another sector to do business in. or we’ll find a reason to deploy our biscuit bomb.

Original Text: We work with biscuits so much. we can’t think of anything else to talk about anymore.
Translated Text: We work with biscuits so much. we can’t think of anything else to talk about anymore.

Original Text: What kind of biscuits are you looking to buy?
Translated Text: What kind of biscuits are you looking to buy?

Original Text: We hope something appeals to your tastes.
Translated Text: We hope something appeals to your tastes.

Original Text: You can have the credits. no problem! We don’t want to get in a fight.
Translated Text: You can have the credits. no problem! We don’t want to get in a fight.

Original Text: We heartily agree. A few credits aren’t worth our lives. Take them!
Translated Text: We heartily agree. A few credits aren’t worth our lives. Take them!

Original Text: You can have anything you want. Just don’t fire at us!
Translated Text: You can have anything you want. Just don’t fire at us!

Original Text: Our credits are yours! Please. don’t fire.
Translated Text: Our credits are yours! Please. don’t fire.

Original Text: Here. take what you want! We won’t bother you again.
Translated Text: Here. take what you want! We won’t bother you again.

Original Text: We have work to do. Don’t get in the way.
Translated Text: We have work to do. Don’t get in the way.

Original Text: We won’t give you our credits.
Translated Text: We won’t give you our credits.

Original Text: You think just because we sell biscuits we’re pushovers? Try to take our business more seriously in the future.
Translated Text: You think just because we sell biscuits we’re pushovers? Try to take our business more seriously in the future.

Original Text: If you’re trying to scare us into a better discount. it isn’t working. We have a quota to reach.
Translated Text: If you’re trying to scare us into a better discount. it isn’t working. We have a quota to reach.

Original Text: You can have the fuel. no problem! We don’t want to get in a fight.
Translated Text: You can have the fuel. no problem! We don’t want to get in a fight.

Original Text: We heartily agree. A few capsules of fuel aren’t worth our lives. Take them!
Translated Text: We heartily agree. A few capsules of fuel aren’t worth our lives. Take them!

Original Text: Our fuel capsules are yours! Please. don’t fire.
Translated Text: Our fuel capsules are yours! Please. don’t fire.

Original Text: We won’t give you our fuel.
Translated Text: We won’t give you our fuel.

Original Text: Hello. officers. Are you interested in buying some biscuits?
Translated Text: Hello. officers. Are you interested in buying some biscuits?

Original Text: Officers. greetings. We have biscuits for sale. if you’d like to buy any.
Translated Text: Officers. greetings. We have biscuits for sale. if you’d like to buy any.

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Do you want to place an order for biscuits. officers?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Do you want to place an order for biscuits. officers?

Original Text: We’re from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. the leading food delivery service fifty Union-standard years in a row. What can we get you?
Translated Text: We’re from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. the leading food delivery service fifty Union-standard years in a row. What can we get you?

Original Text: Fluffy Biscuit Co. How may we serve?
Translated Text: Fluffy Biscuit Co. How may we serve?

Original Text: This is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. What can we get for you?
Translated Text: This is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. What can we get for you?

Original Text: Greetings. If you want biscuits. we can help. Take a look at our specials.
Translated Text: Greetings. If you want biscuits. we can help. Take a look at our specials.

Original Text: [SHIP_NAME] to [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We’re selling biscuits. Check out our stock if you’re interested.
Translated Text: [SHIP_NAME] to [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We’re selling biscuits. Check out our stock if you’re interested.

Original Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We have fresh biscuits. Care to buy any?
Translated Text: Greetings to the crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. We have fresh biscuits. Care to buy any?

Original Text: Greetings. W.D. unit. Do you want biscuits?
Translated Text: Greetings. W.D. unit. Do you want biscuits?

Original Text: This is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. We’re obliged to offer you biscuits. Do you want to purchase any or not?
Translated Text: This is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. We’re obliged to offer you biscuits. Do you want to purchase any or not?

Original Text: You’re not part of the Alliance are you? Well. even Gentlemen have to eat. right? Would you like some biscuits?
Translated Text: You’re not part of the Alliance are you? Well. even Gentlemen have to eat. right? Would you like some biscuits?

Original Text: …We’ll make this clear right now: we’re not looking for a fight. We’re just here to sell biscuits. Do you want to buy any?
Translated Text: …We’ll make this clear right now: we’re not looking for a fight. We’re just here to sell biscuits. Do you want to buy any?

Original Text: Ever wonder why automated sales bots end all their sentences with ‘yes’? Supposedly. the positivity they exude is more likely to be reciprocated by a customer. We might try it for our next sale.
Translated Text: Ever wonder why automated sales bots end all their sentences with ‘yes’? Supposedly. the positivity they exude is more likely to be reciprocated by a customer. We might try it for our next sale.

Original Text: Have you heard about the robot delivery crew that’s competing against us? Supposedly. some higher-ups in the Fluffy Biscuit Company added them to the competition as an experiment. They wanted to see if automated sales units would be more efficient at selling biscuits. Judging by their position on the scoreboard. I’d say they’re doing a good job. They might even replace us someday.
Translated Text: Have you heard about the robot delivery crew that’s competing against us? Supposedly. some higher-ups in the Fluffy Biscuit Company added them to the competition as an experiment. They wanted to see if automated sales units would be more efficient at selling biscuits. Judging by their position on the scoreboard. I’d say they’re doing a good job. They might even replace us someday.

Original Text: Management told us our sales were inadequate last quarter. We’re going to try harder this time around.
Translated Text: Management told us our sales were inadequate last quarter. We’re going to try harder this time around.

Original Text: We don’t want to fight a fellow Fluffy Biscuit ship. You can take our credits. Let’s not fire any turrets. all right?
Translated Text: We don’t want to fight a fellow Fluffy Biscuit ship. You can take our credits. Let’s not fire any turrets. all right?

Original Text: You’re despicable. you know that? No. we won’t let you extort us.
Translated Text: You’re despicable. you know that? No. we won’t let you extort us.

Original Text: This competition is bringing out the worst in all of you.
Translated Text: This competition is bringing out the worst in all of you.

Original Text: We don’t want to fight a fellow Fluffy Biscuit ship. You can take our fuel. Let’s not fire any turrets. all right?
Translated Text: We don’t want to fight a fellow Fluffy Biscuit ship. You can take our fuel. Let’s not fire any turrets. all right?

Original Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Do you need something from us? Or can we get back to our deliveries?
Translated Text: This is [SHIP_NAME]. Do you need something from us? Or can we get back to our deliveries?

Original Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. How are you faring in the competition?
Translated Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. How are you faring in the competition?

Original Text: Everyone is always in such a rush in this galaxy. It’s nice to see that someone still appreciates a good chat over ship-to-ship comms.
Translated Text: Everyone is always in such a rush in this galaxy. It’s nice to see that someone still appreciates a good chat over ship-to-ship comms.

Original Text: You want to buy biscuits? That’s fantastic! What can we get for you?
Translated Text: You want to buy biscuits? That’s fantastic! What can we get for you?

Original Text: Okay. you can have the credits! We aren’t looking for trouble.
Translated Text: Okay. you can have the credits! We aren’t looking for trouble.

Original Text: As Fluffy Biscuit employees. we will not give up our credits to criminals.
Translated Text: As Fluffy Biscuit employees. we will not give up our credits to criminals.

Original Text: Okay. you can have the fuel! We aren’t looking for trouble.
Translated Text: Okay. you can have the fuel! We aren’t looking for trouble.

Original Text: As Fluffy Biscuit employees. we will not give up our fuel to criminals.
Translated Text: As Fluffy Biscuit employees. we will not give up our fuel to criminals.

Original Text: Hello. officers. We didn’t notice you there. Do you want to buy some biscuits?
Translated Text: Hello. officers. We didn’t notice you there. Do you want to buy some biscuits?

Original Text: Someone from the W.D. Corporation is hailing us? Do you need something? Oh. are you looking to buy biscuits? We have plenty of those.
Translated Text: Someone from the W.D. Corporation is hailing us? Do you need something? Oh. are you looking to buy biscuits? We have plenty of those.

Original Text: Yes. this is the [SHIP_NAME]. Did you hail us to purchase some biscuits? Or is there something else you need?
Translated Text: Yes. this is the [SHIP_NAME]. Did you hail us to purchase some biscuits? Or is there something else you need?

Original Text: The Fluffy Biscuit competition might be fierce. but you shouldn’t resort to extorting your fellow employees.
Translated Text: The Fluffy Biscuit competition might be fierce. but you shouldn’t resort to extorting your fellow employees.

Original Text: Hello. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are your deliveries going well? Our luck fluctuates. but we think we can hold our own in the competition. In any case. is there something you need?
Translated Text: Hello. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Are your deliveries going well? Our luck fluctuates. but we think we can hold our own in the competition. In any case. is there something you need?

Original Text: If you aren’t satisfied with your biscuit delivery. feel free to contact our customer service at one of the Fluffy Biscuit facilities across the galaxy. They would be more than happy to correct any problems you may have experienced.
Translated Text: If you aren’t satisfied with your biscuit delivery. feel free to contact our customer service at one of the Fluffy Biscuit facilities across the galaxy. They would be more than happy to correct any problems you may have experienced.

Original Text: We’re happy to sell. What sort of biscuits are you interested in?
Translated Text: We’re happy to sell. What sort of biscuits are you interested in?

Original Text: The Fluffy Biscuit Company and we as the crew of [SHIP_NAME] are pleased to do business with you. Let us know if there’s anything you need.
Translated Text: The Fluffy Biscuit Company and we as the crew of [SHIP_NAME] are pleased to do business with you. Let us know if there’s anything you need.

Original Text: Please don’t hurt us! You can have whatever you want!
Translated Text: Please don’t hurt us! You can have whatever you want!

Original Text: This is where we draw the line. You cannot get away with threatening our delivery vessels.
Translated Text: This is where we draw the line. You cannot get away with threatening our delivery vessels.

Original Text: Please don’t hurt us! You can have whatever you want!
Translated Text: Please don’t hurt us! You can have whatever you want!

Original Text: Greetings! This is [SHIP_NAME] from the Fluffy Biscuit Company! It’s always a pleasure to run into Colonial Union officers. If you would like to buy some biscuits for those long treks of yours. please let us know! We’d be happy to send some to your ship.
Translated Text: Greetings! This is [SHIP_NAME] from the Fluffy Biscuit Company! It’s always a pleasure to run into Colonial Union officers. If you would like to buy some biscuits for those long treks of yours. please let us know! We’d be happy to send some to your ship.

Original Text: Hello to the W.D. Corporation! If you’re in the mood for biscuits. please take a look at our stock and see if anything interests you!
Translated Text: Hello to the W.D. Corporation! If you’re in the mood for biscuits. please take a look at our stock and see if anything interests you!

Original Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company! Would you like to buy some biscuits?
Translated Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company! Would you like to buy some biscuits?

Original Text: We don’t have time to chat. But please. by all means. continue wasting your own time. You’re doing the rest of us a favor.
Translated Text: We don’t have time to chat. But please. by all means. continue wasting your own time. You’re doing the rest of us a favor.

Original Text: Please don’t hurt us! You can have whatever you want! We’ve worked too hard to get scratched from the Fluffy Biscuit scoreboard!
Translated Text: Please don’t hurt us! You can have whatever you want! We’ve worked too hard to get scratched from the Fluffy Biscuit scoreboard!

Original Text: We refuse to agree to that. Seeing as you’ve become fiercer competition. it’s best we put an end to your threats.
Translated Text: We refuse to agree to that. Seeing as you’ve become fiercer competition. it’s best we put an end to your threats.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. this is [SHIP_NAME]. If you interfere with our business. we’ll wipe you off the Fluffy Biscuit scoreboard. Get out of this sector.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. this is [SHIP_NAME]. If you interfere with our business. we’ll wipe you off the Fluffy Biscuit scoreboard. Get out of this sector.

Original Text: The galaxy is on the verge of great chaos. Even we will admit. our deliveries have gotten more difficult to complete. I can’t imagine what the rest of you must face on a regular basis. Please know that if you ever need a reprieve. our biscuits are never too far away. Take care of yourselves.
Translated Text: The galaxy is on the verge of great chaos. Even we will admit. our deliveries have gotten more difficult to complete. I can’t imagine what the rest of you must face on a regular basis. Please know that if you ever need a reprieve. our biscuits are never too far away. Take care of yourselves.

Original Text: Wonderful! Please have a look at our selection.
Translated Text: Wonderful! Please have a look at our selection.

Original Text: You can take our credits. They aren’t worth a fight. Just take care of yourselves now.
Translated Text: You can take our credits. They aren’t worth a fight. Just take care of yourselves now.

Original Text: Most members of our crew have been working for the Fluffy Biscuit Company for over two Union-standard decades. We don’t submit to threats. and we don’t oblige criminals. Get your act together and contribute to this galaxy instead of tearing it down.
Translated Text: Most members of our crew have been working for the Fluffy Biscuit Company for over two Union-standard decades. We don’t submit to threats. and we don’t oblige criminals. Get your act together and contribute to this galaxy instead of tearing it down.

Original Text: You can take our fuel capsules. They aren’t worth a fight. Just take care of yourselves now.
Translated Text: You can take our fuel capsules. They aren’t worth a fight. Just take care of yourselves now.

Original Text: Greetings to you fine Colonial Union officers! The Fluffy Biscuit Company thanks you for your hard work. How can we help you today? Would a few freshly baked biscuits appeal to you?
Translated Text: Greetings to you fine Colonial Union officers! The Fluffy Biscuit Company thanks you for your hard work. How can we help you today? Would a few freshly baked biscuits appeal to you?

Original Text: Hello. this is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. If any of you fine W.D. employees are interested in buying biscuits. we would be pleased to do business with you.
Translated Text: Hello. this is Fluffy Biscuit delivery vessel [SHIP_NAME]. If any of you fine W.D. employees are interested in buying biscuits. we would be pleased to do business with you.

Original Text: Crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we want to extend our warmest greetings to you. Would you like to browse our ship’s selection of biscuit flavors?
Translated Text: Crew of [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we want to extend our warmest greetings to you. Would you like to browse our ship’s selection of biscuit flavors?

Original Text: It’s not about the sales numbers. It’s about the smiles. Seek to bring happiness with each of your deliveries. and the pressure of the sales scoreboard will no longer matter.
Translated Text: It’s not about the sales numbers. It’s about the smiles. Seek to bring happiness with each of your deliveries. and the pressure of the sales scoreboard will no longer matter.

Original Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. This is the [SHIP_NAME]. How have you been faring? I know the galaxy has been growing wilder as of late. but stay determined. If we stick together and get our biscuits to where they need to go. we can overcome anything.
Translated Text: Greetings. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. This is the [SHIP_NAME]. How have you been faring? I know the galaxy has been growing wilder as of late. but stay determined. If we stick together and get our biscuits to where they need to go. we can overcome anything.

Original Text: We are programmed to engage in small talk to promote customer comfort and satisfaction in our service. That was small talk.
Translated Text: We are programmed to engage in small talk to promote customer comfort and satisfaction in our service. That was small talk.

Original Text: We have many great selections yes.
Translated Text: We have many great selections yes.

Original Text: Please take your time browsing the stock yes.
Translated Text: Please take your time browsing the stock yes.

Original Text: Thank you for considering biscuits as your food option yes.
Translated Text: Thank you for considering biscuits as your food option yes.

Original Text: We are not programmed to submit to threatening language.
Translated Text: We are not programmed to submit to threatening language.

Original Text: Greetings. The Fluffy Biscuit Company commends you Colonial Union officers for your service to the galaxy. Please purchase some biscuits yes.
Translated Text: Greetings. The Fluffy Biscuit Company commends you Colonial Union officers for your service to the galaxy. Please purchase some biscuits yes.

Original Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. After five Union-standard years of friction between our two businesses. Wolden-Dorf Corporation crews are now again authorized to purchase biscuits. Please purchase some biscuits yes.
Translated Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. After five Union-standard years of friction between our two businesses. Wolden-Dorf Corporation crews are now again authorized to purchase biscuits. Please purchase some biscuits yes.

Original Text: We are not programmed to submit to threatening language.
Translated Text: We are not programmed to submit to threatening language.

Original Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. Please purchase some biscuits yes.
Translated Text: Greetings from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. Please purchase some biscuits yes.

Original Text: If you have any concerns. please contact the nearest Fluffy Biscuit facility. We are not authorized to assist you.
Translated Text: If you have any concerns. please contact the nearest Fluffy Biscuit facility. We are not authorized to assist you.

Original Text: Greetings. The Fluffy Biscuit Company promotes cooperation and friendly competition between its crews. Good luck with your deliveries. May you sell many biscuits. But not as many as us.
Translated Text: Greetings. The Fluffy Biscuit Company promotes cooperation and friendly competition between its crews. Good luck with your deliveries. May you sell many biscuits. But not as many as us.

Original Text: Did you know that each Fluffy Biscuit ship has its own biscuit producing station? The biscuits don’t taste as good as the ones made in the factories. but they’re just as nutritious. We had no idea Fluffy Biscuit employees could make their own biscuits until we…acquired this ship…by completely legal means.
Translated Text: Did you know that each Fluffy Biscuit ship has its own biscuit producing station? The biscuits don’t taste as good as the ones made in the factories. but they’re just as nutritious. We had no idea Fluffy Biscuit employees could make their own biscuits until we…acquired this ship…by completely legal means.

Original Text: You want to buy biscuits? That’s great! Here. we’ll…uh…send you some information about what we have in stock. <size=8>How do you do that again?</size>
Translated Text: You want to buy biscuits? That’s great! Here. we’ll…uh…send you some information about what we have in stock. <size=8>How do you do that again?</size>

Original Text: Calm down. we’ll give you the credits! There’s no need to pick a fight with us.
Translated Text: Calm down. we’ll give you the credits! There’s no need to pick a fight with us.

Original Text: We might look like any old Fluffy Biscuit crew. but don’t underestimate us.
Translated Text: We might look like any old Fluffy Biscuit crew. but don’t underestimate us.

Original Text: Calm down. we’ll give you the fuel! There’s no need to pick a fight with us.
Translated Text: Calm down. we’ll give you the fuel! There’s no need to pick a fight with us.

Original Text: Oh… Hello. officers. Nice day. isn’t it? <size=6>Are those Colonial Union officers? Do you think they’re on to us?</size> <size=8>Keep quiet. will you?!</size> Would you like to see the biscuits we have in stock? We have plenty of great flavors. Like…<size=8>What’s that red one over there? Hand it to me!</size>…uh…the Classic! Can’t beat the classic. right? So what will it be?
Translated Text: Oh… Hello. officers. Nice day. isn’t it? <size=6>Are those Colonial Union officers? Do you think they’re on to us?</size> <size=8>Keep quiet. will you?!</size> Would you like to see the biscuits we have in stock? We have plenty of great flavors. Like…<size=8>What’s that red one over there? Hand it to me!</size>…uh…the Classic! Can’t beat the classic. right? So what will it be?

Original Text: Greetings. W.D. ship. We’re from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. <size=6>Way to state the obvious.</size> Would you like to buy some biscuits today? They’re fresh. <size=8>I think.</size>
Translated Text: Greetings. W.D. ship. We’re from the Fluffy Biscuit Company. <size=6>Way to state the obvious.</size> Would you like to buy some biscuits today? They’re fresh. <size=8>I think.</size>

Original Text: Did you know that each Fluffy Biscuit ship has its own biscuit producing station? The biscuits don’t taste as good as the ones made in the factories. but they’re just as nutritious. We had no idea Fluffy Biscuit employees could make their own biscuits until we took over this ship.
Translated Text: Did you know that each Fluffy Biscuit ship has its own biscuit producing station? The biscuits don’t taste as good as the ones made in the factories. but they’re just as nutritious. We had no idea Fluffy Biscuit employees could make their own biscuits until we took over this ship.

Original Text: Don’t underestimate us just because we fly in a Fluffy Biscuit ship.
Translated Text: Don’t underestimate us just because we fly in a Fluffy Biscuit ship.

Original Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we can tell you’re from the Alliance of Gentlemen. So are we. We stole this ship first. so keep your hands off it. Now do you want to buy biscuits? We have a ton of them. and if we don’t want our ship to get flagged. we have to keep up with sales.
Translated Text: [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. we can tell you’re from the Alliance of Gentlemen. So are we. We stole this ship first. so keep your hands off it. Now do you want to buy biscuits? We have a ton of them. and if we don’t want our ship to get flagged. we have to keep up with sales.

Original Text: Hello…fellow…Fluffy Biscuit ship. Have you been…selling lots of biscuits? <size=6>That’s a Fluffy Biscuit vessel?! Why are they hailing us? They must know about our ship. It’s only a matter of time before they pelt us with biscuit bombs or something!</size> <size=8>Stop making a fuss! They don’t know anything!</size> So the scoreboards have been pretty wild. right? What rank are you?
Translated Text: Hello…fellow…Fluffy Biscuit ship. Have you been…selling lots of biscuits? <size=6>That’s a Fluffy Biscuit vessel?! Why are they hailing us? They must know about our ship. It’s only a matter of time before they pelt us with biscuit bombs or something!</size> <size=8>Stop making a fuss! They don’t know anything!</size> So the scoreboards have been pretty wild. right? What rank are you?

Original Text: Glad to—chhht—business with you! Take a—chhht—ook at our stock!
Translated Text: Glad to—chhht—business with you! Take a—chhht—ook at our stock!

Original Text: Okay. fine. we’ll give you our credits! Please don’t pick a fight with us. We still have a lot of deliveries to complete!
Translated Text: Okay. fine. we’ll give you our credits! Please don’t pick a fight with us. We still have a lot of deliveries to complete!

Original Text: Okay. fine. we’ll give you our fuel! Please don’t pick a fight with us. We still have a lot of deliveries to complete!
Translated Text: Okay. fine. we’ll give you our fuel! Please don’t pick a fight with us. We still have a lot of deliveries to complete!

Original Text: It can be difficult selling biscuits to people in this galaxy. We’ve had to get creative with our sales tactics. You should try out some unusual strategies yourselves. You never know what might work!
Translated Text: It can be difficult selling biscuits to people in this galaxy. We’ve had to get creative with our sales tactics. You should try out some unusual strategies yourselves. You never know what might work!

Original Text: Sorry—chhht—our comms are—chhht—out! Chhhht—can’t hear you!
Translated Text: Sorry—chhht—our comms are—chhht—out! Chhhht—can’t hear you!

Original Text: Oh. hello. We didn’t expect to come across another Fluffy Biscuit ship out this way. How is the delivery business treating you?
Translated Text: Oh. hello. We didn’t expect to come across another Fluffy Biscuit ship out this way. How is the delivery business treating you?

Original Text: Deliveries to planets are always exciting. It’s a nice break from the ship.
Translated Text: Deliveries to planets are always exciting. It’s a nice break from the ship.

Original Text: We can’t help sneaking a few carrot cake biscuits out of the crates. They’re so tasty.
Translated Text: We can’t help sneaking a few carrot cake biscuits out of the crates. They’re so tasty.

Original Text: We’re doing quite well. What a surprise! Good luck to the rest of you.
Translated Text: We’re doing quite well. What a surprise! Good luck to the rest of you.

Original Text: Just got interviewed by Galactic Science. Check it out in their next issue.
Translated Text: Just got interviewed by Galactic Science. Check it out in their next issue.

Original Text: Here’s a tip: Give up. You’ll never sell enough to beat us.
Translated Text: Here’s a tip: Give up. You’ll never sell enough to beat us.

Original Text: We’re at the top of the charts. right where we should be.
Translated Text: We’re at the top of the charts. right where we should be.

Original Text: Just scored another catering deal. Enjoy selling your meager handfuls of biscuits.
Translated Text: Just scored another catering deal. Enjoy selling your meager handfuls of biscuits.

Original Text: How did we fall to the bottom of the list?!
Translated Text: How did we fall to the bottom of the list?!

Original Text: Good luck on the deliveries. everyone.
Translated Text: Good luck on the deliveries. everyone.

Original Text: Pleasure serving biscuits with you all.
Translated Text: Pleasure serving biscuits with you all.

Original Text: Stay positive and serve with a smile.
Translated Text: Stay positive and serve with a smile.

Original Text: Remember. it isn’t always about the sales numbers.
Translated Text: Remember. it isn’t always about the sales numbers.

Original Text: Remember to periodically restock on biscuit crates at your nearest facility.
Translated Text: Remember to periodically restock on biscuit crates at your nearest facility.

Original Text: Does this show up on other ships? Can someone read this?
Translated Text: Does this show up on other ships? Can someone read this?

Original Text: Where do you go to restock on biscuits again?
Translated Text: Where do you go to restock on biscuits again?

Original Text: Why are we supposed to steer clear of Cornelia Station?
Translated Text: Why are we supposed to steer clear of Cornelia Station?

Original Text: We’re getting the hang of this.
Translated Text: We’re getting the hang of this.

Original Text: We never knew it could be so challenging to work for Fluffy Biscuit Co.
Translated Text: We never knew it could be so challenging to work for Fluffy Biscuit Co.

Original Text: Well. it’s been nice chatting with you all.
Translated Text: Well. it’s been nice chatting with you all.

Original Text: Just stocked up on more biscuits.
Translated Text: Just stocked up on more biscuits.

Original Text: To think our manager never had any confidence in us.
Translated Text: To think our manager never had any confidence in us.

Original Text: The rest of you don’t stand a chance against us.
Translated Text: The rest of you don’t stand a chance against us.

Original Text: We lost 12 crates in a Gentlemen raid…
Translated Text: We lost 12 crates in a Gentlemen raid…

Original Text: How are you all selling so much?!
Translated Text: How are you all selling so much?!

Original Text: Are we sure there enough people in the galaxy to sell all these biscuits to?
Translated Text: Are we sure there enough people in the galaxy to sell all these biscuits to?

Original Text: Why won’t people buy our biscuits?
Translated Text: Why won’t people buy our biscuits?

Original Text: On the bottom of the list. but there’s still time!
Translated Text: On the bottom of the list. but there’s still time!

Original Text: We couldn’t win even if we tried.
Translated Text: We couldn’t win even if we tried.

Original Text: Turns out phase drones aren’t interested in biscuits. Who knew!
Translated Text: Turns out phase drones aren’t interested in biscuits. Who knew!

Original Text: We could really use a lucky biscuit recipe module right now. We need the help.
Translated Text: We could really use a lucky biscuit recipe module right now. We need the help.

Original Text: Selling to the W.D. Corporation is never fun.
Translated Text: Selling to the W.D. Corporation is never fun.

Original Text: Good luck to anyone selling in the neutral zone.
Translated Text: Good luck to anyone selling in the neutral zone.

Original Text: Someone ordered biscuits three times in a row. We’re tired of turning around.
Translated Text: Someone ordered biscuits three times in a row. We’re tired of turning around.

Original Text: I heard that the Fluffy Biscuit delivery ships were reoutfitted from garbage haulers.
Translated Text: I heard that the Fluffy Biscuit delivery ships were reoutfitted from garbage haulers.

Original Text: Just tried out a new recipe module. Crumbly all the way.
Translated Text: Just tried out a new recipe module. Crumbly all the way.

Original Text: Do any of you guys wear the company-mandated hats?
Translated Text: Do any of you guys wear the company-mandated hats?

Original Text: One of our crewmembers ate too many biscuits at the same time. He’s acting strange.
Translated Text: One of our crewmembers ate too many biscuits at the same time. He’s acting strange.

Original Text: I made my first perfectly cooked biscuit!
Translated Text: I made my first perfectly cooked biscuit!

Original Text: WELCOME TO SPECIAL TRAINING: You have disappointed us. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Your sales have not met the minimum required to remain in the current competition. so you have been selected for replacement. Don’t worry—the gas won’t taint the biscuits. Once you have succumbed. we will pick up your ship and reassign it to a more capable crew who will fulfill the deliveries that you have so irresponsibly neglected. Farewell.
Translated Text: WELCOME TO SPECIAL TRAINING: You have disappointed us. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]. Your sales have not met the minimum required to remain in the current competition. so you have been selected for replacement. Don’t worry—the gas won’t taint the biscuits. Once you have succumbed. we will pick up your ship and reassign it to a more capable crew who will fulfill the deliveries that you have so irresponsibly neglected. Farewell.

Original Text: Congratulations. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! You have won the Fluffy Biscuit Company sales competition! In reward for your hard work and dedication. you will receive the grand prize: celebratory hats! Go ahead and eat a biscuit. You’ve earned it!
Translated Text: Congratulations. [PLAYERSHIP_NAME]! You have won the Fluffy Biscuit Company sales competition! In reward for your hard work and dedication. you will receive the grand prize: celebratory hats! Go ahead and eat a biscuit. You’ve earned it!

Original Text: To all participants of the Fluffy Biscuit Company sales competition: we have a winner! The grand prize has been claimed. and the contest is concluded. As for the rest of you. don’t be disheartened. When it comes to selling biscuits. everyone wins! And there’s always next time…
Translated Text: To all participants of the Fluffy Biscuit Company sales competition: we have a winner! The grand prize has been claimed. and the contest is concluded. As for the rest of you. don’t be disheartened. When it comes to selling biscuits. everyone wins! And there’s always next time…

Original Text: Thank you! Now get rid of those things already. I haven’t been able to sleep for days knowing those creatures are lurking right outside my door! I’ll never rent here again. mark my words.
Translated Text: Thank you! Now get rid of those things already. I haven’t been able to sleep for days knowing those creatures are lurking right outside my door! I’ll never rent here again. mark my words.

Original Text: How rude! Well. if you refuse to help me. then I refuse to review your company’s biscuits. I doubt your manager will be pleased.
Translated Text: How rude! Well. if you refuse to help me. then I refuse to review your company’s biscuits. I doubt your manager will be pleased.

Original Text: Y-you… You’re the ones the Fluffy Biscuit Company sent to cater my party. Thank goodness you’re here! I’m so wrought with nerves. I can’t even eat! It’s…it’s a catastrophe! I was hosting my annual gloom wine tasting event when the creatures in the terrarium burst from their enclosures and started attacking my guests. Everyone left. and the party was an absolute disaster. On top of it all. those animals are still loose in the terrarium. and it’s only a matter of time before they break into this part of the manor. Please. get rid of those creatures! I’ll give your biscuits a much more positive review than I probably would have.
Translated Text: Y-you… You’re the ones the Fluffy Biscuit Company sent to cater my party. Thank goodness you’re here! I’m so wrought with nerves. I can’t even eat! It’s…it’s a catastrophe! I was hosting my annual gloom wine tasting event when the creatures in the terrarium burst from their enclosures and started attacking my guests. Everyone left. and the party was an absolute disaster. On top of it all. those animals are still loose in the terrarium. and it’s only a matter of time before they break into this part of the manor. Please. get rid of those creatures! I’ll give your biscuits a much more positive review than I probably would have.

Original Text: Bravo! Here’s your tip—I trust 3000 credits will suffice. If I order food from your company again. I might just consider requesting you as the delivery crew.
Translated Text: Bravo! Here’s your tip—I trust 3000 credits will suffice. If I order food from your company again. I might just consider requesting you as the delivery crew.

Original Text: Oh. well. that’s wildly unprofessional. The deal was for your company to deliver five crates of biscuits to me. I will not complete this transaction until I get the crates I requested.
Translated Text: Oh. well. that’s wildly unprofessional. The deal was for your company to deliver five crates of biscuits to me. I will not complete this transaction until I get the crates I requested.

Original Text: Thank you! You saved my life! I’ll surely write a review for your company now—a positive one at that. Do you have the five crates of biscuits I ordered? I’d be glad to take them off your hands.
Translated Text: Thank you! You saved my life! I’ll surely write a review for your company now—a positive one at that. Do you have the five crates of biscuits I ordered? I’d be glad to take them off your hands.

Original Text: Did you get rid of those creatures?
Translated Text: Did you get rid of those creatures?

Original Text: You got rid of the creatures? Oh. thank the stars! I thought I was going to be eaten by those dreadful things! I’m thoroughly impressed with your delivery service. I’ll surely write a review for your company—a positive one at that. Now. do you have the five crates of biscuits I ordered? I’d be glad to take them off your hands.
Translated Text: You got rid of the creatures? Oh. thank the stars! I thought I was going to be eaten by those dreadful things! I’m thoroughly impressed with your delivery service. I’ll surely write a review for your company—a positive one at that. Now. do you have the five crates of biscuits I ordered? I’d be glad to take them off your hands.

Original Text: Thank you once again for getting rid of those dreadful creatures. Do you have the five crates of biscuits I ordered? I’d be glad to take them off your hands.
Translated Text: Thank you once again for getting rid of those dreadful creatures. Do you have the five crates of biscuits I ordered? I’d be glad to take them off your hands.

Original Text: As grateful as I am for your help. I also doubt that you have endless free time to spend here at my manor. Off with you! Attend to your deliveries.
Translated Text: As grateful as I am for your help. I also doubt that you have endless free time to spend here at my manor. Off with you! Attend to your deliveries.

Original Text: Wonderful! These should serve as suitable rations for the next few months. I hope it wasn’t too much trouble getting here. This planet can be a tad dangerous on occasion. Excuse my rambling—you must be eager to receive your pay! Here are the credits. and a sizable tip. Do take care on your return journey.
Translated Text: Wonderful! These should serve as suitable rations for the next few months. I hope it wasn’t too much trouble getting here. This planet can be a tad dangerous on occasion. Excuse my rambling—you must be eager to receive your pay! Here are the credits. and a sizable tip. Do take care on your return journey.

Original Text: Ah. the biscuits have arrived! You do have the three crates I requested. yes?
Translated Text: Ah. the biscuits have arrived! You do have the three crates I requested. yes?

Original Text: These biscuits should serve as suitable rations for the next few months. I must thank you for your hard work! Do take care on your return journey.
Translated Text: These biscuits should serve as suitable rations for the next few months. I must thank you for your hard work! Do take care on your return journey.

Original Text: The alien being is still not showing hostility. and it should be safe for you to deliver the crates to it. But please exercise the utmost caution. The last time we entered the vessel. one of our officers may have activated some sort of security system. It released strange flying creatures that do seem to be innately hostile. Equipping ExoSuits. of course. is also a wise idea before setting foot in the vessel. Otherwise. you might have to go through some rather extensive and uncomfortable decontamination procedures. Upon completion of your mission. we will cover the cost of the biscuit crates. The rest is up to you. Good luck. and together. we survive.
Translated Text: The alien being is still not showing hostility. and it should be safe for you to deliver the crates to it. But please exercise the utmost caution. The last time we entered the vessel. one of our officers may have activated some sort of security system. It released strange flying creatures that do seem to be innately hostile. Equipping ExoSuits. of course. is also a wise idea before setting foot in the vessel. Otherwise. you might have to go through some rather extensive and uncomfortable decontamination procedures. Upon completion of your mission. we will cover the cost of the biscuit crates. The rest is up to you. Good luck. and together. we survive.

Original Text: Good. The alien being is still not showing hostility. and it should be safe for you to deliver the crates to it. But please exercise the utmost caution. The last time we entered the vessel. one of our officers may have activated some sort of security system. It released strange flying creatures that seem to be innately hostile. Upon completion of your mission. we will cover the cost of the biscuit crates. The rest is up to you. Good luck. and together. we survive.
Translated Text: Good. The alien being is still not showing hostility. and it should be safe for you to deliver the crates to it. But please exercise the utmost caution. The last time we entered the vessel. one of our officers may have activated some sort of security system. It released strange flying creatures that seem to be innately hostile. Upon completion of your mission. we will cover the cost of the biscuit crates. The rest is up to you. Good luck. and together. we survive.

Original Text: …You don’t have the biscuits? Then what are you doing here? If you aren’t assisting the Colonial Union with this mission. then you need to leave immediately.
Translated Text: …You don’t have the biscuits? Then what are you doing here? If you aren’t assisting the Colonial Union with this mission. then you need to leave immediately.

Original Text: You must be the delivery team. Allow me to brief you on the situation: While we were conducting preliminary surveys of this planet. an alien structure crash-landed close to our base. We received a peculiar transmission—a sort of language—being emitted from within the vessel. Our translators spent days figuring out the message. and what they discovered was surprising—it requested biscuits. And that’s why you’re here. As an attempt to establish peaceful relations with the being inside that vessel. you are going to offer it biscuits. Do you have the eight crates as requested?
Translated Text: You must be the delivery team. Allow me to brief you on the situation: While we were conducting preliminary surveys of this planet. an alien structure crash-landed close to our base. We received a peculiar transmission—a sort of language—being emitted from within the vessel. Our translators spent days figuring out the message. and what they discovered was surprising—it requested biscuits. And that’s why you’re here. As an attempt to establish peaceful relations with the being inside that vessel. you are going to offer it biscuits. Do you have the eight crates as requested?

Original Text: It seems the negotiations went well. We might be off to a good start in forming diplomatic relations with this being. Thank you for assisting the Colonial Union. Here are some extra credits for your work. and I’ll be sure to put in a good word with your manager.
Translated Text: It seems the negotiations went well. We might be off to a good start in forming diplomatic relations with this being. Thank you for assisting the Colonial Union. Here are some extra credits for your work. and I’ll be sure to put in a good word with your manager.

Original Text: We need two parts—a flavor coil and a waste filter. If our original parts aren’t replaced and they fail on us. we won’t be able to produce biscuits that meet company standards. This factory could end up being shut down. just like FB Factory #1204. So please complete this task with haste.
Translated Text: We need two parts—a flavor coil and a waste filter. If our original parts aren’t replaced and they fail on us. we won’t be able to produce biscuits that meet company standards. This factory could end up being shut down. just like FB Factory #1204. So please complete this task with haste.

Original Text: If your concerns lie solely with the sales competition. then you aren’t grasping the severity of what’s at stake here. When this factory fails. one-third of all biscuits produced in this galaxy will be wiped out. When you can wrap your head around those numbers. come back and talk to me. Otherwise. I’ll find someone else to do the job—someone who appreciates the influence a factory manager can have in the sales competition.
Translated Text: If your concerns lie solely with the sales competition. then you aren’t grasping the severity of what’s at stake here. When this factory fails. one-third of all biscuits produced in this galaxy will be wiped out. When you can wrap your head around those numbers. come back and talk to me. Otherwise. I’ll find someone else to do the job—someone who appreciates the influence a factory manager can have in the sales competition.

Original Text: We’ve encountered issues with our machinery. Some vital parts of our factory's systems are breaking down. And since the galaxy has been disconnected from intergalactic warp. we aren’t able to request replacements from the Fluffy Biscuit base hub. I had been mulling over our options for days. when I remembered that there once was a fourth Fluffy Biscuit factory in this galaxy. It was shut down due to a failed experiment in its flavor lab. but it’s quite possible that the abandoned factory contains duplicates of the parts we need. Would you be willing to go to FB Factory #1204 and retrieve those spare parts for me? I’ll reward you for working overtime.
Translated Text: We’ve encountered issues with our machinery. Some vital parts of our factory's systems are breaking down. And since the galaxy has been disconnected from intergalactic warp. we aren’t able to request replacements from the Fluffy Biscuit base hub. I had been mulling over our options for days. when I remembered that there once was a fourth Fluffy Biscuit factory in this galaxy. It was shut down due to a failed experiment in its flavor lab. but it’s quite possible that the abandoned factory contains duplicates of the parts we need. Would you be willing to go to FB Factory #1204 and retrieve those spare parts for me? I’ll reward you for working overtime.

Original Text: What a relief! You’ve done this factory a great service. Thank you. I’ll see that these parts are installed immediately. As promised. your reward: I would like to personally purchase five crates of biscuits from you. I wish you the best of luck in the competition. and I look forward to tracking your progress.
Translated Text: What a relief! You’ve done this factory a great service. Thank you. I’ll see that these parts are installed immediately. As promised. your reward: I would like to personally purchase five crates of biscuits from you. I wish you the best of luck in the competition. and I look forward to tracking your progress.

Original Text: Do you have the spare parts?
Translated Text: Do you have the spare parts?

Original Text: You’ve done this factory a great service. Thank you. I wish you the best of luck in the competition. and I look forward to tracking your progress.
Translated Text: You’ve done this factory a great service. Thank you. I wish you the best of luck in the competition. and I look forward to tracking your progress.

Original Text: Welcome to our facility. I am the manager of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1201. Enjoy the tour. and be sure to pick up a few biscuits for you and your crew mates before you go.
Translated Text: Welcome to our facility. I am the manager of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1201. Enjoy the tour. and be sure to pick up a few biscuits for you and your crew mates before you go.

Original Text: We’re having trouble producing enough biscuits to keep up with all these sales. I don’t know if you delivery agents are just jettisoning your shipments into space or if you’re actually selling this many biscuits. but I’m baffled at how many we need to produce.
Translated Text: We’re having trouble producing enough biscuits to keep up with all these sales. I don’t know if you delivery agents are just jettisoning your shipments into space or if you’re actually selling this many biscuits. but I’m baffled at how many we need to produce.

Original Text: Oh. hello there. Your tour is taking you to all the back rooms of our factory. isn’t it? Well. have a look around. but don’t get any funny ideas. I’m watching you.
Translated Text: Oh. hello there. Your tour is taking you to all the back rooms of our factory. isn’t it? Well. have a look around. but don’t get any funny ideas. I’m watching you.

Original Text: I heard you helped the manager get those spare parts for the factory’s machines. I can’t thank you enough for your help. You’ve made our jobs a lot easier. We don’t have to keep patching up the machinery. and the biscuits taste better for it too. You’re heroes.
Translated Text: I heard you helped the manager get those spare parts for the factory’s machines. I can’t thank you enough for your help. You’ve made our jobs a lot easier. We don’t have to keep patching up the machinery. and the biscuits taste better for it too. You’re heroes.

Original Text: We’ve been having some problems with the equipment. Things keep breaking down on us despite our persistent maintenance. And with the intergalactic warp offline. we can’t simply request replacements. If we lose the machinery. we lose the biscuits. It’s a dire situation.
Translated Text: We’ve been having some problems with the equipment. Things keep breaking down on us despite our persistent maintenance. And with the intergalactic warp offline. we can’t simply request replacements. If we lose the machinery. we lose the biscuits. It’s a dire situation.

Original Text: Sorry. you caught me in the middle of work! This is where we store the biscuit crates that are ready for delivery. It may not look like the most exciting step in the biscuit production line. but it’s a necessary one in getting these delicious biscuits from our factories to you. our valued customers.
