Translated Text: Sorry. you caught me in the middle of work! This is where we store the biscuit crates that are ready for delivery. It may not look like the most exciting step in the biscuit production line. but it’s a necessary one in getting these delicious biscuits from our factories to you. our valued customers.

Original Text: I was newly hired by the Fluffy Biscuit Company just before the intergalactic warp shut down. It’s been an eye opener to see how competitive everyone is here. even for those of us not participating in the sales competition. But I don’t regret applying for this job. We may not be directly contributing to the betterment of the Union or the discovery of the unknown. but I feel like we’re still making a difference. Don’t you?
Translated Text: I was newly hired by the Fluffy Biscuit Company just before the intergalactic warp shut down. It’s been an eye opener to see how competitive everyone is here. even for those of us not participating in the sales competition. But I don’t regret applying for this job. We may not be directly contributing to the betterment of the Union or the discovery of the unknown. but I feel like we’re still making a difference. Don’t you?

Original Text: Greetings! We’re happy to have visitors to our factories. Have fun touring the facility!
Translated Text: Greetings! We’re happy to have visitors to our factories. Have fun touring the facility!

Original Text: Hey. How are the deliveries going? Not too troublesome. I hope. The manager of Factory #1202 is out right now. along with several other employees. so I’m keeping eye on the facility while they’re gone. Let me know if you need anything.
Translated Text: Hey. How are the deliveries going? Not too troublesome. I hope. The manager of Factory #1202 is out right now. along with several other employees. so I’m keeping eye on the facility while they’re gone. Let me know if you need anything.

Original Text: Apologies. our usual visitor greeter is out right now. so you’ll have to deal with me instead. Welcome to Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1202! Feel free to take a look around. And if you’re interested in purchasing some biscuits. I can certainly help you out.
Translated Text: Apologies. our usual visitor greeter is out right now. so you’ll have to deal with me instead. Welcome to Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1202! Feel free to take a look around. And if you’re interested in purchasing some biscuits. I can certainly help you out.

Original Text: It can be challenging to sell biscuits. Not everyone in the galaxy is friendly. One wrong word. and the next minute turrets are being fired at your ship. I suppose we delivery agents have to be skilled at inter-ship communication.
Translated Text: It can be challenging to sell biscuits. Not everyone in the galaxy is friendly. One wrong word. and the next minute turrets are being fired at your ship. I suppose we delivery agents have to be skilled at inter-ship communication.

Original Text: Sorry. can’t talk right now. We’re very busy. New flavors don’t invent themselves. Often.
Translated Text: Sorry. can’t talk right now. We’re very busy. New flavors don’t invent themselves. Often.

Original Text: Another visitor. Snooping around our factory. are you? Well. I hope it thoroughly improves your appreciation of biscuits.
Translated Text: Another visitor. Snooping around our factory. are you? Well. I hope it thoroughly improves your appreciation of biscuits.

Original Text: They wanted me to check one of the waste pipes for blockage. I’ve been down here for so long trying to find the right one. now I think I’m gonna be sick.
Translated Text: They wanted me to check one of the waste pipes for blockage. I’ve been down here for so long trying to find the right one. now I think I’m gonna be sick.

Original Text: We’re severely understaffed. We’ve been working for several days straight to get these deliveries in order. and there’s no end in sight. Do people really eat this many biscuits out here?
Translated Text: We’re severely understaffed. We’ve been working for several days straight to get these deliveries in order. and there’s no end in sight. Do people really eat this many biscuits out here?

Original Text: Hello there. valued customer! Welcome to our storage bay! Bet you’ve never seen so many crates of biscuits in one place. right? Is your mouth watering yet?
Translated Text: Hello there. valued customer! Welcome to our storage bay! Bet you’ve never seen so many crates of biscuits in one place. right? Is your mouth watering yet?

Original Text: Welcome to the Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1202 Flavor Lab. You may freely look around. but please do not touch anything. There are delicate experiments in progress.
Translated Text: Welcome to the Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1202 Flavor Lab. You may freely look around. but please do not touch anything. There are delicate experiments in progress.

Original Text: Greetings. It is an honor to meet one of the participants in the biscuit sales competition. Biscuit Buddy XL 905 was secretly rooting for Necessary Nutritions. but perhaps you would be a more intriguing crew to bet on. Good luck. yes.
Translated Text: Greetings. It is an honor to meet one of the participants in the biscuit sales competition. Biscuit Buddy XL 905 was secretly rooting for Necessary Nutritions. but perhaps you would be a more intriguing crew to bet on. Good luck. yes.

Original Text: Greetings. Please enjoy your tour of the facility.
Translated Text: Greetings. Please enjoy your tour of the facility.

Original Text: Thank the stars you’re not another visitor. I can’t keep smiling all day. My face is exhausted.
Translated Text: Thank the stars you’re not another visitor. I can’t keep smiling all day. My face is exhausted.

Original Text: Welcome to Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1203! If you’re interested in buying some freshly made biscuits. speak to Amit Zino right over there. He runs our facility’s biscuit shop. We hope you have a memorable experience touring the factory!
Translated Text: Welcome to Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1203! If you’re interested in buying some freshly made biscuits. speak to Amit Zino right over there. He runs our facility’s biscuit shop. We hope you have a memorable experience touring the factory!

Original Text: Be careful out there. Make sure you steer clear of suspicious ships. We don’t want to hear about any more of our delivery crews going missing.
Translated Text: Be careful out there. Make sure you steer clear of suspicious ships. We don’t want to hear about any more of our delivery crews going missing.

Original Text: Greetings. I am the manager of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1203. It’s a pleasure to meet you. Now. this window overlooks our packaging line. Biscuits are fed through those machines. from where they come out perfectly wrapped and ready to be packed into crates. It’s rather mesmerizing. isn’t it?
Translated Text: Greetings. I am the manager of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1203. It’s a pleasure to meet you. Now. this window overlooks our packaging line. Biscuits are fed through those machines. from where they come out perfectly wrapped and ready to be packed into crates. It’s rather mesmerizing. isn’t it?

Original Text: Come to buy some biscuits. have you? All right then. Tell me what kind you want.
Translated Text: Come to buy some biscuits. have you? All right then. Tell me what kind you want.

Original Text: You’re not here to say management wants us to make twice as many biscuits or something. are you? That would be awful.
Translated Text: You’re not here to say management wants us to make twice as many biscuits or something. are you? That would be awful.

Original Text: Usually visitors aren’t interested in seeing the employee quarters. but welcome nonetheless.
Translated Text: Usually visitors aren’t interested in seeing the employee quarters. but welcome nonetheless.

Original Text: Problems seem to be multiplying out in the galaxy. The intergalactic warp is offline. those Infected creatures are spreading. the Alliance of Gentlemen is running rampant. It’s only a matter of time before our deliveries are affected. Stay sharp.
Translated Text: Problems seem to be multiplying out in the galaxy. The intergalactic warp is offline. those Infected creatures are spreading. the Alliance of Gentlemen is running rampant. It’s only a matter of time before our deliveries are affected. Stay sharp.

Original Text: I’m a pilot for a Fluffy Biscuit delivery ship. It can be a tricky job at times. but it’s rewarding to get those biscuits where they need to go.
Translated Text: I’m a pilot for a Fluffy Biscuit delivery ship. It can be a tricky job at times. but it’s rewarding to get those biscuits where they need to go.

Original Text: Our stock keeps vanishing. We set three stacks of biscuit crates over here. and now they’re gone. What’s going on?
Translated Text: Our stock keeps vanishing. We set three stacks of biscuit crates over here. and now they’re gone. What’s going on?

Original Text: Welcome to the storage bay of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1203. Now if you don’t mind. can you take your tour elsewhere? We’re a little busy here.
Translated Text: Welcome to the storage bay of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1203. Now if you don’t mind. can you take your tour elsewhere? We’re a little busy here.

Original Text: How do our biscuits keep disappearing? If we can’t figure this out. Manager Nevius will have our necks!
Translated Text: How do our biscuits keep disappearing? If we can’t figure this out. Manager Nevius will have our necks!

Original Text: Oh… Sorry. I didn’t see you there. We’re a bit preoccupied right now. If you have questions. you might want to ask someone else.
Translated Text: Oh… Sorry. I didn’t see you there. We’re a bit preoccupied right now. If you have questions. you might want to ask someone else.

Original Text: Please respect company health codes and affirm that your shoes are clean before walking in such close proximity to the flavor components. Thank you.
Translated Text: Please respect company health codes and affirm that your shoes are clean before walking in such close proximity to the flavor components. Thank you.

Original Text: This room contains key flavor components in the Fluffy Biscuit Company’s signature biscuits. It is most impressive. yes?
Translated Text: This room contains key flavor components in the Fluffy Biscuit Company’s signature biscuits. It is most impressive. yes?

Original Text: I’ll be honest—I am thoroughly distracted at the present moment. Unless you are here to taste-test my new explosive biscuit. I would kindly ask that you leave me in peace. I believe I am on the brink of a breakthrough.
Translated Text: I’ll be honest—I am thoroughly distracted at the present moment. Unless you are here to taste-test my new explosive biscuit. I would kindly ask that you leave me in peace. I believe I am on the brink of a breakthrough.

Original Text: What are you doing idling about? Make sure you deliver those biscuits with haste! Delivery crews like you represent us all out there. Don’t make us look bad.
Translated Text: What are you doing idling about? Make sure you deliver those biscuits with haste! Delivery crews like you represent us all out there. Don’t make us look bad.

Original Text: Welcome to Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1201! If you’re looking to buy some freshly made biscuits. our facility’s biscuit shop is right over there! Please enjoy your visit. and have a great day.
Translated Text: Welcome to Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1201! If you’re looking to buy some freshly made biscuits. our facility’s biscuit shop is right over there! Please enjoy your visit. and have a great day.

Original Text: Hello there. Are you all stocked up on biscuits? Be sure to check in every now and then to refill your supply.
Translated Text: Hello there. Are you all stocked up on biscuits? Be sure to check in every now and then to refill your supply.

Original Text: Greetings. It’s nice to see new faces at the factory. Are you interested in purchasing some biscuits today?
Translated Text: Greetings. It’s nice to see new faces at the factory. Are you interested in purchasing some biscuits today?

Original Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 is pleased to report that since the machinery had its malfunctioning parts replaced. biscuit quality has drastically improved. Biscuit Buddy 224 thanks you for helping the factory.
Translated Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 is pleased to report that since the machinery had its malfunctioning parts replaced. biscuit quality has drastically improved. Biscuit Buddy 224 thanks you for helping the factory.

Original Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 has scanned 10.748 biscuits thus far. Only three biscuits have not met quality standards.
Translated Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 has scanned 10.748 biscuits thus far. Only three biscuits have not met quality standards.

Original Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 has scanned 11.305 biscuits thus far. Only four biscuits have not met quality standards.
Translated Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 has scanned 11.305 biscuits thus far. Only four biscuits have not met quality standards.

Original Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 has scanned 12.099 biscuits thus far. Only one hundred and fifty-one biscuits have not met quality standards. Ah… It seems there has been a minor problem in the production line. Biscuit Buddy 224 will report this to management.
Translated Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 has scanned 12.099 biscuits thus far. Only one hundred and fifty-one biscuits have not met quality standards. Ah… It seems there has been a minor problem in the production line. Biscuit Buddy 224 will report this to management.

Original Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 requests that you do not worry about difficulties in manufacturing. Please deliver the approved biscuits safely to their recipients.
Translated Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 requests that you do not worry about difficulties in manufacturing. Please deliver the approved biscuits safely to their recipients.

Original Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 is a Fluffy Biscuit quality assurance bot and is unqualified to give visitors tours. Please have an enjoyable tour of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1201.
Translated Text: Biscuit Buddy 224 is a Fluffy Biscuit quality assurance bot and is unqualified to give visitors tours. Please have an enjoyable tour of Fluffy Biscuit Factory #1201.

Original Text: Hello there! I’m surprised to see delivery crewmen in the flavor lab. but welcome nonetheless.
Translated Text: Hello there! I’m surprised to see delivery crewmen in the flavor lab. but welcome nonetheless.

Original Text: Ah. it seems you’ve found your way to our factory’s flavor lab! Here. we experiment with all kinds of ingredients in order to find the next greatest biscuit flavor. Due to the intergalactic warp not functioning at this time. we flavor lab specialists have resorted to utilizing this galaxy’s unique flavor signature in order to continue our work. Perhaps the newest biscuit we release will be inspired by your favorite “local” cuisines!
Translated Text: Ah. it seems you’ve found your way to our factory’s flavor lab! Here. we experiment with all kinds of ingredients in order to find the next greatest biscuit flavor. Due to the intergalactic warp not functioning at this time. we flavor lab specialists have resorted to utilizing this galaxy’s unique flavor signature in order to continue our work. Perhaps the newest biscuit we release will be inspired by your favorite “local” cuisines!

Original Text: Never thought I’d see a Fluffy Biscuit crew at this site. Are you really going inside the alien ship to deliver biscuits? Good luck.
Translated Text: Never thought I’d see a Fluffy Biscuit crew at this site. Are you really going inside the alien ship to deliver biscuits? Good luck.

Original Text: Hey. good work. Maybe you should consider working for the Colonial Union in the future.
Translated Text: Hey. good work. Maybe you should consider working for the Colonial Union in the future.

Original Text: All this talk of biscuits has got me craving some myself. Maybe I’ll check out one of your company’s biscuit diners when our work is done on this planet.
Translated Text: All this talk of biscuits has got me craving some myself. Maybe I’ll check out one of your company’s biscuit diners when our work is done on this planet.

Original Text: The location of Revalax 4 has been uploaded to your starmap. Good luck with your delivery!
Translated Text: The location of Revalax 4 has been uploaded to your starmap. Good luck with your delivery!

Original Text: You have declined this business opportunity. But don’t forget—the biscuits you don’t sell might be sold by your fellow competitors! Good luck. and happy deliveries!
Translated Text: You have declined this business opportunity. But don’t forget—the biscuits you don’t sell might be sold by your fellow competitors! Good luck. and happy deliveries!

Original Text: An explorer named Avery Elvort on the planet Revalax 4 has ordered three crates of biscuits. He will be awaiting the delivery on the surface of the planet. an unspecified distance from his teleporter location. As a special instruction. he noted that the delivery team should follow his beacons to navigate the terrain safely. Straying from the path would be “most deadly”. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?
Translated Text: An explorer named Avery Elvort on the planet Revalax 4 has ordered three crates of biscuits. He will be awaiting the delivery on the surface of the planet. an unspecified distance from his teleporter location. As a special instruction. he noted that the delivery team should follow his beacons to navigate the terrain safely. Straying from the path would be “most deadly”. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?

Original Text: An explorer named Avery Elvort on the planet Revalax 4 has ordered three crates of biscuits. He will be awaiting the delivery on the surface of the planet. an unspecified distance from his teleporter location. As a special instruction. he noted that the delivery team should follow his beacons to navigate the terrain safely. Straying from the path would be “most deadly”. You have accepted this business opportunity. Be sure to complete it in a timely manner. or it will be offered to your fellow competitors.
Translated Text: An explorer named Avery Elvort on the planet Revalax 4 has ordered three crates of biscuits. He will be awaiting the delivery on the surface of the planet. an unspecified distance from his teleporter location. As a special instruction. he noted that the delivery team should follow his beacons to navigate the terrain safely. Straying from the path would be “most deadly”. You have accepted this business opportunity. Be sure to complete it in a timely manner. or it will be offered to your fellow competitors.

Original Text: The location of Restricted CU Site 881 has been uploaded to your starmap. Check in with Colonial Union officer Joren Royst on the planet’s surface for instructions on how to complete the delivery. Until then. further information is classified.
Translated Text: The location of Restricted CU Site 881 has been uploaded to your starmap. Check in with Colonial Union officer Joren Royst on the planet’s surface for instructions on how to complete the delivery. Until then. further information is classified.

Original Text: Eight crates of biscuits have been requested from Restricted CU Site 881. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?
Translated Text: Eight crates of biscuits have been requested from Restricted CU Site 881. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?

Original Text: Eight crates of biscuits have been requested from Restricted CU Site 881. Check in with Colonial Union officer Joren Royst on the planet’s surface for instructions on how to complete the delivery. Until then. further information is classified. You have accepted this business opportunity. Be sure to complete it in a timely manner. or it will be offered to your fellow competitors.
Translated Text: Eight crates of biscuits have been requested from Restricted CU Site 881. Check in with Colonial Union officer Joren Royst on the planet’s surface for instructions on how to complete the delivery. Until then. further information is classified. You have accepted this business opportunity. Be sure to complete it in a timely manner. or it will be offered to your fellow competitors.

Original Text: The location of Brassus’s rented manor has been uploaded to your starmap. Ensure that Brassus’s experience with the Fluffy Biscuit delivery service is more than satisfactory.
Translated Text: The location of Brassus’s rented manor has been uploaded to your starmap. Ensure that Brassus’s experience with the Fluffy Biscuit delivery service is more than satisfactory.

Original Text: The famous food reviewer Maxil Brassus has ordered five crates of biscuits for an event he is hosting. If the delivery goes without incident. he will consider writing a review for the Fluffy Biscuit Company. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?
Translated Text: The famous food reviewer Maxil Brassus has ordered five crates of biscuits for an event he is hosting. If the delivery goes without incident. he will consider writing a review for the Fluffy Biscuit Company. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?

Original Text: The famous food reviewer Maxil Brassus has ordered five crates of biscuits for an event he is hosting. If the delivery goes without incident. he will consider writing a review for the Fluffy Biscuit Company. Ensure that Brassus’s experience with the Fluffy Biscuit delivery service is more than satisfactory.
Translated Text: The famous food reviewer Maxil Brassus has ordered five crates of biscuits for an event he is hosting. If the delivery goes without incident. he will consider writing a review for the Fluffy Biscuit Company. Ensure that Brassus’s experience with the Fluffy Biscuit delivery service is more than satisfactory.

Original Text: Delivery information has been sent to your ship system.
Translated Text: Delivery information has been sent to your ship system.

Original Text: XR-27248. an android who has been nominated multiple times for Fluffy Biscuit’s Biggest Fan Award. has placed an order for four crates of biscuits. He resides in a small bunker at the back of the Burrow. a planetary hub near your current location. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?
Translated Text: XR-27248. an android who has been nominated multiple times for Fluffy Biscuit’s Biggest Fan Award. has placed an order for four crates of biscuits. He resides in a small bunker at the back of the Burrow. a planetary hub near your current location. Would you like more information on this business opportunity?

Original Text: XR-27248. an android who has been nominated multiple times for Fluffy Biscuit’s Biggest Fan Award. has placed an order for four crates of biscuits. He resides in a small bunker at the back of the Burrow. a planetary hub near your current location. You have accepted this business opportunity. Be sure to complete it in a timely manner. or it will be offered to your fellow competitors.
Translated Text: XR-27248. an android who has been nominated multiple times for Fluffy Biscuit’s Biggest Fan Award. has placed an order for four crates of biscuits. He resides in a small bunker at the back of the Burrow. a planetary hub near your current location. You have accepted this business opportunity. Be sure to complete it in a timely manner. or it will be offered to your fellow competitors.

Original Text: XR-27248 is very pleased! Many thanks to you. May you experience success in the biscuit sales competition. XR-27248 will be watching the results with much anticipation.
Translated Text: XR-27248 is very pleased! Many thanks to you. May you experience success in the biscuit sales competition. XR-27248 will be watching the results with much anticipation.

Original Text: Then please retrieve the four biscuit crates. XR-27248 is patient. but cannot sign off on a delivery without receiving the specified number of crates.
Translated Text: Then please retrieve the four biscuit crates. XR-27248 is patient. but cannot sign off on a delivery without receiving the specified number of crates.

Original Text: The Fluffy Biscuit delivery crew is here at last! Have you brought the four crates of biscuits. as XR-27248 specified in the order process?
Translated Text: The Fluffy Biscuit delivery crew is here at last! Have you brought the four crates of biscuits. as XR-27248 specified in the order process?

Original Text: May you experience success in the biscuit sales competition. XR-27248 will be watching the results with much anticipation.
Translated Text: May you experience success in the biscuit sales competition. XR-27248 will be watching the results with much anticipation.

Original Text: Greetings! XR-27248 is very pleased to meet a Fluffy Biscuit employee! What is your current ranking in the biscuit sales competition?
Translated Text: Greetings! XR-27248 is very pleased to meet a Fluffy Biscuit employee! What is your current ranking in the biscuit sales competition?

Original Text: Greetings! Welcome to XR-27248’s biscuit bunker. Please view the collection respectfully and do not eat any of the products on display. Many thanks.
Translated Text: Greetings! Welcome to XR-27248’s biscuit bunker. Please view the collection respectfully and do not eat any of the products on display. Many thanks.

Original Text: I am working. sorry. Perhaps we can chat another time.
Translated Text: I am working. sorry. Perhaps we can chat another time.

Original Text: It feels refreshing to take off that heavy helmet.
Translated Text: It feels refreshing to take off that heavy helmet.

Original Text: Though we're in little more than a frosty metal container. this place feels a bit like home. I like to come here when my crew resupplies at Outpost 448. There's no other station in the galaxy that accommodates Sylvassi so thoughtfully.
Translated Text: Though we're in little more than a frosty metal container. this place feels a bit like home. I like to come here when my crew resupplies at Outpost 448. There's no other station in the galaxy that accommodates Sylvassi so thoughtfully.

Original Text: Please do not harm any of the plants.
Translated Text: Please do not harm any of the plants.

Original Text: Glad to hear you went on to win the final race! You've done us all an honor by coming back here to flaunt your victory.
Translated Text: Glad to hear you went on to win the final race! You've done us all an honor by coming back here to flaunt your victory.

Original Text: A shame you didn't win the Ion Races. Still. I hope you enjoyed yourselves.
Translated Text: A shame you didn't win the Ion Races. Still. I hope you enjoyed yourselves.

Original Text: A shame you didn't win. Still. I hope you enjoyed yourselves.
Translated Text: A shame you didn't win. Still. I hope you enjoyed yourselves.

Original Text: That was some great racing out there. Congratulations on winning. You earned it. And if you decide to enter the final race. watch out for the overcharge.
Translated Text: That was some great racing out there. Congratulations on winning. You earned it. And if you decide to enter the final race. watch out for the overcharge.

Original Text: That was some great racing out there. Congratulations on winning. You earned it. And if you decide to enter the second race. watch out for those lasers.
Translated Text: That was some great racing out there. Congratulations on winning. You earned it. And if you decide to enter the second race. watch out for those lasers.

Original Text: The rules are as follows: the first to complete two laps around the track wins. Ship combat is permitted. even encouraged. However. boarding is strictly forbidden and teleportation between ships will be disabled. We can't have everyone attacking the first place ship. taking out its quantum shields. and stealing its position in the race. The personnel of Dutain's Garage and other administrators of the Ion Races are not liable for any damages or deaths that may occur during a race. That all said. if you're still interested in joining. sign up at the screen when you and your crew are ready to go.
Translated Text: The rules are as follows: the first to complete two laps around the track wins. Ship combat is permitted. even encouraged. However. boarding is strictly forbidden and teleportation between ships will be disabled. We can't have everyone attacking the first place ship. taking out its quantum shields. and stealing its position in the race. The personnel of Dutain's Garage and other administrators of the Ion Races are not liable for any damages or deaths that may occur during a race. That all said. if you're still interested in joining. sign up at the screen when you and your crew are ready to go.

Original Text: Every year. we set up three race tracks here along the ion storm. Winning the third race will net you 50.000 credits and a special prize. But don't get ahead of yourself. If you want to participate in the third race. you have to win the first two. One is here at my garage and the other is at an old W.D. mining facility nearby. You have only one shot at each of the races. so it's a good idea to familiarize yourself with the tracks before you sign up.
Translated Text: Every year. we set up three race tracks here along the ion storm. Winning the third race will net you 50.000 credits and a special prize. But don't get ahead of yourself. If you want to participate in the third race. you have to win the first two. One is here at my garage and the other is at an old W.D. mining facility nearby. You have only one shot at each of the races. so it's a good idea to familiarize yourself with the tracks before you sign up.

Original Text: I see you're one of the winners from the mining station. Welcome to my garage. Feel free to use the screen to enter the race whenever you're ready. and good luck on my track.
Translated Text: I see you're one of the winners from the mining station. Welcome to my garage. Feel free to use the screen to enter the race whenever you're ready. and good luck on my track.

Original Text: Never heard of the Ion Races before? That's surprising. They're something of a legend in this galaxy. Every year. we set up three race tracks here along the ion storm. Winning the third race will net you 50.000 credits and a special prize. But don't get ahead of yourself. If you want to participate in the third race. you have to win the first two. One is here at my garage and the other is at an old W.D. mining facility nearby. You have only one shot at each of the races. so it's a good idea to familiarize yourself with the tracks before you sign up.
Translated Text: Never heard of the Ion Races before? That's surprising. They're something of a legend in this galaxy. Every year. we set up three race tracks here along the ion storm. Winning the third race will net you 50.000 credits and a special prize. But don't get ahead of yourself. If you want to participate in the third race. you have to win the first two. One is here at my garage and the other is at an old W.D. mining facility nearby. You have only one shot at each of the races. so it's a good idea to familiarize yourself with the tracks before you sign up.

Original Text: Are you another challenger for the Ion Races? Any and all are welcome to participate. free of charge. Sign up using the screen over there. though I recommend refreshing yourself on the rules of the race before you join.
Translated Text: Are you another challenger for the Ion Races? Any and all are welcome to participate. free of charge. Sign up using the screen over there. though I recommend refreshing yourself on the rules of the race before you join.

Original Text: You already won all the races. What do you need my components for?
Translated Text: You already won all the races. What do you need my components for?

Original Text: You lost the Ion Races. did you? That should be reason enough to think about a better ship configuration. Take a look at the fine components I have in stock.
Translated Text: You lost the Ion Races. did you? That should be reason enough to think about a better ship configuration. Take a look at the fine components I have in stock.

Original Text: Prepping for the next race? Go ahead. Take a look at the fine components I have in stock. It's never too early to start thinking about your next ship configuration.
Translated Text: Prepping for the next race? Go ahead. Take a look at the fine components I have in stock. It's never too early to start thinking about your next ship configuration.

Original Text: You lost the race. did you? That should be reason enough to think about a better ship configuration. Take a look at the fine components I have in stock and turn that losing streak into a winning streak.
Translated Text: You lost the race. did you? That should be reason enough to think about a better ship configuration. Take a look at the fine components I have in stock and turn that losing streak into a winning streak.

Original Text: Need to make some last minute alterations to your ship? I have a few components in stock that might tip the results of the race in your favor.
Translated Text: Need to make some last minute alterations to your ship? I have a few components in stock that might tip the results of the race in your favor.

Original Text: Want your old metal can to run like a racing ship? I've got components that'll put some real power into those thrusters of yours.
Translated Text: Want your old metal can to run like a racing ship? I've got components that'll put some real power into those thrusters of yours.

Original Text: I heard you won the Ion Races. Congratulations! Would you like a celebratory drink?
Translated Text: I heard you won the Ion Races. Congratulations! Would you like a celebratory drink?

Original Text: Sorry you didn't win the Ion Races. How about a drink to take off the edge?
Translated Text: Sorry you didn't win the Ion Races. How about a drink to take off the edge?

Original Text: I heard you won Dutain's race. Congratulations. Would you like a celebratory drink?
Translated Text: I heard you won Dutain's race. Congratulations. Would you like a celebratory drink?

Original Text: Sorry you didn't win Dutain's race. How about a drink to take off the edge?
Translated Text: Sorry you didn't win Dutain's race. How about a drink to take off the edge?

Original Text: You're not piloting in the race. are you? Because if you are. I'm morally obliged to tell you that drinking while flying spaceships is incredibly dangerous. Take the lives of your crewmates into consideration. all right? Otherwise. drink up. We have some great specials.
Translated Text: You're not piloting in the race. are you? Because if you are. I'm morally obliged to tell you that drinking while flying spaceships is incredibly dangerous. Take the lives of your crewmates into consideration. all right? Otherwise. drink up. We have some great specials.

Original Text: Those were entertaining races. You and your crew should be proud of yourselves.
Translated Text: Those were entertaining races. You and your crew should be proud of yourselves.

Original Text: So you lost the Ion Races. did you? That's disappointing. but at least the rest of us were entertained.
Translated Text: So you lost the Ion Races. did you? That's disappointing. but at least the rest of us were entertained.

Original Text: That was quite an entertaining race. You and your crew should be proud of yourselves.
Translated Text: That was quite an entertaining race. You and your crew should be proud of yourselves.

Original Text: So you lost the race. did you? That's disappointing. but at least the rest of us were entertained.
Translated Text: So you lost the race. did you? That's disappointing. but at least the rest of us were entertained.

Original Text: If you're joining the race. be sure to give everyone a show. They've come here to see some action. not a Colonial Union Fleet flight training exercise.
Translated Text: If you're joining the race. be sure to give everyone a show. They've come here to see some action. not a Colonial Union Fleet flight training exercise.

Original Text: Welcome back! You won the Ion Races. but you're still keen on this little bar. are you? Josi would be flattered. So what's next for you? Planning on finding the Lost Colony? Ha! Good luck with that. Surviving all the crazed crews out there will probably be harder than surviving a race through the ion storm.
Translated Text: Welcome back! You won the Ion Races. but you're still keen on this little bar. are you? Josi would be flattered. So what's next for you? Planning on finding the Lost Colony? Ha! Good luck with that. Surviving all the crazed crews out there will probably be harder than surviving a race through the ion storm.

Original Text: Welcome back. It's unfortunate you didn't win. I was secretly rooting for you.
Translated Text: Welcome back. It's unfortunate you didn't win. I was secretly rooting for you.

Original Text: Welcome back. Might I suggest buying yourselves a few drinks? Your pilot could probably use one.
Translated Text: Welcome back. Might I suggest buying yourselves a few drinks? Your pilot could probably use one.

Original Text: Most pilots are drinking Rookie's Rum tonight. I've heard that the competition is intense this year. This might be the last of the Ion Races for a while. since the galaxy is plunging into chaos. Not to mention. there are rumors that the prize has something to do with one of those Lost Colony fragments everyone has been talking about.
Translated Text: Most pilots are drinking Rookie's Rum tonight. I've heard that the competition is intense this year. This might be the last of the Ion Races for a while. since the galaxy is plunging into chaos. Not to mention. there are rumors that the prize has something to do with one of those Lost Colony fragments everyone has been talking about.

Original Text: Hey. it's the winner of the Ion Races! Good job out there. You accomplished what few can claim to have done.
Translated Text: Hey. it's the winner of the Ion Races! Good job out there. You accomplished what few can claim to have done.

Original Text: Hey. you made it back in one piece. That's more than some people can say. Even though you didn't win the Ion Races. you should consider yourselves lucky.
Translated Text: Hey. you made it back in one piece. That's more than some people can say. Even though you didn't win the Ion Races. you should consider yourselves lucky.

Original Text: Hey. you made it back in one piece. Good job out there. I'll be keeping my eye on you if you decide to compete in the final race.
Translated Text: Hey. you made it back in one piece. Good job out there. I'll be keeping my eye on you if you decide to compete in the final race.

Original Text: Hey. you made it back in one piece. That's more than some people can say. Even though you didn't win. you should consider yourselves lucky.
Translated Text: Hey. you made it back in one piece. That's more than some people can say. Even though you didn't win. you should consider yourselves lucky.

Original Text: This is one of the wildest races on the fringes. It's littered with brutal obstacles. and the competition is always fierce. If you decide to enter. I wish you the best of luck. You'll need it out there.
Translated Text: This is one of the wildest races on the fringes. It's littered with brutal obstacles. and the competition is always fierce. If you decide to enter. I wish you the best of luck. You'll need it out there.

Original Text: Congrats on winning the Ion Races!
Translated Text: Congrats on winning the Ion Races!

Original Text: Sorry to hear you didn't win the Ion Races. I guess the odds were just stacked against you.
Translated Text: Sorry to hear you didn't win the Ion Races. I guess the odds were just stacked against you.

Original Text: Congrats on winning the race. I hope you do just as well in the final one.
Translated Text: Congrats on winning the race. I hope you do just as well in the final one.

Original Text: Sorry to hear you didn't win first place. I guess the odds were just stacked against you.
Translated Text: Sorry to hear you didn't win first place. I guess the odds were just stacked against you.

Original Text: Nice to meet you. Are you joining the race? What sort of ship do you have?
Translated Text: Nice to meet you. Are you joining the race? What sort of ship do you have?

Original Text: I can't believe I'm talking to the winner of the Ion Races. It's surreal! Thanks for coming by the garage to say hello.
Translated Text: I can't believe I'm talking to the winner of the Ion Races. It's surreal! Thanks for coming by the garage to say hello.

Original Text: Good to see you back! How were the races? Even though you didn't win. you seem to have fared well enough.
Translated Text: Good to see you back! How were the races? Even though you didn't win. you seem to have fared well enough.

Original Text: Good to see you back! How was the race? That was some excellent ship management out there. In races like these. credit is equally due to every member of the crew. Without everyone working in unison. it's easy to get caught in a dangerous situation.
Translated Text: Good to see you back! How was the race? That was some excellent ship management out there. In races like these. credit is equally due to every member of the crew. Without everyone working in unison. it's easy to get caught in a dangerous situation.

Original Text: Good to see you back! How was the race? Even though you didn't win. you seem to have fared well enough.
Translated Text: Good to see you back! How was the race? Even though you didn't win. you seem to have fared well enough.

Original Text: Oh. I have plenty of those. For one thing. if you find yourself stuck in a heat cloud. turn off the core safety. Otherwise. you could be stuck for good with fires springing up around your ship. In fact. you might want to consider keeping the core safety off for the whole race. just to maximize the power of your reactor. Speaking of reactors. there are some sections of the track that have ice dust that can cool your ship down quickly. Those are handy if your reactor is running too hot. And one more thing. Some of the turrets in the track are programmed to fire at the first place ship. just to make the race a little more unpredictable. So be careful out there.
Translated Text: Oh. I have plenty of those. For one thing. if you find yourself stuck in a heat cloud. turn off the core safety. Otherwise. you could be stuck for good with fires springing up around your ship. In fact. you might want to consider keeping the core safety off for the whole race. just to maximize the power of your reactor. Speaking of reactors. there are some sections of the track that have ice dust that can cool your ship down quickly. Those are handy if your reactor is running too hot. And one more thing. Some of the turrets in the track are programmed to fire at the first place ship. just to make the race a little more unpredictable. So be careful out there.

Original Text: I participated in last year's race. It was rough. We were fired at from all sides. by ships and stationary turrets throughout the track. By the time we reached the finish line. our ship was nearly beyond repair. This year. I've decided to watch.
Translated Text: I participated in last year's race. It was rough. We were fired at from all sides. by ships and stationary turrets throughout the track. By the time we reached the finish line. our ship was nearly beyond repair. This year. I've decided to watch.

Original Text: I can't believe it... I lost my bet. Perhaps I should have compared reactor outputs more.
Translated Text: I can't believe it... I lost my bet. Perhaps I should have compared reactor outputs more.

Original Text: I've taken a look at all the ship manifests. If I make an informed bet. I can't lose.
Translated Text: I've taken a look at all the ship manifests. If I make an informed bet. I can't lose.

Original Text: Well done. I made a nice little profit betting on you.
Translated Text: Well done. I made a nice little profit betting on you.

Original Text: You lost? Well. I'm glad I didn't put a bet on you like Pazor over here.
Translated Text: You lost? Well. I'm glad I didn't put a bet on you like Pazor over here.

Original Text: Well done. I look forward to seeing your ship in action during the next race. Maybe I'll even bet on you.
Translated Text: Well done. I look forward to seeing your ship in action during the next race. Maybe I'll even bet on you.

Original Text: The best ship to bet on isn't the fastest. It's the fiercest.
Translated Text: The best ship to bet on isn't the fastest. It's the fiercest.

Original Text: Good job in the races. Your crew was impressive.
Translated Text: Good job in the races. Your crew was impressive.

Original Text: Good job in the race. Your crew was impressive.
Translated Text: Good job in the race. Your crew was impressive.

Original Text: People think they can predict which ship is going to win. but it's mostly luck. You can analyze a ship's components all you want. In the Ion Races. the results will always be unexpected. That's what makes them so exciting to bet on.
Translated Text: People think they can predict which ship is going to win. but it's mostly luck. You can analyze a ship's components all you want. In the Ion Races. the results will always be unexpected. That's what makes them so exciting to bet on.

Original Text: Since you won. here is the return on your bet: 3000 credits. Enjoy.
Translated Text: Since you won. here is the return on your bet: 3000 credits. Enjoy.

Original Text: Since you won. here is the return on your bet: 15000 credits. Enjoy.
Translated Text: Since you won. here is the return on your bet: 15000 credits. Enjoy.

Original Text: Sorry. when you placed your bet. you forfeited your credits. They cannot be reclaimed.
Translated Text: Sorry. when you placed your bet. you forfeited your credits. They cannot be reclaimed.

Original Text: Your bet of 1000 credits has been logged into my database. Good luck.
Translated Text: Your bet of 1000 credits has been logged into my database. Good luck.

Original Text: Your bet of 5000 credits has been logged into my database. Good luck.
Translated Text: Your bet of 5000 credits has been logged into my database. Good luck.

Original Text: Your bet has been logged into my database. Good luck.
Translated Text: Your bet has been logged into my database. Good luck.

Original Text: You do not have the funds to place this bet.
Translated Text: You do not have the funds to place this bet.

Original Text: Planning to participate in the race? Place a bet on yourselves! If you win. you could earn some spending money.
Translated Text: Planning to participate in the race? Place a bet on yourselves! If you win. you could earn some spending money.

Original Text: Aha! I bet on you. and you won! We are both winners now.
Translated Text: Aha! I bet on you. and you won! We are both winners now.

Original Text: Ah... I bet on you. but you did not win. That is unfortunate.
Translated Text: Ah... I bet on you. but you did not win. That is unfortunate.

Original Text: There are some impressive ship setups this year. I have not the slightest idea who is going to win.
Translated Text: There are some impressive ship setups this year. I have not the slightest idea who is going to win.

Original Text: XR-70202 has located Colonial Union officers! XR-70202 must inform you that this race is not a Union-sanctioned event and is in violation of eighteen Colonial Union regulations. XR-70202 has been unable to send an official report to the Command Center. so the report will now be considered delivered to you.
Translated Text: XR-70202 has located Colonial Union officers! XR-70202 must inform you that this race is not a Union-sanctioned event and is in violation of eighteen Colonial Union regulations. XR-70202 has been unable to send an official report to the Command Center. so the report will now be considered delivered to you.

Original Text: XR-70202 Must warn you that this race is not a Union-sanctioned event. XR-70202 must report any attendees to Colonial Union command. Sending report... sending... sending... ERROR. Sending failed. XR-70202 will retry later.
Translated Text: XR-70202 Must warn you that this race is not a Union-sanctioned event. XR-70202 must report any attendees to Colonial Union command. Sending report... sending... sending... ERROR. Sending failed. XR-70202 will retry later.

Original Text: Dutain's Garage operates as a ship reconstruction bay most of the time. until the annual Ion Races. Then things get lively around here. I always look forward to seeing the new ships that come to the garage. It seems like the thruster arrangements get crazier every year. But it's sad to think that this might be the last of the Ion Races. If the galaxy gets swallowed up by the Infected in the next year. none of us will be around to keep the races going. Here's to hoping someone figures out how to stop all the chaos.
Translated Text: Dutain's Garage operates as a ship reconstruction bay most of the time. until the annual Ion Races. Then things get lively around here. I always look forward to seeing the new ships that come to the garage. It seems like the thruster arrangements get crazier every year. But it's sad to think that this might be the last of the Ion Races. If the galaxy gets swallowed up by the Infected in the next year. none of us will be around to keep the races going. Here's to hoping someone figures out how to stop all the chaos.

Original Text: This is my ship. It's a beauty. isn't it? Just a shame that it won't be competing in the race this year. It was nearly ripped apart during a supply run. so it's undergoing some heavy repairs. I look forward to seeing it fly again.
Translated Text: This is my ship. It's a beauty. isn't it? Just a shame that it won't be competing in the race this year. It was nearly ripped apart during a supply run. so it's undergoing some heavy repairs. I look forward to seeing it fly again.

Original Text: Congrats on winning the Ion Races. I hope your ship didn't take too much damage.
Translated Text: Congrats on winning the Ion Races. I hope your ship didn't take too much damage.

Original Text: What? Do you need your ship patched up or something? Go to an automated repair bay. We're swamped with work here.
Translated Text: What? Do you need your ship patched up or something? Go to an automated repair bay. We're swamped with work here.

Original Text: Winner of the Ion Races! Come buy some noodles. yes. They come in many flavors. all locally sourced from this galaxy.
Translated Text: Winner of the Ion Races! Come buy some noodles. yes. They come in many flavors. all locally sourced from this galaxy.

Original Text: Come buy some noodles. yes. They come in many flavors. all locally sourced from this galaxy.
Translated Text: Come buy some noodles. yes. They come in many flavors. all locally sourced from this galaxy.

Original Text: Congratulations on your big win! You did good out there.
Translated Text: Congratulations on your big win! You did good out there.

Original Text: Apologies that the last race didn't go well for you.
Translated Text: Apologies that the last race didn't go well for you.

Original Text: Congratulations on your win! You did good out there.
Translated Text: Congratulations on your win! You did good out there.

Original Text: Apologies that the race didn't go well for you.
Translated Text: Apologies that the race didn't go well for you.

Original Text: Hello. officer. You're not here to break up the party. are you? The Colonial Union Command Center has known about these races for several years now. but they've let us run them in peace. The Colonial Union has more important things to do at the moment. I'd imagine. Since you're here. you might as well enjoy the race. or maybe even participate in it. Because if your superior officers find out that you were seen at this station. you might be getting a demotion.
Translated Text: Hello. officer. You're not here to break up the party. are you? The Colonial Union Command Center has known about these races for several years now. but they've let us run them in peace. The Colonial Union has more important things to do at the moment. I'd imagine. Since you're here. you might as well enjoy the race. or maybe even participate in it. Because if your superior officers find out that you were seen at this station. you might be getting a demotion.

Original Text: Don't mind XR-70202. He's harmless. He was once a Colonial Union observation bot. but he got stuck sending a report. A client of ours was worried that he'd eventually succeed in sending it. so they dumped him off here for our help. We disconnected XR's long range communication system and got him mostly sorted out. Now he's a permanent fixture of the garage. He tells me half the things I do are violating one Colonial Union regulation or another. but all of us have grown a bit fond of him over the years.
Translated Text: Don't mind XR-70202. He's harmless. He was once a Colonial Union observation bot. but he got stuck sending a report. A client of ours was worried that he'd eventually succeed in sending it. so they dumped him off here for our help. We disconnected XR's long range communication system and got him mostly sorted out. Now he's a permanent fixture of the garage. He tells me half the things I do are violating one Colonial Union regulation or another. but all of us have grown a bit fond of him over the years.

Original Text: ...Huh? The Ion Races are over? How long have I been asleep?
Translated Text: ...Huh? The Ion Races are over? How long have I been asleep?

Original Text: I worked three shifts straight to get all the lasers. heat vents. and turrets working for the racetrack this year. Every muscle in my body aches. I don't care that there's a big race going on. I'm going to sleep.
Translated Text: I worked three shifts straight to get all the lasers. heat vents. and turrets working for the racetrack this year. Every muscle in my body aches. I don't care that there's a big race going on. I'm going to sleep.

Original Text: I am in the middle of work. Please come back another time.
Translated Text: I am in the middle of work. Please come back another time.

Original Text: We have a big winner over here. What. did you come down here to gloat?
Translated Text: We have a big winner over here. What. did you come down here to gloat?

Original Text: Sorry you lost. buddy. but if you want some consolation you've come to the wrong place. We're busy.
Translated Text: Sorry you lost. buddy. but if you want some consolation you've come to the wrong place. We're busy.

Original Text: I have no time to chat. Shouldn't there be races going on? Those should keep you thoroughly preoccupied.
Translated Text: I have no time to chat. Shouldn't there be races going on? Those should keep you thoroughly preoccupied.

Original Text: This is a fine ship. It's a shame that it didn't fly in the races. Be sure to take good care of your own vessel.
Translated Text: This is a fine ship. It's a shame that it didn't fly in the races. Be sure to take good care of your own vessel.

Original Text: This is a fine ship. It's a shame that it won't be flying in the races. Be sure to take good care of your own vessel.
Translated Text: This is a fine ship. It's a shame that it won't be flying in the races. Be sure to take good care of your own vessel.

Original Text: You have my congratulations! Was the ion storm as difficult to navigate as everyone says?
Translated Text: You have my congratulations! Was the ion storm as difficult to navigate as everyone says?

Original Text: You have my congratulations! Best of luck in the final race.
Translated Text: You have my congratulations! Best of luck in the final race.

Original Text: Welcome to Dutain's Garage. home of one of the Ion Races! If you're interested in participating. speak with Vara Dutain over to the left. She'll get you sorted out. When you're ready to race. just use the screen to sign up. And if you're not here for racing. I recommend the noodles.
Translated Text: Welcome to Dutain's Garage. home of one of the Ion Races! If you're interested in participating. speak with Vara Dutain over to the left. She'll get you sorted out. When you're ready to race. just use the screen to sign up. And if you're not here for racing. I recommend the noodles.

Original Text: Don't look so glum. Not everyone can be winners.
Translated Text: Don't look so glum. Not everyone can be winners.

Original Text: That was some excellent racing. I look forward to seeing your ship in the final race.
Translated Text: That was some excellent racing. I look forward to seeing your ship in the final race.

Original Text: To win this race. be the first to complete two laps around the track. Fight it out with your fellow contestants all you like. but no boarding. And of course. none of the race organizers are responsible for any of your untimely deaths. Not so many rules. is it? I'm sure you can remember them.
Translated Text: To win this race. be the first to complete two laps around the track. Fight it out with your fellow contestants all you like. but no boarding. And of course. none of the race organizers are responsible for any of your untimely deaths. Not so many rules. is it? I'm sure you can remember them.

Original Text: There are three races around the ion storm. aptly called the Ion Races. You can join for free. If you win all three races. you'll be awarded 50.000 credits and an additional prize. But join only when you're ready. You get one attempt at each race. and you need to beat the first two races before you can participate in the third. So prepare to the best of your ability.
Translated Text: There are three races around the ion storm. aptly called the Ion Races. You can join for free. If you win all three races. you'll be awarded 50.000 credits and an additional prize. But join only when you're ready. You get one attempt at each race. and you need to beat the first two races before you can participate in the third. So prepare to the best of your ability.

Original Text: You're one of the winners from Dutain's Garage. Welcome to the mines. If you wish to participate in the Ion Races. sign up using this screen.
Translated Text: You're one of the winners from Dutain's Garage. Welcome to the mines. If you wish to participate in the Ion Races. sign up using this screen.

Original Text: Greetings. If you wish to participate in the Ion Races. sign up using this screen.
Translated Text: Greetings. If you wish to participate in the Ion Races. sign up using this screen.

Original Text: Thank you for making the last year of the Ion Races so enjoyable. I wish you luck out there.
Translated Text: Thank you for making the last year of the Ion Races so enjoyable. I wish you luck out there.

Original Text: You made it out of the Ion Races alive. That should count for something.
Translated Text: You made it out of the Ion Races alive. That should count for something.

Original Text: You put up quite a fight. Enjoy the win. You deserve it.
Translated Text: You put up quite a fight. Enjoy the win. You deserve it.

Original Text: You made it out alive. That should count for something.
Translated Text: You made it out alive. That should count for something.

Original Text: It's upsetting that this might be the last year for the Ion Races. The race organizers know that with the Infected looming on the horizon. this galaxy may be doomed. Might as well enjoy this last race while we can.
Translated Text: It's upsetting that this might be the last year for the Ion Races. The race organizers know that with the Infected looming on the horizon. this galaxy may be doomed. Might as well enjoy this last race while we can.

Original Text: I am sure you are aware that this was once a W.D. mining facility. It has fallen into great disrepair. but do not deface it any further. I will be watching.
Translated Text: I am sure you are aware that this was once a W.D. mining facility. It has fallen into great disrepair. but do not deface it any further. I will be watching.

Original Text: My congrats. Those were enjoyable races to watch.
Translated Text: My congrats. Those were enjoyable races to watch.

Original Text: Your loss is unfortunate. but the races were enjoyable to watch.
Translated Text: Your loss is unfortunate. but the races were enjoyable to watch.

Original Text: My congrats. That was an enjoyable race to watch.
Translated Text: My congrats. That was an enjoyable race to watch.

Original Text: Your loss is unfortunate. but it was an enjoyable race to watch.
Translated Text: Your loss is unfortunate. but it was an enjoyable race to watch.

Original Text: Have you come to watch the Ion Races. as well? Or are you looking to join? Not to worry. I'll keep it a secret from the supervisors that you were here.
Translated Text: Have you come to watch the Ion Races. as well? Or are you looking to join? Not to worry. I'll keep it a secret from the supervisors that you were here.

Original Text: I'm surprised to see Colonial Union officers here. The Ion Races aren't exactly legal. Still. try to enjoy yourselves. Even factions as differing as our own can unite for a bit of fun on occasion.
Translated Text: I'm surprised to see Colonial Union officers here. The Ion Races aren't exactly legal. Still. try to enjoy yourselves. Even factions as differing as our own can unite for a bit of fun on occasion.

Original Text: I used to work at this station many years ago. It wasn't much more comfortable than it is now. In fact. I'd say these racers have improved the place.
Translated Text: I used to work at this station many years ago. It wasn't much more comfortable than it is now. In fact. I'd say these racers have improved the place.

Original Text: That was some smooth flying in the last race. You're famous around here now.
Translated Text: That was some smooth flying in the last race. You're famous around here now.

Original Text: At least your ship didn't get ripped apart by the ion storm. If you made it all the way back here. your warp drive must be working at least.
Translated Text: At least your ship didn't get ripped apart by the ion storm. If you made it all the way back here. your warp drive must be working at least.

Original Text: Good job! If you and your crew can fly that well during the final race. your names will go down in the books.
Translated Text: Good job! If you and your crew can fly that well during the final race. your names will go down in the books.

Original Text: At least your ship didn't get cut in half by the mining lasers.
Translated Text: At least your ship didn't get cut in half by the mining lasers.

Original Text: The race should be starting soon. If you want to join. you'd better hurry up.
Translated Text: The race should be starting soon. If you want to join. you'd better hurry up.

Original Text: You won the Ion Races? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.
Translated Text: You won the Ion Races? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.

Original Text: You lost the Ion Races? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.
Translated Text: You lost the Ion Races? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.

Original Text: You won? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.
Translated Text: You won? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.

Original Text: You lost? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.
Translated Text: You lost? So what? They're selling Gentlemen's Coolers at the bar. Go buy one before they sell out.

Original Text: These races are a nice break from our usual routine. I'll admit. I wasn't sure about them at first. It seemed boring to watch ships fly around in a loop. Then I found the bar. Even if you're like me and don't care as much about the ships. you can appreciate the drinks.
Translated Text: These races are a nice break from our usual routine. I'll admit. I wasn't sure about them at first. It seemed boring to watch ships fly around in a loop. Then I found the bar. Even if you're like me and don't care as much about the ships. you can appreciate the drinks.

Original Text: You're the champions of the Ion Races! What are you doing around here? Shouldn't you be at a fancy party or something?
Translated Text: You're the champions of the Ion Races! What are you doing around here? Shouldn't you be at a fancy party or something?

Original Text: I heard you lost the Ion Races. Did you not manage the overcharge?
Translated Text: I heard you lost the Ion Races. Did you not manage the overcharge?

Original Text: I'm sure it's difficult to manage all those ship systems and still be the first to cross the finish line. You're great racers.
Translated Text: I'm sure it's difficult to manage all those ship systems and still be the first to cross the finish line. You're great racers.

Original Text: I heard you lost the race. Did you not manage your ship's heat?
Translated Text: I heard you lost the race. Did you not manage your ship's heat?

Original Text: If you're going to participate in this race. I recommend buying some upgraded fire extinguishers. The track is incredibly hot. Fires often spring up inside ships. and it can be difficult to keep your reactor from overheating. Be sure to go in prepared. Just so you know. Naq is selling extinguishers at the end of the corridor.
Translated Text: If you're going to participate in this race. I recommend buying some upgraded fire extinguishers. The track is incredibly hot. Fires often spring up inside ships. and it can be difficult to keep your reactor from overheating. Be sure to go in prepared. Just so you know. Naq is selling extinguishers at the end of the corridor.

Original Text: I put down 1000 credits on your ship. See? I never lose a bet. Congratulations. by the way.
Translated Text: I put down 1000 credits on your ship. See? I never lose a bet. Congratulations. by the way.

Original Text: I put down 1000 credits on your ship. and you lost the last race. This is the first time I've ever lost a bet...
Translated Text: I put down 1000 credits on your ship. and you lost the last race. This is the first time I've ever lost a bet...

Original Text: I put down 500 credits on your ship. See? I never lose a bet.
Translated Text: I put down 500 credits on your ship. See? I never lose a bet.

Original Text: Good thing I didn't bet on you.
Translated Text: Good thing I didn't bet on you.

Original Text: In all my years coming to the Ion Races. I've never lost a bet. I have a knack for telling which crew is going to win a race.
Translated Text: In all my years coming to the Ion Races. I've never lost a bet. I have a knack for telling which crew is going to win a race.

Original Text: You were amazing! Can I get your autographs?
Translated Text: You were amazing! Can I get your autographs?

Original Text: It's sad you didn't win the Ion Races. but you managed better than my crew would have. We probably wouldn't have won a single race.
Translated Text: It's sad you didn't win the Ion Races. but you managed better than my crew would have. We probably wouldn't have won a single race.

Original Text: Your crew is impressive! If you come out of the last race alive. I want your autographs.
Translated Text: Your crew is impressive! If you come out of the last race alive. I want your autographs.

Original Text: It's sad you didn't win. but you managed better than my crew would have.
Translated Text: It's sad you didn't win. but you managed better than my crew would have.

Original Text: I wouldn't want to be a pilot in one of these races. even for all the credits in the galaxy. The turns on some of these tracks are absurdly tight. One overshot corner. and your ship could blow up from the collision. I'm happy watching.
Translated Text: I wouldn't want to be a pilot in one of these races. even for all the credits in the galaxy. The turns on some of these tracks are absurdly tight. One overshot corner. and your ship could blow up from the collision. I'm happy watching.

Original Text: It's a miracle you made it back from all those races alive. I hope your normal routine isn't as dangerous as this.
Translated Text: It's a miracle you made it back from all those races alive. I hope your normal routine isn't as dangerous as this.

Original Text: Those races were scary to watch. Is your crew all right?
Translated Text: Those races were scary to watch. Is your crew all right?

Original Text: That was scary to watch. Is your crew all right? Take care of yourselves if you decide to compete in the other races.
Translated Text: That was scary to watch. Is your crew all right? Take care of yourselves if you decide to compete in the other races.

Original Text: That was scary to watch. Is your crew all right?
Translated Text: That was scary to watch. Is your crew all right?

Original Text: I don't really understand these races. They're so dangerous. Why would anyone want to enter?
Translated Text: I don't really understand these races. They're so dangerous. Why would anyone want to enter?

Original Text: The ion storm is incredibly treacherous. I'm glad it wasn't me out there.
Translated Text: The ion storm is incredibly treacherous. I'm glad it wasn't me out there.

Original Text: I'm just glad it wasn't me out there.
Translated Text: I'm just glad it wasn't me out there.

Original Text: These races don't happen every day. Have a drink. Celebrate. And if you decide to enter. put full power into engineering.
Translated Text: These races don't happen every day. Have a drink. Celebrate. And if you decide to enter. put full power into engineering.

Original Text: You handled those races well. Congratulations. Hope you enjoy that prize of yours.
Translated Text: You handled those races well. Congratulations. Hope you enjoy that prize of yours.

Original Text: I'm sorry you didn't win the races. At least it was free to enter... Apart from all the credits you'll have to pay for ship repairs.
Translated Text: I'm sorry you didn't win the races. At least it was free to enter... Apart from all the credits you'll have to pay for ship repairs.

Original Text: You handled that track really well.
Translated Text: You handled that track really well.

Original Text: I'm sorry you didn't win the race. At least it was free to enter... Apart from all the credits you'll have to pay for ship repairs.
Translated Text: I'm sorry you didn't win the race. At least it was free to enter... Apart from all the credits you'll have to pay for ship repairs.

Original Text: This track was once part of an old mining rig owned by the W.D. Corporation. They abandoned it after they depleted most of the resources. so we swooped in and claimed the place. What can I say? It makes a good course for racing.
Translated Text: This track was once part of an old mining rig owned by the W.D. Corporation. They abandoned it after they depleted most of the resources. so we swooped in and claimed the place. What can I say? It makes a good course for racing.

Original Text: Yeah. good job. You're not a bad racer.
Translated Text: Yeah. good job. You're not a bad racer.

Original Text: I'm surprised you survived that last race. Good for you.
Translated Text: I'm surprised you survived that last race. Good for you.

Original Text: I'm surprised you survived that race. If you were looking to win. you should have invested in better ship components.
Translated Text: I'm surprised you survived that race. If you were looking to win. you should have invested in better ship components.

Original Text: There's a trick to winning the Ion Races: Get rid of the competition. Remember that if you decide to compete.
Translated Text: There's a trick to winning the Ion Races: Get rid of the competition. Remember that if you decide to compete.

Original Text: You've come back victorious. Good for you!
Translated Text: You've come back victorious. Good for you!

Original Text: Even though you didn't win the races. you put forth a good effort.
Translated Text: Even though you didn't win the races. you put forth a good effort.

Original Text: Even though you didn't win. you put forth a good effort.
Translated Text: Even though you didn't win. you put forth a good effort.

Original Text: Welcome. Are you here for the race? Talk to Zodro. the Sylvassi over there. if you want to learn more. You can sign up through the screen when you're ready to join.
Translated Text: Welcome. Are you here for the race? Talk to Zodro. the Sylvassi over there. if you want to learn more. You can sign up through the screen when you're ready to join.

Original Text: Are the races over yet? Good. Now. I'll have to collect my crew and sober them up.
Translated Text: Are the races over yet? Good. Now. I'll have to collect my crew and sober them up.

Original Text: I have no interest in racing. After weeks of dealing with my crew's pestering. I finally agreed to let them take a break and watch the races. While they burn through their allowance on bets. I'll just rest over here at the bar.
Translated Text: I have no interest in racing. After weeks of dealing with my crew's pestering. I finally agreed to let them take a break and watch the races. While they burn through their allowance on bets. I'll just rest over here at the bar.

Original Text: Congrats. You just won yourself 3000 credits.
Translated Text: Congrats. You just won yourself 3000 credits.

Original Text: Since you didn't win the race. you won't get any credits back from your bet. Apologies.
Translated Text: Since you didn't win the race. you won't get any credits back from your bet. Apologies.

Original Text: Congrats. You just won yourself 15000 credits.
Translated Text: Congrats. You just won yourself 15000 credits.

Original Text: Good job in the races. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?
Translated Text: Good job in the races. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?

Original Text: Sorry about the races. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?
Translated Text: Sorry about the races. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?

Original Text: Good job in the race. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?
Translated Text: Good job in the race. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?

Original Text: Sorry about the race. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?
Translated Text: Sorry about the race. Do you want to look at the components I have for sale?

Original Text: I have you down for 1000 credits. If you want a return on your bet. you're going to have to win the race.
Translated Text: I have you down for 1000 credits. If you want a return on your bet. you're going to have to win the race.

Original Text: I have you down for 5000 credits. If you want a return on your bet. you're going to have to win the race.
Translated Text: I have you down for 5000 credits. If you want a return on your bet. you're going to have to win the race.

Original Text: You don't have enough credits. sorry.
Translated Text: You don't have enough credits. sorry.

Original Text: Place your bet. But keep in mind: if you lose the race. you lose your credits.
Translated Text: Place your bet. But keep in mind: if you lose the race. you lose your credits.

Original Text: Are you here to bet or buy?
Translated Text: Are you here to bet or buy?

Original Text: So you've won the Ion Races. That's quite an accomplishment.
Translated Text: So you've won the Ion Races. That's quite an accomplishment.

Original Text: I had my bet on a different crew. They lost too.
Translated Text: I had my bet on a different crew. They lost too.

Original Text: Best of luck if you decide to continue onward. I'll be watching the final race intently.
Translated Text: Best of luck if you decide to continue onward. I'll be watching the final race intently.

Original Text: These races have been around longer than you'd expect. The first of the Ion Races took place twenty years ago. though the tracks were all different in those days. Since then. the races have become something of a tradition in our galaxy. I hope we can keep it going.
Translated Text: These races have been around longer than you'd expect. The first of the Ion Races took place twenty years ago. though the tracks were all different in those days. Since then. the races have become something of a tradition in our galaxy. I hope we can keep it going.

Original Text: Thanks for visiting the station! We don't usually get to see the winners of the Ion Races after they've won. It's nice to give our congratulations to you in person.
Translated Text: Thanks for visiting the station! We don't usually get to see the winners of the Ion Races after they've won. It's nice to give our congratulations to you in person.

Original Text: It's unfortunate that you lost the Ion Races. But hey. at least you were brave enough to try.
Translated Text: It's unfortunate that you lost the Ion Races. But hey. at least you were brave enough to try.

Original Text: What a win! You ripped through that track. Congrats!
Translated Text: What a win! You ripped through that track. Congrats!

Original Text: It's unfortunate that you lost the race. But hey. at least you were brave enough to try.
Translated Text: It's unfortunate that you lost the race. But hey. at least you were brave enough to try.

Original Text: You're the winner of the Dutain's Garage race. aren't you? You were impressive out there. Maybe I'll root for you this time around.
Translated Text: You're the winner of the Dutain's Garage race. aren't you? You were impressive out there. Maybe I'll root for you this time around.

Original Text: I've wanted to join the Ion Races for years now. but I haven't worked up the courage to participate. Good luck if you decide to join.
Translated Text: I've wanted to join the Ion Races for years now. but I haven't worked up the courage to participate. Good luck if you decide to join.

Original Text: I sell fire extinguishers and repair guns. Are you in need of better tools?
Translated Text: I sell fire extinguishers and repair guns. Are you in need of better tools?

Original Text: We're going to miss the race. Skarg! Why couldn't we have popped into existence on the other side of these damn doors?!
Translated Text: We're going to miss the race. Skarg! Why couldn't we have popped into existence on the other side of these damn doors?!

Original Text: Huzzah! You won the Ion Races! Trust me. that's an accomplishment. There are several other timelines in which you didn't win.
Translated Text: Huzzah! You won the Ion Races! Trust me. that's an accomplishment. There are several other timelines in which you didn't win.

Original Text: You didn't win the Ion Races? What a shame! If only you could bend the laws of time and space. Like by reloading a save file.
Translated Text: You didn't win the Ion Races? What a shame! If only you could bend the laws of time and space. Like by reloading a save file.

Original Text: Huzzah! You won the Ion Races! Wait. That hasn't happened yet? Well. go finish them.
