Translated Text: Huzzah! You won the Ion Races! Wait. That hasn't happened yet? Well. go finish them.

Original Text: You didn't win? What a shame! If only you could bend the laws of time and space. Like by reloading a save file.
Translated Text: You didn't win? What a shame! If only you could bend the laws of time and space. Like by reloading a save file.

Original Text: Calm down. Bolgath. At least we can see through the back-face culling. And look! Someone noticed us. Greetings! No need to pry us out. Just tell us who wins the race. all right?
Translated Text: Calm down. Bolgath. At least we can see through the back-face culling. And look! Someone noticed us. Greetings! No need to pry us out. Just tell us who wins the race. all right?

Original Text: You have officially won the Ion Races. Enjoy your prizes.
Translated Text: You have officially won the Ion Races. Enjoy your prizes.

Original Text: You have officially lost the Ion Races. My apologies.
Translated Text: You have officially lost the Ion Races. My apologies.

Original Text: The rules of this race differ from the previous tracks. In order to win you must be the first to complete one lap. flying through each of the metal rings. In addition. at several points during the race. we will send boarding bots through your teleporter. They will be equipped with high-powered turrets and have been programmed to target ship systems and nearby crewmembers. Please keep in mind: by participating in this race you acknowledge that we. the race organizers. are not liable for any damages to your ship or crew. By winning this race. you will receive 50.000 credits and an additional prize.
Translated Text: The rules of this race differ from the previous tracks. In order to win you must be the first to complete one lap. flying through each of the metal rings. In addition. at several points during the race. we will send boarding bots through your teleporter. They will be equipped with high-powered turrets and have been programmed to target ship systems and nearby crewmembers. Please keep in mind: by participating in this race you acknowledge that we. the race organizers. are not liable for any damages to your ship or crew. By winning this race. you will receive 50.000 credits and an additional prize.

Original Text: The Ion Races are comprised of three races: one at Dutain's Garage. one at W.D. Mining Station 41X. and a final one here at the Ion Port. You must win the first two races. which your crew has already done. before you are able to participate in this one. You are allowed only a single attempt at each race. though the tracks are open to practice unless a race is under way. If you win all three races. you will receive 50.000 credits and an additional prize.
Translated Text: The Ion Races are comprised of three races: one at Dutain's Garage. one at W.D. Mining Station 41X. and a final one here at the Ion Port. You must win the first two races. which your crew has already done. before you are able to participate in this one. You are allowed only a single attempt at each race. though the tracks are open to practice unless a race is under way. If you win all three races. you will receive 50.000 credits and an additional prize.

Original Text: Welcome to the last of the Ion Races. You are qualified to participate. Please use the screen to sign up if you want to compete in the final track.
Translated Text: Welcome to the last of the Ion Races. You are qualified to participate. Please use the screen to sign up if you want to compete in the final track.

Original Text: You are not yet qualified to participate in the third Ion Race. The rules of this race will only be disclosed when you have secured wins at the other two racetracks.
Translated Text: You are not yet qualified to participate in the third Ion Race. The rules of this race will only be disclosed when you have secured wins at the other two racetracks.

Original Text: The Ion Races are comprised of three races: one at Dutain's Garage. one at W.D. Mining Station 41X. and a final one here at the Ion Port. You must win the first two races before you can participate in this one. You are allowed only a single attempt at each race. though the tracks are open to practice unless a race is under way. If you win all three races. you will receive 50.000 credits and an additional prize.
Translated Text: The Ion Races are comprised of three races: one at Dutain's Garage. one at W.D. Mining Station 41X. and a final one here at the Ion Port. You must win the first two races before you can participate in this one. You are allowed only a single attempt at each race. though the tracks are open to practice unless a race is under way. If you win all three races. you will receive 50.000 credits and an additional prize.

Original Text: This track is the last of the Ion Races. You are not qualified to participate. since you have not yet earned victories at the other two tracks: Dutain's Garage and W.D. Mining Station 41X. Luckily. you still have time before the race will begin. Come back when you have secured both of the other wins. and you will be permitted to compete.
Translated Text: This track is the last of the Ion Races. You are not qualified to participate. since you have not yet earned victories at the other two tracks: Dutain's Garage and W.D. Mining Station 41X. Luckily. you still have time before the race will begin. Come back when you have secured both of the other wins. and you will be permitted to compete.

Original Text: You did well. In fact. I would say you handled that race better than we did last year. You have my congratulations.
Translated Text: You did well. In fact. I would say you handled that race better than we did last year. You have my congratulations.

Original Text: It is disappointing that you did not win. but do not be disheartened. The fact that you have come this far is already proof that you are a good crew.
Translated Text: It is disappointing that you did not win. but do not be disheartened. The fact that you have come this far is already proof that you are a good crew.

Original Text: So you are one of the new challengers. I hope you have what it takes to win this race.
Translated Text: So you are one of the new challengers. I hope you have what it takes to win this race.

Original Text: If you intend to compete in the Ion Races. you should return to this station after you have beaten the other two tracks. This third race requires two wins to enter.
Translated Text: If you intend to compete in the Ion Races. you should return to this station after you have beaten the other two tracks. This third race requires two wins to enter.

Original Text: You did it! I guess my crew will have to step aside now. since you're the new winners of the Ion Races.
Translated Text: You did it! I guess my crew will have to step aside now. since you're the new winners of the Ion Races.

Original Text: The Ion Races are difficult. You did well for a newcomer.
Translated Text: The Ion Races are difficult. You did well for a newcomer.

Original Text: Are you one of the racers? Just fly through the rings. and you'll be fine. Don't worry. If we could do it. so can you.
Translated Text: Are you one of the racers? Just fly through the rings. and you'll be fine. Don't worry. If we could do it. so can you.

Original Text: Good work out there. I'm sure people will be talking about this race for a long time.
Translated Text: Good work out there. I'm sure people will be talking about this race for a long time.

Original Text: It's too bad this is the last of the Ion Races. If you had won. you could've gotten free drinks next year.
Translated Text: It's too bad this is the last of the Ion Races. If you had won. you could've gotten free drinks next year.

Original Text: Our crew won the Ion Races last year. though we won't be participating this time. We're just here to congratulate the new winners. Plus. we get free drinks.
Translated Text: Our crew won the Ion Races last year. though we won't be participating this time. We're just here to congratulate the new winners. Plus. we get free drinks.

Original Text: Allow me to offer my congratulations. Winning the Ion Races is a great triumph.
Translated Text: Allow me to offer my congratulations. Winning the Ion Races is a great triumph.

Original Text: The winners managed their overcharge incredibly well. That must be why they won. Did you struggle with yours?
Translated Text: The winners managed their overcharge incredibly well. That must be why they won. Did you struggle with yours?

Original Text: If you are headed into the ion storm for the race. there are a few things you should know. Firstly. it is probable that your ship will begin collecting overcharge. If you fly too close to other ships. overcharge will start building between you. While overcharge can give your reactor a boost of energy. there is also the risk that it will shut down your ship. The giant metal machines out there intensify overcharge. as well. If you want to stand a chance of winning. manage your distance and overcharge as best you can.
Translated Text: If you are headed into the ion storm for the race. there are a few things you should know. Firstly. it is probable that your ship will begin collecting overcharge. If you fly too close to other ships. overcharge will start building between you. While overcharge can give your reactor a boost of energy. there is also the risk that it will shut down your ship. The giant metal machines out there intensify overcharge. as well. If you want to stand a chance of winning. manage your distance and overcharge as best you can.

Original Text: Nice work out there. Looks like you're one of us now.
Translated Text: Nice work out there. Looks like you're one of us now.

Original Text: The winners warped out of here as soon as they got their prize. We didn't even get to congratulate them. You. on the other hand. decided to come back here even though you lost. Good for you. It's better to be a good loser than a bad winner.
Translated Text: The winners warped out of here as soon as they got their prize. We didn't even get to congratulate them. You. on the other hand. decided to come back here even though you lost. Good for you. It's better to be a good loser than a bad winner.

Original Text: This race is particularly deadly. Not only do you have to deal with the storm. the overcharge. and your competitors. but the race organizers throw in an extra challenge: Boarding Bots. Nasty little things. They have powerful turrets attached to them. and they'll rip apart your ship systems if they don't rip through you first. Watch out for them. If you don't deal with them fast. they'll overwhelm you. and you can say goodbye to the grand prize.
Translated Text: This race is particularly deadly. Not only do you have to deal with the storm. the overcharge. and your competitors. but the race organizers throw in an extra challenge: Boarding Bots. Nasty little things. They have powerful turrets attached to them. and they'll rip apart your ship systems if they don't rip through you first. Watch out for them. If you don't deal with them fast. they'll overwhelm you. and you can say goodbye to the grand prize.

Original Text: I don't recognize you. You must not be one of the contestants for the race. If you want to compete. come back when you've won races at the other two tracks. Then people will take you seriously around here.
Translated Text: I don't recognize you. You must not be one of the contestants for the race. If you want to compete. come back when you've won races at the other two tracks. Then people will take you seriously around here.

Original Text: You're part of the crew that won the Ion Races! I didn't think I'd get to speak with you in person. Your performance was incredible!
Translated Text: You're part of the crew that won the Ion Races! I didn't think I'd get to speak with you in person. Your performance was incredible!

Original Text: Chikta is one of the best pilots in the galaxy. It's surreal to see her in person.
Translated Text: Chikta is one of the best pilots in the galaxy. It's surreal to see her in person.

Original Text: The ship I bet on lost to yours. Perhaps I underestimated your ship specs.
Translated Text: The ship I bet on lost to yours. Perhaps I underestimated your ship specs.

Original Text: I made a good number of credits on this race. Thanks for losing.
Translated Text: I made a good number of credits on this race. Thanks for losing.

Original Text: Let's see... Who shall I bet on?
Translated Text: Let's see... Who shall I bet on?

Original Text: You weren't the crowd favorite to win the race. but you certainly proved everyone wrong. Here are your 5000 credits back. along with an additional 10000 credits.
Translated Text: You weren't the crowd favorite to win the race. but you certainly proved everyone wrong. Here are your 5000 credits back. along with an additional 10000 credits.

Original Text: You lost the race. Unfortunately. you won't get any return on your credits. Sorry.
Translated Text: You lost the race. Unfortunately. you won't get any return on your credits. Sorry.

Original Text: You weren't the crowd favorite to win the race. but you certainly proved everyone wrong. Here are your 10000 credits back. along with an additional 20000 credits.
Translated Text: You weren't the crowd favorite to win the race. but you certainly proved everyone wrong. Here are your 10000 credits back. along with an additional 20000 credits.

Original Text: You weren't the crowd favorite to win the race. but you certainly proved everyone wrong.
Translated Text: You weren't the crowd favorite to win the race. but you certainly proved everyone wrong.

Original Text: Well. even though the race didn't pan out for you. the rest of us can call this a successful year for the Ion Races. If only it wasn't the last.
Translated Text: Well. even though the race didn't pan out for you. the rest of us can call this a successful year for the Ion Races. If only it wasn't the last.

Original Text: Don't worry. I haven't forgotten about your crew. You placed a 5000 credit bet. Go win the race. and then we'll talk.
Translated Text: Don't worry. I haven't forgotten about your crew. You placed a 5000 credit bet. Go win the race. and then we'll talk.

Original Text: Don't worry. I haven't forgotten about your crew. You placed a 10000 credit bet. Go win the race. and then we'll talk.
Translated Text: Don't worry. I haven't forgotten about your crew. You placed a 10000 credit bet. Go win the race. and then we'll talk.

Original Text: Your bet has been accounted for. Have fun in the race.
Translated Text: Your bet has been accounted for. Have fun in the race.

Original Text: Are you joking around? If you don't have the credits. you can't place a bet. So come back with more credits.
Translated Text: Are you joking around? If you don't have the credits. you can't place a bet. So come back with more credits.

Original Text: Are you one of the racers? Feel like placing a bet on yourself?
Translated Text: Are you one of the racers? Feel like placing a bet on yourself?

Original Text: Congratulations on your win. Are you looking for a drink to celebrate?
Translated Text: Congratulations on your win. Are you looking for a drink to celebrate?

Original Text: I have some drinks you might like.
Translated Text: I have some drinks you might like.

Original Text: That was some great racing. I'm impressed!
Translated Text: That was some great racing. I'm impressed!

Original Text: Don't beat yourselves up just because you lost the race. Some of those crews were veteran racers. They don't lose easily.
Translated Text: Don't beat yourselves up just because you lost the race. Some of those crews were veteran racers. They don't lose easily.

Original Text: You did good to make it this far. Dutain's Garage and the mines aren't tracks to scoff at. Good luck with the last race. and try to stay alive out there.
Translated Text: You did good to make it this far. Dutain's Garage and the mines aren't tracks to scoff at. Good luck with the last race. and try to stay alive out there.

Original Text: Are you here to watch the races or participate in them? Because if you're looking to race. you might want to check out the other two tracks first.
Translated Text: Are you here to watch the races or participate in them? Because if you're looking to race. you might want to check out the other two tracks first.

Original Text: I'm glad to see that this racetrack can still produce winners after all the obstacles that have been thrown into it. You crewed that ship well.
Translated Text: I'm glad to see that this racetrack can still produce winners after all the obstacles that have been thrown into it. You crewed that ship well.

Original Text: That was a difficult racetrack. You should be proud that you came back from it alive.
Translated Text: That was a difficult racetrack. You should be proud that you came back from it alive.

Original Text: I worked on this racetrack years ago. Back then. the storm itself was enough of a challenge. There weren't even any turrets. Our biggest feat was installing the stabilized rings to guide racers through the track. Since those days. it seems they've added more obstacles and challenges for racers to overcome. If you decide to compete this year. good luck. This might be the hardest version of the track yet.
Translated Text: I worked on this racetrack years ago. Back then. the storm itself was enough of a challenge. There weren't even any turrets. Our biggest feat was installing the stabilized rings to guide racers through the track. Since those days. it seems they've added more obstacles and challenges for racers to overcome. If you decide to compete this year. good luck. This might be the hardest version of the track yet.

Original Text: Winning the Ion Races is no easy feat. Congratulations. and good luck with your next endeavor.
Translated Text: Winning the Ion Races is no easy feat. Congratulations. and good luck with your next endeavor.

Original Text: Despite losing. you can still claim to have flown into the ion storm and lived. That accomplishment comes with its own merits.
Translated Text: Despite losing. you can still claim to have flown into the ion storm and lived. That accomplishment comes with its own merits.

Original Text: The ion storm is dangerous. Asteroids and other debris are constantly flying through the race's path. Keep your shields up and watch out for anything hurtling toward you.
Translated Text: The ion storm is dangerous. Asteroids and other debris are constantly flying through the race's path. Keep your shields up and watch out for anything hurtling toward you.

Original Text: XR-98223 found your racing methods to be adequate.
Translated Text: XR-98223 found your racing methods to be adequate.

Original Text: XR-98223 found your racing methods to be inferior. Most disappointing.
Translated Text: XR-98223 found your racing methods to be inferior. Most disappointing.

Original Text: Are you a contestant in the race? XR-98223 will be pleased to observe your performance.
Translated Text: Are you a contestant in the race? XR-98223 will be pleased to observe your performance.

Original Text: Congratulations. You have a knack for racing.
Translated Text: Congratulations. You have a knack for racing.

Original Text: I'm surprised to see you. Usually the losers of the Ion Races don't visit the station after the race. Still. good job giving the races a try. It was brave of you.
Translated Text: I'm surprised to see you. Usually the losers of the Ion Races don't visit the station after the race. Still. good job giving the races a try. It was brave of you.

Original Text: Some racers think that because this track has fewer turrets than the other two. it must be easier. Nothing could be further from the truth. A few blasts from a turret might take out your shields. but overcharge can shut down your ship and boarding bots can cause all sorts of havoc. Go into this race with a plan. or you might not come back at all.
Translated Text: Some racers think that because this track has fewer turrets than the other two. it must be easier. Nothing could be further from the truth. A few blasts from a turret might take out your shields. but overcharge can shut down your ship and boarding bots can cause all sorts of havoc. Go into this race with a plan. or you might not come back at all.

Original Text: That race looked difficult. I'm glad I didn't participate.
Translated Text: That race looked difficult. I'm glad I didn't participate.

Original Text: This is my first time watching the Ion Races. I was planning on joining next year. but with the races being postponed indefinitely after this one. it seems I won't get the chance. At least I can enjoy the show.
Translated Text: This is my first time watching the Ion Races. I was planning on joining next year. but with the races being postponed indefinitely after this one. it seems I won't get the chance. At least I can enjoy the show.

Original Text: So was it true? Was the secret prize really a Lost Colony data fragment? If you decide to hunt down the Lost Colony like everyone else now. you should be careful. It sounds dangerous.
Translated Text: So was it true? Was the secret prize really a Lost Colony data fragment? If you decide to hunt down the Lost Colony like everyone else now. you should be careful. It sounds dangerous.

Original Text: I wonder if the winner is going to seek out the Lost Colony now. Sounds dangerous.
Translated Text: I wonder if the winner is going to seek out the Lost Colony now. Sounds dangerous.

Original Text: According to rumor. the winner of all three races will receive a secret prize in addition to the credit reward. Some say it's one of those Lost Colony data fragments. If that's true. the fragment is probably worth more than the credit prize. But who knows. they might just be trying to get rid of it. Having one of those data fragments is dangerous. considering all the people who would want to get their hands on it.
Translated Text: According to rumor. the winner of all three races will receive a secret prize in addition to the credit reward. Some say it's one of those Lost Colony data fragments. If that's true. the fragment is probably worth more than the credit prize. But who knows. they might just be trying to get rid of it. Having one of those data fragments is dangerous. considering all the people who would want to get their hands on it.

Original Text: I've got components for sale. Even though the races are over. a capable ship is still nice to have.
Translated Text: I've got components for sale. Even though the races are over. a capable ship is still nice to have.

Original Text: I've got components for sale. Why not take a look? Some of them might help you out in the races.
Translated Text: I've got components for sale. Why not take a look? Some of them might help you out in the races.

Original Text: Thank you! You're truly kind. Please. keep the Sylvassi a secret. We made sure that they'll be taken care of by the Colonial Union. so long as the Corporation doesn't catch wind of their escape. Once again. thank you. I guarantee you won't hear from us again.
Translated Text: Thank you! You're truly kind. Please. keep the Sylvassi a secret. We made sure that they'll be taken care of by the Colonial Union. so long as the Corporation doesn't catch wind of their escape. Once again. thank you. I guarantee you won't hear from us again.

Original Text: All right. we sent the credits over to you. Thank you for sparing us. We know we aren't in a position to ask for much. but please. keep the Sylvassi a secret. We made sure that they'll be taken care of by the Colonial Union. so long as the Corporation doesn't catch wind of their escape.
Translated Text: All right. we sent the credits over to you. Thank you for sparing us. We know we aren't in a position to ask for much. but please. keep the Sylvassi a secret. We made sure that they'll be taken care of by the Colonial Union. so long as the Corporation doesn't catch wind of their escape.

Original Text: If you plan to eliminate us. we won't go down without a fight.
Translated Text: If you plan to eliminate us. we won't go down without a fight.

Original Text: We don't have much money. but we can offer one-thousand credits. It's probably nowhere near the price of the bounty on us. but it's all we have right now. Will that be enough?
Translated Text: We don't have much money. but we can offer one-thousand credits. It's probably nowhere near the price of the bounty on us. but it's all we have right now. Will that be enough?

Original Text: The Corporation is lying. We were sent to a W.D. factory to perform a routine inspection. but what we found was horrifying. The Sylvassi laborers were being mistreated. Our crew couldn't let it continue. We'll admit that we sabotaged the factory to facilitate the Sylvassi workers' escape. but we didn't kidnap them. We took them somewhere safe. Please. if you have any compassion. forget about the bounty and spare us. We'll ditch our ship and disappear. Despite what the W.D. Corporation says. we aren't criminals!
Translated Text: The Corporation is lying. We were sent to a W.D. factory to perform a routine inspection. but what we found was horrifying. The Sylvassi laborers were being mistreated. Our crew couldn't let it continue. We'll admit that we sabotaged the factory to facilitate the Sylvassi workers' escape. but we didn't kidnap them. We took them somewhere safe. Please. if you have any compassion. forget about the bounty and spare us. We'll ditch our ship and disappear. Despite what the W.D. Corporation says. we aren't criminals!

Original Text: Wait. please don't attack us! We aren't kidnappers! The Sylvassi workers are safe!
Translated Text: Wait. please don't attack us! We aren't kidnappers! The Sylvassi workers are safe!

Original Text: Grey Huntsmen. it is a pleasure to meet at last. Finally. one of you has fallen into our trap. We will enjoy ridding you from this galaxy.
Translated Text: Grey Huntsmen. it is a pleasure to meet at last. Finally. one of you has fallen into our trap. We will enjoy ridding you from this galaxy.

Original Text: WANTED: U.S.S. XARIUS - 7.000 CREDIT REWARD. Outrider-class 'U.S.S. Xarius' was recently discovered to be involved with a drug smuggling operation led by infamous sundust producer Tam Mora. After the U.S.S. Xarius had a falling out with Mora. its illegal activities were exposed to the Colonial Union Command Center through an anonymous tip. Xarius has since resisted arrest and destroyed all ships that attempted to apprehend it. Recent information has come in pinpointing a possible location of intercept between Xarius and a mercenary vessel called 'The Butcher'. which is believed to have been hired by Mora to rid of Xarius. Infighting is expected. The Butcher is also wanted for unrelated crimes. and its contract may be optionally accepted in addition to the bounty on Xarius. Reward of 7.000 credits for U.S.S. Xarius. funded by the Colonial Union. Reward of 5.000 credits for The Butcher. funded by an anonymous requester.
Translated Text: WANTED: U.S.S. XARIUS - 7.000 CREDIT REWARD. Outrider-class 'U.S.S. Xarius' was recently discovered to be involved with a drug smuggling operation led by infamous sundust producer Tam Mora. After the U.S.S. Xarius had a falling out with Mora. its illegal activities were exposed to the Colonial Union Command Center through an anonymous tip. Xarius has since resisted arrest and destroyed all ships that attempted to apprehend it. Recent information has come in pinpointing a possible location of intercept between Xarius and a mercenary vessel called 'The Butcher'. which is believed to have been hired by Mora to rid of Xarius. Infighting is expected. The Butcher is also wanted for unrelated crimes. and its contract may be optionally accepted in addition to the bounty on Xarius. Reward of 7.000 credits for U.S.S. Xarius. funded by the Colonial Union. Reward of 5.000 credits for The Butcher. funded by an anonymous requester.

Original Text: WANTED: CRUMB CLEANERS - 5.000 CREDIT REWARD. After being at the bottom of the sales chart for several Union-standard days. the Fluffy Biscuit vessel 'Crumb Cleaners' suddenly severed contact with its managers and began attacking any vessels it came into contact with. Several civilian ships have been assaulted by Crumb Cleaners. with one being destroyed. Crumb Cleaners has since been deemed a substantial threat to public safety. It is unknown what triggered such a violent reaction from the crew. though some kind of chemical exposure is suspected. Crumb Cleaners is a Fluffy One-class vessel. Based on reports. it seems to be outfitted with chemical weaponry. Reward of 5.000 credits. funded by the Fluffy Biscuit Company. the Colonial Union. and the Civilian Transport Association.
Translated Text: WANTED: CRUMB CLEANERS - 5.000 CREDIT REWARD. After being at the bottom of the sales chart for several Union-standard days. the Fluffy Biscuit vessel 'Crumb Cleaners' suddenly severed contact with its managers and began attacking any vessels it came into contact with. Several civilian ships have been assaulted by Crumb Cleaners. with one being destroyed. Crumb Cleaners has since been deemed a substantial threat to public safety. It is unknown what triggered such a violent reaction from the crew. though some kind of chemical exposure is suspected. Crumb Cleaners is a Fluffy One-class vessel. Based on reports. it seems to be outfitted with chemical weaponry. Reward of 5.000 credits. funded by the Fluffy Biscuit Company. the Colonial Union. and the Civilian Transport Association.

Original Text: WANTED: UNIT 10. DIV #44 - 8.000 CREDIT REWARD. W.D. Unit 10. Div #44 broke into a restricted W.D. Corporation factory and kidnapped several workers. Due to a zero-cooperation policy regarding extortion. the W.D. Corporation refused to abide by any ransom terms and now believes the kidnapped workers to be dead. Since the Corporation's security drones have been unable to capture or eliminate the kidnappers. the Grey Huntsmen have been enlisted to help. Unit 10. Div #44 is a Cruiser-class starship and is reportedly equipped with a strong shield generator and hull. Reward of 8.000 credits. funded by the W.D. Corporation.
Translated Text: WANTED: UNIT 10. DIV #44 - 8.000 CREDIT REWARD. W.D. Unit 10. Div #44 broke into a restricted W.D. Corporation factory and kidnapped several workers. Due to a zero-cooperation policy regarding extortion. the W.D. Corporation refused to abide by any ransom terms and now believes the kidnapped workers to be dead. Since the Corporation's security drones have been unable to capture or eliminate the kidnappers. the Grey Huntsmen have been enlisted to help. Unit 10. Div #44 is a Cruiser-class starship and is reportedly equipped with a strong shield generator and hull. Reward of 8.000 credits. funded by the W.D. Corporation.

Original Text: WANTED: DEATHSEEKER DRONE - 5.000 CREDIT REWARD. A Deathseeker drone that was recently purchased by a collector named Rumibard Warger was mistakenly activated and is running rampant in Colonial Union space. It needs to be deactivated immediately. Deathseeker drones do not have ranged weapons but ram into ships with blades that can rip apart hulls. Reward of 5.000 credits. funded by the Colonial Union.
Translated Text: WANTED: DEATHSEEKER DRONE - 5.000 CREDIT REWARD. A Deathseeker drone that was recently purchased by a collector named Rumibard Warger was mistakenly activated and is running rampant in Colonial Union space. It needs to be deactivated immediately. Deathseeker drones do not have ranged weapons but ram into ships with blades that can rip apart hulls. Reward of 5.000 credits. funded by the Colonial Union.

Original Text: WANTED: THE STRIKER - 9.000 CREDIT REWARD. Destroyer-class starship 'The Striker' is a stolen vessel. Its crew is known for hijacking security drones and other automated weaponry. and they are responsible for massive damages and casualties across the galaxy. Reports state that The Striker recently hacked into a pair of shock drones and has been using them to threaten civilian transports. attacking anyone who does not comply with its demands. Witnesses claim that The Striker is utilizing a lightning turret to attack in tandem with the shock drones. Reward of 9.000 credits. funded by the Colonial Union Sector Defense Division. the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. and the Civilian Transport Association.
Translated Text: WANTED: THE STRIKER - 9.000 CREDIT REWARD. Destroyer-class starship 'The Striker' is a stolen vessel. Its crew is known for hijacking security drones and other automated weaponry. and they are responsible for massive damages and casualties across the galaxy. Reports state that The Striker recently hacked into a pair of shock drones and has been using them to threaten civilian transports. attacking anyone who does not comply with its demands. Witnesses claim that The Striker is utilizing a lightning turret to attack in tandem with the shock drones. Reward of 9.000 credits. funded by the Colonial Union Sector Defense Division. the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. and the Civilian Transport Association.

Original Text: WANTED: THE UMBRA - 5.000 CREDIT REWARD. For several Union-standard weeks. Carrier-class starship 'The Umbra' had been harassing a cargo storage station called the Abrium Galactic Warehouse. Over that period of time. The Umbra never penetrated the warehouse's defenses. The owner of the Abrium warehouse considered The Umbra a nuisance but did not bother sending a report to the Colonial Union. During The Umbra's most recent attack. however. it worked with another ship. breached the warehouse's defenses. and slew three workers before stealing a CU long range turret and an advanced fusion reactor. Reward of 5.000 credits. funded by Abrium Galactic Warehouse and an anonymous requester.
Translated Text: WANTED: THE UMBRA - 5.000 CREDIT REWARD. For several Union-standard weeks. Carrier-class starship 'The Umbra' had been harassing a cargo storage station called the Abrium Galactic Warehouse. Over that period of time. The Umbra never penetrated the warehouse's defenses. The owner of the Abrium warehouse considered The Umbra a nuisance but did not bother sending a report to the Colonial Union. During The Umbra's most recent attack. however. it worked with another ship. breached the warehouse's defenses. and slew three workers before stealing a CU long range turret and an advanced fusion reactor. Reward of 5.000 credits. funded by Abrium Galactic Warehouse and an anonymous requester.

Original Text: I didn't expect that we'd come across a W.D. crew out here. If you don't mind. could you just forget what you've seen on this planet?
Translated Text: I didn't expect that we'd come across a W.D. crew out here. If you don't mind. could you just forget what you've seen on this planet?

Original Text: We were working under terrible conditions in a Corporation factory. but then a W.D. crew helped us escape. They dropped us off on this planet and left us with some rations and tools so we could wait for a rescue party to take us to Outpost 448. That W.D. crew took a big risk for us. I hope they're all right.
Translated Text: We were working under terrible conditions in a Corporation factory. but then a W.D. crew helped us escape. They dropped us off on this planet and left us with some rations and tools so we could wait for a rescue party to take us to Outpost 448. That W.D. crew took a big risk for us. I hope they're all right.

Original Text: Thanks for your help earlier. Maybe we'll get off this planet alive after all.
Translated Text: Thanks for your help earlier. Maybe we'll get off this planet alive after all.

Original Text: That's a huge relief! Maybe we'll get off this planet alive after all. Please. take this component. It isn't much. but it's all I have to show my appreciation.
Translated Text: That's a huge relief! Maybe we'll get off this planet alive after all. Please. take this component. It isn't much. but it's all I have to show my appreciation.

Original Text: Back so soon? Are the crawlers gone?
Translated Text: Back so soon? Are the crawlers gone?

Original Text: Oh. thank you! I could really use a good night of sleep. I keep worrying that I'll wake up one night with one of those creatures gnawing through my suit.
Translated Text: Oh. thank you! I could really use a good night of sleep. I keep worrying that I'll wake up one night with one of those creatures gnawing through my suit.

Original Text: You won't do it? Well. I understand. I don't want to go out there either.
Translated Text: You won't do it? Well. I understand. I don't want to go out there either.

Original Text: Those crawlers are out there. I think they're waiting for us to let down our guard. I'm not convinced that these walls of ours will keep them out forever. Do you think...you could you take them on? I don't have any credits. but I did strip a nice component off the crashed security drone. You can have it if you help me out.
Translated Text: Those crawlers are out there. I think they're waiting for us to let down our guard. I'm not convinced that these walls of ours will keep them out forever. Do you think...you could you take them on? I don't have any credits. but I did strip a nice component off the crashed security drone. You can have it if you help me out.

Original Text: What do you want? Why are you on this planet?
Translated Text: What do you want? Why are you on this planet?

Original Text: We're stuck on this planet. just waiting for a Colonial Union rescue party. Through some convoluted bureaucracy. our situation isn't considered an immediate life-threatening emergency. Plus. it's made even more complicated due to the fact that we escaped from the W.D. Corporation. The Colonial Union ship that was sent to rescue us is sitting in space until someone can sort out the documentation to grant us passage to Outpost 448. I just hope our rations don't run out before they finally get their paperwork in order.
Translated Text: We're stuck on this planet. just waiting for a Colonial Union rescue party. Through some convoluted bureaucracy. our situation isn't considered an immediate life-threatening emergency. Plus. it's made even more complicated due to the fact that we escaped from the W.D. Corporation. The Colonial Union ship that was sent to rescue us is sitting in space until someone can sort out the documentation to grant us passage to Outpost 448. I just hope our rations don't run out before they finally get their paperwork in order.

Original Text: ...You work for the W.D. Corporation? You're not going to turn us in. are you?
Translated Text: ...You work for the W.D. Corporation? You're not going to turn us in. are you?

Original Text: These large vines move every few days. Sometimes I even hear the security drone creaking. like it's being crushed. I don't know if the vines have any kind of intelligence. but they haven't responded to our presence so far. thankfully. Still. I wonder how many more of them are lurking beneath the sand on this planet.
Translated Text: These large vines move every few days. Sometimes I even hear the security drone creaking. like it's being crushed. I don't know if the vines have any kind of intelligence. but they haven't responded to our presence so far. thankfully. Still. I wonder how many more of them are lurking beneath the sand on this planet.

Original Text: I don't know whether or not you're one of those employees that blindly follows W.D. Corporation orders. but please. don't report us to your supervisors. It wouldn't be profitable for the Corporation to hunt us down anyway.
Translated Text: I don't know whether or not you're one of those employees that blindly follows W.D. Corporation orders. but please. don't report us to your supervisors. It wouldn't be profitable for the Corporation to hunt us down anyway.

Original Text: Nati and Uleq are getting increasingly nervous. They want to get off this planet as soon as possible. I. however. am enjoying the peace and quiet. I can't remember the last time I felt this free.
Translated Text: Nati and Uleq are getting increasingly nervous. They want to get off this planet as soon as possible. I. however. am enjoying the peace and quiet. I can't remember the last time I felt this free.

Original Text: Always glad to have another huntsman among us. You'll receive notices on bounties through long range comms. though you aren't obliged to accept every job that's offered. We have plenty of hunters to pick up the work if you find yourself indisposed. If you accept a job. complete it and you'll be paid.
Translated Text: Always glad to have another huntsman among us. You'll receive notices on bounties through long range comms. though you aren't obliged to accept every job that's offered. We have plenty of hunters to pick up the work if you find yourself indisposed. If you accept a job. complete it and you'll be paid.

Original Text: Very well. Speak to me again if you reconsider.
Translated Text: Very well. Speak to me again if you reconsider.

Original Text: All hunters must consent to the following contract: Most jobs accepted through the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency are time sensitive and should be completed with haste. or they will be reassigned to another crew. To receive the rewards of the bounty. the target ship or ships must be destroyed. As tempting as it may be to capture a vessel. many of these ships are infamous and wanted due to heinous crimes. As a Grey Huntsman. you acknowledge that these ships should not be repurposed. Do you agree to these terms?
Translated Text: All hunters must consent to the following contract: Most jobs accepted through the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency are time sensitive and should be completed with haste. or they will be reassigned to another crew. To receive the rewards of the bounty. the target ship or ships must be destroyed. As tempting as it may be to capture a vessel. many of these ships are infamous and wanted due to heinous crimes. As a Grey Huntsman. you acknowledge that these ships should not be repurposed. Do you agree to these terms?

Original Text: The Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency was formed forty-seven Union-standard years ago. Captains from several factions and companies banded together to take down ships that were posing a significant threat to the galaxy. Though relations are strained between some of the organizations our bounty hunters belong to. being part of the Grey Huntsmen represents union in an important goal: making the galaxy safer for everyone.
Translated Text: The Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency was formed forty-seven Union-standard years ago. Captains from several factions and companies banded together to take down ships that were posing a significant threat to the galaxy. Though relations are strained between some of the organizations our bounty hunters belong to. being part of the Grey Huntsmen represents union in an important goal: making the galaxy safer for everyone.

Original Text: Welcome. Looking to join the Grey Huntsmen? Our hunters receive plenty of work and are paid well.
Translated Text: Welcome. Looking to join the Grey Huntsmen? Our hunters receive plenty of work and are paid well.

Original Text: It's a Lost Colony data fragment. Since the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency has no interest in pursuing the Lost Colony. I trust a crew as capable as yours will know what to do with the fragment. Thank you for your service to the galaxy. May the stars favor your voyages.
Translated Text: It's a Lost Colony data fragment. Since the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency has no interest in pursuing the Lost Colony. I trust a crew as capable as yours will know what to do with the fragment. Thank you for your service to the galaxy. May the stars favor your voyages.

Original Text: I beg you to reconsider. Nevertheless. your work at the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency is appreciated.
Translated Text: I beg you to reconsider. Nevertheless. your work at the Grey Huntsmen Bounty Agency is appreciated.

Original Text: Greetings. hunter. I've heard many reports of your fine work. You have proven yourself to be an invaluable member of the Grey Huntsmen. As such. I would like to entrust something very valuable to you. Do you accept?
Translated Text: Greetings. hunter. I've heard many reports of your fine work. You have proven yourself to be an invaluable member of the Grey Huntsmen. As such. I would like to entrust something very valuable to you. Do you accept?

Original Text: Consider it done. You are no longer part of the Grey Huntsmen. Farewell.
Translated Text: Consider it done. You are no longer part of the Grey Huntsmen. Farewell.

Original Text: I'm glad that you reconsidered. Please don't hesitate to speak with me if you need anything else.
Translated Text: I'm glad that you reconsidered. Please don't hesitate to speak with me if you need anything else.

Original Text: You intend to leave the Grey Huntsmen? That's unfortunate to hear. but I understand that the job can be taxing. Are you certain that you want to retract your membership among us?
Translated Text: You intend to leave the Grey Huntsmen? That's unfortunate to hear. but I understand that the job can be taxing. Are you certain that you want to retract your membership among us?

Original Text: It's a shame you left the Grey Huntsman. but I hope all is well with you and your crew. Take care.
Translated Text: It's a shame you left the Grey Huntsman. but I hope all is well with you and your crew. Take care.

Original Text: So there have been reports of attacks in that quadrant... If I can just verify the distress signals along this route... Oh. apologies. I'm in the middle of a breakthrough. I didn't notice you standing there. Do you need something?
Translated Text: So there have been reports of attacks in that quadrant... If I can just verify the distress signals along this route... Oh. apologies. I'm in the middle of a breakthrough. I didn't notice you standing there. Do you need something?

Original Text: There are many logs to be decrypted and much data to sort through. If you do not have anything to report. I should resume my work.
Translated Text: There are many logs to be decrypted and much data to sort through. If you do not have anything to report. I should resume my work.

Original Text: There was an issue in the assignment of a bounty contract. and these two captains received the same target. Though they worked together to bring down the wanted ship. they are both demanding the full reward. Please excuse XR-55614. This negotiation may take some time.
Translated Text: There was an issue in the assignment of a bounty contract. and these two captains received the same target. Though they worked together to bring down the wanted ship. they are both demanding the full reward. Please excuse XR-55614. This negotiation may take some time.

Original Text: More bounties have been coming in after the transmission. Seems like many crews are dropping everything to hunt for the Lost Colony. Plus. there are some 'opportunists' who think that in all the chaos. they can get away with almost anything. The Grey Huntsmen will put a swift end to that kind of thinking.
Translated Text: More bounties have been coming in after the transmission. Seems like many crews are dropping everything to hunt for the Lost Colony. Plus. there are some 'opportunists' who think that in all the chaos. they can get away with almost anything. The Grey Huntsmen will put a swift end to that kind of thinking.

Original Text: Brogan and Larentios go through countless reports. logs and distress signals to collect information on elusive targets. I wouldn't have the concentration to do their jobs. They make the actual bounty hunting look easy.
Translated Text: Brogan and Larentios go through countless reports. logs and distress signals to collect information on elusive targets. I wouldn't have the concentration to do their jobs. They make the actual bounty hunting look easy.

Original Text: Greetings. Are you here to become a bounty hunter? If so. speak with Remigus Nalidak. He can give you more information about joining the Grey Huntsmen.
Translated Text: Greetings. Are you here to become a bounty hunter? If so. speak with Remigus Nalidak. He can give you more information about joining the Grey Huntsmen.

Original Text: Trying to get information on the newest bounties? I used to be eager like that. but now I let the contracts come to me. A fringe galaxy such as this one has no shortage of wanted ships... Unless another bounty hunter is given the same contract as you. that is.
Translated Text: Trying to get information on the newest bounties? I used to be eager like that. but now I let the contracts come to me. A fringe galaxy such as this one has no shortage of wanted ships... Unless another bounty hunter is given the same contract as you. that is.

Original Text: My crew and I have been members of the Grey Huntsman for years now. The W.D. Corporation tends to be stingy with job payments. so picking up the occasional bounty contract helps bring in more credits. It usually works out quite well for us. but today is an exception. This Colonial Union officer says that his crew deserves the reward because they reached the wanted ship first. even though my crew did most of the work in taking it down. I refuse to leave this station until I get the credits that I'm owed.
Translated Text: My crew and I have been members of the Grey Huntsman for years now. The W.D. Corporation tends to be stingy with job payments. so picking up the occasional bounty contract helps bring in more credits. It usually works out quite well for us. but today is an exception. This Colonial Union officer says that his crew deserves the reward because they reached the wanted ship first. even though my crew did most of the work in taking it down. I refuse to leave this station until I get the credits that I'm owed.

Original Text: Finally I found someone with guts. Please. avenge my friend.
Translated Text: Finally I found someone with guts. Please. avenge my friend.

Original Text: Fine then. I'll find someone else who isn't such a coward.
Translated Text: Fine then. I'll find someone else who isn't such a coward.

Original Text: A while ago. my friend's ship was caught too close to a black hole and was forced to blind jump. Luck wasn't on their side. and they dropped out of warp in infected space. By the time they sent out a distress signal. it was far too late. They were quickly overtaken by an infected carrier. When I discovered what happened. I urged the Colonial Union to track down the infected carrier and kill it. but they refused to listen to me. Now that loathsome creature is running free out there. I know it's impossible to find the exact carrier that was responsible. but I can't rest until someone has claimed some justice for my friend's death. I'm offering 20.000 credits to anyone who can hunt down and destroy an infected carrier for me. How about it? Are you too afraid to face off against the infected? Or will you help me get revenge?
Translated Text: A while ago. my friend's ship was caught too close to a black hole and was forced to blind jump. Luck wasn't on their side. and they dropped out of warp in infected space. By the time they sent out a distress signal. it was far too late. They were quickly overtaken by an infected carrier. When I discovered what happened. I urged the Colonial Union to track down the infected carrier and kill it. but they refused to listen to me. Now that loathsome creature is running free out there. I know it's impossible to find the exact carrier that was responsible. but I can't rest until someone has claimed some justice for my friend's death. I'm offering 20.000 credits to anyone who can hunt down and destroy an infected carrier for me. How about it? Are you too afraid to face off against the infected? Or will you help me get revenge?

Original Text: Are you one of the Grey Huntsmen? No matter. Please. hear me out. I have a dangerous job for you. but I'm willing to pay a great deal for your assistance.
Translated Text: Are you one of the Grey Huntsmen? No matter. Please. hear me out. I have a dangerous job for you. but I'm willing to pay a great deal for your assistance.

Original Text: You've given me a bit of closure. Thank you. Here are the credits. as promised. Stay alive out there. all right?
Translated Text: You've given me a bit of closure. Thank you. Here are the credits. as promised. Stay alive out there. all right?

Original Text: Did you hunt down an infected carrier?
Translated Text: Did you hunt down an infected carrier?

Original Text: You've given me a bit of closure. Thank you. Stay alive out there. all right?
Translated Text: You've given me a bit of closure. Thank you. Stay alive out there. all right?

Original Text: WANTED: THE DRAFTERS - 7.000 CREDIT REWARD. The Drafters are a group of raiders who are highly experienced in mechanical engineering. They attack heavy transport ships and research facilities to steal prototypes of new technology. which they then modify and sell on the black market. They have broken into numerous ships and facilities. killing over two-dozen workers in their attempts to steal experimental technology. A recent report claimed that the Drafters are operating out of a planetary base near your location. Shut down the Drafters' operation to receive the bounty. Reward of 7.000 credits. funded by the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Dark Star Navigation Inc.. and Explorers United.
Translated Text: WANTED: THE DRAFTERS - 7.000 CREDIT REWARD. The Drafters are a group of raiders who are highly experienced in mechanical engineering. They attack heavy transport ships and research facilities to steal prototypes of new technology. which they then modify and sell on the black market. They have broken into numerous ships and facilities. killing over two-dozen workers in their attempts to steal experimental technology. A recent report claimed that the Drafters are operating out of a planetary base near your location. Shut down the Drafters' operation to receive the bounty. Reward of 7.000 credits. funded by the Wolden-Dorf Corporation. Dark Star Navigation Inc.. and Explorers United.

Original Text: WANTED: BISCUIT BURNERS - 8.000 CREDIT REWARD. The Biscuit Burners are a group of raiders that primarily target Fluffy Biscuit delivery ships and are responsible for nearly a dozen ship destructions. Their persistent attacks on delivery ships have contributed to rising animosity towards the Fluffy Biscuit Company within Cornelia Station. where Fluffy Biscuit crews have already been banned from entry. The Biscuit Burners conduct coordinated strikes against Fluffy Biscuit ships. tracking their delivery routes within a certain range of Cornelia Station. Since the Biscuit Burners are well established. they need to be eliminated at their base of operations on Cornelia Station. Reports indicate that they work out of a gutted Fluffy Biscuit delivery ship within the market section of the station. Reward of 8.000 credits. funded by the Fluffy Biscuit Company.
Translated Text: WANTED: BISCUIT BURNERS - 8.000 CREDIT REWARD. The Biscuit Burners are a group of raiders that primarily target Fluffy Biscuit delivery ships and are responsible for nearly a dozen ship destructions. Their persistent attacks on delivery ships have contributed to rising animosity towards the Fluffy Biscuit Company within Cornelia Station. where Fluffy Biscuit crews have already been banned from entry. The Biscuit Burners conduct coordinated strikes against Fluffy Biscuit ships. tracking their delivery routes within a certain range of Cornelia Station. Since the Biscuit Burners are well established. they need to be eliminated at their base of operations on Cornelia Station. Reports indicate that they work out of a gutted Fluffy Biscuit delivery ship within the market section of the station. Reward of 8.000 credits. funded by the Fluffy Biscuit Company.

Original Text: Thank you for your assistance. I hope to hear of more remarkable feats from your crew in the future. Together. we survive.
Translated Text: Thank you for your assistance. I hope to hear of more remarkable feats from your crew in the future. Together. we survive.

Original Text: The matter is regarding the fabled Lost Colony. Until now. the Colonial Union's main focus has been mitigating the chaos that the transmission  brought to the galaxy. However. I acknowledge that finding the Lost Colony before it falls into the wrong hands is of great importance. It is my hope that a crew of admirable officers such as yourselves can represent the Colonial Union in this race to find the Lost Colony. Thus. I am entrusting you with a Lost Colony data fragment. Please use it wisely. Good luck. and together. we survive.
Translated Text: The matter is regarding the fabled Lost Colony. Until now. the Colonial Union's main focus has been mitigating the chaos that the transmission  brought to the galaxy. However. I acknowledge that finding the Lost Colony before it falls into the wrong hands is of great importance. It is my hope that a crew of admirable officers such as yourselves can represent the Colonial Union in this race to find the Lost Colony. Thus. I am entrusting you with a Lost Colony data fragment. Please use it wisely. Good luck. and together. we survive.

Original Text: You did excellent work. After you eliminated the source of the breach. the rescue crews were able to get the last survivors out safely. They have been sent to the medical bay and are expected to make full recoveries. Doctor Vilvard was heavily injured. but due to the medicine you administered to him. he was able to survive. Apparently. he communicated to the rescue crew that he is immensely grateful to you for saving his life and those of the other researchers. I. too. must thank you for your assistance in this mission. But before you leave. there is one other matter I wish to bring to your attention.
Translated Text: You did excellent work. After you eliminated the source of the breach. the rescue crews were able to get the last survivors out safely. They have been sent to the medical bay and are expected to make full recoveries. Doctor Vilvard was heavily injured. but due to the medicine you administered to him. he was able to survive. Apparently. he communicated to the rescue crew that he is immensely grateful to you for saving his life and those of the other researchers. I. too. must thank you for your assistance in this mission. But before you leave. there is one other matter I wish to bring to your attention.

Original Text: You did excellent work. After you eliminated the source of the breach. the rescue crews were able to get the last survivors out safely. Many of them have been sent to the medical bay and are expected to make full recoveries. Doctor Vilvard. however. was not so fortunate. Shrapnel had pierced through his vital organs. and his genetic data was not attuned to any nearby medical atrium before he passed away. Apparently. he communicated to the rescue crew that he was immensely grateful to you. I. too. must thank you for your assistance in this mission. But before you leave. there is one other matter I wish to bring to your attention.
Translated Text: You did excellent work. After you eliminated the source of the breach. the rescue crews were able to get the last survivors out safely. Many of them have been sent to the medical bay and are expected to make full recoveries. Doctor Vilvard. however. was not so fortunate. Shrapnel had pierced through his vital organs. and his genetic data was not attuned to any nearby medical atrium before he passed away. Apparently. he communicated to the rescue crew that he was immensely grateful to you. I. too. must thank you for your assistance in this mission. But before you leave. there is one other matter I wish to bring to your attention.

Original Text: Allow me to explain why you're here. By now. you are likely aware of the disconnected section of our station. what the inhabitants of Outpost 448 have been referring to as the 'Wasted Wing'. It was formerly a research wing used for private labs and classified Colonial Union research projects. Due to the risks posed by some of the experiments. the research wing had a security protocol in place called 'Code Black'. in which the wing detaches from Outpost 448 and performs a very limited range warp jump to a safe. prespecified location. It was designed to be used in the event of an uncontrollable outbreak or containment breach. and it was to be activated only if the wing was beyond saving or the lives of the citizens of Outpost 448 were in jeopardy. Recently and without warning. the Code Black protocol was initiated. At this time. we have been unable to establish communication with anyone inside the research wing. and we do not know what sort of event triggered Code Black. What we do know is that many life support systems are still functioning. and our scans have shown some life signatures. The signatures have been slowly diminishing. but I believe that with a great deal of caution. it might be possible to rescue the survivors and recover any salvageable research projects. I've prepared several teams of Colonial Union officers to do just that. However. we need to send in an initial crew to sweep out any dangers from the wing before the rescue teams can be sent in. You have been selected for this task. Warp to the research wing. identify any survivors. and most importantly: find and eliminate the source of the outbreak. Only one teleporter is currently functional within the research wing. That will be your point of entry. After that. you'll have to navigate through the research wing on your own. It sustained heavy damage in the warp detachment. so its structural integrity is likely to be compromised. Any other teleporters that withstood the blast will have to be brought back online. In addition. a sensor will be added to your visual feed. It will display a strange signature that we've been picking up and believe is being emitted by the source. The sensor will detect the signature's surges. which seem to be linked to the stability of the station. If the signature grows stronger and more frequent. it is possible that large-scale breach could be imminent. If the source is not eliminated before then. our mission will fail. Good luck. And together. we survive.
Translated Text: Allow me to explain why you're here. By now. you are likely aware of the disconnected section of our station. what the inhabitants of Outpost 448 have been referring to as the 'Wasted Wing'. It was formerly a research wing used for private labs and classified Colonial Union research projects. Due to the risks posed by some of the experiments. the research wing had a security protocol in place called 'Code Black'. in which the wing detaches from Outpost 448 and performs a very limited range warp jump to a safe. prespecified location. It was designed to be used in the event of an uncontrollable outbreak or containment breach. and it was to be activated only if the wing was beyond saving or the lives of the citizens of Outpost 448 were in jeopardy. Recently and without warning. the Code Black protocol was initiated. At this time. we have been unable to establish communication with anyone inside the research wing. and we do not know what sort of event triggered Code Black. What we do know is that many life support systems are still functioning. and our scans have shown some life signatures. The signatures have been slowly diminishing. but I believe that with a great deal of caution. it might be possible to rescue the survivors and recover any salvageable research projects. I've prepared several teams of Colonial Union officers to do just that. However. we need to send in an initial crew to sweep out any dangers from the wing before the rescue teams can be sent in. You have been selected for this task. Warp to the research wing. identify any survivors. and most importantly: find and eliminate the source of the outbreak. Only one teleporter is currently functional within the research wing. That will be your point of entry. After that. you'll have to navigate through the research wing on your own. It sustained heavy damage in the warp detachment. so its structural integrity is likely to be compromised. Any other teleporters that withstood the blast will have to be brought back online. In addition. a sensor will be added to your visual feed. It will display a strange signature that we've been picking up and believe is being emitted by the source. The sensor will detect the signature's surges. which seem to be linked to the stability of the station. If the signature grows stronger and more frequent. it is possible that large-scale breach could be imminent. If the source is not eliminated before then. our mission will fail. Good luck. And together. we survive.

Original Text: I have already briefed you on the situation. Do I need to repeat myself?
Translated Text: I have already briefed you on the situation. Do I need to repeat myself?

Original Text: I must ask you to remove yourself from the Command Center immediately. Lives are at stake. and we cannot waste time on reluctant officers.
Translated Text: I must ask you to remove yourself from the Command Center immediately. Lives are at stake. and we cannot waste time on reluctant officers.

Original Text: Only one teleporter is currently functional within the research wing. That will be your point of entry. After that. you'll have to navigate through the research wing on your own. It sustained heavy damage in the warp detachment. so its structural integrity is likely to be compromised. Any other teleporters that withstood the blast will have to be brought back online. In addition. a sensor will be added to your visual feed. It will display a strange signature that we've been picking up and believe is being emitted by the source. The sensor will detect the signature's surges. which seem to be linked to the stability of the station. If the signature grows stronger and more frequent. it is possible that large-scale breach could be imminent. If the source is not eliminated before then. our mission will fail. Good luck. And together. we survive.
Translated Text: Only one teleporter is currently functional within the research wing. That will be your point of entry. After that. you'll have to navigate through the research wing on your own. It sustained heavy damage in the warp detachment. so its structural integrity is likely to be compromised. Any other teleporters that withstood the blast will have to be brought back online. In addition. a sensor will be added to your visual feed. It will display a strange signature that we've been picking up and believe is being emitted by the source. The sensor will detect the signature's surges. which seem to be linked to the stability of the station. If the signature grows stronger and more frequent. it is possible that large-scale breach could be imminent. If the source is not eliminated before then. our mission will fail. Good luck. And together. we survive.

Original Text: Then I must ask you to remove yourself from the Command Center immediately. Lives are at stake. and we cannot waste time on reluctant officers.
Translated Text: Then I must ask you to remove yourself from the Command Center immediately. Lives are at stake. and we cannot waste time on reluctant officers.

Original Text: I understand that I'm asking a lot from your crew. but I truly believe that you are the best fit officers for the job. I urge you to reconsider. If you still refuse. then I will assign a more willing crew in your place.
Translated Text: I understand that I'm asking a lot from your crew. but I truly believe that you are the best fit officers for the job. I urge you to reconsider. If you still refuse. then I will assign a more willing crew in your place.

Original Text: Good. Allow me to explain why you're here. By now. you are likely aware of the disconnected section of our station. what the inhabitants of Outpost 448 have been referring to as the 'Wasted Wing'. It was formerly a research wing used for private labs and classified Colonial Union research projects. Due to the risks posed by some of the experiments. the research wing had a security protocol in place called 'Code Black'. in which the wing detaches from Outpost 448 and performs a very limited range warp jump to a safe. prespecified location. It was designed to be used in the event of an uncontrollable outbreak or containment breach. and it was to be activated only if the wing was beyond saving or the lives of the citizens of Outpost 448 were in jeopardy. Recently and without warning. the Code Black protocol was initiated. At this time. we have been unable to establish communication with anyone inside the research wing. and we do not know what sort of event triggered Code Black. What we do know is that many life support systems are still functioning. and our scans have shown some life signatures. The signatures have been slowly diminishing. but I believe that with a great deal of caution. it might be possible to rescue the survivors and recover any salvageable research projects. I've prepared several teams of Colonial Union officers to do just that. However. we need to send in an initial crew to sweep out any dangers from the wing before the rescue teams can be sent in. You have been selected for this task. Warp to the research wing. identify any survivors. and most importantly: find and eliminate the source of the outbreak. I'll be frank with you. If you are unsuccessful. the entire mission will fail. Do you accept this responsibility?
Translated Text: Good. Allow me to explain why you're here. By now. you are likely aware of the disconnected section of our station. what the inhabitants of Outpost 448 have been referring to as the 'Wasted Wing'. It was formerly a research wing used for private labs and classified Colonial Union research projects. Due to the risks posed by some of the experiments. the research wing had a security protocol in place called 'Code Black'. in which the wing detaches from Outpost 448 and performs a very limited range warp jump to a safe. prespecified location. It was designed to be used in the event of an uncontrollable outbreak or containment breach. and it was to be activated only if the wing was beyond saving or the lives of the citizens of Outpost 448 were in jeopardy. Recently and without warning. the Code Black protocol was initiated. At this time. we have been unable to establish communication with anyone inside the research wing. and we do not know what sort of event triggered Code Black. What we do know is that many life support systems are still functioning. and our scans have shown some life signatures. The signatures have been slowly diminishing. but I believe that with a great deal of caution. it might be possible to rescue the survivors and recover any salvageable research projects. I've prepared several teams of Colonial Union officers to do just that. However. we need to send in an initial crew to sweep out any dangers from the wing before the rescue teams can be sent in. You have been selected for this task. Warp to the research wing. identify any survivors. and most importantly: find and eliminate the source of the outbreak. I'll be frank with you. If you are unsuccessful. the entire mission will fail. Do you accept this responsibility?

Original Text: No? Was I wrong to select you for this mission? If you cannot agree to keep the details of the mission confidential. I cannot give you this assignment. So I will ask you one more time. Do you understand that this mission requires a great measure of secrecy? And can I trust that you will keep this information within the Command Center?
Translated Text: No? Was I wrong to select you for this mission? If you cannot agree to keep the details of the mission confidential. I cannot give you this assignment. So I will ask you one more time. Do you understand that this mission requires a great measure of secrecy? And can I trust that you will keep this information within the Command Center?

Original Text: Greetings. I am Darine Hatham. the Commander of Outpost 448. Thank you for reporting to the Command Center on such short notice. You've proven yourselves to be a reliable crew of officers. and I am in great need of reliable officers at the moment. Before you can be briefed on the situation. you must be aware that the details of this mission are highly sensitive. Breaking confidentiality will result in an immediate dismissal from your service to the Colonial Union. Do you understand?
Translated Text: Greetings. I am Darine Hatham. the Commander of Outpost 448. Thank you for reporting to the Command Center on such short notice. You've proven yourselves to be a reliable crew of officers. and I am in great need of reliable officers at the moment. Before you can be briefed on the situation. you must be aware that the details of this mission are highly sensitive. Breaking confidentiality will result in an immediate dismissal from your service to the Colonial Union. Do you understand?

Original Text: If you cannot accept the responsibilities offered by your commander. you will not go far in the Colonial Union. It may be time to reconsider your profession.
Translated Text: If you cannot accept the responsibilities offered by your commander. you will not go far in the Colonial Union. It may be time to reconsider your profession.

Original Text: Report back to me once you have completed your missions. Good luck.
Translated Text: Report back to me once you have completed your missions. Good luck.

Original Text: Very well. Then I will speak with one of the rescue crews. Perhaps they will be more willing to assist me in this matter.
Translated Text: Very well. Then I will speak with one of the rescue crews. Perhaps they will be more willing to assist me in this matter.

Original Text: In the administration wing off Tram Gate D. there is a room that is often used for presenting ongoing research and prototypes of new technology. Inside. there is a data pad that contains a record of recent projects. Retrieving that data pad would help immensely in rebuilding Outpost 448's research labs after our current problems have been resolved. To get into the room. there are three security doors that need to be opened. each with its own admin access card. There were a handful of people within the research wing who kept the access cards in their possession. I can't say where the cards have ended up now. but I presume that they were scattered around the research wing during the Code Black protocol. You'll need to find all three admin access cards. get through the security doors. and retrieve the data pad inside. Are you up to the task?
Translated Text: In the administration wing off Tram Gate D. there is a room that is often used for presenting ongoing research and prototypes of new technology. Inside. there is a data pad that contains a record of recent projects. Retrieving that data pad would help immensely in rebuilding Outpost 448's research labs after our current problems have been resolved. To get into the room. there are three security doors that need to be opened. each with its own admin access card. There were a handful of people within the research wing who kept the access cards in their possession. I can't say where the cards have ended up now. but I presume that they were scattered around the research wing during the Code Black protocol. You'll need to find all three admin access cards. get through the security doors. and retrieve the data pad inside. Are you up to the task?

Original Text: Finding survivors and eliminating the source of the outbreak are your priorities in this mission. However. if you think you can handle another responsibility. I have a task in mind for you.
Translated Text: Finding survivors and eliminating the source of the outbreak are your priorities in this mission. However. if you think you can handle another responsibility. I have a task in mind for you.

Original Text: Phenomenal work. This should speed up the process of getting our labs back on track.
Translated Text: Phenomenal work. This should speed up the process of getting our labs back on track.

Original Text: Thank you for your assistance to the Command Center. If you keep up this kind of work. there may be a command position in your future.
Translated Text: Thank you for your assistance to the Command Center. If you keep up this kind of work. there may be a command position in your future.

Original Text: Complete the mission with haste. Lives are depending on you.
Translated Text: Complete the mission with haste. Lives are depending on you.

Original Text: Good. you're here. Commander Hatham will be pleased that you've arrived. Speak with her as soon as possible.
Translated Text: Good. you're here. Commander Hatham will be pleased that you've arrived. Speak with her as soon as possible.

Original Text: It's unfortunate that you weren't able to participate in the mission. Commander Hatham had high hopes for your crew.
Translated Text: It's unfortunate that you weren't able to participate in the mission. Commander Hatham had high hopes for your crew.

Original Text: I had hoped that when the research wing mission was over. we could reveal everything that happened and finally put this whole thing to rest. Sure. it wouldn't be easy to deal with the angry civilians. but maybe it would bring them some closure. Commander Hatham. however. still seems keen on covering up what happened in the research wing. She's going to release a statement to the public soon claiming that it was a minor virus outbreak that accidentally triggered the Code Black protocol. But I'm not sure if I can keep looking people in the eyes and lying about what really happened. especially when some of their loved ones were among the deceased...
Translated Text: I had hoped that when the research wing mission was over. we could reveal everything that happened and finally put this whole thing to rest. Sure. it wouldn't be easy to deal with the angry civilians. but maybe it would bring them some closure. Commander Hatham. however. still seems keen on covering up what happened in the research wing. She's going to release a statement to the public soon claiming that it was a minor virus outbreak that accidentally triggered the Code Black protocol. But I'm not sure if I can keep looking people in the eyes and lying about what really happened. especially when some of their loved ones were among the deceased...

Original Text: Ever since the research wing was separated from the station. we've been working nonstop to determine the status of the labs and any survivors inside them. Each hour that goes by could mean the difference between life and death for those scientists. If that wasn't enough pressure. many citizens of Outpost 448 have been persistently questioning us about what happened. I understand that they're concerned. but we're doing everything we can to get this situation under control. A mass panic is the last thing we need to deal with right now.
Translated Text: Ever since the research wing was separated from the station. we've been working nonstop to determine the status of the labs and any survivors inside them. Each hour that goes by could mean the difference between life and death for those scientists. If that wasn't enough pressure. many citizens of Outpost 448 have been persistently questioning us about what happened.
