Translated Text: A lighter mass version of the C.C.G. Hull. It was designed by the W.D. Corporation and uses a carbon-carbon-graphite bond for increased strength and reduced mass.

Original Text: A special hull designed for a phase drone. It can withstand a multitude of warps in a short span of time.
Translated Text: A special hull designed for a phase drone. It can withstand a multitude of warps in a short span of time.

Original Text: Utilizing Polytechnic Federation technology. this component employs trillions of nano-bots that repair segments of the hull during warp travel.
Translated Text: Utilizing Polytechnic Federation technology. this component employs trillions of nano-bots that repair segments of the hull during warp travel.

Original Text: W.D. Corporation's high-end C.C.G. hull. Very dense and durable. it is specially designed for warships and combat vessels.
Translated Text: W.D. Corporation's high-end C.C.G. hull. Very dense and durable. it is specially designed for warships and combat vessels.

Original Text: A massive and sturdy hull designed by Tricorp for its sentry drones.
Translated Text: A massive and sturdy hull designed by Tricorp for its sentry drones.

Original Text: Custom hull for a W.D. Destroyer-class starship. It has a high integrity and is well-armored.
Translated Text: Custom hull for a W.D. Destroyer-class starship. It has a high integrity and is well-armored.

Original Text: A hull with armor that scales with its current integrity. Due to layers of reinforced plates. its armoring is stronger when the hull integrity is lower.
Translated Text: A hull with armor that scales with its current integrity. Due to layers of reinforced plates. its armoring is stronger when the hull integrity is lower.

Original Text: A sturdy hull designed for the Deathwarden drone.
Translated Text: A sturdy hull designed for the Deathwarden drone.

Original Text: A cheaper version of the C.C.G. Hull.
Translated Text: A cheaper version of the C.C.G. Hull.

Original Text: This hull is exceptionally strong and has unique properties that allow field repairs. yet it isn’t compatible with shields.
Translated Text: This hull is exceptionally strong and has unique properties that allow field repairs. yet it isn’t compatible with shields.

Translated Text: An extra layer of reinforced hull plating that prevents system damage from attacks under the ship and reduces hull damage.

Translated Text: Standard maneuvering thruster. Provides the ability for the ship to translate in any direction.

Translated Text: Used almost exclusively for racing. this maneuvering thruster has superior thrust but requires a great deal of power. Provides the ability for the ship to translate in any direction.

Original Text: Colonial Union medical supplies that were likely stolen from a transport ship.
Translated Text: Colonial Union medical supplies that were likely stolen from a transport ship.

Translated Text: Colonial Union medical supplies. The registration numbers have been removed so they can’t be traced back to their site of origin.

Original Text: Borthix crystals packed into a shipping crate. Since it is an ingredient in the drug sundust. borthix is both highly valuable and illegal to transport.
Translated Text: Borthix crystals packed into a shipping crate. Since it is an ingredient in the drug sundust. borthix is both highly valuable and illegal to transport.

Original Text: A wooden crate that contains a living creature. It often slams against its enclosure.
Translated Text: A wooden crate that contains a living creature. It often slams against its enclosure.

Translated Text: A cryogenic pod that contains a human male of unknown identity. Though it is old. it is impeccably sealed.

Translated Text: A crate that is emitting dangerous levels of radiation.

Translated Text: W.D. Corp's prime nuclear device. It is one of the most damaging nuclear devices on the market.

Original Text: A powerful nuclear device designed by the Colonial Union. Though its name would seem contrary to its use. the Colonial Union Fleet normally uses the Peacekeeper as a deterrent for combat. rather than an end to it.

Original Text: Small nuke designed for close-range combat.
Translated Text: Small nuke designed for close-range combat.

Original Text: Standard oxygen generator. Designed to support six passengers for several months.
Translated Text: Standard oxygen generator. Designed to support six passengers for several months.

Translated Text: Large oxygen generator. Uses very efficient filters and produces a higher yield of breathable air. It has stable performance under pressure and multiple backup systems in case of emergencies.

Original Text: Fires a beam that pierces through hull and armor to damage internal ship systems. It is not particularly effective at dealing damage to hull or shields.
Translated Text: Fires a beam that pierces through hull and armor to damage internal ship systems. It is not particularly effective at dealing damage to hull or shields.

Original Text: Produces reliable energy output. The design of this reactor was inspired by Old Wars technology. and it is used on many active ships today.
Translated Text: Produces reliable energy output. The design of this reactor was inspired by Old Wars technology. and it is used on many active ships today.

Original Text: State-of-the-art energy generation with impressive output. Uses advanced cooling systems coupled with reinforced alloys that can withstand high temperatures. This reactor is not only powerful. but safe.
Translated Text: State-of-the-art energy generation with impressive output. Uses advanced cooling systems coupled with reinforced alloys that can withstand high temperatures. This reactor is not only powerful. but safe.

Original Text: Reliable. safe. and efficient. this reactor was designed for the Colonial Union Fleet but has become one of the most commonly used reactors even on civilian and transport ships. It is tried and true technology.
Translated Text: Reliable. safe. and efficient. this reactor was designed for the Colonial Union Fleet but has become one of the most commonly used reactors even on civilian and transport ships. It is tried and true technology.

Original Text: Newer version of the Colonial Fusion Reactor. Has increased energy output and can handle higher core temperatures. It is frequently used on Colonial Union military and police vessels.
Translated Text: Newer version of the Colonial Fusion Reactor. Has increased energy output and can handle higher core temperatures. It is frequently used on Colonial Union military and police vessels.

Original Text: Superior version of the Military-Grade Fusion Reactor. Has increased energy output and can handle higher core temperatures. It is used on select ships in the Colonial Union Fleet.
Translated Text: Superior version of the Military-Grade Fusion Reactor. Has increased energy output and can handle higher core temperatures. It is used on select ships in the Colonial Union Fleet.

Original Text: Polytechnic Federation technology. These reactors were salvaged from destroyed P.F. vessels. studied. and recreated to work within the constraints of more common ships.
Translated Text: Polytechnic Federation technology. These reactors were salvaged from destroyed P.F. vessels. studied. and recreated to work within the constraints of more common ships.

Original Text: A standard reactor for Fluffy Biscuit Co. delivery ships. It produces a small output but is fairly difficult to detect.
Translated Text: A standard reactor for Fluffy Biscuit Co. delivery ships. It produces a small output but is fairly difficult to detect.

Original Text: A modified Fluffy Biscuit Co. reactor also known as a murmur engine. It is an Alliance of Gentlemen favorite due to its small EM signature. If a crew does not want its presence known. this reactor will surely help in that endeavor.
Translated Text: A modified Fluffy Biscuit Co. reactor also known as a murmur engine. It is an Alliance of Gentlemen favorite due to its small EM signature. If a crew does not want its presence known. this reactor will surely help in that endeavor.

Original Text: Custom reactor built for a CU Roland-class starship. It is capable of large output and can function smoothly despite very high temperatures.
Translated Text: Custom reactor built for a CU Roland-class starship. It is capable of large output and can function smoothly despite very high temperatures.

Original Text: An experimental reactor that provides more power the hotter the core temperature. Due to high risk associated with this reactor. it has not been approved for standard commercial use.
Translated Text: An experimental reactor that provides more power the hotter the core temperature. Due to high risk associated with this reactor. it has not been approved for standard commercial use.

Original Text: High-performing reactor that links all the ship systems to boost output. Damaged ship systems will lower the output of the reactor.
Translated Text: High-performing reactor that links all the ship systems to boost output. Damaged ship systems will lower the output of the reactor.

Original Text: Powerful reactor that occasionally spews radiation. Label reads “DO NOT USE”.
Translated Text: Powerful reactor that occasionally spews radiation. Label reads “DO NOT USE”.

Original Text: A competent reactor with a lower maximum temperature. It is usually used on refurbished Sylvassi ships.
Translated Text: A competent reactor with a lower maximum temperature. It is usually used on refurbished Sylvassi ships.

Original Text: Pieces of broken hull and debris. If properly processed. it could be repurposed.
Translated Text: Pieces of broken hull and debris. If properly processed. it could be repurposed.

Original Text: Used to amplify the ship’s signal detection capabilities.
Translated Text: Used to amplify the ship’s signal detection capabilities.

Translated Text: Shield generator with a fast recharge rate but minimal capacity. Originally designed for Fluffy Biscuit Co. delivery ships.

Original Text: Shield generator with a fast recharge rate and moderate capacity. Originally designed for larger Fluffy Biscuit Co. delivery ships.
Translated Text: Shield generator with a fast recharge rate and moderate capacity. Originally designed for larger Fluffy Biscuit Co. delivery ships.

Original Text: An older type of shield generator. It seems to work. but it may not last long under pressure. You get what you pay for. you cheap bastard!
Translated Text: An older type of shield generator. It seems to work. but it may not last long under pressure. You get what you pay for. you cheap bastard!

Original Text: A reliable and versatile shield generator that has been used for decades in the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet. It has saved many crews over the years.
Translated Text: A reliable and versatile shield generator that has been used for decades in the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet. It has saved many crews over the years.

Original Text: A powerful and modern shield generator. Commonly used on newer ships in the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet.
Translated Text: A powerful and modern shield generator. Commonly used on newer ships in the Colonial Union Galactic Fleet.

Original Text: Colonial Union's latest shield generator technology. It was designed specifically for expeditionary ships on the fringes of known space.
Translated Text: Colonial Union's latest shield generator technology. It was designed specifically for expeditionary ships on the fringes of known space.

Original Text: Recovers quicker than most shields. It is one of the few products of the Gentlemen Trade Commission that was not created from previously stolen merchandise.
Translated Text: Recovers quicker than most shields. It is one of the few products of the Gentlemen Trade Commission that was not created from previously stolen merchandise.

Original Text: Designed to allow 'layers' of shielding. These particle shields are very effective and provide 5% extra resistance to physical attacks.
Translated Text: Designed to allow 'layers' of shielding. These particle shields are very effective and provide 5% extra resistance to physical attacks.

Original Text: Designed to allow ‘layers’ of shielding. Some W.D. crews tinker with their particle shield generators. This one has been significantly upgraded and provides 10% extra resistance to physical attacks.
Translated Text: Designed to allow ‘layers’ of shielding. Some W.D. crews tinker with their particle shield generators. This one has been significantly upgraded and provides 10% extra resistance to physical attacks.

Original Text: A shield generator with such a high integrity. it nearly acts as a second hull. It has an extremely slow recharge rate.
Translated Text: A shield generator with such a high integrity. it nearly acts as a second hull. It has an extremely slow recharge rate.

Original Text: Powerful shield generator with 15% extra resistance to beam attacks.
Translated Text: Powerful shield generator with 15% extra resistance to beam attacks.

Original Text: Powerful shield generator with 30% extra resistance to beam attacks.
Translated Text: Powerful shield generator with 30% extra resistance to beam attacks.

Original Text: Are you tired of the same old shields with minimal integrities? Do you wish your shield was less like a screen and more like a wall? Worry no more. ‘Corbin’s Wall’ has you covered! This is a limited-time offer. so BUY NOW!$No refunds.
Translated Text: Are you tired of the same old shields with minimal integrities? Do you wish your shield was less like a screen and more like a wall? Worry no more. ‘Corbin’s Wall’ has you covered! This is a limited-time offer. so BUY NOW!$No refunds.

Translated Text: Shield generator with a fast recharge rate and decent capacity. Originally designed for Fluffy Biscuit Co. delivery ships with particularly valuable cargo.

Translated Text: Designed to allow 'layers' of shielding. This shield generator is the latest model of the W.D. Corporation's particle shield technology and provides 20% extra resistance to physical attacks.

Original Text: A strange projector that creates a meta-mesh link surrounding the ship that acts as a shield. It reduces incoming damage of all damage types by 15%.
Translated Text: A strange projector that creates a meta-mesh link surrounding the ship that acts as a shield. It reduces incoming damage of all damage types by 15%.

Translated Text: A W.D. Corporation shield generator installed with a prototype shield charger array that boosts charge speed.

Translated Text: Long range laser weapon that is particularly powerful against hulls and ship systems. Has enhanced auto-aim that can shoot down some missiles.

Original Text: Named after Captain Adelaide. an engineer and hero from the Old Wars. This thruster has a high max output and can propel many types of ships quickly and efficiently.
Translated Text: Named after Captain Adelaide. an engineer and hero from the Old Wars. This thruster has a high max output and can propel many types of ships quickly and efficiently.

Original Text: Military-grade thruster system capable of impressive forward thrust.
Translated Text: Military-grade thruster system capable of impressive forward thrust.

Original Text: Used to propel a ship forward. It does not have as much thrust as other products on the market. but it uses little power.
Translated Text: Used to propel a ship forward. It does not have as much thrust as other products on the market. but it uses little power.

Original Text: A thruster with extreme forward thrust. It is a favorite among racing ships. though it is often tinkered with to push it to greater limits. As it requires a massive amount of power. it is not meant to be used over long durations.
Translated Text: A thruster with extreme forward thrust. It is a favorite among racing ships. though it is often tinkered with to push it to greater limits. As it requires a massive amount of power. it is not meant to be used over long durations.

Original Text: A forward thruster with very good power efficiency. It was originally designed to accompany a warp drive that has since been declared contraband by the Colonial Union. The thrusters. however. are still legal to use.
Translated Text: A forward thruster with very good power efficiency. It was originally designed to accompany a warp drive that has since been declared contraband by the Colonial Union. The thrusters. however. are still legal to use.

Original Text: Appear like an ally (works on drones)
Translated Text: Appear like an ally (works on drones)

Translated Text: Botnet virus that explores the galaxy for information

Original Text: Causes the ship screens to malfunction
Translated Text: Causes the ship screens to malfunction

Original Text: The best selection of viruses in the galaxy!
Translated Text: The best selection of viruses in the galaxy!

Original Text: Standard-issue warp drive installed in most Colonial Union Fleet vessels. A combination of reliable charge speed and decent range makes it a commonly used technology. even outside the Colonial Union.
Translated Text: Standard-issue warp drive installed in most Colonial Union Fleet vessels. A combination of reliable charge speed and decent range makes it a commonly used technology. even outside the Colonial Union.

Translated Text: Long range warp drive used by many expeditionary and frontier vessels. It allows ships to traverse large distances but suffers from a below-average charge speed.

Original Text: Warp drive with an extremely long range. Though it can cross great distances. it has a loud signature and few program charges.
Translated Text: Warp drive with an extremely long range. Though it can cross great distances. it has a loud signature and few program charges.

Original Text: Fast charging warp drive with good range. This device is good for fast getaways.
Translated Text: Fast charging warp drive with good range. This device is good for fast getaways.

Original Text: Low signature warp drive with good range. It is favored by many crews in the Alliance of Gentlemen.
Translated Text: Low signature warp drive with good range. It is favored by many crews in the Alliance of Gentlemen.

Original Text: Warp drive that provides reasonable jump capability and above average computational power. It is commonly used by supply ships.
Translated Text: Warp drive that provides reasonable jump capability and above average computational power. It is commonly used by supply ships.

Original Text: A Gentlemen Trade Commission original warp drive. It provides increased computational power and a low signature.
Translated Text: A Gentlemen Trade Commission original warp drive. It provides increased computational power and a low signature.

Original Text: Pricey but robust warp drive with a very long range. It was designed specifically for members of the ‘Explorers United’ intergalactic spacefaring organization. but it is available for general use.
Translated Text: Pricey but robust warp drive with a very long range. It was designed specifically for members of the ‘Explorers United’ intergalactic spacefaring organization. but it is available for general use.

Translated Text: Standard warp drive for W.D. Corporation vessels. It has decent range but a very loud signature.

Translated Text: Warp drive with no signature. Because of its potential for malicious use. it has been labelled contraband by the Colonial Union.

Original Text: Designed to ‘warp in a snap’. this drive has an incredibly fast charge speed. However. it also has an extremely loud EM signature and small jump range.
Translated Text: Designed to ‘warp in a snap’. this drive has an incredibly fast charge speed. However. it also has an extremely loud EM signature and small jump range.

Original Text: A W.D. Corporation warp drive installed with a prototype quantum charger that allows for the drive to charge programs in tandem instead of in sequence. Every installed program will be charged by one point per drive activation.
Translated Text: A W.D. Corporation warp drive installed with a prototype quantum charger that allows for the drive to charge programs in tandem instead of in sequence. Every installed program will be charged by one point per drive activation.

Translated Text: Broadcasts [Sitting Duck] virus to nearby ships on activation.$$Sitting Duck: Disables ship thrusters for 60 seconds

Translated Text: Replaces itself with a random program from cargo.

Translated Text: Increases max shields by +80 for 60 seconds.

Translated Text: Collect a Lost Colony Data Fragment

Translated Text: Complete a bounty contract for the Grey Huntsmen

Translated Text: Can't upgrade Talent. Crew level is below

Translated Text: No room for component in destination slot

Translated Text: You need to be the Captain to move components

Translated Text: You don't have permission to take that item!

Original Text: CREW PURCHASE LIMITS ARE ENABLED$$Crew allowance ENABLED$Only the Captain can buy or sell ship components$Crew CAN buy or sell items

Original Text: CREW PURCHASE LIMITS ARE DISABLED$$Crew allowance DISABLED$Crew CAN buy or sell ship components$Crew CAN buy or sell items

Original Text: Your ship will become unflagged each jump
Translated Text: Your ship will become unflagged each jump

Original Text: Gain access to special deals in general stores across the galaxy
Translated Text: Gain access to special deals in general stores across the galaxy

Original Text: Random chance to either gain credits. processed scrap or coolant each jump
Translated Text: Random chance to either gain credits. processed scrap or coolant each jump

Original Text: 2x fluffy oven food supply$2x credits earned for biscuit sales
Translated Text: 2x fluffy oven food supply$2x credits earned for biscuit sales

Original Text: A supposedly 'cursed' data fragment. If you believe in that sort of thing ...
Translated Text: A supposedly 'cursed' data fragment. If you believe in that sort of thing ...

Original Text: Installed tracker missiles are refilled by 10% each jump
Translated Text: Installed tracker missiles are refilled by 10% each jump

Original Text: The faction that you currently aligned to and will recieve missions / support from
Translated Text: 你现在的阵营.可以接受任务/支持

Original Text: How other ships will see your crew (when not revealed)
Translated Text: 其他船是如何看待你的船员的(未显示的时候).

Original Text: How other ships will see your crew (when revealed)
Translated Text: 其他船会怎么看你的船员(显示时)

Original Text: Priority has the maximum number of overrides!
Translated Text: 优先级具有最大覆盖次数！

Original Text: Refills your currently equipped handheld item to full ammo.
Translated Text: 填满你当前装备的手持物品弹药.

Original Text: Launches special grenades that can extinguish nearby fires. The #1 solution for killing fires dead the quick and easy way.
Translated Text: 发射可以扑灭附近火灾的特殊手榴弹.首要解决火灾的方法是快速和简单的方法.

Original Text: A sandstone statuette from an extinct civilization. It bears the likeness of a sacred creature.
Translated Text: 一个灭绝文明的砂岩雕像.它看起来像一个神圣的生物.

Original Text: A broken sandstone statuette from an extinct civilization. It bears the likeness of a sacred creature.
Translated Text: 一个已灭绝文明的砂岩雕像.它看起来像一个神圣的生物.

Original Text: An artifact from an extinct civilization. It has a strange symbol carved on its surface.
Translated Text: 一件来自灭绝文明的工艺品.它的表面刻着一个奇怪的符号.

Original Text: A broken artifact from an extinct civilization. It has a strange symbol carved on its surface.
Translated Text: 一件来自灭绝文明的破碎文物.它的表面刻着一个奇怪的符号.

Original Text: A strange object from a long forgotten culture. The markings seem to glow.
Translated Text: 一个来自被遗忘已久的文化的奇怪物体.这些标记似乎在发光.

Original Text: A crystal used in the production of the drug sundust. It is illegal to have this substance in your possession.
Translated Text: 一种用于生产药物太阳尘的晶体.你持有这种物质是违法的.

Original Text: An extremely old coronet from an extinct civilization. Simple in its design.
Translated Text: 一种来自灭绝文明的非常古老的王冠.设计简单.

Original Text: An extremely old coronet from an extinct civilization.
Translated Text: 一种来自灭绝文明的非常古老的王冠.

Original Text: An extremely old coronet from an extinct civilization. It must have belonged to an individual of great importance.
Translated Text: 一种来自灭绝文明的非常古老的王冠.它一定是属于一个非常重要的人.

Original Text: Unrecognizable fragment of a larger object. It has been worn down by harsh weather for a long time.
Translated Text: 更大物体的无法辨认的碎片.它被恶劣的天气磨损了很长时间：

Original Text: Useless debris that is beyond repurposing. It won’t fetch much of a price.
Translated Text: Useless debris that is beyond repurposing. It won’t fetch much of a price.

Original Text: Thrown away long ago. this scrap remained undisturbed for many years until you picked it up.
Translated Text: Thrown away long ago. this scrap remained undisturbed for many years until you picked it up.

Original Text: Metal scrap that has been badly bent out of shape.
Translated Text: Metal scrap that has been badly bent out of shape.

Original Text: An old battery produced by the W.D. Corporation. Might still have some power in it. but it’s unlikely.
Translated Text: An old battery produced by the W.D. Corporation. Might still have some power in it. but it’s unlikely.

Original Text: Fires an accurate burst of three shots that deals significant damage.
Translated Text: 发射造成显著伤害的精确三连发.

Original Text: A unique tool for Fluffy Biscuit Company employees. Fixes damage caused to the main ship systems and allows you to sell biscuits in person.
Translated Text: A unique tool for Fluffy Biscuit Company employees. Fixes damage caused to the main ship systems and allows you to sell biscuits in person.

Original Text: Used to put out fires. Designed for ease of use.
Translated Text: Used to put out fires. Designed for ease of use.

Original Text: Exactly as it sounds. A dehydrated sandwich.
Translated Text: 听起来就是这样.一个脱水的三明治.

Original Text: Chewy and substantial. It’s difficult to tell where the meat came from.耐嚼的和实质性的.很难说这肉是从哪里来的.
Someone took four zesty jerky sticks and lumped them together for even greater effect. Chewy and substantial. It’s difficult to tell where the meat came from.
Translated Text: 有人拿了四根肉干棒.并把它们放在一起.以达到更大的效果.耐嚼的和实质性的.很难说这肉是从哪里来的.

Original Text: Standard ration package often used to supply the Colonial Union Fleet. Contains all the necessary nutrients for a crew on a long voyage across the galaxy.
Translated Text: 殖民地联盟舰队常用的标准口粮包.包含了船员穿越银河系长途航行所需的所有营养物质.

Original Text: Ration package often used to supply the Colonial Union Fleet. Its condensed contents were designed specifically for use in emergency situations.
Translated Text: Ration package often used to supply the Colonial Union Fleet. Its condensed contents were designed specifically for use in emergency situations.

Original Text: Tasteless rations produced by the W.D. Corporation. Can last for centuries in storage without expiring.
Translated Text: Tasteless rations produced by the W.D. Corporation. Can last for centuries in storage without expiring.

Original Text: Fillet from the sandshark creature native to certain desert planets. It is heavily marinated to tenderize the meat and reduce its natural pungent flavor.
Translated Text: Fillet from the sandshark creature native to certain desert planets. It is heavily marinated to tenderize the meat and reduce its natural pungent flavor.

Original Text: Powdered supplement that contains high amounts of protein.
Translated Text: 含有大量蛋白质的粉状补充剂.

Original Text: Grown to be a cubic shape for maximum storage efficiency.
Translated Text: Grown to be a cubic shape for maximum storage efficiency.

Original Text: The Fluffy Biscuit Company’s signature biscuit. Fills you with a fluffy feeling when eaten.
Translated Text: The Fluffy Biscuit Company’s signature biscuit. Fills you with a fluffy feeling when eaten.

Original Text: Produced from the Fluffy Biscuit Company’s top-secret perfect biscuit formula. It has an ideal texture and a secret blend of flavor additives to please even the pickiest of palates.
Translated Text: Produced from the Fluffy Biscuit Company’s top-secret perfect biscuit formula. It has an ideal texture and a secret blend of flavor additives to please even the pickiest of palates.

Original Text: Contains no nutrients. Stick to your vegetable rations.
Translated Text: 不含营养物质的一种定量蔬菜.

Original Text: A strong greasy drink. Large enough doses are said to be lethal. Many crewmen try to prove their grit by drinking an entire cup. Most fail.
Translated Text: A strong greasy drink. Large enough doses are said to be lethal. Many crewmen try to prove their grit by drinking an entire cup. Most fail.

Original Text: A common drink at space ports and planetary stations. A cheap solution for crews to forget about their troubles for a short time.
Translated Text: A common drink at space ports and planetary stations. A cheap solution for crews to forget about their troubles for a short time.

Original Text: Reproduction of a traditional Sylvassi beverage. It has a bitter flavor. In recent years. Sylvassi brew has become an unexpectedly popular drink among humans.
Translated Text: Reproduction of a traditional Sylvassi beverage. It has a bitter flavor. In recent years. Sylvassi brew has become an unexpectedly popular drink among humans.

Original Text: A rare and acidic fruit that grows only in specific environments. Often used to produce expensive wines.
Translated Text: A rare and acidic fruit that grows only in specific environments. Often used to produce expensive wines.

Original Text: Bottled reproduction of a traditional Sylvassi beverage. It has a bitter flavor. In recent years. Sylvassi brew has become an unexpectedly popular drink among humans.
Translated Text: 瓶装复制的一个传统Sylvassi饮料.它有一种苦味.近年来.西尔瓦西啤酒出人意料地成为了一种受人类欢迎的饮料.

Original Text: A glowing egg-shaped pod filled with spores. It feels solid enough.
Translated Text: 充满孢子的发光的卵状荚果.它感觉很坚固.

Original Text: A unique blend of spices and spirits created by Bram Hully. Often believed to be the biggest reason Gentlemen return to the Estate.由布拉姆·胡利创造的香料和烈酒的独特混合物.经常被认为是盖亚人回到庄园的最大原因
A sour wine made from the balmy gloom fruit. It’s an acquired taste.
Translated Text: 一种由芳香的阴暗水果制成的酸酒.这是一种后天养成的嗜好!

Original Text: A sweet drink originally made for children that is sometimes given to new crewmen as a joke. Served warm.
Translated Text: 一种最初为孩子们制作的甜饮料.有时作为玩笑给新船员.温暖的服务.

Original Text: An ice cold drink served in a temperature stabilizing container.
Translated Text: An ice cold drink served in a temperature stabilizing container.

Original Text: A hearty chunk of drone meat. Best served roasted. Just don't eat the exoskeleton.
Translated Text: A hearty chunk of drone meat. Best served roasted. Just don't eat the exoskeleton.

Original Text: Allows the player to hold their breath for longer
Translated Text: Allows the player to hold their breath for longer

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases fire resistance and decreases damage in no oxygen environments for 2 minutes. Its benefits outweigh its bland flavor.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases fire resistance and decreases damage in no oxygen environments for 2 minutes. Its benefits outweigh its bland flavor.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases stamina regeneration for 2 minutes. It has an invigorating flavor.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases stamina regeneration for 2 minutes. It has an invigorating flavor.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases armor for 2 minutes. It’s very dense and crunchy.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases armor for 2 minutes. It’s very dense and crunchy.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases maximum health and adds a small amount of health regeneration for 2 minutes. This biscuit is low sodium and packed with nutritious vegetables.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases maximum health and adds a small amount of health regeneration for 2 minutes. This biscuit is low sodium and packed with nutritious vegetables.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases handheld weapon accuracy for 2 minutes. After years of debate. it’s now considered cheating to eat a carrot cake biscuit in combat-oriented competitions.
Translated Text: 一种特殊的饼干.可提高手持武器精度2分钟.经过多年的争论.现在被认为是在比赛中吃胡萝卜蛋糕饼干是作弊行为.

Original Text: Increased armor at the cost of decreased movement speed for 5 minutes
Translated Text: Increased armor at the cost of decreased movement speed for 5 minutes

Original Text: A special biscuit that heals nearby crewmates over time for 5 minutes. It has a fruity flavor.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that heals nearby crewmates over time for 5 minutes. It has a fruity flavor.

Original Text: A special biscuit that causes damage dealt to enemies to slightly heal you for 2 minutes. The garlic packs quite a punch. Don’t stand too close to your crewmates when you talk to them.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that causes damage dealt to enemies to slightly heal you for 2 minutes. The garlic packs quite a punch. Don’t stand too close to your crewmates when you talk to them.

Original Text: A special biscuit that causes handheld weapons to cool down faster for 2 minutes. When eaten. it makes your hands feel quite cold.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that causes handheld weapons to cool down faster for 2 minutes. When eaten. it makes your hands feel quite cold.

Original Text: Increased grenade damage by 25% for 2 minutes
Translated Text: Increased grenade damage by 25% for 2 minutes

Original Text: A special biscuit that has a random effect and a flavor that can be described only as funky.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that has a random effect and a flavor that can be described only as funky.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases the chance of selling biscuits to customers in person. A staple among Fluffy Biscuit Co. employees.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases the chance of selling biscuits to customers in person. A staple among Fluffy Biscuit Co. employees.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases handheld weapon damage for 2 minutes. When eaten. it makes your mouth feel ablaze.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases handheld weapon damage for 2 minutes. When eaten. it makes your mouth feel ablaze.

Original Text: A special biscuit that increases handheld weapon damage for nearby crewmates for 5 minutes. It ignites the fire of teamwork.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that increases handheld weapon damage for nearby crewmates for 5 minutes. It ignites the fire of teamwork.

Original Text: Damages nearby enemies over time for 2 minutes
Translated Text: Damages nearby enemies over time for 2 minutes

Original Text: A special biscuit that will prevent lethal damage once in the next 5 minutes. It is rumored that eating a long life biscuit every day could be the secret to immortality.
Translated Text: A special biscuit that will prevent lethal damage once in the next 5 minutes. It is rumored that eating a long life biscuit every day could be the secret to immortality.

Original Text: Special noodles made for racing events. They go down fast.
Translated Text: Special noodles made for racing events. They go down fast.

Original Text: Noodles served in a cold broth. A favorite among Sylvassi racers.
Translated Text: Noodles served in a cold broth. A favorite among Sylvassi racers.

Original Text: Despite being soaked in broth. these noodles are mysteriously crunchy.
Translated Text: Despite being soaked in broth. these noodles are mysteriously crunchy.

Original Text: Something still seems to be moving in the bowl.
Translated Text: Something still seems to be moving in the bowl.

Original Text: Slimy noodles served in a thick broth with a medley of strange ingredients. It's very nutritious.
Translated Text: Slimy noodles served in a thick broth with a medley of strange ingredients. It's very nutritious.

Original Text: The best quality noodles. made fresh daily.
Translated Text: The best quality noodles. made fresh daily.

Original Text: A bigger version of the Classic Biscuit
A sweeter version of the Classic Biscuit
Translated Text: A sweeter version of the Classic Biscuit

Original Text: Fires a devastating shot at short range. A deadly weapon during ship boarding.
Translated Text: Fires a devastating shot at short range. A deadly weapon during ship boarding.

Original Text: Launches special grenades that provide gradual healing in an area of effect. The heal grenades can be detonated early for a quicker burst of healing.
Translated Text: Launches special grenades that provide gradual healing in an area of effect. The heal grenades can be detonated early for a quicker burst of healing.

Original Text: Fires projectiles that deal considerable damage.
Translated Text: Fires projectiles that deal considerable damage.

Original Text: Fires a powerful sustained beam capable of piercing targets.
Translated Text: Fires a powerful sustained beam capable of piercing targets.

Original Text: Fires a sustained beam that can heal fellow crewmembers. It is also capable of piercing enemy targets.
Translated Text: Fires a sustained beam that can heal fellow crewmembers. It is also capable of piercing enemy targets.

Original Text: Generates a field of ice spikes on the ground that harms and slows enemies. Also known as the \^Sporadic Point Industrial Kinetic Energy Reducer\^.
Translated Text: Generates a field of ice spikes on the ground that harms and slows enemies. Also known as the \^Sporadic Point Industrial Kinetic Energy Reducer\^.

Original Text: Keycard that opens the doors of a train car.
Translated Text: Keycard that opens the doors of a train car.

Original Text: Keycard that permits entrance to the Outpost 448 research wing.
Translated Text: Keycard that permits entrance to the Outpost 448 research wing.

Original Text: Keycard that grants level 1 access to some administration areas of the Outpost 448 research wing.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants level 1 access to some administration areas of the Outpost 448 research wing.

Original Text: Keycard that grants level 2 access to some administration areas of the Outpost 448 research wing.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants level 2 access to some administration areas of the Outpost 448 research wing.

Original Text: Keycard that grants level 3 access to some administration areas of the Outpost 448 research wing.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants level 3 access to some administration areas of the Outpost 448 research wing.

Original Text: Keycard that grants access to the Colonial Union Command Center in Outpost 448.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants access to the Colonial Union Command Center in Outpost 448.

Original Text: Keycard that grants access to the Aberrant Organisms Main Lab in the Outpost 448 research wing.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants access to the Aberrant Organisms Main Lab in the Outpost 448 research wing.

Original Text: Strange key found in an ancient Sylvassi tomb. It hums with energy and emits and blue glow.
Translated Text: Strange key found in an ancient Sylvassi tomb. It hums with energy and emits and blue glow.

Original Text: Strange key found in an ancient Sylvassi tomb. It hums with energy and emits and orange glow.
Translated Text: Strange key found in an ancient Sylvassi tomb. It hums with energy and emits and orange glow.

Original Text: Keycard that grants security clearance to use the short range transporters leading to the W.D. Control Room.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants security clearance to use the short range transporters leading to the W.D. Control Room.

Original Text: Badge that grants access to the weapons section of the W.D. Flagship.
Translated Text: Badge that grants access to the weapons section of the W.D. Flagship.

Original Text: Keycard that grants access to the captain's quarters on the Estate.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants access to the captain's quarters on the Estate.

Original Text: Keycard that grants access to main facilities of the Lost Colony
Translated Text: Keycard that grants access to main facilities of the Lost Colony

Original Text: Keycard that grants access to a secure storage locker.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants access to a secure storage locker.

Original Text: Keycard that grants access to the lower labratories of the Lost Colony.
Translated Text: Keycard that grants access to the lower labratories of the Lost Colony.

Original Text: A fast-firing launcher that spits out small explosives. Though it doesn’t do as much damage as a pulse grenade launcher. it can hold much more ammunition.
Translated Text: A fast-firing launcher that spits out small explosives. Though it doesn’t do as much damage as a pulse grenade launcher. it can hold much more ammunition.

Original Text: A simple yet effective weapon that has been in circulation for many years. Fires blasts of plasma.
Translated Text: 这是一种简单而有效的武器.已经流通多年.等离子体爆炸.

Original Text: Fires a powerful beam capable of piercing targets.
Translated Text: 发射能穿透目标的强大光束.

Original Text: The standard explosive-launching device for decades.
Translated Text: 几十年来都是标准的爆炸发射装置.

Original Text: Shipping logs that contain information about an organized group of outlaws.
Translated Text: 包含一组有组织的不法分子信息的运输日志.

Original Text: Highly encrypted data logs. It's impossible to tell what information is stored without a lot of computing power and time.
Translated Text: 高度加密的数据日志.如果没有大量的计算能力和时间.就不可能知道存储了什么信息.

Original Text: A priceless medal that identifies a deceased member of a missing research team.
Translated Text: 一枚价值连城的奖章.用来鉴定失踪研究小组的一名已故成员.

Original Text: An essential component commonly found in the heating systems of planetary bases.
Translated Text: An essential component commonly found in the heating systems of planetary bases.

Original Text: An odd relic that emits a warm. reddish glow. It may never have been intended to be removed from its pedestal.
Translated Text: An odd relic that emits a warm. reddish glow. It may never have been intended to be removed from its pedestal.

Original Text: A battery for a short range sensor station.
Translated Text: A battery for a short range sensor station.

Original Text: A crucial part for creating a warp drive. Raw warp coils are notoriously difficult to manufacture.
Translated Text: A crucial part for creating a warp drive. Raw warp coils are notoriously difficult to manufacture.

Original Text: A container specifically built to be invisible from most sensors. It’s impossible to open without the appropriate key.
Translated Text: A container specifically built to be invisible from most sensors. It’s impossible to open without the appropriate key.

Original Text: An egg laid by a sandshark. Sandshark eggs are often closely guarded by the creature that laid them.
Translated Text: An egg laid by a sandshark. Sandshark eggs are often closely guarded by the creature that laid them.

Original Text: Classified research logs from a Colonial Union lab.
Translated Text: Classified research logs from a Colonial Union lab.

Original Text: A metal sphere with no visible openings. Its purpose is utterly foreign.
Translated Text: A metal sphere with no visible openings. Its purpose is utterly foreign.

Original Text: Carved stone tablet from a deceased civilization.
Translated Text: Carved stone tablet from a deceased civilization.

Original Text: An egg from an alien creature.
Translated Text: An egg from an alien creature.

Original Text: A unusual looking key found on Lotharus 9.
Translated Text: A unusual looking key found on Lotharus 9.

Original Text: Log from a sensor that contains data about an unknown dimension.
Translated Text: Log from a sensor that contains data about an unknown dimension.

Original Text: A personal message from Bakul Faros to his grandson.
Translated Text: A personal message from Bakul Faros to his grandson.

Original Text: A piece of Fluffy Biscuit technology that concentrates flavor components.
Translated Text: A piece of Fluffy Biscuit technology that concentrates flavor components.

Original Text: Filter for a Fluffy Biscuit Company waste disposal system.
Translated Text: Filter for a Fluffy Biscuit Company waste disposal system.

Original Text: Grants access to a raider hideout found in Cornelia Station.
Translated Text: Grants access to a raider hideout found in Cornelia Station.

Original Text: A data pad that contains information on various prototypes and experiments from the Outpost 448 research wing.
Translated Text: A data pad that contains information on various prototypes and experiments from the Outpost 448 research wing.

Original Text: An emergency package of medicine mainly used when regeneration atriums are unavailable.
Translated Text: An emergency package of medicine mainly used when regeneration atriums are unavailable.

Original Text: Detailed instructions for building a highly advanced intergalactic warp jump processor. Unrivaled in its complexity.
Translated Text: Detailed instructions for building a highly advanced intergalactic warp jump processor. Unrivaled in its complexity.

Original Text: These logs contain findings about the Infected.
Translated Text: These logs contain findings about the Infected.

Original Text: A chip that provides coodinates for Conrad's 'Personal Universal Null-Point Teleporter' System.
Translated Text: A chip that provides coodinates for Conrad's 'Personal Universal Null-Point Teleporter' System.

Original Text: Ancient tablet given as a reward for completing a Sylvassi Cypher. Only someone with extensive knowledge of ancient Sylvassi language can decipher it.
Translated Text: Ancient tablet given as a reward for completing a Sylvassi Cypher. Only someone with extensive knowledge of ancient Sylvassi language can decipher it.

Original Text: An old artifact that glows. It's hot to the touch.
Translated Text: An old artifact that glows. It's hot to the touch.

Original Text: A old object that seems to contain a glowing red liquid.
Translated Text: A old object that seems to contain a glowing red liquid.

Original Text: A beam pistol designed for high damage at range.
Translated Text: 一种射束手枪.用于射程内的高伤害.

Original Text: Launches special grenades that can repair nearby ship systems. It can save a lot of time when your ship is in a pinch.
Translated Text: Launches special grenades that can repair nearby ship systems. It can save a lot of time when your ship is in a pinch.

Original Text: Fixes damage caused to the main ship systems.
Translated Text: Fixes damage caused to the main ship systems.

Original Text: Curling blue stems that look similar to motifs in Sylvassi art. Sylvassi stems are a highly adaptable species and can thrive in even the driest of climates.
Translated Text: Curling blue stems that look similar to motifs in Sylvassi art. Sylvassi stems are a highly adaptable species and can thrive in even the driest of climates.

Original Text: A jagged blue crystal that appears to have red veins running through its core. IU-03020 is extremely rare to find and may have played a part in the sudden destruction of a warship in the past.
Translated Text: A jagged blue crystal that appears to have red veins running through its core. IU-03020 is extremely rare to find and may have played a part in the sudden destruction of a warship in the past.

Original Text: A sharp. dark mineral that has glowing slivers in its surface. It feels hot to the touch.
Translated Text: A sharp. dark mineral that has glowing slivers in its surface. It feels hot to the touch.

Original Text: A round bulb with a circling pattern of light blue spines. Its exterior is hard and almost rock-like. while its spines are sharp enough to cut through an exosuit if not careful.
Translated Text: A round bulb with a circling pattern of light blue spines. Its exterior is hard and almost rock-like. while its spines are sharp enough to cut through an exosuit if not careful.

Original Text: Green. viscous substance that is believed to be the product of the complex decomposition of a certain plant. It is very nutrient-rich.
Translated Text: Green. viscous substance that is believed to be the product of the complex decomposition of a certain plant. It is very nutrient-rich.

Original Text: A gritty. reddish substance with unknown origins. It has been banned from research at many laboratories due to its volatile properties.
Translated Text: A gritty. reddish substance with unknown origins. It has been banned from research at many laboratories due to its volatile properties.

Original Text: Pitch black sludge that is highly corrosive and can be difficult to remove. For centuries it has been widely considered the bane of ship hulls.
Translated Text: Pitch black sludge that is highly corrosive and can be difficult to remove. For centuries it has been widely considered the bane of ship hulls.

Original Text: A slippery goop that glows a bright purple color. Even in larger quantities. it seems to hardly weigh anything at all.
Translated Text: A slippery goop that glows a bright purple color. Even in larger quantities. it seems to hardly weigh anything at all.

Original Text: Sharp seed-like grains suspended in a thick slime. Although difficult to find. it is highly valued by scientists in the study of biological resilience.
Translated Text: Sharp seed-like grains suspended in a thick slime. Although difficult to find. it is highly valued by scientists in the study of biological resilience.

Original Text: A runny substance that seems to shimmer when held to a light. Upon closer examination. it contains hundreds of small. nearly transparent strands.
Translated Text: A runny substance that seems to shimmer when held to a light. Upon closer examination. it contains hundreds of small. nearly transparent strands.

Original Text: Long tube-like plant cluster with wiry roots. It is sometimes difficult to collect as it has been known to periodically vanish from its location.
Translated Text: Long tube-like plant cluster with wiry roots. It is sometimes difficult to collect as it has been known to periodically vanish from its location.

Original Text: A glowing red flower with a long stem. Researchers believe that in close proximities. fenrasil may communicate to adjacent plants through their hypersensitive tendrils.
Translated Text: A glowing red flower with a long stem. Researchers believe that in close proximities. fenrasil may communicate to adjacent plants through their hypersensitive tendrils.

Original Text: A firm. almost lung-shaped plant material. It has a very long lifecycle that includes a bout of tremendous. rapid growth. Only in its early years is it considered to be manageable.
Translated Text: A firm. almost lung-shaped plant material. It has a very long lifecycle that includes a bout of tremendous. rapid growth. Only in its early years is it considered to be manageable.

Original Text: Pod with a thorn and strong suction at the bottom. It is suspected of excreting a poison when disturbed. but its reported effects have been inconsistent.
Translated Text: Pod with a thorn and strong suction at the bottom. It is suspected of excreting a poison when disturbed. but its reported effects have been inconsistent.

Original Text: A rubbery pod surrounded by hearty leaves. The pod itself is covered in thin. sharp thorns and exudes a sweet fragrance.
Translated Text: A rubbery pod surrounded by hearty leaves. The pod itself is covered in thin. sharp thorns and exudes a sweet fragrance.

Original Text: A collection of transparent stems. They are barely visible to the naked eye and are somehow difficult to separate from the other stems in their cluster.
Translated Text: A collection of transparent stems. They are barely visible to the naked eye and are somehow difficult to separate from the other stems in their cluster.

Original Text: A perfectly round sphere that flashes with light. It is presumed to encase some kind of energy. but very little else is known about it.
Translated Text: A perfectly round sphere that flashes with light. It is presumed to encase some kind of energy. but very little else is known about it.

Original Text: A naturally forming pod that radiates intense heat. It has many unconventional applications.
Translated Text: A naturally forming pod that radiates intense heat. It has many unconventional applications.

Original Text: Piece of a strange ore. It emits a frequency that is inaudible to humans.
Translated Text: Piece of a strange ore. It emits a frequency that is inaudible to humans.

Original Text: A handheld device that scans an area to detect points of interest.
Translated Text: 扫描区域以检测感兴趣点的手持设备.

Original Text: Custom modified weapon with a higher fire rate than a normal phase pistol. Often used by raiders and smugglers.
Translated Text: 自定义改装武器.比普通相手枪有更高的射速.常被袭击者和走私者使用.

Original Text: Launches special grenades that can stun nearby enemies.
Translated Text: Launches special grenades that can stun nearby enemies.

Original Text: Fully heals self and restores full health bonus
Translated Text: ． 完全治疗自己并恢复全部生命值

Original Text: Fires a short-range blast that bludgeons enemies and propels them backward. Also known as the \^Inter-Manifold Projector Arc / Combatant Thrower\^.
Translated Text: Fires a short-range blast that bludgeons enemies and propels them backward. Also known as the \^Inter-Manifold Projector Arc / Combatant Thrower\^.

Original Text: Fires a concentrated beam capable of piercing targets. It deals a significant amount of damage but also generates a lot of heat.
Translated Text: Fires a concentrated beam capable of piercing targets. It deals a significant amount of damage but also generates a lot of heat.

Original Text: Can't start race. Not the Captain!
Translated Text: Can't start race. Not the Captain!

Original Text: Only the Captain can claim ships!
Translated Text: Only the Captain can claim ships!

Original Text: You cannot claim a ship as a Polytechnic crew!
Translated Text: You cannot claim a ship as a Polytechnic crew!

Translated Text: 将反应堆冷却剂泵调至OFF

Translated Text: 调整反应堆冷却剂泵到低

Original Text: Adjusting reactor coolant pump to HIGH

Translated Text: Turns the coolant pump on at a low speed

Translated Text: Turns the coolant pump on at a high speed

Translated Text: Loads and unloads a fuel capsule that can be used to manually recharge programs

Translated Text: Activates the distress signal. Can bring fuel ships or enemies

Original Text: Overclock Reactor Toggle: Increases output and heat generation while enabled!
Translated Text: Overclock Reactor Toggle: Increases output and heat generation while enabled!

Original Text: Hull damage dealt by tracker missiles will cause extra damage to the
Translated Text: 追踪导弹造成的船体伤害会直接对

Original Text: I just enabled crew control for the screens!
Translated Text: I just enabled crew control for the screens!

Translated Text: Starts the process of scanning for nearby ships and objects outside of normal detection range. Your ship will be easier to detect by enemies while your sensors are boosted

Translated Text: Hull damage to target ship will be directed towards the Engineering system for 30 seconds

Translated Text: Hull damage to target ship will be directed towards the Weapons system for 30 seconds

Translated Text: 该系统已被锁定.需要舰长解锁
请将船对准即将跳跃的目标

Translated Text: 盲跳：立即使舰船跳跃且不进行导航.可能造成舰船损毁

Translated Text: Launch the currently loaded nuclear device at the target ship

Translated Text: Immediately detonate the active nuclear device

Translated Text: Provides information on a target ship's systems and power levels.

Translated Text: Boosts shield charging rate for all ships

Translated Text: Equipped with a long range laser weapon

Translated Text: Earn 20 levels aligned with the Colonial Union (

Translated Text: Can upgrade ship components at any time

Original Text: You need the <Advanced Operator> talent to use this station
Translated Text: You need the <Advanced Operator> talent to use this station

Original Text: You hand control of the Infected to the Alliance of Gentlemen.
Translated Text: You hand control of the Infected to the Alliance of Gentlemen.

Original Text: The Caretaker thanks you for your contribution and uses the Infected to achieve even the most ambitious of Alliance goals.
Translated Text: The Caretaker thanks you for your contribution and uses the Infected to achieve even the most ambitious of Alliance goals.

Original Text: The Estate emerges from the shadows and holds its own against all who try to subdue it—including the Colonial Union and W.D. fleets.
Translated Text: The Estate emerges from the shadows and holds its own against all who try to subdue it—including the Colonial Union and W.D. fleets.

Original Text: The Alliance of Gentlemen sees a surge of new members. enough to make it a truly formidable force in intergalactic society.
Translated Text: The Alliance of Gentlemen sees a surge of new members. enough to make it a truly formidable force in intergalactic society.

Original Text: The names of your crew go down in legend and are echoed by pirates and smugglers throughout the galaxies.
Translated Text: The names of your crew go down in legend and are echoed by pirates and smugglers throughout the galaxies.

Original Text: You are known as heroes who gave the outcasts a chance at power.
Translated Text: You are known as heroes who gave the outcasts a chance at power.

Original Text: Your influence in the Alliance of Gentlemen is as great as the Caretaker’s. and you are never wanting for profitable job opportunities for the rest of your days.
Translated Text: Your influence in the Alliance of Gentlemen is as great as the Caretaker’s. and you are never wanting for profitable job opportunities for the rest of your days.

Original Text: You hand control of the Infected to the Colonial Union.
Translated Text: You hand control of the Infected to the Colonial Union.

Original Text: Your findings are used to reverse the spread of the Infected. containing them and ending their scourge upon the galaxies.
Translated Text: Your findings are used to reverse the spread of the Infected. containing them and ending their scourge upon the galaxies.

Original Text: In the following months. you hear rumors that the Colonial Union is conducting further research on the Infected.
Translated Text: In the following months. you hear rumors that the Colonial Union is conducting further research on the Infected.

Original Text: A few leaks suggest that despite the events of the Wasted Wing. some of the Colonial Union’s research practices may be questionable.
Translated Text: A few leaks suggest that despite the events of the Wasted Wing. some of the Colonial Union’s research practices may be questionable.

Original Text: However. all information on the subject is classified.
Translated Text: However. all information on the subject is classified.

Original Text: The Colonial Union commends you for your loyalty and promotes your crew as officers of the highest order.
Translated Text: The Colonial Union commends you for your loyalty and promotes your crew as officers of the highest order.

Original Text: You are honored among Colonial Union ranks. and the citizens of the galaxy see you as heroes.
Translated Text: You are honored among Colonial Union ranks. and the citizens of the galaxy see you as heroes.

Original Text: Their power is never wielded by any individual or faction.
Translated Text: Their power is never wielded by any individual or faction.

Original Text: Their scourge upon the galaxy ends. and order is slowly restored.
Translated Text: Their scourge upon the galaxy ends. and order is slowly restored.

Original Text: For the most part. you are considered heroes.
Translated Text: For the most part. you are considered heroes.

Original Text: Regardless of your reasons for destroying the Infected. you are lauded for your foresight that their power was too great for anyone to wield.
Translated Text: Regardless of your reasons for destroying the Infected. you are lauded for your foresight that their power was too great for anyone to wield.

Original Text: Though the leaders of prominent factions criticize your decision.
Translated Text: Though the leaders of prominent factions criticize your decision.

Original Text: history looks upon you favorably for saving the galaxy from both the Infected and itself.
Translated Text: history looks upon you favorably for saving the galaxy from both the Infected and itself.

Original Text: You hand control of the Infected to the Fluffy Biscuit Company.
Translated Text: You hand control of the Infected to the Fluffy Biscuit Company.

Original Text: The Infected are used to protect deliveries and funnel space traffic towards Fluffy Biscuit shops.
Translated Text: The Infected are used to protect deliveries and funnel space traffic towards Fluffy Biscuit shops.

Original Text: You also hear rumors of a new secret ingredient that makes the biscuits especially delicious.
Translated Text: You also hear rumors of a new secret ingredient that makes the biscuits especially delicious.

Original Text: The nutritional facts list it only as “naturally sourced flavor enhancer”.
Translated Text: The nutritional facts list it only as “naturally sourced flavor enhancer”.

Original Text: You are promoted to high-level biscuit hawkers. and you become legends in the eyes of the other delivery crews.
Translated Text: You are promoted to high-level biscuit hawkers. and you become legends in the eyes of the other delivery crews.

Original Text: In your honor. a new biscuit flavor is named after your ship.
Translated Text: In your honor. a new biscuit flavor is named after your ship.

Original Text: You are never forced to participate in the biscuit sales competition again. and out of respect. the “special training device” is removed from your delivery ship.
Translated Text: You are never forced to participate in the biscuit sales competition again. and out of respect. the “special training device” is removed from your delivery ship.

Original Text: You heal and free the Infected.
Translated Text: You heal and free the Infected.

Original Text: Returned to their original state. the Infected withdraw from the galaxy and go back to wherever they originated.
Translated Text: Returned to their original state. the Infected withdraw from the galaxy and go back to wherever they originated.

Original Text: Their sudden change in behavior is puzzling to scientists and historians for years to come. but the citizens of the galaxy do not question their good fortune.
Translated Text: Their sudden change in behavior is puzzling to scientists and historians for years to come. but the citizens of the galaxy do not question their good fortune.

Original Text: Your actions at the Lost Colony go unnoticed by the galaxy’s citizens.
Translated Text: Your actions at the Lost Colony go unnoticed by the galaxy’s citizens.

Original Text: They do not know that you are their heroes. but the newfound peace and stability can be attributed largely to your triumph.
Translated Text: They do not know that you are their heroes. but the newfound peace and stability can be attributed largely to your triumph.

Original Text: Far away. past the edges of known space. the sentient creatures once known as the Infected are grateful for your help.
Translated Text: Far away. past the edges of known space. the sentient creatures once known as the Infected are grateful for your help.

Original Text: They will not forget what you have done for them.
Translated Text: They will not forget what you have done for them.

Original Text: You keep control of the Infected for yourselves.
Translated Text: You keep control of the Infected for yourselves.

Original Text: With power over the Infected at your fingertips. all your goals are easily attainable.
Translated Text: With power over the Infected at your fingertips. all your goals are easily attainable.

Original Text: It does not matter if someone opposes you. They are inconsequential.
Translated Text: It does not matter if someone opposes you. They are inconsequential.

Original Text: As no one in the galaxy can contend with the weaponized Infected. you quickly rise in power.
Translated Text: As no one in the galaxy can contend with the weaponized Infected. you quickly rise in power.

Original Text: Even the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation do not stand a chance against you—in this galaxy or any other.
Translated Text: Even the Colonial Union and the W.D. Corporation do not stand a chance against you—in this galaxy or any other.

Original Text: The known universe is yours. and you can shape it as you see fit.
Translated Text: The known universe is yours. and you can shape it as you see fit.

Original Text: The future is whatever you wish it to be…until whispers of rebellion begin to form.
Translated Text: The future is whatever you wish it to be…until whispers of rebellion begin to form.

Original Text: Scrambling in the hunt for the Lost Colony. the galaxy's inhabitants are utterly unaware of the grave existential threat heading their way.
Translated Text: Scrambling in the hunt for the Lost Colony. the galaxy's inhabitants are utterly unaware of the grave existential threat heading their way.

Original Text: The Polytechnic Federation. however. has taken notice and begins preparations to face it…
Translated Text: The Polytechnic Federation. however. has taken notice and begins preparations to face it…

Original Text: You and your crew have defeated the Unseen mothership.
Translated Text: You and your crew have defeated the Unseen mothership.

Original Text: The Unseen threat is no longer a danger to this galaxy. nor any other.
Translated Text: The Unseen threat is no longer a danger to this galaxy. nor any other.

Original Text: Occupied with the hunt for the Lost Colony. the galaxy is unaware of your victory.
Translated Text: Occupied with the hunt for the Lost Colony. the galaxy is unaware of your victory.

Original Text: Unfortunately. your ship and crew were destroyed in the mothership’s explosion.
Translated Text: Unfortunately. your ship and crew were destroyed in the mothership’s explosion.

Original Text: Not all was lost. however. as your final memories managed to reach the Compiler and soon merged with its central code.
Translated Text: Not all was lost. however. as your final memories managed to reach the Compiler and soon merged with its central code.

Original Text: The members of the Polytechnic Federation both celebrate and mourn your sacrifice
Translated Text: The members of the Polytechnic Federation both celebrate and mourn your sacrifice

Original Text: The actions of your crew will live on inside the code. informing and inspiring all future members of the federation.
Translated Text: The actions of your crew will live on inside the code. informing and inspiring all future members of the federation.

Original Text: You hand control of the Infected to the W.D. Corporation.
Translated Text: You hand control of the Infected to the W.D. Corporation.

Original Text: The Infected are repurposed to assist the company’s newest line of exploratory combat vessels.
Translated Text: The Infected are repurposed to assist the company’s newest line of exploratory combat vessels.

Original Text: The W.D. fleet pushes the boundaries of known space and is the first to discover thousands of untouched sectors and planets.
Translated Text: The W.D. fleet pushes the boundaries of known space and is the first to discover thousands of untouched sectors and planets.

Original Text: With a rush of new resources and prestige. the Corporation expands—becoming larger and more profitable than ever before.
Translated Text: With a rush of new resources and prestige. the Corporation expands—becoming larger and more profitable than ever before.

Original Text: Due to your phenomenal work. your crewmembers are promoted to the ranks of chief supervisors.
Translated Text: Due to your phenomenal work. your crewmembers are promoted to the ranks of chief supervisors.

Original Text: For better or for worse. you have great sway in the future operations of the biggest company in the known universe.
Translated Text: For better or for worse. you have great sway in the future operations of the biggest company in the known universe.

Original Text: Nearly every major decision of a voyage falls into the Captain’s hands. With clear communication and resolve. the Captain must be the link that coordinates the actions of the entire crew. As the Captain determines the route the crew will take—through both the galaxy itself and the hard choices they encounter—success is more often than not a reflection of his or her leadership.
Translated Text: 航行中几乎所有的重要决策都会交给舰长.$舰长必须充当协调全体舰员的纽带.$并具备清晰的沟通能力与问题解决能力.$舰长决定着舰员将驶过的航线——且其将穿过$银河系与重重困难——不过通常成功$不仅仅是舰长领导能力的反映.$

Original Text: The Pilot is responsible for flying the ship and navigating across sectors of space. Through management of different flight controls. a Pilot must maneuver the ship through debris. position it effectively during combat. and align it to the next sector for warp. Despite various flight styles in the field. most Pilots become one with their ships and make them extensions of themselves.
Translated Text: 飞行员负责在星域中穿梭和驾驶飞船.$通过管理不同的飞控.飞行员必须操纵$飞船穿越残骸区、在战斗中高效地调整$姿态并在跃迁前对齐下一星区.$即使实操中有各种飞行风格.$大部分飞行员仍人舰合一.$让舰船成为自己的延伸.$

Original Text: Scientists provide the crew with medical assistance and information about their current environment. As they possess superior technological prowess. Scientists have the responsibility of overseeing sensor sweeps. ship security. the breaching of enemy firewalls. and research. Furthermore. their skills are invaluable when developing strategies or exploring alien planets.
Translated Text: 科学家给予舰员医疗帮助与当下环境信息.$他们拥有非凡的技术能力.$并负责监视传感器扫描、舰船安全、$突破敌舰防火墙与科研.$不仅如此.在发展战略或探索外星星球时.$他们的技能更显宝贵.$

Original Text: Guns. turrets. nukes—the Weapons Specialist manages them all. Operating lasers. missiles and any other combat related technologies. Weapons Specialists have the greatest direct impact in battle. and their aim can greatly sway the outcome of a fight. Apart from ship-to-ship combat. Weapons Specialists are also crucial in ship boarding and investigations of hostile environments.
Translated Text: 枪炮.炮塔.核弹——它们尽由武器专家掌管.$武器专家们操作激光、导弹和其它格斗相关技术.$在战斗中造成最直接的影响.$而且他们的瞄准左右战斗的结果.$除了舰对舰格斗.$武器专家也对登舰和调查敌对环境十分必要.$

Original Text: The Engineer keeps the ship running. In addition to charging the warp drive and manning the startup switchboard. Engineers must continually maintain and repair vital ship systems. as well as control ship power flow to prevent overheating. Engineers make the most out of a reactor’s capabilities and balance power allocation for the greatest possible output.
Translated Text: 工程师保证舰船正常运转.$工程师不仅充能跃迁、操纵启动配电柜.他们还要持续维护与维修关键的$舰船系统和控制舰船能源以防过热.工程师榨尽反应堆的每一点性能.$平衡能源分配.尽可能输出最大的能源.$

Original Text: Location of a Colonial Union terraforming station.
Translated Text: Location of a Colonial Union terraforming station.

Original Text: [b]Your Decision[/b]$$Time is running short for me. My rations are long gone. and I know I will not find a way back from the quantum reflection. With a few tweaks to the Lost Colony’s communication tower. I have sent out a transmission so that this place will not again lie forgotten. Whoever first reads this log. please know that a grave decision lies with you. Control over the Infected could mean control over the galaxy at large—and perhaps many other galaxies as well. However you decide to handle the power of the Infected. I leave the decision in your hands.
Translated Text: [b]Your Decision[/b]$$Time is running short for me. My rations are long gone. and I know I will not find a way back from the quantum reflection. With a few tweaks to the Lost Colony’s communication tower. I have sent out a transmission so that this place will not again lie forgotten. Whoever first reads this log. please know that a grave decision lies with you. Control over the Infected could mean control over the galaxy at large—and perhaps many other galaxies as well. However you decide to handle the power of the Infected. I leave the decision in your hands.

Original Text: [b]Internal Network Messages (Recovered)@[/b]$Subject: Revalis@$@$Havener.@$@$You’re friends with that lab assistant. Revalis. aren’t you? I need you to talk him down before he does something stupid. It seems he’s suddenly having qualms with the ethics of our experiments. and he’s been floating some dangerous suggestions about Subject A. You see. we need to keep this thing in a physically weakened state. or we won’t be able to maintain control over it in the tank. Revalis. however. has a problem with that.@$@$As it stands. most members of Team 1 don’t trust Revalis in the containment chamber. They think if we turn our backs on him. he’ll do something that could ruin our research forever. We already removed his clearance access. but the way he’s been talking in the mess hall. that may not be enough punishment. If you don’t want your friend on the first ship back to the prime galaxy. talk some sense into him.@$@$I’m risking my job just by mentioning this to you. so consider us even.@@$–Darshen$[newpage][b]Internal Network Messages (Recovered)@[/b]$Subject: Re: Tomorrow@$$Havener.@$$Calm down and be realistic here. This is just a test. Need I remind you. a prolonged connection can cause headaches. disorientation. nausea. hallucinations. and partial or complete loss of brain function. Don’t expect to be in the chair for more than a few minutes.@$$I know you’re excited. but try to get a good night’s sleep.$$You’re going to need it.@$–Darshen@
Translated Text: [b]Internal Network Messages (Recovered)@[/b]$Subject: Revalis@$@$Havener.@$@$You’re friends with that lab assistant. Revalis. aren’t you? I need you to talk him down before he does something stupid. It seems he’s suddenly having qualms with the ethics of our experiments. and he’s been floating some dangerous suggestions about Subject A. You see. we need to keep this thing in a physically weakened state. or we won’t be able to maintain control over it in the tank. Revalis. however. has a problem with that.@$@$As it stands. most members of Team 1 don’t trust Revalis in the containment chamber. They think if we turn our backs on him. he’ll do something that could ruin our research forever. We already removed his clearance access. but the way he’s been talking in the mess hall. that may not be enough punishment. If you don’t want your friend on the first ship back to the prime galaxy. talk some sense into him.@$@$I’m risking my job just by mentioning this to you. so consider us even.@@$–Darshen$[newpage][b]Internal Network Messages (Recovered)@[/b]$Subject: Re: Tomorrow@$$Havener.@$$Calm down and be realistic here. This is just a test. Need I remind you. a prolonged connection can cause headaches. disorientation. nausea. hallucinations. and partial or complete loss of brain function. Don’t expect to be in the chair for more than a few minutes.@$$I know you’re excited. but try to get a good night’s sleep.$$You’re going to need it.@$–Darshen@

Original Text: [b]Internal Network Messages (Recovered)@[/b]$Subject: Prevention of Long-Range Communication@$$To Dr. Darshen.@$$We have found something you might be interested in.@ Signals that jam long-range communications may hinder the creatures’ regenerative properties. It seems to disconnect them from the Mindslaver. It is not something we anticipated. While it may be beneficial at this stage in our research. if left in the next stage. it could be a terrible oversight.$@$I will have our full report written up by next week.@$$—Pandev. Project Leader. Team 3B@

Original Text: [b]Ghosts[/b]$$When I first arrived at the Lost Colony. I was caught off guard. I hadn’t expected to find apparitions—let alone ones that could pose a threat to my wellbeing. These ghosts have pursued me around the facility. often sneaking up behind me. I’m glad my regeneration atrium was still functional. Since then. I’ve learned how to deal with the ghosts. When keeping an eye on them. they will not move. Only when you turn away will they approach.$[newpage]I have observed the ghosts for some time now. and I have a suspicion as to their origin. I believe they are a byproduct of the immense psychic energy at the core of this facility. Much like how tornadoes can be spawned from hurricanes. the psychic energy is creating splinter forms of what was once around it. In this case. the splinter forms are imprints of the human residents who once worked at the Lost Colony. Though I doubt they have any sentience. by looking at them I sometimes feel that I am not entirely alone in this place.
Translated Text: [b]Ghosts[/b]$$When I first arrived at the Lost Colony. I was caught off guard. I hadn’t expected to find apparitions—let alone ones that could pose a threat to my wellbeing. These ghosts have pursued me around the facility. often sneaking up behind me. I’m glad my regeneration atrium was still functional. Since then. I’ve learned how to deal with the ghosts. When keeping an eye on them. they will not move. Only when you turn away will they approach.$[newpage]I have observed the ghosts for some time now. and I have a suspicion as to their origin. I believe they are a byproduct of the immense psychic energy at the core of this facility. Much like how tornadoes can be spawned from hurricanes. the psychic energy is creating splinter forms of what was once around it. In this case. the splinter forms are imprints of the human residents who once worked at the Lost Colony. Though I doubt they have any sentience. by looking at them I sometimes feel that I am not entirely alone in this place.

Original Text: [b]SYSTEM ERROR: OVERRIDE REQUIRED.[/b]$$Containment door will remain locked until all systems are nominal. Refer to upper right of containment screen for items that must be fixed. When all systems are nominal. push switch below to open containment door.
Translated Text: [b]SYSTEM ERROR: OVERRIDE REQUIRED.[/b]$$Containment door will remain locked until all systems are nominal. Refer to upper right of containment screen for items that must be fixed. When all systems are nominal. push switch below to open containment door.

Original Text: [b]The Quantum Reflection[/b]$$The Lost Colony was once a secret facility created by humans before the Old Wars. The humans ensured it would be difficult to find. tucked away in something called the ^quantum reflection^ which acts an alternate version of reality—another dimension in a sense—to separate the Lost Colony from the rest of the universe. For thousands of Union-standard years. the quantum reflection has kept the Lost Colony in pristine condition. truly a time capsule of the pre-Old Wars era. I believe the quantum reflection was a safety measure to keep the Lost Colony hidden. as well as contain the experiments inside. While remarkable. it ultimately failed at preventing one experiment from escaping.
Translated Text: [b]The Quantum Reflection[/b]$$The Lost Colony was once a secret facility created by humans before the Old Wars. The humans ensured it would be difficult to find. tucked away in something called the ^quantum reflection^ which acts an alternate version of reality—another dimension in a sense—to separate the Lost Colony from the rest of the universe. For thousands of Union-standard years. the quantum reflection has kept the Lost Colony in pristine condition. truly a time capsule of the pre-Old Wars era. I believe the quantum reflection was a safety measure to keep the Lost Colony hidden. as well as contain the experiments inside. While remarkable. it ultimately failed at preventing one experiment from escaping.

Original Text: Temp is low but not dangerous to human life.
Translated Text: Temp is low but not dangerous to human life.

Original Text: [b]To whoever first reads this.[/b]$$Congratulations. You have found the Lost Colony. I am certain it was a difficult journey. and I wish I were here to welcome you. By the time you read this. I will be gone. For me. the Lost Colony was a one-way trip. I surely hope with your connections. you will manage your way back to the galaxy from which you came. In any case. I have left my logs around the Lost Colony's facilities so that you may learn as I did the secrets that the Lost Colony has hidden for thousands of years. When you reach the center of the Lost Colony. you will be faced with a decision of great magnitude.$ $Since you have come this far. I trust you are capable of choosing rightly. I could not. The choice was never mine to make.@
Translated Text: [b]To whoever first reads this.[/b]$$Congratulations. You have found the Lost Colony. I am certain it was a difficult journey. and I wish I were here to welcome you. By the time you read this. I will be gone. For me. the Lost Colony was a one-way trip. I surely hope with your connections. you will manage your way back to the galaxy from which you came. In any case. I have left my logs around the Lost Colony's facilities so that you may learn as I did the secrets that the Lost Colony has hidden for thousands of years. When you reach the center of the Lost Colony. you will be faced with a decision of great magnitude.$ $Since you have come this far. I trust you are capable of choosing rightly. I could not. The choice was never mine to make.@
